anya-e0103n0:25_1: Svāyaṃ visuddhimaggo yaṃ suttapadaṃ nissāya paṭṭhapīyati,
anya-e0103n0:25_2: taṃ tāva nikkhipitvā tassa nidānādiniddhāraṇamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:25_3: Dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇentena hi ādito tassa nidānaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:25_4: tato payojanaṃ piṇḍattho padattho sambandho adhippāyo codanā sodhanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:25_6: Ettha hi bhagavantaṃ kirātiādi desanāya nidānapayojananiddhāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:26_4: Sumaṅgalavilāsinīādayo viya hi dīghanikāyādīnaṃ nāyaṃ visuṃ saṃvaṇṇanā,
anya-e0103n0:26_8: Atha vā thomanāpubbikāpi cāyaṃ kathā na vatthupubbikāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:26_9: Sāsane hi vatthukittanaṃ na loke viya kevalaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:26_10: sāsanasampattikittanattā pana satthu aviparītadhammadesanābhāvavibhāvanena satthuguṇasaṃkittanaṃ ulliṅgantameva pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:26_12: Sotāpannādibhāvassa ca kāraṇanti ettha hi ādi-
anya-e0103n0:26_13: saddena sabbasakadāgāmianāgāmino viya sabbepi arahanto saṅgayhanti vibhāgassa anuddhaṭattā.
anya-e0103n0:26_14: Tena tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyā sīlādayo idha “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tiādivacanena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:26_15: Tiṇṇampi hi nesaṃ carimabhave visesato saṃsārabhayikkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:26_16: yathāsakaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanapaṭipatti ca samānāti.
anya-e0103n0:26_17: Atha vā “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti sādhāraṇavacanena sātisayaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:26_24: Atha vā thomanāpubbikā evāyaṃ kathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:26_25: “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”tiādinā satthu thomanaṃ purakkhatvā saṃvaṇṇanāya āraddhattā.
anya-e0103n0:26_26: Sā panāyaṃ yasmā pucchantassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ byākaraṇasamatthatāya vibhāvanavasena pavattitā,
anya-e0103n0:26_27: āciṇṇañcetaṃ ācariyassa yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammānukūlaṃ saṃvaṇṇanārambhe satthu abhitthavanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:26_28: Tasmā iminā kāraṇena evamettha thomanā pavattitāti.
anya-e0103n0:26_29: Thomanākārassa vuccamānassa kāraṇaṃ uddharantena paṭhamaṃ vissajjanagāthaṃ nikkhipitvā tassā nidānacodanāmukhena
anya-e0103n0:26_30: pucchāgāthaṃ sarūpato ca atthato ca dassetvā tassā pucchāya aviparītabyākaraṇasamatthabhāvāvajotanaṃ
anya-e0103n0:26_33: Tattha gāthāya attho parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n0:27_9: Atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:27_11: “Iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe.
anya-e0103n0:27_12: “Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho,
anya-e0103n0:27_20: “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda,
anya-e0103n0:30_0: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti. –
anya-e0103n0:31_4: “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve.
anya-e0103n0:31_5: “Yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite.
anya-e0103n0:31_6: Loke pana “vutto guṇo vutto pārāyano”tiādīsu ajjhesane.
anya-e0103n0:31_11: Tasmā “iti hi evameva idaṃ suttaṃ desita”nti yathānikkhittaṃ gāthaṃ desitabhāvena nidasseti.
anya-e0103n0:32_5: Tadatthassa attano buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānataṃ upādāya “ida”nti vatvā puna bhagavatā bhāsitākāraṃ sandhāya “eta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:32_6: Sakalena panānena vacanena desanāya nidānaṃ jotitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:32_7: Parato tassā desakadesakālapaṭiggāhake vibhāvetuṃ “bhagavantaṃ kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:32_9: Tena vuccamānassatthassa anu anu suyyamānataṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0103n0:32_15: “Saṃsayasamugghāṭattha”nti ca iminā pañcasu pucchāsu ayaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:32_18: Sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedo attano avayavabhūto eva jālo etissā atthīti “jālinī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:33_0: Idānissā jaṭākārena pavattiṃ dassetuṃ “sā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:33_3: Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇe kadāci dhammārammaṇe kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇeti evaṃ heṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n0:33_6: Kadāci kāmabhave kadāci rūpabhave kadāci arūpabhave kadāci vā arūpabhave…pe…
anya-e0103n0:33_7: kadāci kāmabhaveti evamettha heṭṭhupariyavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:33_8: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvattā aparāparuppatti ettha saṃsibbananti āha “punappunaṃ uppajjanato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:33_9: “Saṃsibbanaṭṭhenā”ti idaṃ yena sambandhena jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti jaṭātaṇhānaṃ upamūpameyyatā,
anya-e0103n0:33_13: kosasañcayādayo ca attanā attano avayavehi saṃsibbitā vinaddhā “jaṭā”ti vuccanti,
anya-e0103n0:33_17: Ayaṃ hi taṇhā kosakārakimi viya attanāva attānampi saṃsibbantī pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:33_21: Ime sattā “mama ida”nti pariggahitaṃ vatthuṃ attanibbisesaṃ maññamānā abbhantarimaṃ karonti.
anya-e0103n0:33_22: Abbhantarattho ca antosaddoti sakaparikkhāre uppajjamānāpi taṇhā “antojaṭā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:34_4: asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyāti vā ādinā sakaattabhāvādīsu taṇhāya uppajjamānākāro veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:34_11: Kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kathañcipi avimutto ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti “ajjhattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:34_18: pavattiākārabhedena ca anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṃ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā “tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:34_19: Sā pana “pajā”ti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṃ taṃ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha “jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:34_20: Tathā hi paramatthato yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi,
anya-e0103n0:34_21: ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato samudāyaṃ bhinnaṃ katvā upamūpameyyaṃ dassento “yathā nāma veḷujaṭādīhi…pe…
anya-e0103n0:34_24: Tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṃsibbanena tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:35_0: Evaṃ “antojaṭā”tiādinā puṭṭho pana assa devaputtassa imaṃ gāthamāhāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:35_1: “Edisova imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeyyā”ti satthāraṃ guṇato dassento “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:35_4: Etena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāvibhāvanena ādito tiṇṇaṃ āveṇikadhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇatāya
anya-e0103n0:35_5: tadavinābhāvato ca bhagavato sesāveṇikadhammānampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:35_14: Atha vā devanīyā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā,
anya-e0103n0:35_19: Bhagavā pana niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravijayicchānipphattiyā
anya-e0103n0:35_23: māravijayasabbasabbaññuguṇaparahitanipphādanesu appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
anya-e0103n0:35_25: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitattā tesaṃ devānaṃ seṭṭho uttamo devoti devadevo.
anya-e0103n0:35_27: visuddhidevabhāvassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa vā adhigatattā aññesaṃ devānaṃ atisayena devoti devadevo.
anya-e0103n0:36_1: mahābrahmānañca guṇābhibhavanato adhiko atisayo atirekataro vā sakko brahmā cāti sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā.
anya-e0103n0:36_2: Ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesesu sadevake loke kenaci avikkhambhanīyaṭṭhānatāya kutocipi utrastābhāvato catūhi vesārajjehi visāradoti catuvesārajjavisārado.
anya-e0103n0:36_3: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e0103n0:36_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato,
anya-e0103n0:36_10: Tañca sabbaṃ samantato sabbākārato hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassanasamatthena ñāṇacakkhunā samannāgatattā samantacakkhu,
anya-e0103n0:36_12: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi pacchimāni dve asādhāraṇañāṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n0:37_0: Ettha ca “sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro”ti iminā tiyaddhāruḷhānaṃ pucchānaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthatāya
anya-e0103n0:37_1: dassitāya kiṃ devatānampi pucchaṃ byākātuṃ samattho bhagavāti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “devadevo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:37_2: Devānaṃ atidevo sakko devānamindo devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeti,
anya-e0103n0:37_3: “tato imassa ko viseso”ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ “sakkānaṃ atisakko”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:37_5: “tato imassa ko atisayo”ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ “brahmānaṃ atibrahmā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:37_6: Ayaṃ cassa viseso catuvesārajjadasabalañāṇehi pākaṭo jātoti dassanatthaṃ “catu…pe…
anya-e0103n0:37_8: Imāni ca ñāṇāni imassa ñāṇadvayassa adhigamena saheva siddhānīti dassanatthaṃ “anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:37_9: Tayidaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ puññañāṇasambhārūpacayasiddhāya bhaggadosatāya siddhanti dassento “bhagavā”ti avocāti.
anya-e0103n0:37_12: Yaṃ panetaṃ pacchimaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇanti ñāṇadvayaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:37_14: Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ visayapavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:38_1: Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esī gavesīti mahesi, bhagavā.
anya-e0103n0:38_6: Sudullabhanti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena laddhabbattā suṭṭhu dullabhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:38_8: Ariyamaggo hi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena,
anya-e0103n0:38_12: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā;
anya-e0103n0:39_0: Yathābhūtaṃ ajānantāti evaṃ sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhiparamparāya adhigantabbo evarūpo evaṃkiccako evamatthoti yāthāvato anavabujjhantā.
anya-e0103n0:39_2: saṃsārato ca suddhiṃ vimuttiṃ kāmenti patthentīti suddhikāmā. Api-
anya-e0103n0:39_7: Bhāvanāya yuttapayuttatāya yogino vāyamantāpi visuddhiṃ uddissa payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karontāpi upāyassa anadhigatattā visuddhiṃ nādhigacchantīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:39_9: Kāmañcāyaṃ visuddhimaggo samantabhaddakattā savanadhāraṇaparicayādipasutānaṃ sabbesampi pāmojjakaro,
anya-e0103n0:39_10: yogīnaṃ pana sātisayaṃ pamodahetūti āha “tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa”nti.
anya-e0103n0:39_14: Ettha ca “tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa”ntiādinā sabbasaṃkilesamalavisuddhatāya visuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ patthentānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:39_15: yogīnaṃ ekaṃsena tadāvahattā pāmojjakaro ñāṇuttarehi sammāpaṭipannehi adhiṭṭhitattā suṭṭhu sammā visuddhavinicchayo
anya-e0103n0:39_17: Sakkaccaṃ me bhāsato sakkaccaṃ nisāmayathāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:40_0: Ettha ca “imissā dāni gāthāyā”ti iminā visuddhimaggabhāsanassa nissayaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:40_8: sakkacca”nti ca iminā karaṇappakāraṃ dassetvā “visuddhikāmā sabbepi,
anya-e0103n0:40_9: nisāmayatha sādhavo”ti iminā tattha sakkaccasavane sādhujane niyojeti.
anya-e0103n0:41_1: Vacanatthavibhāvanena paveditavisuddhimaggasāmaññatthassa visuddhimaggakathā vuccamānā abhiruciṃ uppādetīti
anya-e0103n0:41_3: Tattha tatthāti yadidaṃ “visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa”nti ettha visuddhimaggapadaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha.
anya-e0103n0:41_8: Yathāvuttaṃ visuddhiṃ maggati gavesati adhigacchati etenāti visuddhimaggo.
anya-e0103n0:42_2: tesu ayameko nayo gahitoti dassetuṃ “so panāya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:42_7: saddena ca visesanivattiatthena savisesaṃ samādhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0103n0:42_8: So upacārappanābhedo vipassanāyānikassa desanāti katvā na samādhimattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:42_9: Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṃ vinā vipassanā sambhavati.
anya-e0103n0:42_13: Yaṃ pana gāthāyaṃ aniccalakkhaṇasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:42_14: taṃ yassa tadeva suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:42_16: Sopi hi itaraṃ lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā sammasitvā visesaṃ adhigacchati,
anya-e0103n0:43_2: Aniccāti na niccā addhuvā ittarā khaṇabhaṅgurāti.
anya-e0103n0:43_6: Nibbindati dukkheti tasmiṃyeva aniccākārato diṭṭhe “sabbe saṅkhārā”ti vutte tebhūmake khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte
anya-e0103n0:43_8: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti esa nibbidānupassanāsaṅkhāto virāgādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūto nibbānassa adhigamūpāyo.
anya-e0103n0:44_1: Jhānanti cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:44_4: yo puggalo jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā taṃ ussukkāpeti.
anya-e0103n0:44_5: Sa ve nibbānasantiketi so byattaṃ nibbānassa samīpe ekantato nibbānaṃ adhigacchatīti.
anya-e0103n0:45_1: Sā hi apacayagāmitāya sattānaṃ suddhiṃ āvahati.
anya-e0103n0:45_12: Dhammoti samādhi “evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n0:45_17: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti vacanato sammāvāyāmasatīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:45_19: Jīvitamuttamanti evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa jīvitaṃ uttamaṃ jīvitanti evamettha aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:46_7: Pahitattoti nibbānaṃ patipesitattatāya kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhacitto.
anya-e0103n0:47_5: Ekaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ayati gacchatīti ekāyano,
anya-e0103n0:47_6: ekena vā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena ayitabbo paṭipajjitabboti ekāyano,
anya-e0103n0:47_10: ekasmiṃ vā imasmiṃyeva dhammavinaye ayanoti ekāyano.
anya-e0103n0:47_15: Pubbe saraṇalakkhaṇena maggaṭṭhena ca maggoti vuttasseva kāyādivisayabhedena catubbidhattā “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:47_18: Appamādābhiratiādivasenāpi hi katthaci visuddhimaggo desito. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:50_3: tato saṃkhittatarā atthavaṇṇanā uddesaṭṭhāniyāti āha “ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:50_8: akusalā sīlā”tiādīsu akusalā dhammāpi sīlanti āgatā.
anya-e0103n0:50_9: Vuccamānāya pana cittapaññābhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānāyogyatāya kiriyasīlānampi asambhavo,
anya-e0103n0:50_15: Tathābhūto hi taṃ avijahanto tattha patiṭṭhito nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:50_20: Bhinditvā pana gahaṇe yathā lokiyacittuppādesu sahajātānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:50_24: tadā “saddhaṃ upanissāyā”tiādīsu viya purimakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:50_25: Tenāha “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:50_27: tadā “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādīsu viya samānakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:50_28: Sammāvācādayo hi attanā sampayuttānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ sahajātavaseneva nissayapaccayā hontīti.
anya-e0103n0:51_2: itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena puri ucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti “puriso”ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:51_4: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:51_9: padhānameva pana sattaṃ dassento “naro”ti āha yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:51_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṃ “naroti satto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:51_11: Sapaññoti vipākabhūtāya saha paññāya pavattatīti sapañño.
anya-e0103n0:51_12: Tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya santānavasena bahulaṃ pavattamānāya ayaṃ satto savisesaṃ “sapañño”ti vattabbataṃ arahati.
anya-e0103n0:51_13: Vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesanena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayo hoti ahetukadvihetukānaṃ tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:51_14: Sampajaññasaṅkhātāya ca taṃtaṃkiccakārikāya paññāya vasena “sapañño”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n0:51_16: saddena pārihārikapaññā gayhatīti vipākapaññāvasenevettha attho vutto.
anya-e0103n0:51_17: Kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāyāti kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ paññāyāti evaṃ tihetuka-
anya-e0103n0:51_21: Paṭisandhito pabhuti pavattamānā paññā “paṭisandhiyaṃ paññā”ti vuttā taṃmūlakattā,
anya-e0103n0:52_2: Na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṃ sādhenti,
anya-e0103n0:52_7: iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva.
anya-e0103n0:52_9: saddo viññāṇe niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ “cittasīsena hettha samādhi niddiṭṭho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:52_12: “Bhāvaya”nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā idhādhippetāti taṃ dassetuṃ “vipassana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:52_18: Taṃ hi bhāvayamāno ariyamaggakkhaṇe taṇhājaṭaṃ samucchedavasena vijaṭetīti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:52_20: Nānantariyabhāvena panettha lokiyāpi gahitāva honti lokiyasamathavipassanāya vinā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:52_21: Samathayānikassa hi upacārappanāppabhedaṃ samādhiṃ itarassa khaṇikasamādhiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:52_22: ubhayesampi vimokkhamukhattayaṃ vinā na kadācipi lokuttarādhigamo sambhavati.
anya-e0103n0:53_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi vīriyaṃ sati sampajaññanti ime tayo dhammā bahūpakārā.
anya-e0103n0:53_7: Na hi saddheyyavatthuṃ asaddahantassa yathāvuttavīriyādayo sambhavanti,
anya-e0103n0:53_11: Vīriyādīsu hi sampajjamānesu samādhi sampannova hoti asamāhitassa tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:53_19: Apare pana “sapañño”ti imināva pārihārikapaññāpi gayhatīti “nipako”ti padassa “sato”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:53_22: Ātappasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddo vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti āha “ātāpīti vīriyavā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:53_23: Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:53_31: Ātāpanaggahaṇena cettha ārambha dhātumāha ādito vīriyārambhoti katvā,
anya-e0103n0:53_35: tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako,
anya-e0103n0:54_0: Abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti sabbakiccapariṇāyikā.
anya-e0103n0:54_1: Kammaṭṭhānassa vā uggaho paripucchā bhāvanārambho manasikāravidhi,
anya-e0103n0:54_2: tattha ca sakkaccakāritā sātaccakāritā sappāyakāritā nimittakusalatā pahitattatā antarāasaṅkoco indriyasamattapaṭipādanā
anya-e0103n0:54_3: vīriyasamatāpādanaṃ vīriyasamatāyojananti evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kiccānaṃ pariṇāyikā sabbakiccapariṇāyikā.
anya-e0103n0:54_4: Bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhūti sādhāraṇato bhikkhulakkhaṇakathanena paṭipattiyāva bhikkhubhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:54_9: Bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti vā bhikkhu.
anya-e0103n0:54_10: So imaṃ vijaṭayeti yo naro sappañño sīle patiṭṭhāya ātāpī nipako cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti vutto,
anya-e0103n0:54_11: so bhikkhu imaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭayeti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:54_12: Idāni tampi vijaṭanaṃ veḷugumbavijaṭanena upametvā dassetuṃ gāthāya yathāvutte sīlādidhamme “iminā ca sīlenā”tiādinā paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n0:54_13: Tattha yasmā yogāvacarasantānagatā nānākkhaṇikā missakā sīlādidhammā gāthāya gahitā,
anya-e0103n0:54_14: tasmā te ekaccaṃ gaṇhanto “chahi dhammehi samannāgato”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:54_15: Na hi te cha dhammā ekasmiṃ santāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe labbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:54_17: tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṃ dassento “seyyathāpi nāma puriso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:54_21: bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṃ upameyye dassento “samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n0:54_27: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭetuṃ samattho nāma.
anya-e0103n0:54_28: Vijaṭanaṃ cettha samucchedavasena pahānanti āha “sañchindeyya sampadāleyyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:54_30: aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo cāti aggadakkhiṇeyyo,
anya-e0103n0:55_15: sampajānassa vā asammohassa kārako uppādakoti sampajānakārī,
anya-e0103n0:55_18: Sīlādisampādane vīriyassa tesaṃ aṅgabhāvato taṃ visuṃ aggahetvā “sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:56_0: “Visuddhimaggaṃ dassetī”ti avibhāgato desanāya piṇḍatthaṃ vatvā puna taṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:56_4: Sīlādidhammehi saṃvaraṇādivasena āsevanto te sikkhatīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:56_12: Taṃ pana taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanassa patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ adhippetanti āha “sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:57_1: Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇatāya sāsanassa ādikalyāṇataṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0103n0:57_8: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇanti sabbassāpi sāvajjassa akiriyā anajjhāpajjanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:57_9: Etena cārittavārittabhedassa sabbassa sīlassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:57_15: vimutti ca anuttarā”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:57_17: “Avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahattā”ti etena na kevalaṃ sīlassa kalyāṇatāva vibhāvitā,
anya-e0103n0:57_19: Tathā hissa sutte avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vimuttiñāṇapariyosānānaṃ paramparapaccayatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:57_21: Sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ saṅgahetvā pavattāya gāthāya ādipadena ādimhi paṭipajjitabbassa sīlassa,
anya-e0103n0:57_22: tatiyapadena pariyosāne paṭipajjitabbāya paññāya gahitattā majjhe paṭipajjitabbo samādhi pārisesato dutiyapadena
anya-e0103n0:57_23: gayhatīti “kusalassa upasampadātiādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:57_25: Pubbūpanissayavato hi samāhitatādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena abhinīhārakkhamatā samādhissa iddhividhādiguṇāvahattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:57_32: sacittassa sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchindanena visodhanaṃ sacittapariyodāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:57_33: Evaṃ pana paññākicce matthakappatte uttari karaṇīyābhāvato sāsanassa paññuttaratā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:57_38: Tato eva vā yādiso anāpāthagatesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu,
anya-e0103n0:58_1: tathā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayassāti tesaṃ pakāsanākārūpasaṃhārattho tathā- saddo.
anya-e0103n0:58_3: kammassakatañāṇabalena ca saṃkilesamalato visujjhati pāripūriñca gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:58_5: ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato.
anya-e0103n0:58_9: Puretaraṃ siddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0103n0:58_10: Samādhipaññā viya abhiññāpaṭisambhidānaṃ sīlaṃ na sabhāgahetūti katvā vuttaṃ “na tato para”nti.
anya-e0103n0:58_11: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo.
anya-e0103n0:58_12: Paññā viya paṭisambhidānaṃ samādhi na sabhāgahetūti vuttaṃ “na tato para”nti.
anya-e0103n0:58_15: paccekabodhisammāsambodhiyopi paññāsampattisannissayāti paññāya anadhigantabbassa visesassa abhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:58_16: tassā ca paṭisambhidāpabhedassa ekantikakāraṇato heṭṭhā viya “na tato para”nti avatvā “na aññena kāraṇenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:59_0: Ettha ca “sīlasampattiñhi nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti,
anya-e0103n0:59_2: Satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā.
anya-e0103n0:59_3: Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhanti,
anya-e0103n0:59_5: evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa
anya-e0103n0:59_6: maggeneva ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:59_8: sammāsambuddhānañca paccekabodhisammāsambodhisamadhigamasadisā hi imesaṃ ariyānaṃ ime visesādhigamāti.
anya-e0103n0:59_9: Vinayasuttābhidhammesu sammāpaṭipattiyā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayatāpi yathāvuttavidhinā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:60_1: Yebhuyyena hi sattā kāmahetu pāṇātipātādivasenāpi asuddhapayogā honti.
anya-e0103n0:60_2: Jhānasukhalābhino kāyakilamathassa sambhavo eva natthīti samādhinā dutiyantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyattā.
anya-e0103n0:60_4: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi ekaṃsato ariyamaggova majjhimā paṭipatti nāma.
anya-e0103n0:61_0: Sīlaṃ taṃsamaṅgino kāmasugatīsuyeva nibbattāpanato catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyā kāraṇanti āha “sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:61_2: Samādhi taṃsamaṅgino mahaggatabhūmiyaṃyeva nibbattāpanena sakalakāmabhavato vimocetīti vuttaṃ “samādhinā kāmadhātusamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:61_3: Na hi kāmāvacarakammassa anubalappadāyīnaṃ kāmacchandādīnaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ jhānaṃ kāmadhātuparikilesāvahaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:61_6: Nāpi “sīleneva atikkamitabbassa apāyabhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabbatā”ti vacanokāso.
anya-e0103n0:61_8: Sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyoti kāmabhavādīnaṃ navannampi bhavānaṃ samatikkamanupāyo sīlasamādhīhi atikkantāpi bhavā anatikkantā eva,
anya-e0103n0:61_10: Paññāya panassa suppahīnattā te samatikkantā eva.
anya-e0103n0:62_0: Tadaṅgappahānavasenāti dīpālokeneva tamassa puññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānavasena.
anya-e0103n0:62_1: Samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasenāti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva
anya-e0103n0:62_2: jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānavasena.
anya-e0103n0:62_4: Samucchedappahānavasenāti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:63_1: kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvāresu vītikkamo ajjhācāro,
anya-e0103n0:63_4: Okāsādānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:63_5: Taṃ samādhi vikkhambhetīti āha “samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:63_7: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanato kāraṇalābhe uppattirahā anusayā,
anya-e0103n0:63_8: te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:63_9: Te ariyamaggapaññāya sabbaso pahīyantīti āha “paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:64_5: tassa visodhanaṃ sīlena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa.
anya-e0103n0:64_6: Taṇhāsaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissa,
anya-e0103n0:64_8: Diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ samucchedavasena pahānaṃ anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya,
anya-e0103n0:65_1: Sīlesu paripūrakārīti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtattā ādibrahmacariyakānaṃ pārājikasaṅghādisesasaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:65_2: mahāsīlasikkhāpadānaṃ avītikkamanato khuddānukhuddakānaṃ āpajjane sahasāva tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yaṃ
anya-e0103n0:65_4: taṃ paripūraṃ samatthaṃ karotīti sīlesu paripūrakārī.
anya-e0103n0:65_5: Tathā sakadāgāmīti “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti etaṃ upasaṃharati tathā- saddena.
anya-e0103n0:65_6: Ete hi dve ariyā samādhipāripanthikānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ paññāpāripanthikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa sabbaso asamūhatattā samādhiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:65_8: taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti samādhismiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:65_9: paññāya ca mattaso kārino “sīlesu paripūrakārino”icceva vuccanti.
anya-e0103n0:65_10: Anāgāmī pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ samucchinnattā samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī.
anya-e0103n0:65_11: Arahā sabbaso sammohassa susamūhatattā paññāya paripūrakārī.
anya-e0103n0:67_11: Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni,
anya-e0103n0:67_12: tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca,
anya-e0103n0:67_14: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
anya-e0103n0:67_18: so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti.
anya-e0103n0:67_19: Sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:68_0: “Katha”nti pucchitvā sikkhādike vibhajitvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:68_6: Evarūpāti yādisakā sikkhattikādayo idha sīlādīhi pakāsitā honti, edisā.
anya-e0103n0:69_0: Ettha hi vivaṭṭasannissitassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā sīlena kāyaviveko pakāsito hoti,
anya-e0103n0:69_3: Tathā sīlena adoso kusalamūlaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:69_11: Adosappadhānaṃ hi sīlasampadaṃ nissāya dose ādīnavadassino aniccānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati,
anya-e0103n0:69_15: Alobhappadhānaṃ hi kāmanissaraṇaṃ samādhisampadaṃ nissāya kāmesu ādīnavadassino dukkhānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati,
anya-e0103n0:69_20: Taṃ hi sīlesu paripūrakārino aṭṭhamakassa indriyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:69_22: Taṃ hi ukkaṃsagataṃ samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino anāgāmino,
anya-e0103n0:69_26: Iminā nayena aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā sīlādīhi pakāsetabbā.
anya-e0103n0:72_4: Sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenāti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādīsu viya vipassanāmattādimukhena saṅkhepato adesetvā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi,
anya-e0103n0:72_5: sattatiṃsāyapi vā bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ visuddhimaggantogadhattā tattha sīlasamādhipaññā mukhaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā desitopi.
anya-e0103n0:73_1: Kenaṭṭhena sīlanti kena atthena sīlanti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:73_2: “sīla”nti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:73_5: āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbanti āha “kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:73_6: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti āha “kimānisaṃsa”nti.
anya-e0103n0:73_11: Taṃ icchantena yasmā upāyakosallatthinā anupāyakosallaṃ viya saṃkileso jānitabboti āha “ko cassa saṃkileso”ti.
anya-e0103n0:74_3: Pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n0:74_7: Tassa saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antare eva ativa pātanaṃ atipāto,
anya-e0103n0:74_8: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho,
anya-e0103n0:74_9: atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto,
anya-e0103n0:74_16: Cetanādayo dhammāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:74_18: attanā sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:74_19: Cetanāya anukūlavaseneva hi taṃsampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇe pavattanti.
anya-e0103n0:74_21: idha pana sīlacetanā adhippetāti katvā “kusalā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:74_24: Cetanāya satipi cetasikatte “cetanā sīla”nti visuṃ gahitattā tadaññameva viratianabhijjhādikaṃ cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ gobalībaddañāyena.
anya-e0103n0:74_26: Yathā akusalā dhammā citte na otaranti,
anya-e0103n0:74_29: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāmātiādi yathāvuttassa suttapadassa vivaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:74_32: Viramantassa viratīti viratiyā padhānabhāvaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:75_2: kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādi vacanato pāṇātipātādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā tabbirativisiṭṭhā cetanā
anya-e0103n0:75_4: tadā taṃsampayuttā viratianabhijjhādayo ca cetanāpakkhikā vā,
anya-e0103n0:75_5: abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetanāsīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:75_6: Yadā pana pāṇātipātādīhi saṅkocaṃ āpajjantassa tato viramaṇākārena pavattamānā cetanāvisiṭṭhā virati,
anya-e0103n0:75_7: anabhijjhādayo ca tattha tattha padhānabhāvena kiccasādhikā honti,
anya-e0103n0:75_8: tadā taṃsampayuttā cetanā viratiādipakkhikā vā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:75_9: abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetasikasīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:76_0: Idāni sutte āgatanayena kusalakammapathavasena cetanācetasikasīlāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:76_1: Pajahantassāti samādānavasena “ito paṭṭhāya na karissāmī”ti sampattavatthukānipi anajjhācaraṇena pajahantassa.
anya-e0103n0:76_2: Satta kammapathacetanāti pāṇātipātādipahānasādhikā paṭipāṭiyā satta kusalakammapathacetanā.
anya-e0103n0:76_4: tassa pahāyakā anabhijjhādayo sīlanti āha “cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma anabhijjhā…pe…
anya-e0103n0:77_1: “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhiyyare”ti vacanena sotānaṃ saṃvaro pidahanaṃ samucchedanaṃ ñāṇanti viññāyati.
anya-e0103n0:78_0: Idamatthikataṃ manasi katvā yena ñāṇena yoniso paccavekkhitvā paccayā paṭisevīyanti.
anya-e0103n0:78_1: Taṃ paccayapaṭisevanampi ñāṇasabhāvattā ettheva ñāṇasaṃvare eva samodhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0103n0:78_3: Uppannanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe jātaṃ nibbattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:78_5: Nādhivāsetīti cittaṃ āropetvā abbhantare na vāseti.
anya-e0103n0:78_6: Ājīvapārisuddhipīti buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ micchājīvaṃ pahāya anavajjena paccayapariyesanena sijjhanakaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlampi
anya-e0103n0:78_7: ettheva vīriyasaṃvare eva samodhānaṃ gacchati vīriyasādhanattā.
anya-e0103n0:78_8: Ettha ca yathā ñāṇaṃ taṇhādisotānaṃ pavattinivāraṇato pidahanaṭṭhena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca,
anya-e0103n0:78_10: evaṃ khanti anadhivāsanena uppajjanakakilesānaṃ adhivāsanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca,
anya-e0103n0:78_12: vīriyaṃ vinodetabbānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vinodanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca,
anya-e0103n0:78_13: vinodanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:78_14: Yathā pana pātimokkhasīlādi tassa tassa pāpadhammassa pavattituṃ appadānavasena saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:78_16: evaṃ asamādinnasīlassa āgatavatthuto viramaṇampīti āha “yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n0:79_5: na sammā ṭhapitāti asaṇṭhapitā vippakiṇṇā visaṭā ca nāma honti,
anya-e0103n0:79_6: susīlyavasena pana pavattā tabbipariyāyato saṇṭhapitā avippakiṇṇā avisaṭā ca nāma honti yathā taṃ okkhittacakkhutā abāhuppacālanādi.
anya-e0103n0:79_17: Tattha kusaladhammā nāma sapubbabhāgā mahaggatānuttarā dhammā.
anya-e0103n0:79_19: Siraṭṭhoti yathā sirasi chinne sabbo attabhāvo vinassati,
anya-e0103n0:79_20: evaṃ sīle bhinne sabbaṃ guṇasarīraṃ vinassati.
anya-e0103n0:79_22: “Siro sīsa”nti vā vattabbe niruttinayena “sīla”nti vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:79_24: kārassa lopaṃ katvā niruttinayeneva “sīla”nti vuttanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:79_27: saddena sayanti akusalā etasmiṃ sati apaviṭṭhā hontīti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:79_28: supanti vā tena vihatussāhāni sabbaduccaritānīti sīlaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:79_29: sabbesaṃ vā kusaladhammānaṃ pavesārahasālāti sīlanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:80_1: “Sīlanaṭṭhena sīla”nti pubbe saddatthuddhārena pakāsitopi bhāvattho evāti āha “sīlanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ tassā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:80_2: Na hi tassa cetanādibhedabhinnassa anavasesato saṅgāhako tato añño attho atthi,
anya-e0103n0:80_4: Nanu ca anekabhedasaṅgāhakaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ nāma siyā,
anya-e0103n0:80_5: na visesalakkhaṇanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “sanidassanattaṃ rūpassa,
anya-e0103n0:81_0: Yathā hi nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ visesalakkhaṇaṃ tadaññadhammāsādhāraṇato.
anya-e0103n0:81_6: Tassa pana rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā saha nidassanena sanidassananti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:81_7: Dhammasabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro sabhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:81_8: so aññaṃ viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
anya-e0103n0:81_10: Atha vā “saha nidassanenā”ti ettha tabbhāvattho saha-
anya-e0103n0:82_6: Keci pana “kiccamevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ tassa itararasato balavabhāvadassanatthanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:82_9: sampatti eva vā rasoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n0:83_7: Imassa pana ānisaṃsaphalassa ānisaṃsakathāyaṃ vakkhamānattā idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:83_8: Keci pana phalassa anicchitattā idha aggahaṇanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:85_4: yassa me suparisuddhaṃ sīla”nti attano sīlassa paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattoti veditabbo. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:85_11: Añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:86_0: Sīlavato sīlasampadāyāti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlavato,
anya-e0103n0:86_7: Visāradoti attani kiñci garahitabbaṃ upavaditabbaṃ apassanto vigatasārajjo nibbhayo.
anya-e0103n0:86_10: kusalakammādīnaṃyeva ca tadā upaṭṭhānato amūḷho pasannamānaso eva kālaṃkaroti.
anya-e0103n0:86_17: Sā hi rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo,
anya-e0103n0:86_18: lokiyati ettha uḷāraṃ puññaphalanti lokoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:87_1: Piyo ca assanti piyāyitabbo piyacakkhūhi passitabbo pemaniyo bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:87_8: Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti catupārisuddhisīlesu eva paripūrakārī assa,
anya-e0103n0:87_10: “Ādinā nayenā”ti etena “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā
anya-e0103n0:87_11: suññāgārāna”nti evamādike sīlathomanasuttāgate sattarasa sīlānisaṃse saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:88_1: atha kho aññepi bahū sīlānisaṃsā vijjantīti te dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:88_3: Ācārakulaputtānaṃ yaṃ sīlaṃ vinā patiṭṭhā avaṭṭhānaṃ natthi,
anya-e0103n0:88_4: tassa evaṃ mahānubhāvassa sīlassa ānisaṃsānaṃ paricchedaṃ parimāṇaṃ ko vade ko vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:88_5: Etena sabbesaṃyeva lokiyalokuttarānaṃ guṇānaṃ sīlameva mūlabhūtanti dassetvā tato parampi malavisodhanena,
anya-e0103n0:88_10: kittipāmojjajanena ca sīlasadisaṃ aññaṃ sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ natthīti dassento “na gaṅgā”tiādikā gāthā abhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:89_6: Pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇīnaṃ sattānaṃ yaṃ malaṃ sīlajalaṃ visodhayati,
anya-e0103n0:89_7: taṃ malaṃ visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇanti gaṅgādayo nadiyoti paṭhamagāthāya na-
anya-e0103n0:89_17: taṃ tesaṃ kātuṃ adentaṃ sīlaṃ dosānaṃ balaṃ ghātetīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:92_0: Caranti tena sīlesu paripūrakāritaṃ upagacchantīti carittaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:92_2: Vāritato tena attānaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti vārittaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:92_16: yathāparicchinno vā kālo pariyanto etassāti kālapariyantaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:92_17: Yāva pāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ koṭi etassāti āpāṇakoṭikaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:94_2: Idaṃ kattabbanti paññattasikkhāpadapūraṇanti idaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ kattabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti evaṃ paññattassa sikkhāpadasīlassa pūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:94_3: Sikkhāpadasīlaṃ hi pūrento sikkhāpadampi pūreti pāleti nāma.
anya-e0103n0:94_7: Idaṃ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittassa akaraṇanti idaṃ duccaritaṃ na kattabbanti bhagavatā paṭikkhittassa akaraṇaṃ viramaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:94_8: Caranti tasminti tasmiṃ sīle taṃsamaṅgino carantīti sīlassa adhikaraṇataṃ vibhāvento tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:94_10: Vāritanti idaṃ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittaṃ akappiyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:94_21: saddho eva satthārā paṭikkhitte aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti āha “saddhāsādhanaṃ vāritta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:95_5: taṃ ārabbha uddissa tadatthaṃ tappayojanaṃ paññattaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:95_9: Tattha kāmaṃ ājīvahetukato sattavidhaduccaritato virati sammāājīvoti sopi sattavidho hoti,
anya-e0103n0:95_10: sammājīvatāsāmaññena pana taṃ ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:95_11: Atha vā tividhakuhanavatthusannissayato micchājīvato viratiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vutto “ājīvo suparisuddho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:95_12: Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato maggo eva brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ, tassa.
anya-e0103n0:95_13: Ādibhāvabhūtanti ādimhi bhāvetabbataṃ nipphādetabbataṃ bhūtaṃ pattaṃ ādibhāvabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:95_16: Tassa sampattiyāti ābhisamācārikassa sampajjanena paripūraṇena ādibrahmacariyakaṃ sampajjati.
anya-e0103n0:95_18: so garukāni mahāsāvajjāni bahvādīnavāni parivajjessatīti vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0103n0:95_21: Taṃ hi upariguṇavisesānaṃ dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:96_0: Viratisīlassa itarasīlena satipi sampayogādike asammissakatādassanatthaṃ “veramaṇimatta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:97_3: Diṭṭhicarito hi asatipi diṭṭhiyā taṇhāvirahe diṭṭhinissitova pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:98_1: imañca diva”ntiādinā viya kālavasena paricchedaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:98_2: Kālaparicchedaṃ akatvā samādinnampi antarāvicchinnaṃ sampattavirativasena yāvajīvaṃ pavattitampi āpāṇakoṭikaṃ
anya-e0103n0:98_3: na hotīti dassetuṃ “yāvajīvaṃ samādiyitvā tatheva pavattita”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:99_1: uppannānaṃ rakkhaṇavasena ceva vaḍḍhanavasena ca ñātiaṅgajīvitānaṃ avināsanavasena.
anya-e0103n0:99_2: Kiṃ so vītikkamissatīti yo vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti,
anya-e0103n0:100_0: Ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave kāmāsavādike paggharatīti sampayogabhāvābhāvepi sahāsavehīti sāsavaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:100_1: Tebhūmakadhammajātanti sīlaṃ tappariyāpannanti āha “sāsavaṃ sīlaṃ lokiya”nti.
anya-e0103n0:101_4: Yatheva hi kammaṃ āyūhanavasena hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:101_6: So ca nesaṃ pavattiākāro adhimuttibhedenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:101_9: “Kathaṃ nāma mādiso īdisaṃ kareyyā”ti pāpajigucchāya ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya.
anya-e0103n0:101_16: Yā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā mahābodhiṃ ārabbha pavattā paramukkaṃsagatasoceyyasallekhā desakālasattādivikapparahitā sīlapāramitā.
anya-e0103n0:102_1: Attā eva garu adhipati etassāti attagaru,
anya-e0103n0:102_8: Tasmā “naṃ sīlasampadāya pūjessāmī”ti evaṃ dhammamahattaṃ pūjetukāmena.
anya-e0103n0:103_1: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā,
anya-e0103n0:103_2: iminā me sīlena saṃsārasuddhi bhavissatī”ti pavattassa sīlaṃ parāmasantiyo taṃ parābhavaṃ pāpenti maggassa anupanissayabhāvakaraṇato.
anya-e0103n0:103_4: So hi puthujjanova hutvā kalyāṇehi sīlādīhi samannāgato.
anya-e0103n0:103_6: samucchindanato ca tehi na parāmaṭṭhanti aparāmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:103_7: Tassa tassa kilesadarathassa paṭippassambhanato vūpasamanato paṭippassaddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:104_1: Evaṃ hi taṃ sīlaṃ paṭipākatikameva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:104_3: “Katapaṭikamma”nti iminā ca “na punevaṃ karissa”nti adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:104_9: na nu kho vītikkanta”ntiādinā ajjhācāre vā vematikassa saṃsayāpannassa.
anya-e0103n0:104_14: Vimati paṭivinetabbāti sayaṃ vā taṃ vatthuṃ vicāretvā,
anya-e0103n0:106_3: Ekaccaṃ abyākataṃ sīlaṃ idhādhippetasīlena ekasaṅgahanti akusalassevāyujjamānataṃ dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:106_6: Vuttanayenevāti vutteneva nayena kusalattikaṃ aggahetvā hīnattikādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ tikānaṃ vasena assa sīlassa tividhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:107_5: Tassa hi sīlavante anupasaṅkamitvā dussīle sevantassa tato eva tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanena paṇṇattivītikkame
anya-e0103n0:107_6: adosadassāvino micchāsaṅkappabahulatāya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni arakkhato sīlaṃ ekaṃseneva hānabhāgiyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:107_12: Sampādite hi samādhismiṃ sīlassa samādhisaṃvattaniyatā nicchiyati.
anya-e0103n0:108_0: Yāni ca sikkhāpadāni nesaṃ rakkhitabbānīti sambandho,
anya-e0103n0:108_4: Sati vā ussāheti ussakkitvā sīlāni rakkhituṃ ussāhe sati.
anya-e0103n0:108_6: Aṭṭhāti naccādimālādiveramaṇiṃ ekaṃ katvā sabbapacchimavajjāni aṭṭha.
anya-e0103n0:109_3: Mariyādācārittanti tassa tassa sāvajjassa akaraṇe mariyādabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:109_4: tattha tattha kulādīsu pubbapurisehi ṭhapitaṃ cārittaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:109_11: pāsaṃ vā bādhaṃ ariyavinayassa ḍetīti “pāsaṇḍa”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:109_12: “Pakatiyā sīlavatī hotī”ti vacanato bodhisattamātu pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ paripuṇṇameva.
anya-e0103n0:109_13: Idaṃ pana ukkaṃsagataṃ bodhisattapitaripi cittuppādamattenapi asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ “dhammatāsīla”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:109_16: Sīlapāramiṃ hi paramukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā kucchigatassa mahābodhisattassa sīlatejena guṇānubhāvena bodhisattamātu
anya-e0103n0:109_20: Te kira suciraṃ kālaṃ suparisuddhasīlā eva hutvā āgatā.
anya-e0103n0:109_23: Pubbe purimajātiyaṃ siddho hetu etassāti pubbahetukasīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:109_24: Idaṃ pana pakatisīlādisamādānena vinā avītikkamalakkhaṇaṃ sampattaviratisaṅgahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:110_0: Yaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ vuttaṃ sīlanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:110_12: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idaṃ pātimokkhato acavanabhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:111_7: Disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhīti saṃvarassa upāyaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:111_9: anvāssaveyyunti saṃvarassa paṭipakkhaṃ tattha ādīnavaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:111_10: Saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti pageva satiyā upaṭṭhapetabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:111_11: Rakkhati cakkhundriyanti satiyā upaṭṭhāpanameva cakkhundriyassa ārakkhāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:111_12: Cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti tathābhūtā satiyevettha saṃvaroti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:111_14: Channaṃ sikkhāpadānanti “ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n0:111_16: Sāmantajappanādinā tividhena kuhanavatthunā vimhāpanaṃ kuhanā. Attānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:111_17: dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti,
anya-e0103n0:111_23: Gandhādayo viya lābhāya paresaṃ akkosanādinā nipisatīti nippeso,
anya-e0103n0:111_26: Mahicchatāya attanā laddhalābhena parato lābhapariyesanā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā.
anya-e0103n0:113_2: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti “idha bhikkhū”tiādinā āgatadesanāya ādito pabhuti.
anya-e0103n0:113_4: Paṭhamassa atthassa sabbasādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇaṃ pabbajitāveṇikaṃ pariyāyaṃ dassento “chinnabhinnapaṭadharāditāya vā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:113_6: Bhinnapaṭadharādibhāvo ca nāma daliddassāpi niggahitassa hotīti tato visesetuṃ “saddhāpabbajito”ti vatvā
anya-e0103n0:113_8: Ācārakulaputto vā hi paṭipajjituṃ sakkoti jātikulaputto vā.
anya-e0103n0:113_19: Yasmā pana so sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamo vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti katvā,
anya-e0103n0:113_22: Tathābhūto ca yasmā taṃ upeto tena ca samaṅgī nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:114_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n0:114_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n0:114_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n0:114_13: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pātī,
anya-e0103n0:114_14: “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:114_15: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:114_17: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:114_32: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro.
anya-e0103n0:114_34: atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:114_38: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
anya-e0103n0:114_40: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
anya-e0103n0:115_6: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:115_8: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho,
anya-e0103n0:115_12: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato,
anya-e0103n0:115_19: “Viharatī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro dassito.
anya-e0103n0:116_4: yathā vā sasīsanhānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanasaṃvidhānaṃ yuttarūpaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:116_6: atthi anācāro”ti dvayaṃ uddisitvā anācāraṃ tāva vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo anācāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:117_1: Idāni mānasaṃ anācāraṃ dassetuṃ “sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro”ti vatvā tattha ekacciyaṃ dassento “idhekacco veḷudānena vā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:117_4: Veḷūti manussānaṃ payojanāvaho yo koci veḷudaṇḍo.
anya-e0103n0:117_12: Cāṭukamyatā attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:117_14: Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā paccanti,
anya-e0103n0:117_16: evaṃ saccālikena jīvitakappane bahu alikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:117_23: Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ jaṅghapesanikaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:117_28: Ayaṃ vuccati anācāroti ayaṃ sabbopi “anācāro”ti kathīyati.
anya-e0103n0:118_0: Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṃ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:118_18: Tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyā,
anya-e0103n0:118_23: Tattha tehi soṇḍatādivasena na upasaṅkamitabbaṃ brahmacariyantarāyakarattā.
anya-e0103n0:118_24: Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājāno nāma ye rajjamanusāsanti.
anya-e0103n0:118_28: Ananulomikena saṃsaggenāti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ananulomikena paccanīkabhūtena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho viharati,
anya-e0103n0:118_29: yena brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā sallekhaparihāniṃ vā pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n0:119_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṃ dassetuṃ “yāni vā pana tānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:119_5: Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosavatthūhi akkosakāni ceva bhayadassanena santajjanakāni ca.
anya-e0103n0:119_6: Atthaṃ na icchanti anatthameva icchantīti anatthakāmāni.
anya-e0103n0:119_7: Hitaṃ na icchanti ahitameva icchantīti ahitakāmāni.
anya-e0103n0:119_8: Phāsu na icchanti aphāsuṃyeva icchantīti aphāsukakāmāni.
anya-e0103n0:119_19: assaddhakulādiko ca taṃ taṃ sevantassa tippakāropi ayutto gocaroti agocaro.
anya-e0103n0:120_2: bhikkhunīsaṅghassa ca catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya yathāsukhaṃ ogāhanakkhamāni.
anya-e0103n0:120_6: nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ cīvaravātena ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena
anya-e0103n0:121_0: Idāni niddese āgatanayenāpi ācāragocare dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:121_9: Ṭhitakopīti upari tiṭṭhanto viya āsannataraṭṭhāne ṭhitakopi bhaṇati.
anya-e0103n0:121_13: There bhikkhū anupakhajjāti therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anupavisitvā tesaṃ āsannataraṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā.
anya-e0103n0:122_0: Apica bhikkhūtiādi sabbasseva bhikkhuno ācāradassanavasena pavattaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:122_12: Eseva nayo ito paresupi chasu padesu.
anya-e0103n0:122_16: Indriyesu guttadvāroti cakkhundriyādīsu chasu dvāresu susaṃvihitārakkho.
anya-e0103n0:122_17: Bhojane mattaññūti paribhuñjitabbato bhojanasaññite catubbidhepi paccaye pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogādivasena sabbaso pamāṇaññū.
anya-e0103n0:122_18: Jāgariyamanuyuttoti pubbarattāpararattaṃ bhāvanāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ jāgariyaṃ sātaccakāritāvasena anu anu yutto tattha yuttapayutto.
anya-e0103n0:122_24: Ayaṃ vuccati ācāroti ayaṃ sagāravatādi atthakāmehi ācaritabbato ācāro.
anya-e0103n0:123_1: Satisaṅkhāto cittassa ārakkhabhūto eva gocaro ārakkhagocaro.
anya-e0103n0:123_3: Appicchatādīhi dasahi vivaṭṭanissitāya kathāya vatthubhūtehi guṇehi samannāgato dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato.
anya-e0103n0:123_4: Tato eva kalyāṇo sundaro mittoti kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0103n0:123_8: Sutaṃ pariyodāpetīti tameva yathāsutaṃ avisadatāya apariyodātaṃ punappunaṃ paripucchanādinā visodheti nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:123_12: ratanattaye ca sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇena diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:123_13: Tato eva ca duvidhāyapi saddhāsampadāya cittaṃ pasādeti.
anya-e0103n0:123_14: Atha vā yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ pariyodapetvā tatthāgate rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā sapaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
anya-e0103n0:123_16: Dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāmattadassanena tīsupi addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
anya-e0103n0:123_17: Tato paraṃ ca udayabbayañāṇādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanto aveccapasādena ratanattaye cittaṃ pasādeti.
anya-e0103n0:123_18: Tathābhūtova tassa kalyāṇamittassa anusikkhanena saddhādīhi guṇehi na hāyati,
anya-e0103n0:124_1: taṃ etassāti vā “antaraghara”nti laddhanāmaṃ gocaragāmaṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0103n0:124_2: Tattha ghare ghare bhikkhāpariyesanāya vīthiṃ paṭipanno.
anya-e0103n0:126_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e0103n0:128_1: Tattha sako pettiko visayoti attano pitu sammāsambuddhassa santako,
anya-e0103n0:129_5: Tathā hi mātikāyaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ viya sekhiyānaṃ paricchedo na kato.
anya-e0103n0:129_6: Evañca katvā “asañcicca āpannasekhiyā”ti asañciccaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:129_7: Na hi mātikāyaṃ āgatesu pañcasattatiyā sekhiyesu nosaññāvimokkho nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n0:129_9: Keci panettha asiñcicca āpannaggahaṇena acittakāpattiyo gahitāti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:129_14: Tenāha “yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni oramattakāni lahukāni lahusammatānī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:129_15: Ādisaddena pātimokkhasaṃvaravisuddhatthaṃ anatikkamanīyānaṃ anāpattigamanīyānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:129_17: sabbalahukaṃ vā dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n0:129_18: Yaṃ kiñcīti mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:129_21: Ayaṃ pana ācāragocarasampadā kiṃ pātimokkhasīle pariyāpannā,
anya-e0103n0:129_24: Yadi evaṃ kasmā puna vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:131_2: tasmiṃ satiyeva icchitabbanti vuttaṃ “soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhū”ti.
anya-e0103n0:131_3: Sampādite hi etasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitameva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:131_11: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ettha yadi cakkhu rūpaṃ passeyya,
anya-e0103n0:131_22: Tañca kenaci kuṭṭādinā antarite na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:131_27: na yaṃ kiñcīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhuṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:132_2: Pasādavatthukena cittenāti cakkhupasādavatthukena tannissāya pavattena viññāṇena,
anya-e0103n0:132_5: Cakkhupasādasannissaye hi viññāṇe ālokānuggahitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sannissayaguṇena obhāsente taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “rūpaṃ passatī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:132_8: Usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhārabhūtena dhanunā vijjhatīti vacanaṃ viya viññāṇena rūpadassane
anya-e0103n0:132_9: sijjhante cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti īdisī sasambhārakathā nāmesā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:132_14: kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:133_0: Itthipurisanimittaṃ vāti ettha itthisantānanissitarūpamukhena gayhamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ thanamaṃsāvisadatā
anya-e0103n0:133_1: nimmassumukhatā kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṃ avisadaṭṭhānagamanādi ca sabbaṃ “itthī”ti sañjānanassa kāraṇabhāvato
anya-e0103n0:133_4: Subhanimittādikaṃ vāti ettha rāguppattihetubhūto iṭṭhākāro subhanimittaṃ. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:133_10: Tathā hi vakkhati “muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:133_15: Diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhātīti “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti sutte vuttanayena vaṇṇāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena,
anya-e0103n0:133_17: na tato paraṃ kiñci subhādiākāraṃ parikappeti.
anya-e0103n0:133_19: Visabhāgavatthuno hi hatthādiavayavesu subhādito parikappentassa aparāparaṃ tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattā hontīti te tesaṃ anubyañjanā nāma.
anya-e0103n0:133_20: Te pana yasmā tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānaṃ bhūtupādāyarūpānaṃ sannivesākāro.
anya-e0103n0:133_21: Na hi taṃ muñcitvā paramatthato hatthādi nāma koci atthi.
anya-e0103n0:133_24: Kiṃ pana gaṇhātīti āha “yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:133_26: Yaṃ tasmiṃ sarīre vijjamānaṃ kesalomādi bhūtupādāyamattaṃ vā,
anya-e0103n0:133_28: Tattha asubhākāragahaṇassa nidassanaṃ dassento “cetiyapabbatavāsī”tiādinā mahātissattheravatthuṃ āhari.
anya-e0103n0:134_0: Tattha sumaṇḍitapasādhitāti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca.
anya-e0103n0:134_7: Olokentoti thero kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva gacchanto saddakaṇṭakattā pubbabhāgamanasikārassa hasitasaddānusārena “kimeta”nti olokento.
anya-e0103n0:134_10: Arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti thero kira tassā hasantiyā dantaṭṭhidassaneneva pubbabhāgabhāvanāya subhāvitattā paṭibhāganimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:134_11: sātisayañca upacārajjhānaṃ labhitvā yathāṭhitova tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhigantvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
anya-e0103n0:134_13: Pubbasaññaṃ anussarīti pubbakaṃ yathāraddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ anuyuñjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ anussari samannāhari.
anya-e0103n0:134_15: Therassa kira bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvato dantaṭṭhidassaneneva tassā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:135_0: “Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetū”ti vatvā puna “tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:135_2: Yadidaṃ yaṃ cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhādianvāssavanaṃ dassitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:135_3: taṃ asaṃvutacakkhundriyasseva hetu pavattaṃ dassitanti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:135_4: Cakkhudvārikassa hi abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṃdvārikaviññāṇassa viya cakkhundriyaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:135_5: Cakkhundriyassa asaṃvutatte sati te anvāssavantīti asaṃvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko so asaṃvaro tathā vuttoti.
anya-e0103n0:135_6: Yatvādhikaraṇanti hi yassa cakkhundriyassa kāraṇāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:136_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:136_1: Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ atthi,
anya-e0103n0:136_4: Muṭṭhasaccādīnaṃ hi satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre uppatti,
anya-e0103n0:136_5: na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti,
anya-e0103n0:136_7: Dussīlyādayo cettha pañca asaṃvarā sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saṃvarānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:137_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhundriye asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:137_2: Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati
anya-e0103n0:137_3: taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti evaṃ aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatā sāmaññameva nidasseti,
anya-e0103n0:137_6: Sati vā dvārabhavaṅgādike puna uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:137_8: Paccayabhāvena hi purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi cakkhādi viya phalanipphattiyā santaṃyeva nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:137_10: “Bāhiraṃ viya katvā”ti ca paramatthato javanassa bāhirabhāve,
anya-e0103n0:137_13: tañca kho āgantukehi upakkiliṭṭha”ntiādi vacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:137_14: tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ekena pariyāyena hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:137_15: Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito.
anya-e0103n0:137_16: Asaṃvarassa hi uppattiyā dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyatīti.
anya-e0103n0:137_17: Nagaradvārasadisena javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:137_19: so tattha dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ upacchindantoyeva pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n0:137_20: Dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ javanena saha sambandho ekasantatipariyāpannato daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:138_0: Ettha ca cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate niyamitādivasena kusalākusalajavane sattakkhattuṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0103n0:138_1: bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe tadanurūpameva manodvārikajavane tasmiṃyevārammaṇe sattakkhattuṃyeva uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ
anya-e0103n0:138_2: otiṇṇe puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre tadevārammaṇaṃ nissāya “itthī puriso”tiādinā vavatthapentaṃ pasādarajjanādivasena
anya-e0103n0:138_4: Evaṃ pavattamānaṃ javanaṃ sandhāya “javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:139_2: Yathā hi pageva satiārakkhaṃ anupaṭṭhapentassa dussīlyādīnaṃ uppatti,
anya-e0103n0:139_3: evaṃ pageva satiārakkhaṃ upaṭṭhapentassa sīlādīnaṃ uppatti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:139_5: Sotaviññāṇena hi saddaṃ sutvā “itthisaddo”ti vā “purisasaddo”ti vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n0:139_7: Yo ca gītasaddādikassa kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti laddhavohāro mandatārādivasena vavatthito chajjādibhedabhinno ākāro,
anya-e0103n0:139_10: Manodvāre pana sāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ manodvāraṃ tasmiṃ dvāre dhammārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ javanamanasāva viññāya vijānitvātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:141_2: Tathā hi “ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadāna”nti paduddhāraṃ katvā tāni pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “yāni tānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:141_3: Tattha yāni tāni evaṃ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadānīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:141_12: Anuppannattā hi tassa taṃ asantanti purimassa pacchimaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:141_19: pārājikasaññitassa vā vītikkamassa āpajjanaṃ ullapananti attho.
anya-e0103n0:141_23: “Imesaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamassa vasenā”ti sambandho heṭṭhā dassito eva.
anya-e0103n0:142_0: Kuhanātiādīsūti heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapāḷiyāva paduddhāro. Ayaṃ pāḷīti ayaṃ vibhaṅge āgatā niddesapāḷi.
anya-e0103n0:143_2: Te eva sakkaccaṃ ādaravasena diyyamānā sakkārā.
anya-e0103n0:143_6: Asantaguṇadīpanakāmassāti asante attani avijjamāne saddhādiguṇe sambhāvetukāmassa.
anya-e0103n0:143_9: Icchāya apakatassāti pāpikāya icchāya sammāājīvato apeto katoti apakato.
anya-e0103n0:143_10: Tathābhūto ca ājīvūpaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha “upaddutassāti attho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:144_1: Tividhampetaṃ tattha āgataṃ tassa nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetunti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:145_2: tasmā “dhāreyyā”ti ettha yadetaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:146_0: Attānaṃ uttarimanussadhammādhigamassa sāmante katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:146_3: “Mitto”ti sāmaññato vatvā puna taṃ viseseti “sandiṭṭho sambhatto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:146_21: Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:146_30: Yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:147_8: Mukhasambhāvikoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāviko.
anya-e0103n0:147_9: So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā “ayaṃ samaṇo”tiādīni katheti.
anya-e0103n0:148_0: Sambhāvanādhippāyakatenāti “kathaṃ nu kho maṃ jano ‘ariyo’ti vā ‘visesalābhī’ti vā sambhāveyyā”ti iminā adhippāyena katena.
anya-e0103n0:148_1: Gamanaṃ saṇṭhapetīti visesalābhīnaṃ gamanaṃ viya attano gamanaṃ sakkaccaṃ ṭhapeti,
anya-e0103n0:148_6: Āpāthakajjhāyīti manussānaṃ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhisamāpanno viya nisīdanto āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī.
anya-e0103n0:149_0: Paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti ayoniso uppāditānaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭisevananti evaṃ kathitena,
anya-e0103n0:149_2: Aññaṃ viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanaṃ sāmantajappitaṃ. Ā-
anya-e0103n0:149_6: kuhassa vā puggalassa ayanā gati kiriyā kuhāyanā. Kuheti,
anya-e0103n0:151_1: Dve kira bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā āsanasālāya nisīditvā ekaṃ kumārikaṃ pakkosiṃsu.
anya-e0103n0:151_2: Tāya āgatāya tatreko ekaṃ pucchi “ayaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0103n0:151_5: imissā mātā mayi gehaṃ gate sappiṃ dadamānā ghaṭeneva deti,
anya-e0103n0:151_6: ayampi mātā viya ghaṭena detī”ti ukkācesi.
anya-e0103n0:152_5: saccato vā aññā subhāsitā vācā “dhammo”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:154_4: Taṃ pana avahasitvā vacanaṃ hotīti āha “uppaṇḍanā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:154_10: Nipisitvā gandhamagganā viyāti anippisite alabbhamānassa gandhassa nipisane lābho viya paraguṇe anippisite
anya-e0103n0:155_0: Nikattuṃ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:156_6: Mūsikacchinnanti vatthādīnaṃ asukabhāge mūsikacchede sati idaṃ nāma phalaṃ hotīti jānanakasatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:156_7: Palāsaggiādīsu iminā nāma agginā hute idaṃ nāma hotīti aggivasena homavidhānaṃ aggihomaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:156_10: aññesañca sutte āgatānaṃ micchājīvānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:156_14: Na hi alaso ñāyena paccaye pariyesituṃ sakkotīti.
anya-e0103n0:158_5: “Paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā”ti vatvā tayidaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇanti dassetuṃ “paccavekkhitvāti attho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:158_6: Yathā hi paccavekkhitvāti sītapaṭighātādikaṃ taṃ taṃ payojanaṃ pati pati avekkhitvā,
anya-e0103n0:158_8: evaṃ paṭisaṅkhāyāti tadeva payojanaṃ pati pati saṅkhāya,
anya-e0103n0:158_11: Ettha ca “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādi kāmaṃ paccayaparibhogakālena vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:158_12: dhātuvasena pana paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sujjhatīti apare.
anya-e0103n0:158_14: Eke pana paṭhamaṃ eva pariyattanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:158_16: “Cīvara”nti ekavacanaṃ ekattamattaṃ vācakanti adhippāyena “antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kiñcī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:158_17: jātisaddatāya pana tassa pāḷiyaṃ ekavacananti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni,
anya-e0103n0:158_18: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti sakkā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:158_21: “Nivāseti vā pārupati vā”ti vikappanaṃ pana paṭisevanapariyāyassa paribhogassa vibhāgadassananti taṃ paññapetvā sayananisīdana-
anya-e0103n0:159_3: Idāni taṃ niyamaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “ettakameva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:159_6: Līḷāvasena hi ekacce sattā vatthāni paridahanti ceva upasaṃviyanti ca.
anya-e0103n0:159_14: saddena hemantādīsu himapātādivasena pavattassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n0:159_21: Ekacco dāvaggisantāpo kāyaṃ cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha “tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:159_36: Hiriyitabbaṭṭhena hirī ca taṃ kopinañcāti hirikopinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:160_0: Yaṃ kiñci āhāranti khādanīyabhojanīyādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci āharitabbavatthuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:160_6: Piṇḍānaṃ vā pātoti ghare ghare laddhabhikkhānaṃ sannipāto.
anya-e0103n0:160_15: Porisamadanimittanti porisamado vuccati purisamāno “ahaṃ puriso”ti uppajjanakamāno.
anya-e0103n0:161_3: mohañca vaḍḍhetīti tassā vajjanena mohassa anupanissayatā.
anya-e0103n0:161_9: Yadipi ekaccassa davamade ārabbha parassa paṭighasaṃyojanādīnaṃ uppatti hotiyeva manopadosikadevādīnaṃ viya,
anya-e0103n0:161_10: attano pana davamade ārabbha yesaṃ savisesaṃ rāgamohamānādayo pāpadhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:161_11: Te sandhāya “attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanattha”nti vatvā maṇḍanavibhūsanāni paṭicca savisesaṃ parassapi
anya-e0103n0:161_13: Ayoniso paṭipattiyāti ettha kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ muñcitvā sabbāpi micchāpaṭipatti ayoniso paṭipatti.
anya-e0103n0:161_15: pacchimehi dvīhi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānaṃ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:161_16: “Catūhipi cetehī”ti pana vacanato sabbehi ubhinnampi pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:162_3: Sā panassa ṭhiti pabandhavasena icchitāti āha “pabandhaṭṭhitattha”nti.
anya-e0103n0:162_5: Tathā hi jīvitindriyaṃ “yāpanā vattanā”ti ca niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:162_8: tāva avatthānaṃ yāpanāti dassento “cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ vā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:162_11: yathā jiṇṇagharasāmiko gharassa upatthambhanaṃ karoti tassa apatanatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:162_12: yathā ca sākaṭiko akkhabbhañjanaṃ karoti tassa sampavattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:162_15: Etena ṭhiti nāma apatanaṃ yāpanā pavattīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:162_20: ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti kāyassa ṭhitihetutāya “ṭhitī”ti laddhavohārassa jīvitindriyassa pavattanatthanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:162_27: Uṇhasītādīsu abhibhavantesu tappaṭikāraṃ sītuṇhaṃ viya paṭisevatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:162_28: Maggabrahmacariyaṃ ṭhapetvā sikkhattayasaṅgahā sāsanāvacaritabbā anusāsanī sāsanabrahmacariyanti āha
anya-e0103n0:162_31: Kāyabalaṃ nissāyāti yathāsamāraddhaṃ guṇavisesapāripūrihetubhūtaṃ kāyabalamattaṃ nissāya.
anya-e0103n0:162_34: nadīsamuddanittharaṇatthikā ca puttamaṃsādīni yathā agiddhā amucchitā kevalaṃ taṃ taṃ atthasiddhimeva avekkhantā paṭisevanti tehi vinā asijjhanato,
anya-e0103n0:162_35: evamayampi kevalaṃ bhavakantāranittharaṇatthiko agiddho amucchito tena vinā asijjhanato piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevatīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:163_1: Tena paṭiseviyamānassa piṇḍapātassa paṭisevanākāro gayhatīti āha “evaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:163_4: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatīti yojanā. Kīdisaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:163_7: Aparimitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ bhojanaṃ paccayo etissāti aparimitabhojanapaccayā,
anya-e0103n0:163_8: taṃ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṃ attano gahaṇītejapamāṇato atikkantapamāṇabhojanahetukanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:163_9: Yo bahuṃ bhuñjitvā attano dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto “āhara hattha”nti vadati,
anya-e0103n0:163_11: Yo bhuñjitvā accuddhumātakucchitāya uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṃ nivāsetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:163_13: Yo bhuñjitvā uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto tattheva parivattati,
anya-e0103n0:163_18: Yo bhuñjitvā mukhe sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tattheva vamati,
anya-e0103n0:163_21: Atha vā purāṇavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā.
anya-e0103n0:163_25: Atha vā navavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā,
anya-e0103n0:163_31: bhuttapaccayena ca uppajjanakānuppajjanakavedanāsu purimā yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā.
anya-e0103n0:163_34: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā pubbe anuppannāva nuppajjissatīti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n0:164_2: Asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ nissāyāti asappāyāparimitassa āhārassa bhuñjanapayogaṃ āgamma uppajjatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:164_3: Purāṇakammapaccayavasenāti pubbe purimajātiyaṃ katattā purāṇassa kammassa paccayatāvasena payogavipattiṃ
anya-e0103n0:164_4: āgamma uppajjanārahatāya taṃ vajjetvā payogasampattiyā upaṭṭhāpanaṃ dukkhavedanāpaccayaghāto,
anya-e0103n0:164_5: paṭihananañca hotīti āha “tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:164_8: Taṃ nissāya paṭicca āyatiṃ anāgate kāle uppajjanato yā cāyaṃ “navavedanā”ti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:164_10: tassā navavedanāya mūlaṃ ayuttaparibhogakammaṃ anibbattento sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādento.
anya-e0103n0:164_12: “Vihiṃsūparatiyā”tiādinā vā padacatukkena yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho pabbajitānucchavikassa paccayaparibhogassa vuttattā.
anya-e0103n0:164_14: Jhānasukhādīnaṃ paccayabhūtassa kāyasukhassa avissajjanato dhammikasukhāpariccāgo ca dīpito hoti.
anya-e0103n0:165_3: Tathā sati cirakālappavattisaṅkhātā sarīrassa yātrā yāpanā bhavissatīti imamatthaṃ dassento “parimitaparibhogena…pe…
anya-e0103n0:165_5: Yo rogo sāddho asāddho ca na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:165_14: idha pana catunnampi iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanā yātrāti ayamettha viseso.
anya-e0103n0:165_21: Tesaṃ parivajjanaṃ dhammena samena paccayuppādanādivasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:165_22: Dhammena hi paccaye pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṃ anavajjatā nāma.
anya-e0103n0:166_7: “laddhaṃ me”ti pamāṇādhikaṃ bhuñjitvā taṃ jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi kilamati,
anya-e0103n0:166_9: Aññe te “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “asukassa udaraṃ uddhumāta”ntiādīni sutvā “niccakālamesa evaṃpakatiko attano kucchipamāṇaṃ nāma na jānātī”ti nindanti,
anya-e0103n0:166_12: Attano hi pakatiaggibalādiṃ jānitvā “evaṃ me aratiādīnaṃ abhāvena kāyasukhatā,
anya-e0103n0:166_15: tassa sādhanena yāvadatthaṃ udarassa paripūraṇena udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ yāvadatthaudarāvadehakabhojanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:166_18: ubhohi passehi samparivattanakaṃ sayantassa uppajjanasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:166_21: sukhānaṃ pahānato catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yogyabhāvassa paṭipādanaṃ kāyassa catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanaṃ, tato.
anya-e0103n0:166_24: sabbavikappesu vā vuttaṃ phāsuvihāralakkhaṇaṃ āgamena samatthetuṃ “vuttampi heta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:166_25: Tīsupi vikappesu āhārassa ūnaparibhogavaseneva hi phāsuvihāro vuttoti.
anya-e0103n0:167_4: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetabbāni –
anya-e0103n0:167_15: Mahāsivatthero panāha “heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma,
anya-e0103n0:167_17: Tattha “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:167_26: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārento paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati nāma.
anya-e0103n0:168_7: Yattha yattha vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā āsatīti vihāraaḍḍhayogādike ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Idha ādi-
anya-e0103n0:168_11: Utuyeva utuparissayoti sītuṇhādiutuyeva asappāyo vuttanayena utuparissayo.
anya-e0103n0:168_15: Nānārammaṇato paṭisaṃharitvā kammaṭṭhānabhūte ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa sammadeva layanaṃ paṭisallānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:168_18: Senāsanaṃ hi vivittaṃ yogino bhāvanānukūlaṃ suññāgārabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:168_19: Taṃ panetaṃ atthadvayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yo sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:169_1: “utu ca sītuṇha”nti sītuṇhapaṭighātaṃ vatvā utuparissayavinodanaṃ kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmañcā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:169_2: Tattha “niyataṃ utuparissayavinodana”nti etena “sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyā”ti ettha vuttaṃ sītuṇhaṃ aniyataṃ kadāci kadāci uppajjanakaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:169_5: asappāyo”ti ca evaṃ vuttappakāro vivaṭaṅgaṇarukkhamūlādīsu nisinnassa apariguttiyā asaṃvutadvārāditāya pākaṭaparissayā,
anya-e0103n0:169_6: asappāyarūpadassanādinā apākaṭaparissayā ca bhikkhussa kāyacittānaṃ ābādhaṃ kareyyuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:169_7: Yattha gutte senāsane ābādhaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0103n0:169_8: Evaṃ jānitvāti ubhayaparissayarahitanti evaṃ ñatvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu veditabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:170_9: Vivaṭaparikkhepo parikkhā uḍḍāpo pākāro esikā paligho pākārapatthaṇḍilanti satta “nagaraparikkhārā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:170_14: Samudānetabbāti sammā uddhaṃ uddhaṃ ānetabbā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:171_2: Verikānaṃ antaraṃ adatvā attano sāmikānaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitasevakā viya rakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n0:171_5: Rasāyanabhūtaṃ hi bhesajjaṃ sucirampi kālaṃ jīvitaṃ pavattetiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:171_6: Yadipi anuppannā eva dukkhavedanā bhesajjaparibhogena paṭihaññanti,
anya-e0103n0:171_13: Sañcayato paṭṭhāya so dhātukkhobho samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti taṃsamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:171_14: “Dukkhavedanā”ti vatvā sā akusalasabhāvāpi atthīti tato visesetuṃ “akusalavipākavedanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:172_0: Cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ nissayanaṃ paribhogo evāti dassetuṃ “te paṭicca nissāyā”ti vatvā “paribhuñjamānā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:174_1: Evaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedena niddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ puna sādhanavibhāgena dassetuṃ “evametasmi”ntiādimāraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:174_4: Nanu ca vīriyasatipaññāhipi vinā pātimokkhasaṃvaro na sijjhatīti?
anya-e0103n0:174_6: saddhāya pana visesahetubhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti dassento āha
anya-e0103n0:175_1: Garukalahukādibhede otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ tassa tassa aparādhassa anurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ avisayo,
anya-e0103n0:175_5: buddhānaṃ eva visayoti dassento “sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanapaṭikkhepo cettha nidassana”nti āha.
anya-e0103n0:175_13: yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattāmā”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:176_0: Kikīva aṇḍanti kikīsakuṇikā viya attano aṇḍaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:176_1: Sā kira jīvitampi pariccajitvā aṇḍameva rakkhati.
anya-e0103n0:176_2: Camarīva vāladhinti camarīmigo viya attano vāladhiṃ.
anya-e0103n0:176_3: Camarīmigā kira byādhena paripātiyamānā jīvitampi pariccajitvā kaṇḍakagumbādīsu laggaṃ attano vālameva rakkhanti.
anya-e0103n0:176_5: Yathā hi ekaputtako kuṭumbiko taṃ ekaputtaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:176_6: ekanayano ca taṃ ekanayanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ rakkhati.
anya-e0103n0:177_0: Evameva khoti yathā mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātikkamati, evameva.
anya-e0103n0:179_2: Yassa hi kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggo pariyādiyati,
anya-e0103n0:179_3: tato ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgottaraṇe vaṭṭasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati,
anya-e0103n0:179_9: Appevāti appeva nāma attano jīvitampi jaheyya,
anya-e0103n0:180_0: Satiyā adhiṭṭhitānanti pageva upaṭṭhitāya satiyā ārakkhavasena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ indriyānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:180_11: Anubyañjanaso nimittaggāhoti kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanavasena uppādanena pākaṭīkaraṇavasena subhādinimittaggāho,
anya-e0103n0:181_6: Kilesuppattiyā hetubhāvena taṃsamaṅginaṃ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:181_9: Te kīdisā vivaṭā arakkhitā asaṃvutacakkhādihetuṃ taṃsamaṅginaṃ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:182_1: Ayaṃ pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ anuppādo atiukkaṭṭhadesanā maggenāgatasadisattā.
anya-e0103n0:183_3: So ca pana dāho idāni cittagatoti dassento āha “cittaṃ me pariḍayhatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:184_2: Rāgūpasañhitaṃ rāguppattihetubhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ parivajjehi na manasi karohi.
anya-e0103n0:184_4: atha kho asubhabhāvanāya attano cittaṃ bhāvehi. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n0:184_5: Ekaggaṃ susamāhitaṃ yathā taṃ asubhārammaṇe vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:184_8: Evaṃ samathabhāvanāya kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanaṃ dassetvā idāni samucchedanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:184_9: Tattha saṅkhāre parato passāti sabbepi saṅkhāre avidheyyakatāya “pare”ti passa.
anya-e0103n0:184_13: Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento maggapaṭipāṭiyā catutthamaggena sabbaso nibbāpehi mahārāgaṃ
anya-e0103n0:184_16: evaṃ mā ḍayhittho punappunanti daḷhataraṃ rāgavinodane niyojesi.
anya-e0103n0:185_0: Evaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlassa sampādane vidhiṃ dassetvā evaṃ taṃ susampāditaṃ hotīti nayaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādinā tattha paripūrakārino there nidasseti.
anya-e0103n0:185_1: Tattha “leṇaṃ na ullokitapubba”nti idaṃ sabbattheva therassa yugamattadassitāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:185_2: Kiṃ pana thero senāsanaṃ na sodheti?
anya-e0103n0:186_1: Taruṇā thaññapivanakā puttadhītaro yāsaṃ tā taruṇaputtā, tāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:186_2: Lañjāpesīti thanapaṭṭikāya thane bandhāpetvā rājamuddikāya lañjāpesi.
anya-e0103n0:186_3: Rājā theraṃ cirataraṃ daṭṭhuṃ kālavikkhepaṃ karonto “sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:186_4: Thero rañño ca deviyā ca vandanakāle sattākāramattaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:186_5: Itthī purisoti pana vivekaṃ na karoti.
anya-e0103n0:186_7: “Aho suparisuddhasīlo vatāyaṃ ayyo”ti daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:186_8: Atiparisuddhaṃ pākaṭanti sappāyalābhena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ativiya parisuddhaṃ vibhūtaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0103n0:186_9: Sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayantoti pathavikampanena sakalaṃ pabbataṃ ekaṃ ninnādaṃ karonto.
anya-e0103n0:187_5: Tesu hi bhinnesu indriyānipi bhinnānīti vuccanti ārakkhābhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:187_6: indriyāneva vā nimittānubyañjanaggāhassa dvārabhūtāni bhinnāni nāma taṃsamaṅgino anatthuppattito,
anya-e0103n0:188_8: Sā eva satthusāsanassa na patirūpāti appatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:188_11: pariggahitadhutaṅgassa dhutaṅganiyamavirodhinī yassa kassaci sallekhavikopinī paṭipatti.
anya-e0103n0:188_16: “Parisuddhuppāde”ti imināva dhammadesanādīnaṃ parisuddhāya samuṭṭhānatā dīpitā hotīti “dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannāna”nti vuttaṃ. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:188_18: Dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n0:188_25: Appicchatāya ukkaṃsagatāya micchājīvassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṃ “ekabyādhivūpasamattha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:188_30: paccayagedhassa dūrasamussāritattā uttamo ca so ariyavaṃsiko cāti uttamaariyavaṃsiko.
anya-e0103n0:189_0: Nimittaṃ nāma paccaye uddissa yathā adhippāyo ñāyati evaṃ nimittakammaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:189_1: Obhāso nāma ujukameva akathetvā yathā adhippāyo vibhūto hoti,
anya-e0103n0:190_0: Dvāraṃ dinnanti rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṃ dinnaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:190_4: Na vaṭṭatīti sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0103n0:190_6: “Ājīvaṃ pana kopetī”ti imināva senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttadhutaṅgadharassa nimittādayo na vaṭṭantīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:191_0: Gaṇavāsaṃ pahāya araññāyatane paṭippassaddhivivekassa muddhabhūtāya aggaphalasamāpattiyā viharanto mahāthero “pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:191_8: tena me phāsu ahosī”ti attano vacīnicchāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ uppattihetuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:191_12: ajjhāsayaṃ pana ajānantā ekacce puthujjanā tathā maññeyyuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:191_13: anāgate ca sabrahmacārino evaṃ mama diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjeyyunti paṭikkhipi.
anya-e0103n0:191_15: Tathā hi daharabhikkhuno “kassa sampannaṃ na manāpa”nti vacanaṃ nissāya yāva parinibbānā piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ na khādati.
anya-e0103n0:192_1: Atthaviññāpanavasena pavattamāno hi saddo asatipi viññattiyā tassa kenaci paccayena paccayabhāve vacīviññattivaseneva
anya-e0103n0:192_7: Bahi careti āsayato nikkhamitvā gocaraggahaṇavasena bahi yadi vicareyya.
anya-e0103n0:192_9: Loke hi ayuttabhojanaṃ odariyaṃ garahantā evaṃ vadanti “kiṃsu nāma tassa antāni bahi carantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:193_0: Mahātissatthero kira dubbhikkhakāle maggaṃ gacchanto bhattacchedena,
anya-e0103n0:193_1: maggakilamathena ca kilantakāyo dubbalo aññatarassa phalitassa ambassa mūle nipajji,
anya-e0103n0:193_2: bahūni ambaphalāni tahaṃ tahaṃ patitāni honti.
anya-e0103n0:193_3: Tattheko vuḍḍhataro upāsako therassa santikaṃ upagantvā parissamaṃ ñatvā ambapānaṃ pāyetvā attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ neti. Thero –
anya-e0103n0:194_0: “Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0103n0:196_0: Attānaṃ ovaditvā sammasanaṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa piṭṭhigato eva maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
anya-e0103n0:197_1: tabbipariyāyato paccavekkhitaparibhoge ānisaṃsassa ca dassanaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsadassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:197_3: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇabhāvena vuccati yathā tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddhanti.
anya-e0103n0:197_4: Yena kāraṇena bhikkhuno apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma siyā,
anya-e0103n0:197_7: Tattha paccayagedhanti gedhaggahaṇeneva sammohopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo tena saha pavattanato,
anya-e0103n0:197_9: Dhammena samena uppanneti idaṃ paccayānaṃ āgamanasuddhidassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:197_11: Paccayānaṃ hi idamatthitaṃ upadhāretvā paribhuñjanaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:197_12: Yasmā pana te paccayā ñāyādhigatā eva bhikkhunā paribhuñjitabbā,
anya-e0103n0:198_2: tadupabhuñjako ca puggalo”ti evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena vā.
anya-e0103n0:198_3: Paṭikūlavasena vāti piṇḍapāte tāva āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena,
anya-e0103n0:198_5: imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyāni jāyantī”ti evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vā.
anya-e0103n0:198_7: Anavajjova paribhogo āditova paññāya parisodhitattā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitapattacīvarānaṃ viyāti.
anya-e0103n0:199_1: Bhagavatāpi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā,
anya-e0103n0:199_7: dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo theyyaparibhogo.
anya-e0103n0:199_9: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:199_11: Cīvaraṃ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta…pe…
anya-e0103n0:199_13: Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:199_20: so “neva davāyā”tiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyyāti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:199_28: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā,
anya-e0103n0:200_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:200_3: Vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:200_6: Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
anya-e0103n0:200_7: Catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi.
anya-e0103n0:200_9: Suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi.
anya-e0103n0:201_3: anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato santakā.
anya-e0103n0:201_7: Atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādā”’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:202_6: Tenāha “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:203_4: Yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo,
anya-e0103n0:203_6: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti,
anya-e0103n0:203_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:203_13: Paccanīkattāti yathā iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ gantuṃ na labhati,
anya-e0103n0:203_14: evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha “āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:203_15: Etena nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:204_0: Idāni tameva kiccakāritaṃ suttapadena vibhāvetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
