anya-e0103n0:204_6: Sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desitanti cīvarādīsu “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
anya-e0103n0:204_10: “pipāsāgelaññassa vūpasamanato pānīyampi gilānapaccayo”ti āpamukhena dassitaṃ gilānapaccayaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:204_11: saṅghāṭiyādicīvaranti catubbidhaṃ paccayaṃ saṅkhāya “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena paccavekkhitvā.
anya-e0103n0:204_12: Seve sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.
anya-e0103n0:205_7: Anuggahāti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte mattaṃ so jaññā jāneyya satataṃ sabbakālaṃ upaṭṭhito upaṭṭhitassati.
anya-e0103n0:205_8: Ālepanarūhane yathāti bhesajjalepanena vaṇassa ruhane viya,
anya-e0103n0:205_13: Amucchitoti taṇhāmucchāya amucchito gedhaṃ taṇhaṃ anāpanno.
anya-e0103n0:206_0: Attano mātulassa saṅgharakkhitattherasseva nāmassa gahitattā bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero.
anya-e0103n0:208_7: Sekkhadhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassāti sekkhapariyanto.
anya-e0103n0:208_9: kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū,
anya-e0103n0:208_10: tāva pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto.
anya-e0103n0:208_11: Sekkhadhammānaṃ vā heṭṭhimantabhūtā sikkhitabbā lokiyā tisso sikkhā sekkhapariyanto,
anya-e0103n0:208_14: Uparivisesādhigamatthaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:208_17: Kilesānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassaddhiyā pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ paṭippassaddhipārisuddhisīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:209_2: kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṃ mahānubhāvatāya ānubhāvato apariyantamevāti āha “gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:209_5: Peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhāti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena yathāvuttagaṇanato niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0103n0:209_8: Gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṃ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:209_9: Yaṃ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṃ sīlaṃ nāma,
anya-e0103n0:210_0: Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto.
anya-e0103n0:210_6: Sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkammāti assāmikesu ambaphalesu bhūmiyaṃ patitesu samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena
anya-e0103n0:211_1: sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṃ etādisaṃ aṃsena vāhaṇādikaṃ kiccaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:211_3: Sudhotajātimaṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu sammadeva dhotajātimaṇi viya.
anya-e0103n0:211_6: “Kimatthaṃ mayaṃ idhāgatā”ti mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:212_0: Appassutopi ce hotīti suttageyyādisutarahito hoti ce.
anya-e0103n0:212_1: Sīlesu asamāhitoti pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlesupi na sammā patiṭṭhito hoti ce.
anya-e0103n0:212_2: Nāssa sampajjate sutanti assa sīlarahitassa puggalassa sutaṃ attano,
anya-e0103n0:212_4: “Dussīloyaṃ purisapuggalo”ti hi sikkhākāmā na tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanti.
anya-e0103n0:214_2: Sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmīti sīlaṃ avināsento tena saheva marissāmi,
anya-e0103n0:214_4: Sati hi bhavādāne sīlena viyogo siyā,
anya-e0103n0:214_6: Rogaṃ sammasantoti rogabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ vedanāmukhena sesārūpadhamme,
anya-e0103n0:215_3: Pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ sūriyātapasantatte paṃsuni ṭhapitaṃ sirīsādipupphaṃ viyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:215_6: Jaññarūpaṃ apassatoti yathābhūtaṃ appassato aviddasuno “jañña”nti pasaṃsitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:215_11: Yattha yathāvutte pūtikāye rāgahetu pamattā pamādaṃ āpannā.
anya-e0103n0:215_17: itare pana paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti saha visesanenāti āha “arahantādīna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:217_6: Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanti hirottappakaruṇālobhādipamukhena yena kusalacittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati,
anya-e0103n0:217_14: Veramaṇī cetanā taṃsampayuttā saṃvarāvītikkamā tappamukhā dhammā.
anya-e0103n0:218_0: Evaṃ dasakusalakammapathavasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:218_4: Kusalā hi dhammā kāmapaṭipakkhā idha “nekkhamma”nti adhippetā.
anya-e0103n0:219_0: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānādhigamassa upāyabhūtāya
anya-e0103n0:219_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiādīnaṃ vasena dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n0:219_3: Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānaṃ hi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti.
anya-e0103n0:219_5: Tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti samāpattivipassanānaṃ arativinodanaavijjāpadālanādinā upāyoti vuttaṃ “ñāṇena avijjāya,
anya-e0103n0:219_7: Uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhānīvaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:220_2: Suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa hi cittasamādānavasena imāni jhānāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:220_14: Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto manodvāre vītikkamo natthi etesūti avītikkamāti ca vuccanti,
anya-e0103n0:220_18: Na hi nippariyāyato sīlaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ pahāyakaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0103n0:220_22: atisayapahānaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ “catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṃ pahāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:221_2: Tebhūmikadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:221_3: Niccasaññāyāti “saṅkhatadhammā niccā sassatā”ti evaṃ pavattāya micchāsaññāya,
anya-e0103n0:221_24: Nimittassāti samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahatāya.
anya-e0103n0:221_35: “Ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattā saṃsayāpatti sammohābhinivesoti apare.
anya-e0103n0:221_39: rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti apare.
anya-e0103n0:221_40: “Evaṃ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī”ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā.
anya-e0103n0:222_6: Na hi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n0:223_2: kusalāni sīlānī”ti vacanato cetaso avippaṭisāratthāya bhavanti.
anya-e0103n0:223_4: “Yoniso manasi karoto pāmojjaṃ jāyatī”ti vacanato pāmojjāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n0:223_13: Nirāmise hi sukhe siddhe “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato samādhi siddhoyeva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:223_14: tasmā samādhissa āsevanāya paguṇabalavabhāvāya saṃvattantīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:223_17: Alaṅkārāyāti tasseva samādhissa pasādhanabhūtasaddhindriyādinipphattiyā alaṅkārāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n0:223_18: Parikkhārāyāti avippaṭisārādikassa samādhisambhārassa siddhiyā tasseva samādhissa parikkhārāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n0:223_20: “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”tiādīsu viya sambhāroti ca paccayo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:223_24: Idha pana alaṅkāraparivārānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “sambhārattho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:223_27: vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena ca paripuṇṇabhāvasādhanato samādhissa pāripūriyā saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n0:224_0: Evaṃ suparisuddhasīlamūlakaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ samādhiṃ dassetvā idāni “samāhito pajānāti passati,
anya-e0103n0:224_3: virāgā vimuccatī”ti vacanato sīlamūlakāni samādhipadaṭṭhānāni payojanāni dassetuṃ “ekantanibbidāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:224_4: Nibbidāya hi dassitāya tassā padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ dassitameva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:224_8: Evamettha amatamahānibbānapariyosānaṃ sīlassa payojanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:225_0: Idāni pahānādīsu sīlatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:225_1: Tattha pajahanaṃ anuppādanirodho pahānanti tassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāya “pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:225_6: adinnādānassa pahāna”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:225_7: Tassa tassa kusaladhammassāti pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ mettādikusaladhammassa,
anya-e0103n0:225_8: adinnādānassa pahānaṃ cāgādikusaladhammassāti evaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa.
anya-e0103n0:225_12: tassa “patiṭṭhāna”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti katvā yasmiṃ santāne pāṇātipātādayo tassa pakampahetavoti
anya-e0103n0:225_17: Itare cattāroti veramaṇiādayo cattāro dhammā na pahānaṃ viya vohāramattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:225_23: Taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassāti taṃ taṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ avītikkamantassa puggalassa,
anya-e0103n0:225_24: dhammasamūhassa vā vasena cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:227_2: Ko pana soti āha “khaṇḍādibhāvo sīlassa saṃkileso”ti.
anya-e0103n0:227_7: Sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā vemajjheti ca idaṃ tesaṃ uddesādipāḷivasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:227_8: Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi.
anya-e0103n0:228_1: Methunasaṃyogavasenāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā mithunānaṃ idanti methunaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:228_8: Samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo vā.
anya-e0103n0:228_18: Idampi khoti ettha idanti yathāvuttaṃ sādiyanādiṃ khaṇḍabhāvādivasena ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Pi-
anya-e0103n0:228_22: yadetaṃ brahmacārīpaṭiññassa asatipi dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyaṃ mātugāmassa ucchādananhāpanasambāhanasādiyanādi,
anya-e0103n0:228_23: idampi ekaṃsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampīti.
anya-e0103n0:228_24: Evaṃ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati,
anya-e0103n0:228_28: Tato cassa na jātiādīhi parimuttīti dassento “ayaṃ vuccatī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:229_10: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisato diyaḍḍharatanuccappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:232_0: Idāni “akhaṇḍādibhāvo panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yāni hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:232_7: sā ca tattha sati dosadassaneti āha “sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:232_8: Nisammakārīnaṃ payojanagarukatāya diṭṭhaguṇeyeva sammāpaṭipattīti vuttaṃ “sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:233_0: Tattha sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo sīlasampadāya heṭṭhā dassitaānisaṃsapaṭipakkhato veditabbo,
anya-e0103n0:233_1: taṃ suviññeyyanti avitthāretvā pakārantarehi dassetuṃ “apicā”ti āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:233_11: Samphassitānaṃ dukkho dukkhāvaho samphasso etassāti dukkhasamphasso.
anya-e0103n0:234_0: “Aggikkhandhapariyāye vuttadukkhabhāgitāyā”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “dussīlānañhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:234_2: parehi kayiramānavandanamānanādisukhe ca assādena gadhitacittā pañcakāma…pe…
anya-e0103n0:235_6: Sajotibhūtanti sapabhaṃ samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:235_7: Taṃ kiṃ maññathāti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānamatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatigahaṇatthaṃ pucchati.
anya-e0103n0:235_18: Asucisaṅkassarasamācārassāti aparisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya asucissa hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācārassa.
anya-e0103n0:235_19: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyova hoti,
anya-e0103n0:235_20: kenacideva vā karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā kataṃ kammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāroti.
anya-e0103n0:235_26: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa.
anya-e0103n0:235_33: Bhagavā dukkhaṃ dassetvā dukkhaṃ dassetīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:237_0: Aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhatopi adhimattadukkhatāya kaṭukabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ phalaṃ etassāti aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhādhikadukkhakaṭukaphalaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:237_1: Kāmasukhaṃ avijahato bhinnasīlassa dussīlassa kuto tassa sukhaṃ natthevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:238_3: Karoti api devānanti ettha “gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitāna”ntiādikā gāthā vitthāretabbā.
anya-e0103n0:238_8: accantaṃ santā accantasantā kilesapariḷāhasaṅkhātadarathānaṃ abhāvena sabbadā santā.
anya-e0103n0:242_8: aññaṃ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā.
anya-e0103n0:242_12: Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe.
anya-e0103n0:242_14: Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti.
anya-e0103n0:242_15: Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṃ dhunanakaaṅgānaṃ viddhaṃsanakāraṇānaṃ sammadeva ādānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:242_19: Sallekho kilesānaṃ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:242_21: Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṃ apacinanti na ācinanti,
anya-e0103n0:242_24: Subharatā yathāvuttaappicchabhāvādisiddhā upaṭṭhakānaṃ sukhabharaṇīyatā suposatā. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:242_26: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n0:242_27: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti,
anya-e0103n0:242_29: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā,
anya-e0103n0:244_7: saddo gatiatthoti āha “kucchitabhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:244_8: paṃsu viya kucchitaṃ ulati pavattatīti vā paṃsukūlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:244_12: Aṅgati attano phalaṃ paṭicca hetubhāvaṃ gacchatīti aṅgaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:244_14: so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṃsukūlikassa aṅganti paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:245_7: na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti tāni sarūpato dassento “saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhāta”nti āha.
anya-e0103n0:246_0: Taṃ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte patanasaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:246_10: tañca dassetuṃ “avakhaṇḍanarahitaṃ anugharanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:246_14: kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:246_15: Uttarapadalopaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti dassento “pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:247_0: Pacchābhattaṃ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṃ eva. Khalu-
anya-e0103n0:247_5: so eva samādānassa visayoti āha “samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:247_8: taṃ sīlaṃ assātiādinā sabbaṃ vattabbanti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:247_11: Taṃ hesa “idaṃ bahumaṅkuṇaṃ duggandhapavāta”ntiādivasena appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati.
anya-e0103n0:247_14: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṃsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti viddhaṃsitakilesattā,
anya-e0103n0:247_17: tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni,
anya-e0103n0:247_19: aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno.
anya-e0103n0:247_20: “Ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesa”nti iminā ñāṇapubbakataṃ tesaṃ samādānassa vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n0:250_0: Samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṃ taṃmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. Attanā,
anya-e0103n0:250_1: parammukhena ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṃ taṇhācāro,
anya-e0103n0:251_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṃ antarā avicchedanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:251_1: rañño santike paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṃsato avisaṃvādanaṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:251_4: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa.
anya-e0103n0:251_6: Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko,
anya-e0103n0:251_8: Athekadivasaṃ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṃ vijjulatobhāsena disvā itaro pucchi “kiṃ, bhante,
anya-e0103n0:251_10: Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṃ vatthu.
anya-e0103n0:253_1: Gahapatidānacīvaranti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṃyeva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:253_3: na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṃ nivattetuṃ dānaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:253_4: Aññatarenāti ettha samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṃ hotu,
anya-e0103n0:253_7: Yathā “devadatto divā na bhuñjatī”ti vutte “rattiyaṃ bhuñjatī”ti atthato āpannameva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:253_9: evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:254_2: Taṃ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:254_11: Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṃ satisammosena patitasadisanti “sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:255_1: coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya “samaṇacīvaraṃ siyā nu kho,
anya-e0103n0:255_2: no”ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “na taṃ paṃsukūla”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:255_3: Na hi taṃ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:255_4: Idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṃ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:255_6: Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṃ cīvaraṃ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dīyati.
anya-e0103n0:255_7: Senāsanacīvaranti senāsanaṃ kāretvā “etasmiṃ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū”ti dinnacīvaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:255_8: Na taṃ paṃsukūlanti apaṃsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato,
anya-e0103n0:255_11: Tatrapīti yaṃ gāhetvā na dinnaṃ bhikkhudattiyaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:255_14: dāne ca visuṃ visuṃ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṃ sabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:255_15: tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ dāyakehī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:256_0: Nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvoti upasampannasamanantaraṃ ācariyena vuttesu catūsu nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya
anya-e0103n0:256_6: Dhutadhamme samādāya vattanaṃ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṃ “sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:256_13: tasmā ko taṃ na dhārayeti yojanā yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:256_14: Paṭiññaṃ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe “āma bhante”ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n0:259_14: parassa vā santakaṃ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena adhiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:259_17: aṃsakāsāvanti imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṃ na karontī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:259_18: Pariharituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa.
anya-e0103n0:259_24: parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n0:262_16: Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṃ pacitvā “sabbesaṃ ayyānaṃ dassāmā”ti vihāreyeva bhattaṃ sampādenti,
anya-e0103n0:262_21: vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī”ti vadantānaṃ sampaṭicchanena taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n0:263_2: Niccaṃ antaragharaṃ pavisantasseva suppaṭicchannagamanādayo sekhiyadhammā sampajjantīti sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:264_2: Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato attabharassa.
anya-e0103n0:264_3: Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṃ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n0:264_4: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:264_8: Devāpi pihayanti tādinoti tādisassa bhusaṃ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena satinepakkena
anya-e0103n0:264_9: samannāgamato sabbakālaṃ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo devāpi pihayanti patthenti.
anya-e0103n0:264_10: Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti,
anya-e0103n0:267_4: Puratoti vīthiyaṃ gacchantassa purato gharaṃ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n0:267_5: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṃ pesakārabhāvaṃ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:267_6: Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṃ divasaṃ na bhikkhaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdati,
anya-e0103n0:267_8: Katthacipi kule nibaddhaṃ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena kulesu niccanavakatā.
anya-e0103n0:267_9: Sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca candūpamatā.
anya-e0103n0:270_2: ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṃ visuṃ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho.
anya-e0103n0:270_4: Vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vattaṃ kātuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0103n0:270_6: Tattha pana paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ theravādaṃ āha “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:270_8: ekāsanikaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhuñjantaṃ āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya,
anya-e0103n0:270_9: dhutaṅgabhedato yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:270_14: tasmā vattakaraṇaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:273_1: Appaṭikūlaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:273_2: Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti “ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī”ti bahuṃ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:273_4: Atra atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho,
anya-e0103n0:273_7: Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṃ akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā.
anya-e0103n0:273_8: Visuṃ visuṃ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā,
anya-e0103n0:276_2: tassa paṭikkhepena taṃ atirittaṃ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:276_3: Puna bhojanaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:276_13: Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya khedaṃ na yāti.
anya-e0103n0:279_1: Gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbanti ettha gāmantaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:279_2: araññañca sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha saddhiṃ upacārenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:279_4: Yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:279_8: Tattha hi “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:279_10: Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti abhidhamme gāmā “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā,
anya-e0103n0:279_12: Suttantikapariyāyena āraññakasikkhāpade “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n0:279_13: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike “araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano”ti sutte vutto.
anya-e0103n0:279_14: Ayañca suttasaṃvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva pamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:279_15: Tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṃ gahetabbanti dassento “taṃ āropitena ācariyadhanunā”tiādinā minanavidhiṃ āha.
anya-e0103n0:279_16: Teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathānayova idamettha pamāṇanti ca vutto.
anya-e0103n0:280_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ pidahati.
anya-e0103n0:280_6: Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:280_10: Assa āraññikassa cittaṃ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato.
anya-e0103n0:280_12: Jīvitanikantiṃ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa dūrīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n0:280_15: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino vāhanasadisanti katvā vuttaṃ “avasesadhutāyudho”ti,
anya-e0103n0:283_4: Tattha hi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ balakāyo upagantvā antarantarā yuddhaṃ kareyya,
anya-e0103n0:283_5: corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṃ na denti.
anya-e0103n0:283_6: Cetiyarukkho “devatādhiṭṭhito”ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṃ upagatehi manussehi avivitto hoti.
anya-e0103n0:284_1: tarūnaṃ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa khaṇabhaṅgassa dassanena.
anya-e0103n0:284_4: Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti.
anya-e0103n0:284_7: “Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ nissāya pabbajjā”ti evaṃ nissayoti ca bhāsito.
anya-e0103n0:284_12: Evaṃ passanto tarupaṇṇāni paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṃ panūdati pajahati,
anya-e0103n0:287_1: “Rukkhamūlaṃ paṭikkhipāmī”ti ettake vutte channaṃ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti “channañca rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:287_2: Dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi samādānaṃ ijjhati,
anya-e0103n0:287_4: “Dhammassavanāyā”ti imināva dhammaṃ kathentenāpi uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ tehi yācitena channaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0103n0:287_10: Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṃ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:288_2: Acchannamariyādanti yathā vassodakaṃ anto na pavisati,
anya-e0103n0:288_4: Anto pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṃ pavisati ce,
anya-e0103n0:289_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:289_1: Jānitvāti dhammassavanādiatthaṃ channaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā nisinno “idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī”ti jānitvā.
anya-e0103n0:289_2: Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako āvāsapalibodho,
anya-e0103n0:289_3: na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṃso vutto.
anya-e0103n0:289_7: tasmā tattha gantuṃ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso.
anya-e0103n0:292_4: Na tatthāti “susāna”nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:293_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “tasmiṃ pana vasantenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:293_3: Tattha uppannaparissayavighātatthāyāti “susānaṃ nāma manussarāhasseyyaka”nti corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti,
anya-e0103n0:293_4: tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṃ “coro”ti gahetvā potheyyuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:293_5: tasmā vihāre saṅghattheraṃ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṃ rājayuttakaṃ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā yathā tādiso,
anya-e0103n0:293_8: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṃ abhimukhaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:293_9: tadāpi saṃvegajananatthaṃ tattha diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṃ “addhakkhikena āḷahanaṃ olokentenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:294_5: Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na paharitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:294_11: pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṃ na pavisitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:294_13: Matañātakānaṃ tattha gantvā devasikaṃ rodanaṃ dhuvarodanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:295_10: Saṃviggassa yoniso padahanaṃ sambhavatīti amanussānaṃ garubhāvanīyatā.
anya-e0103n0:298_6: Vihārassa pariyantabhāvena dūreti vā bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṃ accāsanneti vā pucchituṃ na labhati,
anya-e0103n0:298_9: Sacassa taṃ na ruccatīti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṃ yathāgāhitaṃ senāsanaṃ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati,
anya-e0103n0:298_10: mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṃ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṃ loluppaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:302_2: Tappaṭikkhepeneva hi tadatthā “mañco bhisī”ti evamādikā seyyā paṭikkhittā eva honti.
anya-e0103n0:302_3: “Nesajjiko”ti ca sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṃ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī,
anya-e0103n0:302_6: Kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena icchito, na itare.
anya-e0103n0:302_7: Na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṃ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī.
anya-e0103n0:303_1: piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo.
anya-e0103n0:303_4: Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṃ apassāya viharato nesajjikassa “anesajjikato ko viseso”ti gāhaṃ
anya-e0103n0:303_5: nivāretuṃ abhayatthero nidassito “thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:304_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:307_5: Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:307_8: taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:307_10: Yaṃ hidaṃ kilesānaṃ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa, ñāṇassa,
anya-e0103n0:307_14: āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “na maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:307_17: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:307_20: etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga”nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:307_21: Na ca akusalaṃ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato.
anya-e0103n0:307_22: Yesaṃ samādānānaṃ taṃ akusalaṃ ñāṇaṃ viya aṅganti katvā tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:307_23: Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga”nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:308_1: Te hi dhutaṅgaṃ nāma paññattīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:308_2: Tathā sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṃ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā,
anya-e0103n0:308_3: samādātabbatā cāti tesaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṃ “kusalattikavinimutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:308_4: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā,
anya-e0103n0:308_5: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:308_13: siyā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikāti evaṃ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṃ yathārahaṃ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:309_1: idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo “dhutakileso puggalo”ti adhippeto.
anya-e0103n0:309_2: Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena kilesadhunano dhammo,
anya-e0103n0:309_6: Evaṃ dhutaṃ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho,
anya-e0103n0:309_8: tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “atthi dhuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:310_2: Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dhunanavasena pavattiyā “dhuto”ti
anya-e0103n0:310_3: laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma.
anya-e0103n0:310_4: Asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho.
anya-e0103n0:310_5: Paccayagedhādihetukānaṃ lolatādīnaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato
anya-e0103n0:310_6: saṃsaggato cittassa vivecanato sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti
anya-e0103n0:310_10: yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca,
anya-e0103n0:310_13: Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu.
anya-e0103n0:311_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti āha “dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:311_2: satisampajaññe moho apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṃ “sallekhaṃ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:313_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena “dvācattālīsa hontī”ti vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0103n0:313_1: terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṃyeva sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:313_5: rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vacanato channe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati,
anya-e0103n0:313_11: Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ na labbhati.
anya-e0103n0:313_15: Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṃkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṃ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:313_16: Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:313_17: Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṃ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:313_18: “Ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga”nti hi imaṃ anuvattamānameva katvā “satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:317_6: Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:317_7: “samādhī”ti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:318_1: vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:318_2: Taṃdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ “samādhi bahuvidho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:318_5: Na sādheyyāti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho,
anya-e0103n0:318_7: Jhānavimokkhādīsu hi samādhiṃ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne jhānavibhaṅgādīsu
anya-e0103n0:318_9: Tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0103n0:318_11: Kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena hīnādibhedabhinnena pavattivibhāgena brahmapārisajjādivasena navavidho,
anya-e0103n0:318_12: pañcamajjhānikena vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati.
anya-e0103n0:318_13: Svāssa pavattivibhāgo ayaṃ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā,
anya-e0103n0:319_0: Cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:319_8: Tathā hesa “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0103n0:320_1: sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo,
anya-e0103n0:321_2: na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:321_3: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti vitakko appanā.
anya-e0103n0:321_5: Tappamukhatāvasena pana sabbasmiṃ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme “appanā”ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro.
anya-e0103n0:321_7: Gāmādīnaṃ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā viyāti āha “upacārappanāvasena duvidho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:321_12: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti lokuttaro.
anya-e0103n0:321_14: ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tato itaraṃ niddhāretuṃ “lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:321_29: padena pana nippītikekadesovāti ayametesaṃ padānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n0:322_8: savitakko ca so savicāro cāti savitakkasavicāro. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:322_11: Tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto cāti avitakkavicāramatto.
anya-e0103n0:322_13: Savitakkasavicāro hi samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro,
anya-e0103n0:322_16: Atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṃ vicāramatto,
anya-e0103n0:322_17: na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṃ avitakka-
anya-e0103n0:322_30: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti mahaggato.
anya-e0103n0:323_3: Pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā,
anya-e0103n0:323_5: Dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiñño, samādhi.
anya-e0103n0:325_1: Imesaṃ vasenāti imesaṃ dasannaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0103n0:325_2: “Pubbabhāge ekaggatā”ti iminā appanāya upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n0:326_3: siyā nippītikoti aniyamavacanaṃ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi vā jhānānaṃ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko,
anya-e0103n0:326_5: Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṃ upacārasamādhi sappītikova,
anya-e0103n0:326_10: siyā upekkhāsahagatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:328_3: Subhāvitoti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva paguṇataṃ upanīto.
anya-e0103n0:329_0: Saddhiṃ upacārasamādhināti sabbesampi jhānānaṃ upacārasamādhinā saha.
anya-e0103n0:329_1: Vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ disvāti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante “cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya”nti
anya-e0103n0:329_2: ādīnavaṃ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā.
anya-e0103n0:329_4: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ evaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ samādhiṃ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n0:330_6: Pītisukhasahagato vāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:330_7: Ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ nippītikasukhato
anya-e0103n0:330_8: sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṃ satthu pītitikadesanāti nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato
anya-e0103n0:331_1: Cittuppādo hi sahajātadhammānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya “bhūmī”ti vuccati “sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n0:333_0: Paṭhamasamannāhāro bhāvanaṃ ārabhantassa “pathavī pathavī”tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n0:333_1: Tassa tassa jhānassa upacāranti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṃ vūpasame thirabhūtaṃ kāmāvacarajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:333_2: “Yāva appanā”ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto viya dissatīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:334_2: Asappāyasevīti upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā.
anya-e0103n0:334_7: Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī,
anya-e0103n0:334_13: Asampāditaappanākosallassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:335_3: Taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha “taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:335_4: Abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya anabhibhūtassa taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:335_5: Tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:335_6: Akatādhikāroti bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggatova hoti,
anya-e0103n0:335_7: evaṃ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti āha “katādhikārassa sukhā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:335_9: kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya.
anya-e0103n0:336_0: Yathāvuttā paṭipadābhiññā puggalādhiṭṭhānāti dhammaniddesampi puggalādhiṭṭhānamukhena dassetuṃ “yo puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:336_3: Ayaṃ parittoti ayaṃ samādhi appānubhāvatāya paritto.
anya-e0103n0:336_4: Avaḍḍhiteti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n0:336_6: “Paguṇo subhāvito”ti vatvā “uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkotī”ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa
anya-e0103n0:336_7: paccayo bhavituṃ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:336_9: evaṃ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva uparijhānanibbattanenāti subhāvitopi uparijhānassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0103n0:336_11: Apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṃ patto uparijhānassa paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva,
anya-e0103n0:336_13: Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyāti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:336_16: Yo pana paguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:336_18: ayaṃ appamāṇo parittārammaṇoti evaṃ paṭhamacatutthasamādhīnaṃ vuttalakkhaṇassa vomissakabhāvena dutiyatatiyasamādhisaṅgāhako vomissakanayo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:337_3: “senaṅgaṃ rathaṅga”ntiādīsu viyāti āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:338_3: Ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṃ bhajatīti ṭhitibhāgiyo.
anya-e0103n0:338_5: Paccanīkasamudācāravasenāti tassa tassa jhānassa paccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ pavattivasena.
anya-e0103n0:338_10: Tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṃtaṃpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n0:338_11: Evañca katvā “satiyā vā nikantiyā vā”ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:338_16: Nibbedhabhāgiyatāti saccānaṃ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā vipassanāya saṃvattatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:339_2: Avitakkasahagatāti “kathaṃ nu kho me avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā.
anya-e0103n0:339_4: samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṃ dassetuṃ “tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā
anya-e0103n0:339_5: samādhīpi cattāro hontī”ti tesaṃ vasena evaṃ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:340_0: Bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā “kāmāvacaro samādhī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:340_4: Labhati samādhinti evaṃ yaṃ samādhiṃ labhati,
anya-e0103n0:341_1: Aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti,
anya-e0103n0:341_2: tena saddhiṃyeva vicārasamatikkamaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya”nti.
anya-e0103n0:341_3: Dvidhā bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:341_4: Pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:342_4: Tattha hānabhāgiyo dhammoti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:342_5: Visesabhāgiyo dhammoti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādianupakkhandanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:342_8: apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṃ tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n0:342_9: tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati,
anya-e0103n0:342_11: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā
anya-e0103n0:342_12: samudācaranti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n0:342_13: tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa
anya-e0103n0:342_16: Iminā nayenāti iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo,
anya-e0103n0:344_2: sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto.
anya-e0103n0:344_5: Visunti paññābhāvanāya visuṃ katvā na vadāma.
anya-e0103n0:345_0: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho ra-
anya-e0103n0:347_2: “Nāmā”ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṃ samaññāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:347_3: Paṭisāmitamevāti niccakālaṃ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:347_6: Etena “bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba”nti ovādo dinno hoti.
anya-e0103n0:348_0: Kulanti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṃ gahaṇaṃ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:349_1: Sadāti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbadā divase divase.
anya-e0103n0:349_3: Sabbaṃ pavattinti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṃ daharassa sabbaṃ pavattiṃ.
anya-e0103n0:350_1: Rathavinītapaṭipadanti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṃ rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṃ rathavinītasutte āgataṃ sattavisuddhipaṭipadaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:350_2: Nālakapaṭipadanti “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā satthārā nālakattherassa desitapaṭipadaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:352_0: Ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe”. ;
anya-e0103n0:353_0: “Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṃ na lapayeyyā”ti. –
anya-e0103n0:355_3: Piṇḍapātaṃ tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti,
anya-e0103n0:355_6: Vadantīti purimadivase bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:356_2: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi lahukameva icchitabbanti āha “yojanato paraṃ agantvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:357_0: Katākateti kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:357_1: katākateti vā appake ca mahante ca kate,
anya-e0103n0:358_0: Pabbajjāpekkhoti sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṃ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā,
anya-e0103n0:358_1: tasmā taṃ paricchinnadivasaṃ atikkametuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0103n0:358_2: “Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu”ntiādinā samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:358_3: byatirekato pana “sace taṃ alabhanto sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:358_4: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo”ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena palibodhupacchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:359_0: Tathāti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo,
anya-e0103n0:359_1: tathā upasampāditaantevāsiko attano kammavācaṃ vatvā upasampādito.
anya-e0103n0:360_0: Yo koci rogoti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno. Anamataggeti anu anu amatagge anādimati.
anya-e0103n0:361_3: Yassa ganthadhuraṃ vissajjetvā ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva,
anya-e0103n0:361_9: Puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ganthadhuraṃ vissajjemīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:362_8: Attano ācariyānanti attano kathetuṃ yuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:362_9: Suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti etasmiṃ atthīti sabbapariyattiko,
anya-e0103n0:362_11: Pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ taṭṭikāya nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n0:362_13: Cīvaraṃ pārupitvāti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā.
anya-e0103n0:363_6: Yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato.
anya-e0103n0:365_4: Paricchinditvāti “imasmiṃ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā.
anya-e0103n0:365_7: ayañca sahavāsīnaṃ cittamaddavajananādiattho “manussānaṃ piyo hotī”tiādinayappavattena mettānisaṃsasuttena dīpetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:366_0: Niccaṃ pariharitabbattāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṃ pariharaṇīyattā anuyuñjitabbattā.
anya-e0103n0:366_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
anya-e0103n0:366_5: tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati.
anya-e0103n0:366_6: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
anya-e0103n0:366_7: sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:366_8: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
anya-e0103n0:366_13: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
anya-e0103n0:366_14: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitaṃ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
anya-e0103n0:367_0: Taṃ pana kalyāṇamittaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:367_10: Na attanomatiṃ pakāseti kathetīti na attanomatiko,
anya-e0103n0:367_11: attano matiṃ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:368_0: “Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo”tiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:368_1: Tattha pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayoti “yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo”tiādinā vuttakhīṇāsavādikā.
anya-e0103n0:368_2: Uggahaparipucchānaṃ visodhitattāti uggahetabbato “uggaho”ti laddhanāmāya kammaṭṭhānupakārāya pāḷiyā,
anya-e0103n0:368_3: tadatthaṃ paripucchanato “paripucchā”ti laddhasamaññāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā gahitattā.
anya-e0103n0:368_4: Ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvāti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa kammaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0103n0:368_5: anurūpaṃ suttapadañceva suttānugataṃ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā.
anya-e0103n0:368_8: samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:368_9: Mahāmaggaṃ dassentoti kammaṭṭhānavidhiṃ mahāmaggaṃ katvā dassento.
anya-e0103n0:369_2: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ pūrentena.
anya-e0103n0:371_1: Santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṃ pavatti rāgacariyā,
anya-e0103n0:371_8: Imā eva hi sandhāya “aparāpi catasso”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:371_10: tathā saddhādīnaṃ saṃsaggasannipātavasena saddhābuddhicariyā saddhāvitakkacariyā buddhivitakkacariyā saddhābuddhivitakkacariyāti.
anya-e0103n0:371_16: tā pana asammohantena saṃyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṃ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:371_17: “Pakatī”ti iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṃ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:371_19: yato rāgacariyādīnaṃ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo balavanto honti,
anya-e0103n0:371_21: Tāsaṃ vasenāti channaṃ mūlacariyānaṃ vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti.
anya-e0103n0:371_23: tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi ca na siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:372_0: Saddhā balavatī hoti rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:372_3: Sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:372_4: Tattha saddhāya siniyhanaṃ pasādavasena akālussiyaṃ alūkhatā,
anya-e0103n0:372_9: rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n0:372_10: evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha “rāgacaritassa saddhācarito sabhāgo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:373_0: Paññā balavatī hoti dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:373_3: Tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṃ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṃsaṭṭhatā,
anya-e0103n0:373_8: dosassa ahitādhānavasena chaḍḍananti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n0:373_9: evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha “dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:374_0: Antarāyakarā vitakkāti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:374_6: mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n0:374_7: evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha “mohacaritassa vitakkacarito sabhāgo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:375_3: dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:375_7: Kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena visuṃ cariyābhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:375_10: Evaṃ rāgena satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā,
anya-e0103n0:375_11: evaṃ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṃ viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti,
anya-e0103n0:375_15: Eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvābhāvo saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:375_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mohacariyantogadhāva diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṃ “mohanidānattā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:376_12: Etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena na tesaṃ luddhatā,
anya-e0103n0:377_0: Itareti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:377_2: mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṃsikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:377_6: sopi ekaṃsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha “yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:377_8: Dosaniyameti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena cariyāniyame “semhādhiko rāgacarito”ti vatvā puna “semhādhiko mohacarito”ti,
anya-e0103n0:377_9: “vātādhiko mohacarito”ti vatvā puna “vātādhiko rāgacarito”ti ca vuttattā tampi dosavasena niyamavacanaṃ pubbāparaviruddhameva.
anya-e0103n0:377_10: Aparicchinnavacananti paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā vuttavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:378_2: Niyāmoti ca tesaṃyeva lobhādīnaṃ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:378_8: Tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissato ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā,
anya-e0103n0:378_9: te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṃ antogadhattā.
anya-e0103n0:379_0: Idāni taṃ nesaṃ lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissakatādiṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yassa hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:379_2: Lobho balavāti lobho tajjāya paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti.
anya-e0103n0:379_4: Kathaṃ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti?
anya-e0103n0:379_5: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “ekakkhaṇe pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:379_6: Nikantikkhaṇaṃ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:379_9: Yo hi “evaṃsundaraṃ evaṃvipulaṃ evaṃmahagghañca na sakkā dātu”ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho,
anya-e0103n0:379_10: so sammadeva lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0103n0:380_0: Purimanayenevāti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0103n0:380_1: amoho pana balavā mohaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti evaṃ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṃ atidesattho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:381_3: eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā,
anya-e0103n0:381_4: tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:381_7: alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti,
anya-e0103n0:381_10: lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā gahitā
anya-e0103n0:381_11: evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
anya-e0103n0:381_12: Ye pana ubhayesaṃ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
anya-e0103n0:381_14: Na hi ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ “lobho ca balavā,
anya-e0103n0:381_18: Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:381_22: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lobho balavā alobho mando,
anya-e0103n0:381_24: So ca nesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:382_0: Yo luddhoti vuttoti yo ussadakittane “luddho”ti vutto,
anya-e0103n0:382_6: Alobhādosānaṃ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha “aluddhaaduṭṭhā pasannapakatitāya saddhācaritā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:383_0: Ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:383_2: upanissayato sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:383_4: Lobhādinā vomissaparivārenāti ettha lobhamohādinā aññamaññaaviruddhavomissaparivārenāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:383_7: Ekaṃsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena cariyāsiddhito.
anya-e0103n0:383_8: Tathā ceva ussadakittanaṃ pavattaṃ yathārahaṃ lobhālobhādīnaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:384_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
anya-e0103n0:384_1: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n0:384_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n0:384_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n0:385_5: Evaṃ lobhussadādayo puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0103n0:386_3: Puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho dhammamukheneva paññāyatīti dhammādhiṭṭhānenāha “cariyāyo vibhāvaye”ti.
anya-e0103n0:386_8: Anukaḍḍhitanti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto viya pādaṃ nikkhipati.
anya-e0103n0:386_9: Tenassa padaṃ anukaḍḍhitaṃ pacchato añchitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:386_16: Idamīdisaṃ padanti bhagavato padaṃ disvā vadati.
anya-e0103n0:387_6: Nipajjitvāti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā sayati niddāyati.
anya-e0103n0:387_7: Pakkhittakāyoti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo.
anya-e0103n0:389_0: Nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārīti sukosallaṃ sundaraṃ avisamaṃ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo.
anya-e0103n0:391_0: Kilantarūpo viyāti tassa asahanena khedappatto viya.
anya-e0103n0:392_9: cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṃ loluppaṃ cāpalyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:393_2: Parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso.
anya-e0103n0:394_6: Yathāgahitassa micchāgāhassa dubbiveṭhiyatā duppaṭinissaggiyatā. Idha ādi-
anya-e0103n0:396_3: “Evañca evañca karissāmī”ti kiccānaṃ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṃ rattiṃ dhūmāyanā.
anya-e0103n0:396_4: Tathāvitakkitānaṃ tesaṃ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṃ divā pajjalanā.
anya-e0103n0:396_5: Hurāhuraṃ dhāvanāti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo.
anya-e0103n0:397_1: aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti “sabbākārenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:397_2: Kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:397_3: “Na sārato paccetabba”nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “rāgacaritassa hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:397_4: Appamādavihārinoti tattha vinidhāya bhāvaṃ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino.
anya-e0103n0:398_5: Ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa heṭṭhābhāgo akatabhittibhūmiparikammo akatapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n0:398_14: Sāṇi viya kharasamphassanti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:400_0: Vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti yathā taṃ āyasmato meghiyattherassa.
anya-e0103n0:401_0: Pabhedaparicchedato nidānaparicchedato vibhāvanaparicchedato sappāyaparicchedatoti paccekaṃ pariccheda-
anya-e0103n0:401_3: Ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṃ “na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena āvikata”nti.
anya-e0103n0:403_1: Saṅkhātaniddesatoti saṅkhātānaṃ “cattālīsāyā”ti saṅkhyāvasena gahitānaṃ uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesato.
anya-e0103n0:405_0: Dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṃ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:405_1: na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n0:405_2: Tena vuttaṃ “parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:405_4: Tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva tāni upatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0103n0:405_7: na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha “ānisaṃsābhāvā cā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:406_5: Thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṃ sārento viya yattha tattha nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjateva.
anya-e0103n0:406_6: Tenassa samantato nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:407_2: Ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa taṃ mahantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:407_4: Appaketi sarīrassa ekadese nimittaṃ gaṇhātīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:407_8: na ca koci ānisaṃso”ti vuttaṃ ādīnavaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:408_0: Sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ upapattito vivarituṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:408_1: Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṃ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā vuttaṃ “vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:408_3: Vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo,
anya-e0103n0:408_7: Na ca tena attho atthīti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṃ natthi.
anya-e0103n0:408_15: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha “parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavasenā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:408_16: katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n0:408_21: na itaranti āha “na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṃ vaḍḍhetu”nti.
anya-e0103n0:409_9: Vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa calanākāro paññāyatīti obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇampi calitārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:410_1: tattha asubhānaṃ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:411_5: Ucchusassādīnaṃ pattesu pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:411_6: Na ādikammikena gahetabbānīti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni,
anya-e0103n0:412_0: Imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:413_7: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṃ tesaṃ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato.
anya-e0103n0:413_8: “Saddhācaritassa purimā cha anussatiyo”ti idaṃ atisappāyavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:413_9: Imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṃ imassa atisappāyanti gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni.
anya-e0103n0:414_4: paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari.
anya-e0103n0:414_10: Aniccasaññāti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti evaṃ pavattā aniccānupassanā.
anya-e0103n0:414_12: Ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:416_3: Somanassameva uppajjati “evaṃ bahuparissayoyaṃ attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito”ti.
anya-e0103n0:417_2: ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “dubbaco vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:417_3: Yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti,
anya-e0103n0:418_0: Tumhākamatthāyāti vutteti “sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṃ koci attho hotī”ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n0:418_1: Ghaṃsentoti “manussakakkena tumhākaṃ koci attho”ti vutte ghaṃsento niravasesaṃ attabhāvaṃ khepetuṃ ussaheyyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:418_2: “Mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṃ koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī”ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n0:418_3: Tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena vīriyārambho eva pavedito.
anya-e0103n0:419_1: Aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n0:419_10: Idāni naṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “alobhādīnaṃ vasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:419_13: lokuttarānaṃ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo, tena.
anya-e0103n0:419_15: anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṃ bahukārā visesato yogino.
anya-e0103n0:419_16: Tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti.
anya-e0103n0:420_6: Tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṃ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:421_0: “Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:421_2: Adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:421_4: Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:421_7: Alobhena ca piyavippayogadukkhaṃ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:421_9: adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṃ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:422_0: “Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṃ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato,
anya-e0103n0:422_2: adosena jarādukkhaṃ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṃ jarāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n0:423_0: “Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:423_1: yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti,
anya-e0103n0:423_4: dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti,
anya-e0103n0:423_9: Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
anya-e0103n0:424_0: “Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso,
anya-e0103n0:424_1: asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti.
anya-e0103n0:424_8: Purimāni ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena,
anya-e0103n0:425_1: aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati,
anya-e0103n0:425_4: aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:425_6: amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjento,
anya-e0103n0:426_4: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0103n0:427_0: “Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṃ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa dukkhassa abhāvā,
anya-e0103n0:428_1: luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato na passati.
anya-e0103n0:428_3: adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati.
anya-e0103n0:428_5: amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati.
anya-e0103n0:428_11: Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya pihaṃ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n0:428_12: saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n0:429_1: upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:430_0: Idāni te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:430_3: Ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:430_7: Bodhiparipākāya saṃvattantīti yathābhinīhāraṃ attanā pattabbabodhiyā paripācanāya bhavanti.
anya-e0103n0:430_13: Lobhe dosadassāvinoti lubbhanalakkhaṇe lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino.
anya-e0103n0:430_16: alobhe ca ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati,
anya-e0103n0:431_2: “ke vā te dhammā bahulaṃ samudācarantī”ti pucchitabbo.
anya-e0103n0:431_3: Kiṃ vāti kiṃ asubhaṃ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā.
anya-e0103n0:431_4: Kiṃ te manasi karoto phāsu hotīti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:431_8: Tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṃsato byabhicārino eva.
anya-e0103n0:431_10: “Asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṃ katipayadivasaṃ anuyuñjāhī”ti ca vattabbo.
anya-e0103n0:432_1: tattha sajjhāyavasena vā manasikāravasena vā kataparicayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:432_2: Ekaṃ dve nisajjānīti ekaṃ vā dve vā uṇhāsanāni.
anya-e0103n0:432_3: Sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā attano sammukhāva adhīyāpetvā dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:433_2: Taṃ taṃ ākāranti ācariyena kammaṭṭhāne vuccamāne padapadatthādhippāyaopammādikaṃ attano ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhitaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:433_6: Evaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitassatitāya nimittaṃ gahetvā tattha sampajānakāritāya sakkaccaṃ suṇantena.
anya-e0103n0:433_9: Sabbākārenāti kassacipi pakārassa tattha asesitattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:437_1: Phāsu hotīti āvāsasappāyādilābhena manasikāraphāsutā bhāvanānukūlatā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:437_2: Parisodhentenāti tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ chindanavasena visodhentena.
anya-e0103n0:437_4: Sati hi kāyakilamathe siyā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa antarāyoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:439_7: Bodhiaṅgaṇādīsu kātabbaṃ idha “vatta”nti adhippetanti āha “pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā ritta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:440_10: Tādisoyevāti “tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā”tiādinā yādiso paṇṇavante vihāre upaddavo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:441_0: Patthanīyeti tattha vasantesu sambhāvanāvasena upasaṅkamanādinā patthetabbe.
anya-e0103n0:444_3: Tenassa tattha phāsuvihāro na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:445_1: Papāteti papātasīse ṭhatvā gāyi “gītasaddena idhāgataṃ papāte pātetvā khādissāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:445_2: Vegena gahetvāti vegenāgantvā “kuhiṃ yāsī”ti khandhe gahetvā.
anya-e0103n0:446_1: vihārasāmantā vā na sakkā hoti kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:446_2: tattha vihāre so alābho mahādosoti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:447_6: Nagaranissitaṃ nagaranti vuttaṃ uttarapadalopena yathā “bhīmaseno bhīmo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:449_1: Ayaṃ anurūpo nāmāti ayaṃ vihāro bhāvanāya anurūpo nāma.
anya-e0103n0:449_2: Nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na atidūraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:449_3: Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:449_5: gocaraṭṭhānaṃ parissayādirahitamaggatāya ca gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:449_15: sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā.
anya-e0103n0:449_20: Atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0103n0:449_22: Avivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti.
anya-e0103n0:449_24: Kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷipadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
anya-e0103n0:453_1: Sabbakammaṭṭhānavasenāti anukkamena niddisiyamānassa cattālīsavidhassa sabbassa kammaṭṭhānassa vasena.
anya-e0103n0:453_5: Āhāre hi āsayaṃ paviṭṭhamatte tassa āgantukatāya yebhuyyena siyā sarīrassa koci parissamo,
anya-e0103n0:453_7: Tasmiṃ hi avūpasante sarīrakhedena cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labheyyāti.
anya-e0103n0:453_9: Sukhanisinnenāti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya nisajjāya sukhanisinnena.
anya-e0103n0:453_10: Vuttañhetanti yaṃ “katāya vā”tiādinā pathaviyā nimittaggahaṇaṃ idha vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:454_2: pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhantoti uggahanimittabhāvena pathavīkasiṇaṃ gaṇhanto ādiyanto,
anya-e0103n0:454_6: Nimittaṃ gaṇhātīti tattha cakkhunā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ viya bhāvanāñāṇena vakkhamānavisesaṃ pathavīnimittaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:454_14: Tathā hi tena nivattitaṃ dassetuṃ “no anantake”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:454_22: uddhaṃ vāti parittappamāṇabhedasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā’ti vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:454_23: Yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe ekaṅgulamattampi vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇamevāti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0103n0:455_0: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotīti so yogāvacaro taṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ suggahitaṃ nimittaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:455_1: Yadā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā oloketvā tattha nimittaṃ gahetvā nimmīletvā āvajjentassa ummīletvā olokitakkhaṇe viya upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:455_3: Athettha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā abahigatena mānasena punappunaṃ sallakkhento sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti nāma.
anya-e0103n0:455_4: Evaṃ upadhāritaṃ pana naṃ punappunaṃ āvajjento manasi karonto tamevārabbha āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ bahulaṃ pavattento suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapeti nāma.
anya-e0103n0:455_5: Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti evaṃ suggahitakaraṇādinā sammadeva upaṭṭhite tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaññite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n0:455_6: Cittaṃ upanibandhatīti attano cittaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ upanetvā nibandhati aññārammaṇato vinivattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:456_0: Idāni yathādassitassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa atthappakāsanena saddhiṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ vibhāvetukāmo akate tāva
anya-e0103n0:458_0: Evaṃ kasiṇadose dassetvā idāni kasiṇakaraṇādike sesākāre dassetuṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:458_8: etadeva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:459_2: Evaṃ vuttapamāṇaṃ paricchedanti yathāvuttappamāṇaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ paricchedaṃ katvā,
anya-e0103n0:459_3: evaṃ vuttappamāṇaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ visabhāgavaṇṇena paricchedaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:460_10: sappasirūpamā sapaṭibhayaṭṭhenā”tiādinā “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā”tiādinā “kāmasukhañca nāmetaṃ bahuparissayaṃ, sāsaṅkaṃ, sabhayaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:460_14: anatthasaṃhita”ntiādinā ca anekākāravokāraṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paccavekkhitvā.
anya-e0103n0:460_22: suppaṭipanno saṅgho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanato”ti evaṃ buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānussaraṇena ratanattayavisayaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ janayitvā.
anya-e0103n0:460_27: Pubbe pana paṭhamajjhānameva nekkhammanti vuttattā vuttāvasesā sabbepi nekkhammadhammā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:463_1: Evametehi pañcahi padehi “ānisaṃsadassāvī”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:463_2: Samena ākārenāti atiummīlanaatimandālocanāni vajjetvā nātiummīlananātimandālocanasaṅkhātena samena ālocanākārena.
anya-e0103n0:463_3: Nimittaṃ gaṇhantenāti pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitanimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena.
anya-e0103n0:463_4: Bhāvetabbanti tathāpavattaṃ nimittaggahaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ āsevitabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:464_3: Tathā ca vaṇṇato vā lakkhaṇato vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0103n0:464_5: Avibhūtaṃ hoti gajanimmīlanena pekkhantassa rūpagataṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:464_6: Cittañca līnaṃ hoti dassane mandabyāpāratāya kosajjapātato.
anya-e0103n0:464_8: Ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viyāti yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassī puriso na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati,
anya-e0103n0:464_12: Atha kho samena ākārena olokento attano mukhanimittameva passati,
anya-e0103n0:464_13: evameva ayampi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samena ākārena olokento nimittaggahaṇappasutoyeva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:464_15: Na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabboti yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo,
anya-e0103n0:464_17: Cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahaṇaṃ na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:464_19: Na lakkhaṇaṃ manasi kātabbanti yaṃ tattha pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:465_0: Disvā gahetabbattā “vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā”ti vatvāpi vaṇṇavasenettha ābhogo na kātabbo,
anya-e0103n0:465_1: so pana vaṇṇo nissayagatiko kātabboti dassento āha “nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:465_2: Nissayena samānākārasannissito so vaṇṇo tāya pathaviyā samānagatikaṃ katvā,
anya-e0103n0:465_4: Ussadavasena paṇṇattidhammeti pathavīdhātuyā ussannabhāvena sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyaṃ “pathavī”ti yo lokavohāro,
anya-e0103n0:465_8: nāmantaravasenapi pathavī manasi kātabbā bhaveyyāti, hotu,
anya-e0103n0:465_10: Tattha yamicchatīti yaṃ nāmaṃ vattuṃ icchati,
anya-e0103n0:465_12: Tañca kho yadassa saññānukūlaṃ hoti yaṃ nāmaṃ assa yogino pubbe tattha gahitasaññāvasena anukūlaṃ pacuratāya,
anya-e0103n0:465_15: Vattabbanti ca paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:465_19: Kālena ummīletvā kālena nimmīletvāti kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīletvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0103n0:465_20: oloketvā puna kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ nimmīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:466_4: Yadi uggahanimitte jātepi pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā bhāveti,
anya-e0103n0:466_6: Samīpaṭṭhena ca na oloketuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0103n0:466_15: sammā vā anu anu āharitabbaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:466_18: vitakko”ti ca evaṃ laddhanāmena bhāvanācittasampayuttena sammāsaṅkappena āhananapariyāhananakiccena aparāparaṃ vattamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:466_21: Evaṃ karontassāti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa.
anya-e0103n0:466_25: Yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:466_26: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayathāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni
anya-e0103n0:466_28: Tato eva tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi vidūrī bhavanti,
anya-e0103n0:466_29: paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saddhiṃ taṃ ārabbha upacārajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:467_4: Tañca kho paṭibhāganimittaṃ neva vaṇṇavantaṃ na saṇṭhānavantaṃ aparamatthasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n0:467_12: Na hi asabhāvassa kutoci samuṭṭhānaṃ atthi.
anya-e0103n0:468_2: na pana tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:468_3: “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi dassetuṃ “duvidho hi samādhī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:468_6: Idāni tāni kāraṇāni avatthāmukhena dassetuṃ “upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:468_8: Yadipi tadā jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na uppajjanti,
anya-e0103n0:468_9: tesaṃ pana paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n0:468_12: Tadā hi appanāpattānaṃ jhānadhammānaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n0:469_3: Kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhatīti samāpattivelaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n0:469_4: Upacārabhūmiyaṃ nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ yuttanti katvā vuttaṃ “nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:469_7: nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhaṃ laddhaṃ jhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttito.
anya-e0103n0:471_4: Yathāladdhañhi nimittaṃ tattha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ekaggataṃ vindantassa thiraṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:471_9: Tīṇi tīṇīti ekekasmiṃ āvāse avutthaavutthaṭṭhāne vasananiyāmena tayo tayo divase vasitvā.
anya-e0103n0:472_0: Uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vāti vuttaṃ gamanāgamane sūriyābhimukhabhāvanivāraṇatthanti.
anya-e0103n0:473_1: Tā hi pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-
anya-e0103n0:473_2: saddena saṅgahetvā saggamokkhānaṃ tiracchānabhāvato “dvattiṃsa tiracchānakathā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:474_1: tiracchānakathā vidhuraṃ dhammikaṃ kammaṭṭhānapaṭisaṃyuttameva kathaṃ kathetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:474_8: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:475_0: Bhojanaṃ yebhuyyena madhurambilarasavasena sattānaṃ upayogaṃ gacchati dadhiādīsu tathā dassanato.
anya-e0103n0:475_1: Kaṭukādirasā pana kevalaṃ abhisaṅkhārakā evāti āha “kassaci madhuraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:476_3: Nimittāsevanabahulassāti nimitte āsevanābahulassa paṭibhāganimitte visayabhūte bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ āsevantassa,
anya-e0103n0:478_5: Vatthuvisadakiriyatoti vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇato appanākosallaṃ icchitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:479_8: sarīraṃ sedamalaggahitaṃ vā aññena vā avassutakiccena vibādhitanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:479_15: Idha pana āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa upacārajjhāne ṭhatvā appanāparivāsaṃ vasantassa kālantare jāte tathāpaṭipatti appanākosallāya vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:479_20: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
anya-e0103n0:479_25: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti dassitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:479_27: ñāṇassa ca visuṃ gahaṇaṃ appanāya bahukārattā.
anya-e0103n0:479_31: Ñāṇe avisade vipassanābhāvanā viya samādhibhāvanāpi paridubbalā hotīti dassetuṃ “aparisuddhena ñāṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:480_4: vīriyādīnaṃ ca sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:480_8: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
anya-e0103n0:480_16: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
anya-e0103n0:480_17: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
anya-e0103n0:480_18: Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
anya-e0103n0:480_22: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:480_24: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:480_25: “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā.
anya-e0103n0:480_26: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:480_27: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:481_0: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:481_6: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasi karoto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:481_7: tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:482_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali,
anya-e0103n0:482_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali,
anya-e0103n0:482_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
anya-e0103n0:482_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsaṃ visajjento attānaṃ dassetvā –
anya-e0103n0:485_1: So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e0103n0:485_2: Saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari.
anya-e0103n0:485_3: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
anya-e0103n0:485_4: So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0103n0:486_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
anya-e0103n0:486_6: Tathā hi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa
anya-e0103n0:487_1: So hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:487_2: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:487_3: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu
anya-e0103n0:487_4: phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0103n0:487_5: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
anya-e0103n0:487_6: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:488_3: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paccekaṃ adhimattatāya pana hāpanavasena samataṃ dassetvā idāni tattha yesaṃ visesato asādhāraṇato,
anya-e0103n0:488_9: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato icchitabbameva,
anya-e0103n0:488_11: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjauddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:489_5: Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā.
anya-e0103n0:489_7: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupaṭirūpakehi vañcito.
anya-e0103n0:489_8: Evaṃbhūto pana sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati,
anya-e0103n0:489_11: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na atthāvaho anatthāvaho ca,
anya-e0103n0:489_12: evamidhāpi samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na avikkhepāvaho vikkhepāvaho cāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:490_3: Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavī”ti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattīti acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena
anya-e0103n0:490_5: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena okappento pakkhandanto.
anya-e0103n0:490_12: lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:491_2: kathaṃ satīti āha “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:491_12: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgaggahaṇena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
anya-e0103n0:491_15: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0103n0:492_3: Cittassa hi samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā samathanimittaṃ rakkhantoyeva kasiṇanimittaṃ rakkhati.
anya-e0103n0:493_5: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāvetīti ettha “tayo”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:494_6: taṃsamaṅgino vā bujjhatīti bodhino yogino aṅganti bojjhaṅgo, pasattho,
anya-e0103n0:494_14: Sā panāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva idha bojjhaṅgupekkhā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:494_21: vidhinā vā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vīriyaṃ, ussāho.
anya-e0103n0:495_13: Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā,
anya-e0103n0:495_22: Atha vā kaṇhā ca sukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā.
anya-e0103n0:495_23: Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā,
anya-e0103n0:496_1: Sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasenāti ekajjhaṃ katvā gahaṇe anavajjasukhavipākādikassa visuṃ visuṃ pana phusanādikassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa,
anya-e0103n0:496_3: Pavattamanasikāroti kusalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsabhāvalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppannajavanacittuppādo.
anya-e0103n0:496_7: Kusalakiriyāya ādiārambhavasena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya “dhātū”ti vuttanti āha “ārambhadhātūti paṭhamavīriyaṃ vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:496_8: Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha “kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara”nti.
anya-e0103n0:496_9: Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0103n0:496_16: Yasmā pana tesu pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgassa visesakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:496_18: Uppādakamanasikāroti yathā manasi karoto anuppanno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:497_1: Pañcapi hi nikāye uggahetvā ācariye pariyupāsitvā tassa tassa atthaṃ paripucchantassa,
anya-e0103n0:497_2: te vā saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:497_4: imassa ko attho”ti pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti.
anya-e0103n0:497_12: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma duppaññānaṃ mandabuddhīnaṃ bhattanikkhittakākamaṃsanikkhittasunakhasadisānaṃ momūhapuggalānaṃ dūrato pariccajanā.
anya-e0103n0:497_13: Paññavantapuggalasevanā nāma paññāya katādhikārānaṃ saccapaṭiccasamuppādādīsu kusalānaṃ ariyānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:497_14: vipassanākammikānaṃ vā mahāpaññānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:498_6: Sapubbabhāgo nibbānagāmimaggo gamanavīthi gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:498_7: Dāyakānaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena piṇḍāpacāyanatāti paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n0:498_10: Kusītapuggalaparivajjanatāti alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
anya-e0103n0:498_11: bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato pariccajanā.
anya-e0103n0:498_15: Tadadhimuttatāti tasmiṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅge adhimutti sabbiriyāpathesu ninnapoṇapabbhāratā.
anya-e0103n0:499_3: Imehi ākārehīti yathāvuttehi kusalādīnaṃ sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivijjhanādiākārehi ceva paripucchakatādiākārehi ca.
anya-e0103n0:499_4: Ete dhammeti ete kusalādīsu yonisomanasikārādike ceva dhammatthaññutādike ca.
anya-e0103n0:501_0: Taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvāti yenākārena assa yogino passaddhi samādhi upekkhāti ime passaddhiādayo dhammā
anya-e0103n0:501_1: pubbe yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle uppannapubbā,
anya-e0103n0:501_9: Yathāsamāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samatho eva samathanimittanti āha “samathanimittanti ca samathassevetamadhivacana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:501_10: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo.
anya-e0103n0:501_14: So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
