anya-e0103n0:502_0: Sarīrāvatthaṃ ñatvā mattaso paribhutto paṇītāhāro kāyalahutādīnaṃ samuṭṭhāpanena passaddhiyā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:503_1: Bhāvanā hi vīthipaṭipannā pubbenāparaṃ visesavatī pavattamānā cittassa assādaṃ upasamasukhaṃ āvahati,
anya-e0103n0:503_5: Sampahaṃsanatāti sammadeva pahaṃsanatā saṃvejanapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanā cittassa tosanā.
anya-e0103n0:503_10: Jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatāti paṭhamādīni jhānāni paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatādinā teyeva vimokkhā tesaṃ “evaṃ bhāvanā,
anya-e0103n0:504_0: Sattamajjhattatāti sattesu piyaṭṭhāniyesupi gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu majjhattākāro ajjhupekkhanā.
anya-e0103n0:504_4: Imehākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi kāyacittānaṃ passaddhākārasallakkhaṇādiākārehi ceva sappāyāhārasevanādiākārehi ca.
anya-e0103n0:505_4: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
anya-e0103n0:505_5: tadā bhāvanācittassa anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa abhiruciṃ na janeti,
anya-e0103n0:505_7: Yadā ca bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā,
anya-e0103n0:505_8: tadā upasamasukhassa alābhena cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:505_13: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte,
anya-e0103n0:505_14: anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni.
anya-e0103n0:505_17: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvitadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:506_5: Pubbenāparaṃ savisesaṃ tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:506_10: Alīnānuddhatatāya hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:507_2: Sā pana yasmā samādhiṃ garuṃ katvā tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavattiyā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:508_1: Paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ evaṃ hi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ imaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:508_6: tasmā cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ upadhārento.
anya-e0103n0:508_7: Samataṃ vīriyasseva vīriyassa samādhinā samarasataṃyeva yojayetha.
anya-e0103n0:508_15: Yathāti reṇuādīsu yathā madhukarādīnaṃ pavatti upamābhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sammavaṇṇitā,
anya-e0103n0:508_16: evaṃ līnuddhatabhāvehi mocayitvā vīriyasamatāyojanena nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādaye paṭibhāganimittābhimukhaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ sampādeyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:510_8: Tasmā nivattane reṇu khīyatīti āha “khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇātī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:512_3: Telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūretīti sarāvādigatena telena achaḍḍento sukhumacchiddakaṃ telanāḷiṃ pūreti.
anya-e0103n0:512_4: Evamevāti yathā te ādito vuttamadhukarasallakattaantevāsisuttākaḍḍhakaniyāmakatelapūrakā vegena payogaṃ karonti,
anya-e0103n0:512_5: evameva yo bhikkhu “sīghaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:512_6: yo majjhe vuttamadhukarādayo viya vīriyaṃ na karoti,
anya-e0103n0:512_7: ime dvepi vīriyasamatābhāvena appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0103n0:512_8: Yo pana avasāne vuttamadhukarādayo viya samappayogo,
anya-e0103n0:512_9: ayaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti vīriyasamatāyogatoti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:514_2: Vīriyasamatāyojanavasena vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanāmānasaṃ paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato assa yogino.
anya-e0103n0:514_13: gotrabhuno eva upacārasamaññā siyāti āha “samīpacārittā vā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:514_14: Anaccāsannopi hi nātidūrapavattī samīpacārī nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:514_24: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:514_26: Tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:514_27: Taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:515_0: Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhamanayo gahitaggahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “aggahitaggahaṇenā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:515_1: Nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ vā upacāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:515_3: pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ pubbe vuttanayena sace catutthaṃ gotrabhu hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:515_6: Svāyaṃ aniyamo iminā kāraṇenāti dassetuṃ “tañca kho khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:515_11: na tato paranti āha “tato paraṃ javanaṃ patatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:515_13: sattamañca javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:516_0: Yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
anya-e0103n0:516_8: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā”ti pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā.
anya-e0103n0:516_9: Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:516_12: Tattha yadi chaṭṭhasattamaṃ javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti parikkhīṇajavattā,
anya-e0103n0:516_18: Tattha ca pariyosānāvatthāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:516_20: Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena tathā abhisaṅkhatattāti ca vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:516_21: Tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:517_2: So panettha sattasu ṭhānesu katthaci aparimāṇacittakkhaṇatāya,
anya-e0103n0:517_9: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalakkhaṇoti etesu catūsu ṭhānesu.
anya-e0103n0:518_0: Ettāvatāti ettakena bhāvanākkamena esa yogāvacaro paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0103n0:518_1: Evaṃ viharatā ca anena tadeva paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:519_5: Vivicceva kāmehīti ettha “viviccā”ti iminā vivecanaṃ jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:519_6: “Viviccevā”ti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa,
anya-e0103n0:519_7: kāmavivekassa ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādiṃ vatvā
anya-e0103n0:519_9: “Andhakāre sati padīpobhāso viyā”ti etena yathā padīpobhāsābhāvena rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo,
anya-e0103n0:520_1: Na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “kāmehi evā”ti avadhāraṇassa akatattā.
anya-e0103n0:520_5: tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ tannissaraṇaṃ, tato.
anya-e0103n0:520_6: Kathaṃ pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:520_17: kāmadhātuto ca vinivattasabhāvattā idaṃ jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:520_20: uttarapadepi pana taṃ gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ “uttarapadepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:520_26: Tayo eva idha jhānakathāyaṃ daṭṭhabbā samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:521_2: vatthukāmā kilesakāmā cā”ti uddisitvā “tattha katame vatthukāmā?
anya-e0103n0:521_8: Patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho chandanaṭṭhena chando,
anya-e0103n0:521_16: avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā “vaccho dammo balībaddo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:522_0: Evañhi satīti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati.
anya-e0103n0:522_1: Vatthukāmehipīti “vatthukāmehi viviccevā”tipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho pi- saddo,
anya-e0103n0:522_3: Imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena vuttattā.
anya-e0103n0:522_12: sabbathā pana kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha “dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:522_17: Lolabhāvo nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo,
anya-e0103n0:522_23: Kāmaguṇādhigamahetupi pāṇātipātādiasuddhapayogo hotīti tabbivekena payogasuddhi vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n0:523_5: Jhānapaṭipakkhatoti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu tannimittaṃ visuṃ vutto.
anya-e0103n0:524_6: nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānato ca.
anya-e0103n0:524_8: Vitakko thinamiddhassa paṭipakkho yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārapavattito.
anya-e0103n0:524_10: Vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpaṭirūpasabhāvattā.
anya-e0103n0:525_1: Āghātavatthubhedādivisayānanti byāpādavivekavacanena “anatthaṃ me acarī”ti ādiāghātavatthubhedavisayassa dosassa,
anya-e0103n0:525_2: mohādhikehi thinamiddhādīhi vivekavacanena paṭicchādanavasena dukkhādipubbantādibhedavisayassa mohassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto.
anya-e0103n0:525_5: hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti avisesetvā nīvaraṇākusalamūlādīnaṃ “vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:526_1: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:526_2: Tayidaṃ “vitakkanaṃ īdisamida”nti ārammaṇassa parikappananti āha “ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:526_3: Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya hoti,
anya-e0103n0:526_6: taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
anya-e0103n0:526_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
anya-e0103n0:526_11: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
anya-e0103n0:526_12: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
anya-e0103n0:526_14: Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhaṇaṃ ciraparicitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:526_15: Tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva.
anya-e0103n0:526_16: Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇavirahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:526_17: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:527_1: Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:527_9: Anuppabandhanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti.
anya-e0103n0:528_4: tassa ca pubbaṅgamo ghaṇḍābhighāto viya vitakko.
anya-e0103n0:528_6: evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto hoti.
anya-e0103n0:528_8: ggahaṇena cettha abhighātajo saddo gahitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:528_11: Anuppabandhena pavattiyanti upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:528_12: Tattha hi vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:528_14: Pākaṭo hotīti vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:528_15: tadabhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa viseso anumajjanākāro pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0103n0:529_3: Maṇḍalanti kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ karontassa.
anya-e0103n0:529_4: Yathā pupphaphalasākhādiavayavavinimutto avijjamānopi rukkho “sapuppho saphalo”ti voharīyati,
anya-e0103n0:529_5: evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti voharīyatīti dassetuṃ “rukkho viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:529_6: Jhānabhāvanāya puggalavasena desetabbattā “idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti.
anya-e0103n0:529_8: attho pana tatrāpi vibhaṅgepi yathā idha “iminā ca vitakkenā”tiādinā dhammavasena vutto,
anya-e0103n0:529_12: jhānasseva ca savitakkasavicāratāya vuttattāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:530_4: “Vivitto”ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi vivecitoti ca sādhanadvayampi saṅgahitamevāti.
anya-e0103n0:531_7: Khuddikā lahuṃ lomahaṃsanamattaṃ katvā bhinnā na puna uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:533_3: Khaṇikasamādhipūrikā ca upacārasamādhipūrikā ca appanāsamādhissa vidūratarāti tadubhayaṃ anāmasanto “tāsu yā appanāsamādhissā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:533_4: Samādhisampayogaṃ gatāti pubbe upacārasamādhinā sampayuttā hutvā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā appanāsamādhinā sampayogaṃ gatā.
anya-e0103n0:534_3: Svāyaṃ kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattu nivattanattho,
anya-e0103n0:534_4: nippariyāyena pana bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti “sukhanaṃ sukha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:534_6: sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti sātaṃ da-
anya-e0103n0:534_12: Dukkhaṃ viya avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:534_16: Paṭiladdharasānubhavananti paṭiladdhassa ārammaṇarasassa anubhavananti sabhāvato pītisukhāni vibhajitvā dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:534_18: tattha sukhanti vitakkassa viya itarena pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha.
anya-e0103n0:534_20: tattha na niyamato pītī”ti vicārassa viya vitakkena sukhassa pītiyā anaccantasaṃyogaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:535_0: Vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe vivekajanti jhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:535_7: Lope vā sati “vivekajapītisukha”nti pāṭhoti ayaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n0:536_2: saṃbhuñjatī”tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ “upagantvā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “upasampādayitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:536_7: Pālanāti hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇā.
anya-e0103n0:538_1: Pañca aṅgāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīnāni etassāti pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:538_6: Nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena pahīyanti,
anya-e0103n0:538_14: Kāmadhātuppahānāyāti nānāvisayasamūpabyūḷhāya kāmadhātuyā pahānāya samatikkamāya paṭipadaṃ jhānaṃ nappaṭipajjati.
anya-e0103n0:538_22: Vicikicchāya upahatanti sātisayassa vicārassa abhāvato “sammāsambuddho nu kho bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:538_26: na nu kho”tiādinā ca pavattāya vicikicchāya upahataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:538_28: Visesena jhānantarāyakarattāti samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato.
anya-e0103n0:539_1: Avikkhepāya sampāditappayogassāti tato evaṃ samādhānāya nipphāditabhāvanāpayogassa.
anya-e0103n0:539_4: Upabrūhanaṃ bhāvanāvasena parivuddhiṃ cetaso karotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:539_10: Dūrībhāve līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:539_12: sampayuttadhamme ca attānaṃ anuvattāpentī jhānakkhaṇe sātisayaṃ samāhite karotīti.
anya-e0103n0:539_14: Etesu vitakkādīsu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti tattheva jhānavohārato.
anya-e0103n0:540_6: Ārammaṇesu phusitāti appanāvasena pavattamānā cittekaggatā samantato ārammaṇaṃ pharantī viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:540_7: Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha cittekaggatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:540_13: Yena adhippāyenāti yena vitakkādīhi saha vattantaṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā uddeso kato.
anya-e0103n0:540_14: So eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge “cittekaggatā”ti niddisantena pakāsito.
anya-e0103n0:540_15: Tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:543_5: Sā panāyaṃ yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati,
anya-e0103n0:543_7: Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā.
anya-e0103n0:543_8: Sā panāyaṃ visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati.
anya-e0103n0:543_10: Sampahaṃsanāti tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā.
anya-e0103n0:543_11: Sā pana yasmā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:543_13: Imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇānīti paripanthato cittassa visujjhanākāro,
anya-e0103n0:543_15: tattha pakkhandanākāroti imāni tīṇi jhānassa ādito uppādakkhaṇe appanāpattilakkhaṇāni tehi ākārehi vinā appanāpattiyā abhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:544_5: Paggahādikiccassa pubbabhāge bhāvanāya eva sādhitattā yā tattha ekāvajjanūpacāre siddhā ajjhupekkhanā,
anya-e0103n0:544_6: sā jhānakkhaṇe paribrūhitā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:544_7: Yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ nissāya yo pahaṭṭhākāro cittassa paritoso,
anya-e0103n0:544_8: taṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena pavattaṃ sandhāyāha “sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:544_12: Tathā hi sati ajjhānadhammehi jhānassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:544_14: Pāḷiyā cetaṃ viruddhanti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:544_16: ekaggatāya ca sikhāppattiyā tadanuguṇaṃ ekattaṃ gatanti ekattagataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:544_19: Tasmāti yasmā ekasmiṃyeva appanācittakkhaṇe paṭipadāvisuddhiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:545_3: Cittaṃ visujjhatīti yadipi āgamanaṃ gahetuṃ avisesena viya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:545_6: Āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvāti yenāvaraṇena āvaṭattā cittaṃ tato pubbe majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:545_11: yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittañcāti majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:545_13: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittanti tassa appanācittassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:545_17: paccayapaccayuppannabhāvabhede ca ekissā eva santatiyā pariṇāmūpagamananayena ekattanayavasena.
anya-e0103n0:545_20: Yasmiñhi khaṇe tathattaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
anya-e0103n0:545_21: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe tathattupagamanena appanāsamādhinā samāhitabhāvūpagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0103n0:545_25: Teyeva hi ākārā paccayavisesato jhānakkhaṇe nipphajjamānā “paṭipadāvisuddhī”ti laddhasamaññā jhānassa taṃ visesaṃ nipphādentā viya vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:546_1: “Visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti pāḷiyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena āgatāti “byāpāraṃ akaronto”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:546_3: Kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassāti pubbe “kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya”nti paṭipannassa
anya-e0103n0:546_4: idāni samathapaṭipattiyā tassa pahīnattā kilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena ekattena upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa.
anya-e0103n0:546_6: tatramajjhattupekkhā sampayuttesu samavāhitabhāvena pavattamānā te anubrūhentī viya hotīti āha “tatramajjhattupekkhāya
anya-e0103n0:547_2: Aññamaññānativattanavasena kiccakaraṇato yuge naddhā baddhā viya yuganaddhā.
anya-e0103n0:547_8: Uppādakkhaṇe atīte hi ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya āsevanā pavattati nāma.
anya-e0103n0:547_9: Te ākārāti aññamaññānativattanādayo tattha dhammānaṃ pavattiākārā.
anya-e0103n0:547_11: Saṃkilesavodānesūti samādhipaññānaṃ samarasatāya akaraṇaṃ bhāvanāya saṃkileso,
anya-e0103n0:547_14: Evametesu saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ puretaraṃ pāṭihāriyañāṇena disvā yathā aññamaññānativattanādayo honti,
anya-e0103n0:547_15: tathā bhāvanāya sampahaṃsitattā teneva ñāṇena visodhitattā.
anya-e0103n0:547_19: veditabbāti vutta”nti lakkhaṇasaṃvaṇṇanāya ādimhi vuttaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:548_0: “Yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti ko sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:548_2: na upekkhānubrūhanāti codanaṃ sandhāya “tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:548_4: Upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā,
anya-e0103n0:548_5: paṭipakkhassa ca pahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:548_8: Sā panāyaṃ ajjhupekkhanā ñāṇassa kiccasiddhiyā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:548_11: tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosānanti vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:549_1: Tathāpaggahitaṃ cittanti yathā bhāvanācittaṃ kosajjapakkhe na patati,
anya-e0103n0:549_3: Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti paggaṇhantenāpi samādhissa vīriyasamatāyojanavasena paggahitattā sakkaccaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0103n0:549_5: Taṃ pana ajjhupekkhanaṃ upekkhāvasena pubbe pavattapārihāriyapaññāvasena appanāpaññāya kiccādhikatāti
anya-e0103n0:549_7: Tassa adhimattattā eva ajjhupekkhantasseva nānāsabhāvehi nīvaraṇapamukhehi kilesehi appanācittaṃ vimuccati.
anya-e0103n0:549_12: visesato saddhāpaññāvīriyasamādhayo ca ekarasā samānakiccā honti.
anya-e0103n0:549_13: Evamayaṃ indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā nipphajjamānā ñāṇabyāpāroti āha “ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:549_14: Evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā laddhavisesāya tividhāya upekkhānubrūhanāya sātisayaṃ paññindriyassa
anya-e0103n0:549_15: adhimuttabhāvena catubbidhāpi sampahaṃsanā sijjhatīti āgamanupekkhā ñāṇakiccavasena dasapi ākārā jhāne
anya-e0103n0:550_5: “Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjitabbanti paṭhama”nti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭisiddhattā idha na gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:550_6: Ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti duvidhe jhāne idhādhippetajjhānameva dassetuṃ “ārammaṇūpanijjhānato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:550_7: Pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhātassa attano attano ārammaṇassa rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato.
anya-e0103n0:550_8: Paccanīkajhāpanatoti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ dahanato vikkhambhanavasena pajahanato.
anya-e0103n0:550_9: Sakalaṭṭhenāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena kate vā akate vā paricchijja gahite pathavībhāge pathavīmaṇḍale sakalārammaṇakaraṇaṭṭhena.
anya-e0103n0:550_11: Pathavīkasiṇasannissayatāya nimittaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:552_1: Lakkhaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sarena vālaṃ vijjhatīti vālavedhī.
anya-e0103n0:552_2: Idha pana anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsuṃ vijjhanto “vālavedhī”ti adhippeto.
anya-e0103n0:552_5: “Ākārā pariggahetabbā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:553_3: Tassa ruccitvā bhuñjanākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tassa upanāmentoti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:553_5: Adhigatakkhaṇe bhojanādayo ākāreti pubbe jhānassa adhigatakkhaṇe kiccasādhake bhojanādigate ākāre.
anya-e0103n0:554_14: Imassa vā sūpeyyassa atthāya hatthaṃ abhiharati.
anya-e0103n0:554_17: Nimittaṃ uggaṇhātīti “evaṃ me cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosī”ti nimittaṃ gaṇhāti sallakkheti.
anya-e0103n0:555_6: Nekkhammaguṇadassanenāpi hi tassa vibandhabhūte kāmacchande ādīnavo visesato pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:555_8: Tena kāyacittānaṃ sārambhanimittassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa na visodhanamāha.
anya-e0103n0:555_18: nanu cāyaṃ pageva kāmādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā samathapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno upacārakkhaṇeyeva jhānena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni,
anya-e0103n0:555_21: Taṃ pana pahānamattanti jhānassa ciraṭṭhitiyā atisayapahānatthaṃ puna gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:556_2: Suddhantagatoti suparisuddhapariyantaṃ sabbaso visodhitakoṇapariyantaṃ uyyānaṃ gato.
anya-e0103n0:556_3: Tahiṃ rameti tasmiṃ jhāne rameyya divasabhāgampi jhānasamaṅgī eva bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n0:557_3: Tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena nimittaṃ vaḍḍhentassa punappunaṃ bahulīkārena jhānaṃ bhāvanāpi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0103n0:559_3: Avaḍḍhetvāti yathā kumbhakāro mattikāya pattaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ aparicchinditvāva pattaṃ vaḍḍheti,
anya-e0103n0:559_4: evaṃ pattavaḍḍhanayogena pattavaḍḍhanayuttiyā avaḍḍhetvā pūvikassa pūvavaḍḍhanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:559_9: Aparicchinditvā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ saparicchede eva bhāvanāpavattito.
anya-e0103n0:562_11: So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya saussāhopi vināsato,
anya-e0103n0:564_5: Jhānaṃ āvajjituṃ yattha yattha padese icchā yatthicchakaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:564_7: yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vā jhānaṅge icchā yadicchakaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:564_10: “Yāvā”ti ca idaṃ bahūnaṃ javanavārānaṃ nirantaraṃ viya tathāpavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:564_13: Āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti vuttanayena yattha katthaci ṭhāne yadā yadā yaṃ kiñci jhānaṅgaṃ āvajjentassa
anya-e0103n0:564_14: yathicchitaṃ kālaṃ āvajjanāya āvajjanappavattiyā dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāyitattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:564_16: Evaṃ āvajjanavasī siddhā nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:565_0: Aṅgasamudāyabhāvato jhānassa jhāne āvajjanavasiṃ nipphādetukāmena paṭipāṭiyā jhānaṅgāni āvajjetabbānīti āha “paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:565_3: Tāni ca kho āvajjanatapparatāya cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitajhānaṅgārammaṇāni katipayāneva honti,
anya-e0103n0:565_4: na paripuṇṇānīti vuttaṃ “vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā javanāni javantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:565_8: Ayaṃ panāti bhavaṅgadvayantaritā catujavanacittā yathāvuttā āvajjanavasī.
anya-e0103n0:565_10: Evarūpe kāleti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya lahutaraṃ āvajjanavasīnibbattanakāle.
anya-e0103n0:565_13: Tathā hi taṃ sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:565_14: Adhigamena samaṃ sasampayuttassa jhānassa sammā āpajjanaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:566_0: Sīghanti ettha samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
anya-e0103n0:566_2: Ayañca matthakappattā samāpajjanavasī satthu dhammadesanāyaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0103n0:566_5: tassā eva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi
anya-e0103n0:566_6: ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi yenassudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:566_7: Ito sīghatarā hi samāpajjanavasī nāma natthi.
anya-e0103n0:566_8: Juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa āyasmato sāriputtassa yakkhena mahantampi
anya-e0103n0:566_9: pabbatakūṭaṃ padāletuṃ samatthe pahāre sīse dinne samāpajjanampettha nidassetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:566_10: Tathā hi vakkhati “tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:566_11: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinno”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:566_12: Ime pana therā “samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṃ tena pahāro dinno”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:567_1: Ṭhapetunti setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ vegena pavattituṃ adatvā yathāvuttakkhaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā.
anya-e0103n0:567_5: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātunti accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā.
anya-e0103n0:567_7: Ettha ca yathā “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena adhiṭṭhānasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī,
anya-e0103n0:567_8: evaṃ “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī veditabbā,
anya-e0103n0:568_1: Kiñcāpi ekaṃyeva taṃ abhiññācittaṃ yena pabbataṃ nimmineyya,
anya-e0103n0:568_4: “Ettakā iddhimantā ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ garuḷato rakkhituṃ na sakkhiṃsū”ti gārayhā assāma.
anya-e0103n0:569_0: Āvajjanānantarānīti āvajjanavasībhāvāya yathākkamaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanāya parato yāni javanāni pavattāni,
anya-e0103n0:571_2: Thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha “oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:571_3: Santato manasi karitvāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya anoḷārikaṅgattā,
anya-e0103n0:571_7: tehi pana te santatarā ceva paṇītatarā ca bhavantīti.
anya-e0103n0:572_10: Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi.
anya-e0103n0:572_13: sabbena sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti? Vuccate –
anya-e0103n0:572_16: na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti ayamattho “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etena dīpito.
anya-e0103n0:572_19: Yasmā diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:572_23: Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi etena “etaṃ oḷārika”nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:572_25: taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ aññaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e0103n0:572_26: bodhetīti katvā kiñci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “oḷārikassa panā”tiādi gahitanti idha “yehi
anya-e0103n0:572_31: Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato
anya-e0103n0:572_34: Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādhigamadīpakena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ pītiādisamatikkamā
anya-e0103n0:572_35: tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa taṃdīpakatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:573_2: Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyāti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:573_4: Tasmiṃ dassite “sampasādanaṃ jhāna”nti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitāti avirodho yutto.
anya-e0103n0:573_5: Ekodibhāve kathanti ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttā hotīti ce?
anya-e0103n0:573_6: “Ekodibhāva”nti padaṃ uddharitvā ekodissa niddeso na kātabbo siyāti ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto
anya-e0103n0:573_8: Imasmiñca atthavikappeti “cetaso sampasādayatī”ti etasmiṃ pakkhe “cetaso”ti ca upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:574_0: Seṭṭhopi loke “eko”ti vuccati “yāva pare ekāhaṃ te karomī”tiādīsu.
anya-e0103n0:574_1: Eko adutiyo “ekākībhi khuddakehi jita”ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi eka-
anya-e0103n0:574_5: samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento “sampayuttadhamme…pe…
anya-e0103n0:575_1: cetaso ekodibhāva”nti visesanadvayaṃ jhānassa atisayavacanicchāvasena gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:575_3: na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:575_5: anumajjanaanuyojanavasena ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:575_6: kañci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ “vitakkavicārakkhobhena na suppasanna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:575_11: sampasādābhāvena ca samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo bahale viya jale maccho.
anya-e0103n0:575_13: Evaṃ vuttenāti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:575_14: yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:575_19: ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti jhānaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā na virujjhati.
anya-e0103n0:576_7: Sositāti pavattisaṅkhātassa santānassa abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ itā.
anya-e0103n0:577_1: Codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pariharituṃ “evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho”ti vatvā “na paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:577_7: avitakkaavicārabhāvahetudīpakena ca vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva vitakkavicārābhāvo dīpitoti kiṃ puna avitakkaavicāravacanena katenāti? Na,
anya-e0103n0:577_9: Na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti vuttā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:577_13: pahīnataṇhesu ca phalesu saṅkhārapavatti hoti eva,
anya-e0103n0:577_14: evamevidhāpi vikkhambhitavitakkavicārataṇhassa dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārasampayogo purimena na nivārito siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:577_15: āvajjitukāmatādiatikkamova tesaṃ vūpasamoti dassanatthañca “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:578_1: Na tathā imassa vitakkavicārāti yathā paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti,
anya-e0103n0:578_2: tathā imassa dutiyajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe vitakkavicārā na pahīyanti asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā,
anya-e0103n0:578_6: Savisesañhi tattha taṇhāppahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:578_8: Pahānaṅgatāpi atisayappahānavaseneva veditabbā yathā nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānassa.
anya-e0103n0:578_11: Rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ viya sampasādo jhānassa parikkhāro,
anya-e0103n0:580_1: Uppilāvitanti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro,
anya-e0103n0:580_6: Ādīnavaṃ hi tattha pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:581_2: Taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “vuttappakārāya
anya-e0103n0:581_3: pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:583_2: Jhānupekkhāpi samavāhitameva antonītaṃ katvā pavattatīti āha “samaṃ passatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:585_1: Samappavattiyā bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannāya alīnānuddhatā nirassādatāya paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpārābhāvato
anya-e0103n0:586_0: Upekkhānimittanti ettha līnuddhaccapakkhapātarahitaṃ majjhattaṃ vīriyaṃ upekkhā.
anya-e0103n0:586_1: Tadeva taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā pavattetabbassa tādisassa vīriyassa nimittabhāvato upekkhānimittaṃ bhāvanāya samappavattikāle upekkhīyatīti upekkhā,
anya-e0103n0:587_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu
anya-e0103n0:587_2: ñāṇa”nti evamāgatā imā aṭṭha samādhivasena uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:587_3: “Sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ
anya-e0103n0:587_4: jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:587_9: nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ
anya-e0103n0:587_10: paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa”nti evamāgatā imā dasa vipassanāvasena uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:587_11: Ettha ca paṭhamajjhānādīhi vikkhambhitāni nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīni paṭisaṅkhāya sabhāvato upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0103n0:587_12: sanniṭṭhānavasena tiṭṭhamānā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā diṭṭhādīnavattā tesaṃ gahaṇe uppādane ajjhupekkhantī
anya-e0103n0:588_0: Tattha uppādanti purimakammapaccayā khandhānaṃ idha uppattimāha.
anya-e0103n0:588_5: Gatinti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0103n0:588_7: Upapattinti “samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā”ti ettha “upapannassā”ti vuttavipākappavattiṃ.
anya-e0103n0:588_10: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:588_13: jātī”ti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ, “gati,
anya-e0103n0:589_2: Yaṃ bhūtanti yaṃ paccayanibbattattā bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:589_3: Taṃ pajahatīti aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādayo pajahanto sammadeva diṭṭhādīnavattā tappaṭibaddhacchandarāgappahānena pajahati,
anya-e0103n0:590_2: Tesaṃ vūpasantattā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā abyāpārabhāvena pavattā,
anya-e0103n0:591_2: Tasmāti yasmā satipi sabhāvato abhede yehi pana paccayavisesehi svāyamimāsaṃ avatthābhedo,
anya-e0103n0:591_3: tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ appavattito na tāsaṃ abhedo,
anya-e0103n0:592_5: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:592_10: Diṭṭhasovattikattayassa sabbalakkhaṇavicinane viya diṭṭhalakkhaṇattayassa bhūtassa saṅkhāralakkhaṇavicinane upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
anya-e0103n0:592_11: Saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇassa sudiṭṭhattā tesaṃ vicinane majjhattabhūtāya vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya
anya-e0103n0:592_12: tathā diṭṭhādīnavānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇepi ajjhupekkhanā siddhāva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:593_1: Abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti satipi sukhapāramippattiyaṃ tasmiṃ sukhe abyāvaṭā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:593_2: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha abyāpāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:597_4: Gati sukhā hoti tattha jhānesūti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:597_5: Abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ “idaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ karīyatī”ti vattabbassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:597_6: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena sukhumattāti ayamattho kāmaṃ dutiyajjhānepi sambhavati,
anya-e0103n0:597_7: tathāpi yebhuyyena avippayogībhāvena vattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahānena sukhumatāya
anya-e0103n0:597_9: Punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyyāti hānabhāgiyaṃ jhānaṃ siyā dutiyajjhānameva sampajjeyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:597_12: Atimadhuratā cassa pahāsodagyasabhāvāya pītiyā abhāveneva veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:598_0: Tasmā etamatthaṃ dassentoti yasmā tassa jhānasamaṅgino yaṃ nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:598_2: Yaṃ vā tanti atha vā yaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:598_3: Taṃsamuṭṭhānena tato samuṭṭhitena atipaṇītena rūpena assa jhānasamaṅgino rūpakāyo yasmā phuṭo.
anya-e0103n0:598_4: Yassa rūpakāyassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi jhānasamaṅgī kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya.
anya-e0103n0:598_5: Tasmā etaṃ cetasikakāyikasukhapaṭisaṃvedanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti āhā”ti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:598_10: Yathā hi udakena phuṭasarīrassa tādise nātipaccanīke vātādiphoṭṭhabbe phuṭe sukhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:598_13: sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kathamābhogena vinā sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāti codanāyaṃ “kiñcāpi…pe…
anya-e0103n0:598_17: Idāni sahāpi ābhogena sukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ vā ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:599_6: Edisesu ṭhānesu satiggahaṇeneva sampajaññampi gahitaṃ hotīti idha pāḷiyaṃ satiyā eva gahitattā evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya “satimā” icceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:600_0: Jhānakkhaṇe cetasikasukhameva labbhatīti “sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:600_1: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatāti ito paṭṭhāya dutiyatatiyajjhānakathāhi aviseso,
anya-e0103n0:602_1: Idāni nibbattitavisesaṃ dassento “ayaṃ pana viseso”ti vatvā “yasmā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:603_1: “Pubbevā”ti vuttattā kadā pana tesaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti codanāyaṃ āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe”ti.
anya-e0103n0:603_4: Tena pana vuccamāne “dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ sukhaṃ somanassa”nti vattabbaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n0:603_6: Atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:604_0: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyanti attano paccayehi uppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:604_1: Kattha ca aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti nirodhaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati.
anya-e0103n0:604_4: Jhānānubhāvanimittaṃ hi anuppajjantaṃ “dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:605_7: pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:605_13: “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilamicittampi uhaññī”ti vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārappaccayatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:605_15: Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha dutiyajjhānūpacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n0:606_0: Ettha ca yadeke “tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti vadantena jhānalābhīnampi domanussuppatti atthīti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:606_1: Tena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvo lobho viya dosopi atthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0103n0:606_2: Na hi dosena vinā domanassaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:606_4: Yasmā tattha parihīnaṃ jhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ domanassaṃ dassitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:606_6: Jhānalābhīnaṃ sabbaso domanassaṃ nuppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:606_8: Na heva kho so pahīnajjhāno ahosīti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:606_13: Tathā hi “arūpe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇa”ntiādīsu byāpādakukkuccanīvaraṇāni anuddhaṭāni.
anya-e0103n0:606_16: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:606_17: tampi akāraṇaṃ uppajjamānena ca domanassena jhānato parihāyanato.
anya-e0103n0:606_18: Lahukena pana paccayena parihīnaṃ tādisā appakasireneva paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:606_19: “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti idaṃ pana parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa appahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:606_23: Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:606_24: Nānāvajjanūpacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyya vāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:606_25: Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:606_26: evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:607_6: Sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ aññāpohananayenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:609_0: Pahīnāti vuttā “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti. Etāti sukhādayo vedanā.
anya-e0103n0:611_6: “Paṭipakkhabhūta”nti idaṃ idha tatiyavedanāya dukkhādīnaṃ samatikkamavasena pattabbattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:611_12: piṭṭhipāsāṇe migagatamaggo viya tehi anumātabbā avibhūtākāropaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:612_2: Sabbapaccanīkadhammaparisuddhāya paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhāne
anya-e0103n0:612_4: suvisadā ca hotīti āha “yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi,
anya-e0103n0:613_0: Evampi kasmā ayameva sati “upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:613_1: Tattha heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu vijjamānāyapi tatramajjhattatāya paccanīkābhibhavato,
anya-e0103n0:613_4: Tadabhāvato idha pārisuddhīti imamatthaṃ rūpakavasena dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:613_6: Atikkhatāya candalekhā viya rattipi sommasabhāvā sabhāgāya rattiyameva ca candalekhā samujjalatīti sā
anya-e0103n0:613_7: tassā sabhāgāti dassento “sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:614_0: “Ekavīthiya”nti idaṃ tattha somanassassa ekaṃsena abhāvato vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:616_2: Catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viyāti catukkanayasambandhini dutiyajjhāne viya.
anya-e0103n0:616_3: Taṃ dvidhā bhinditvāti catukkanaye dutiyaṃ “avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:616_4: avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti ca evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:616_5: Suttantesu pana sarūpato pañcakanayo na gahito.
anya-e0103n0:617_2: Kasmā ca tattha tathā tāni desitāni?
anya-e0103n0:617_5: Sannipatitadevaparisāya kira yesaṃ yathādesite paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0103n0:617_7: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ca caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ jhānaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:617_12: Tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena tatiyādīni jhānāni desitāni.
anya-e0103n0:618_0: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā yasmā desanāvilāsappatto,
anya-e0103n0:618_1: tasmā ñāṇamahantatāya desanāya sukusalo yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati,
anya-e0103n0:618_2: tassa tassa vasena yathāruciṃ desanaṃ niyāmento catukkanayavasena,
anya-e0103n0:618_8: duvaṅgikameva pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ desesīti ayaṃ desanāvilāso.
anya-e0103n0:618_9: Ettha ca pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānaṃ catukkanaye dutiyajjhānapakkhikaṃ katvā vibhattaṃ “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā
anya-e0103n0:618_10: maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:618_13: Paṭhamajjhānameva hi “kāmehi akusalehi ca vivitta”nti tadabhāvā na idha “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehī”ti sakkā vattuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:618_15: Suttantadesanāsu ca pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyajjhānāni dutiyajjhānameva bhajanti vitakkavūpasamā vicāravūpasamā avitakkattā,
anya-e0103n0:618_17: Evañca katvā suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo labbhatevāti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:618_18: Nanu suttante cattāriyeva jhānāni vibhattānīti pañcakanayo na labbhatīti? Na,
anya-e0103n0:618_20: Catukkanayanissito pana katvā pañcakanayo vibhattoti suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo niddhāretabbo.
anya-e0103n0:618_26: saha ca vicārena vitakkappahānena avitakkaṃ, saha,
anya-e0103n0:618_27: vinā ca vitakkena vicārappahānena avicāranti avitakkaṃ, avicāraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:618_28: avitakkañca avicārañcāti vā tividhampi sakkā saṅgahetuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:619_1: vitakkavicāradvayarahite ca ñāyāgatā desanā dutiyaṃ adhigantabbattā,
anya-e0103n0:619_3: Evañca katvā pañcakanayaniddese dutiye vūpasantopi vitakko sahāyabhūtavicārāvūpasamena na sammā vūpasantoti
anya-e0103n0:619_5: sesadhammānaṃ samānatañca dassentena “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n0:619_6: avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti tatiyaṃ catukkanaye dutiyena
anya-e0103n0:619_10: samādhijaṃ pītisukhattañca samānanti samānadhammattāpi dutiyanti niddeso.
anya-e0103n0:619_11: Vicāramattampi hi vitakkavicāradvayarahitaṃ viya “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ
anya-e0103n0:619_12: vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti avitakkaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhanti
anya-e0103n0:619_14: Paṭhamajjhāne vā sahacārīsu vitakkavicāresu ekaṃ atikkamitvā dutiyampi tatraṭṭhameva dosato disvā ubhayampi
anya-e0103n0:619_17: Paṭhamato anantarabhāvena panassa dutiyabhāvo ca uppajjatīti.
anya-e0103n0:619_18: Kasmā panevaṃ sarūpato pañcakanayo na vibhattoti?
anya-e0103n0:624_1: Yathāvitthāritassa atthassa atidesopi vitthāraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha “vitthārakathā hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:624_5: Ettakampīti “kate vā akate vāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabba”nti ettakampi avatvā.
anya-e0103n0:628_1: Akate gaṇhantassāti vuttanayena yathā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0103n0:628_2: evaṃ anabhisaṅkhate kevale tejasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa.
anya-e0103n0:630_10: Samasīsaṭṭhitanti upari pattānaṃ vasena samasīsaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:630_11: Veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vāti etthāpi “samasīsaṃ ṭhitaṃ ghanapattaveḷuṃ vā ghanapattarukkhaṃ vā”ti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:630_14: viraḷesu anuppavesato vātappahāro na paññāyatīti caturaṅgulappamāṇaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:630_16: Etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatīti satiṃ ṭhapetvāti ucchaggādīnaṃ pacalanākāraggahaṇamukhena tesaṃ pahārake vātasaṅghāte satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0103n0:630_17: Tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvāti tasmiṃ kāyapadesassa saṅghaṭṭanavasena pavatte vāyupiṇḍe saṅghaṭṭanākāraggahaṇamukhena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0103n0:630_18: “Usumavaṭṭisadisa”nti etena purimakasiṇassa viya imassāpi nimittassa saṃviggahataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:630_19: “Niccala”nti iminā niccalabhāvoyeva uggahanimittato imassa visesoti paṭibhāganimittassāpi usumavaṭṭisadisatāva vibhāvitā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:632_6: Pattehiyevāti nīluppalādīnaṃ kesaravaṇṭāni apanetvā kevalehi pattehiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:632_7: Pūretabbanti nīlavaṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ gahetvā bhaṇḍikaṃ viya bandhitvā yathā nīlamaṇḍalaṃ hutvā paññāyati,
anya-e0103n0:632_8: tathā caṅkoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pūretabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:640_1: Tathā asakkontenāti yathā sūriyālokādivasena obhāsanimittuppādanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:640_2: tassa obhāsamaṇḍalassa na ciraṭṭhititāya tathā nimittuppādanaṃ kātuṃ asakkontena.
anya-e0103n0:640_6: Ghanavippasannaṃ ālokapuñjasadisanti bhagavato byāmappabhā viya bahalo,
anya-e0103n0:640_7: vippasanno ca hutvā puñjabhūto āloko atthi ce,
anya-e0103n0:642_5: “Vaḍḍhiyamānampi na vaḍḍhatī”ti uggahanimittassa avaḍḍhanīyataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:642_6: Sabbampi hi uggahanimittaṃ vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ na vaḍḍhatiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:642_7: Satipi ca vaḍḍhetukāmatāyaṃ vaḍḍhanā na sambhavati bhāvanāya paridubbalattā.
anya-e0103n0:642_9: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana tasmiṃ uppanne bhāvanā thirāti katvā “vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:643_0: Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “pathavīkasiṇādīni rūpajhānārammaṇāni aṭṭheva kasiṇāni sarūpato āgatāni,
anya-e0103n0:643_2: ākāsakasiṇe ca paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā desanā katā”ti adhippāyenāha “iti kasiṇāni dasabalo,
anya-e0103n0:643_4: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kasiṇe paṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā asādhāraṇato,
anya-e0103n0:643_5: sādhāraṇato ca tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:645_2: saddena yassa kassaci pathavīpakkhiyassa vatthuno nimmānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:645_3: Ṭhānanisajjādikappanaṃ vāti etthāpi “ākāse vā udake vā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:646_0: Yadeva so icchati tassa ḍahanasamatthatāti bahūsu kappāsapicusāradāruādīsu ekajjhaṃ rāsibhūtesu ṭhitesu yaṃ yadeva icchati,
anya-e0103n0:648_0: Suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā suvaṇṇabhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ seyyathāpi āyasmā pilindavaccho tiṇaṇḍupagapāsādādīnaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:650_1: Imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhantīti imaṃ vaḍḍhanādivisesaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n0:651_4: Pubbe vaḍḍhanakāle payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā vaḍḍhentānaṃ vasena vuttattā idāni “tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāretī”ti āha,
anya-e0103n0:651_7: Uddhañce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n0:651_8: adho ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo adho ālokaṃ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n0:651_9: samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti,
anya-e0103n0:652_3: Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
anya-e0103n0:652_6: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesena pharaṇappamāṇassa aggahaṇato pharaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:652_9: Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ālambanaṃ karonto.
anya-e0103n0:652_10: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā ekakkhaṇe sakalameva manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n0:653_1: Ānantariyakammasamaṅginoti pañcasu ānantariyakammesu yena kenaci samannāgatā.
anya-e0103n0:653_2: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikāti ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhi natthikadiṭṭhīti tīsu micchādiṭṭhīsu yāya kāyaci niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatā.
anya-e0103n0:654_2: tampi nibbānādhigamatthameva kattukamyatāchandaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:654_3: Uttarakurukāpi manussā mārādayo viya acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā nibbutichandarahitattā.
anya-e0103n0:654_5: “Bhavaṅgapaññāya paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa pādakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:654_7: Yasmiṃ hi bhavaṅge vattamāne taṃsantatiyaṃ lokuttaraṃ nibbattati,
anya-e0103n0:655_5: Tasmāti yasmā ete vipākantarāyādayo evaṃ atthajānikarā,
anya-e0103n0:655_7: Tiṇṇameva cettha antarāyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itarassa sappaṭikārattā,
anya-e0103n0:660_5: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:660_11: Kucchitaṃ uddhumātaṃ uddhumātakanti kucchanatthe vā ayaṃ ka-
anya-e0103n0:660_12: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:661_0: Setarattehi paribhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:663_2: soṇasiṅgālādīhi visuṃ katvā khādanena sarīrasaṅghātato luñcitvā tahaṃ tahaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:664_1: Satthena hanitvāti verīhi khaggakaravālādinā satthena paharitvā.
anya-e0103n0:665_0: Abbhantarato nikkhamantehi kimīhi paggharantakimikulaṃ puḷavakanti āha “kimiparipuṇṇassā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:668_8: Uggahanimittassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya pathavīkasiṇe vuttaṃ paṭipajjanavidhiṃ sandhāyāha “appanāvidhānapariyosāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:669_2: Atitthena puṇṇanadīādiṃ pakkhandantena viya anupavisantena viya.
anya-e0103n0:669_7: Takkayatīti sambhāveti bhāriyaṃ katvā na maññati.
anya-e0103n0:670_5: Aniṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassāti bheravādibhāvena aniṭṭhehi ārammaṇehi abhibhūtassa ajjhotthaṭassa.
anya-e0103n0:670_6: Na paṭisaṇṭhātīti vidāhavasena āsaye na tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:670_8: Aññoti amanussādīnaṃ vasena vā aññathā vā vuttappakārato añño ābādho hoti.
anya-e0103n0:670_19: “Addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n0:671_0: Evaṃ gamanavidhānaṃ ekadesena vatvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena taṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāsu vuttena vidhinā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:671_5: Yathā vaṇṇādito vavatthānaṃ ekaṃsato samuditameva icchitabbaṃ sabbatthakabhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:671_6: na tathā sandhiāditoti dassanatthaṃ “vaṇṇatopī”tiādinā chasu ṭhānesu sampiṇḍanattho pi-
anya-e0103n0:671_8: Puna eko adutiyotiādi gahitanimittassa yogino nivattitvā vasanaṭṭhānagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:671_13: Na hi kevalena disābhimukhabhāvena kiñci ijjhati.
anya-e0103n0:673_1: Tasmāti yasmā asubhanimittassa uggaṇhanaṃ ariyamaggapadaṭṭhānassa paṭhamajjhānassa adhigamupāyo,
anya-e0103n0:673_2: yasmā vā “asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:673_4: saṃvegajananena ca attano cittassa saññattiatthaṃ saññāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:673_10: Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti pakatiyā attanā kālena kālaṃ parihariyamānaṃ buddhānussatiādisabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:673_14: Evaṃ hi sati asammuṭṭhā nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:673_15: Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe appavattitvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva pavattamānaṃ mānasaṃ abahigataṃ nāma.
anya-e0103n0:673_16: Tathābhūtena cānena rūpindriyāni appavattakiccāni katāni hontīti āha “manacchaṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n0:674_0: Dvāraṃ sallakkhetabbanti vihāre puratthimādīsu disāsu asukadisāya idaṃ dvāraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:674_1: tato eva tāya disāya sallakkhitena asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ upadhāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:675_1: Disā vavatthapetabbāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “ekasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:675_7: Matakaḷevaraṃ puthujjanassa yebhuyyena bhayato upaṭṭhātīti āha “accāsanne bhayamuppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:677_1: Taṃ nimittakaraṇādi idheva yathāvutte pāsāṇādinimittakaraṇe eva antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:677_5: pāsāṇādinimittañca saha ekajjhaṃ karonto vavatthapento “sanimittaṃ karotī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:677_9: na ekavāramevāti āha “punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:677_12: Sārammaṇanti asubhārammaṇena saddhiṃ pāsāṇādiṃ samānārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:677_15: ekajjhaṃ viya ca aparāparaṃ sallakkhento pāsāṇādiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:678_4: sabhāvo eva vā tathā nipphajjanato “raso”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:679_1: Chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbanti vaṇṇādinā chappakārena tāva uddhumātakaasubhanimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:679_4: Liṅgatoti ettha liṅgaṃ nāma vayo liṅgaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:679_5: na thanamassuādi itthipurisaliṅganti dassentena “itthiliṅgaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:679_9: Etena yadi tattha koci anuddhumātakabhāvappatto padeso siyā,
anya-e0103n0:679_12: na sukhumāvayavavasenāti sīsasaṇṭhānādikaṃ navavidhameva saṇṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:680_3: Imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthāti imasmiṃ nāma bhūmippadese imassa kaḷevarassa hatthā ṭhitāti vavatthapetabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:681_1: tato uddhaṃ uparīti imassa vavatthānassa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:681_2: Hatthaparicchedo heṭṭhā aṅguliaggena upari aṃsakūṭasandhinā tiriyaṃ tacapariyantena gahetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:681_4: Yattakaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ gaṇhatīti sace sabbaṃ sarīraṃ paricchinditvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:681_6: so yattakaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uddhumātakavasena ñāṇena pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n0:681_8: Idaṃ īdisanti idaṃ hatthādikaṃ īdisaṃ evamākāraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:681_10: Visabhāge sarīre ārammaṇanti kammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭikkūlākāro na upaṭṭhāti na khāyati,
anya-e0103n0:682_13: Olokitolokitaṭṭhāneyevāti uddhumātakādiasubhassa yattha yattha olokitolokitaṭṭhāne eva,
anya-e0103n0:682_15: asubhassa padesaviseso vā apekkhitabbo natthīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:682_16: No ce evaṃ upaṭṭhātīti evaṃ yathāvuttapurisavisesassa viya paṭibhāganimittaṃ no ce upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:682_17: Evaṃ chabbidhenāti evaṃ vuttākārena vaṇṇādivasena chabbidhena.
anya-e0103n0:683_1: Asītisatasandhitoti sabbepi sandhayo tadāpi atthevāti dassanatthaṃ vatvā uddhumātabhāvena yebhuyyena na paññāyanti.
anya-e0103n0:683_4: Tattha tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhīti aṃsakapparamaṇibandhānaṃ vasena tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhayo.
anya-e0103n0:683_8: Eko kaṭisandhīti kaṭiyā saddhiṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakasandhiṃ sandhāya vadati.
anya-e0103n0:683_17: mukhassa ca vasenāpi vivaraṃ labbhatevāti dassetuṃ “akkhīnampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:683_18: Samantatoti evaṃ sandhiādito uddhumātakaṃ vavatthapentassa ce nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:683_21: Tattha ñāṇaṃ cāretvāti sabbatthakameva sarīraṃ āvajjetvā tattha paṭikkūlākārasahitaṃ uddhumātakabhāvaṃ ārabbha nirantaraṃ bhāvanāñāṇaṃ pavattetvā.
anya-e0103n0:683_22: Yaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ cārentassa tasmiṃ sarīre yo padeso vibhūto hutvā uddhumātakākārena vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:685_4: Suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbanti yathā uggahanimittaṃ upaṭṭhahati,
anya-e0103n0:685_6: Idāni tameva nimittassa suṭṭhu gahaṇākāraṃ upadisanto “satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:685_7: Tattha evaṃ punappunaṃ karontenāti yathā “imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti sañjātādarena satisampajaññañca
anya-e0103n0:685_10: Sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva vavatthapetabbañcāti sakkaccaṃ satiyā sallakkhetabbañceva paññāya nicchetabbañca.
anya-e0103n0:685_15: Atha vā upadhāretabbanti satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya upalakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:685_16: Na hi kadāci satirahitā paññā atthi.
anya-e0103n0:685_22: Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontassāti vuttappakārena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:685_26: Yathā na vinassati na pamuṭṭhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:685_32: esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññe vā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:686_1: Vuttanayenevāti atidesavasena dīpitampi atthaṃ “ekakenā”tiādinā sarūpato dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:686_5: Upaṭṭhitanimittaṃ hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā kammaṭṭhānantaramanasikāro rañño rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā videsagamanaṃ viyāti.
anya-e0103n0:687_4: Vikkhittacittoti bhīrukapuriso viya pisācādiṃ disvā cittavikkhepaṃ patto.
anya-e0103n0:687_5: Ummattako viyāti yakkhummattako viya ekacco hoti.
anya-e0103n0:687_9: Matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ nāma natthi asati tādise mantappayoge.
anya-e0103n0:687_15: Tāsaṃ vinodetvāti nimittupaṭṭhānanimittaṃ uppannacittasantāsaṃ vuttappakārena vinodetvā vūpasametvā.
anya-e0103n0:687_16: “Idāni tava parissamo sapphalo jāto”ti hāsaṃ pītiṃ pamodanaṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n0:688_3: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhatīti bhāvanaṃ yathāvutte nimitte upanento nibandhati.
anya-e0103n0:688_4: Yogakammaṃ hi yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato “kammaṭṭhāna”nti adhippetaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:688_7: Taṃ panassa upanibandhanaṃ sandhāya cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:689_1: “Vīthisampaṭipādanatthā”ti padassa “kammaṭṭhānavīthiyā sampaṭipādanatthā”ti atthaṃ vatvā taṃ pana kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:689_2: tassā ca sampaṭipādanavidhiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:689_6: Tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati pucchantānaṃ cittassa aññathattapariharaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:689_11: “Āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbo”ti iminā āgantukavattaṃ ekadesena dassitanti “avasesānipī”ti vatvā āgantukavattaṃ
anya-e0103n0:689_15: Vattakkhandhake hi āgatāni mahāvattāni idha “khandhakavattānī”ti vuttāni.
anya-e0103n0:689_16: Tajjanīyakammakatādikāle pana pārivāsikādikāle ca caritabbāni imassa bhikkhuno asambhavato idha nādhippetāni.
anya-e0103n0:689_17: Nimittaṃ vā antaradhāyatīti susāne ṭhitaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uddhumātakabhāvāpagamena antaradhāyati.
anya-e0103n0:690_0: Nimittaṃ gahetuṃ gamane viya nimittaṃ gahetvā nivattanepi yathāsallakkhitadisādipaccavekkhaṇaṃ yāva nimittavināsā
anya-e0103n0:690_2: Sati hi tassa nirantarūpadhāraṇe vihāraṃ pavisitvā nisinnakāle kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhitākāro samathanimittassa
anya-e0103n0:690_3: gahaṇe cittassa samāhitākāro viya pākaṭo hutvā upatiṭṭheyyāti.
anya-e0103n0:690_6: Purimākārena nimittassa pākaṭabhāvena upaṭṭhitattā purimākāreneva kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro bhāvanāvīthiṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0103n0:691_1: Uddhumātakaṃ nāma ativiya asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakañca,
anya-e0103n0:691_2: evarūpe ārammaṇe bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evaṃ ābaddhaparikammassa thirībhūtasseva yogino adhippāyo samijjhatīti dassetuṃ “ānisaṃsadassāvī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:691_4: Taṃ rakkheyyāti “addhā iminā sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti attano jīvitaṃ viya taṃ maṇiratanaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0103n0:691_6: Tattha catudhātukammaṭṭhānikoti catudhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha vā niyutto,
anya-e0103n0:692_2: Bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti manasikārassa anuḷāratāya,
anya-e0103n0:692_4: Tabbipariyāyato “paṭibhāganimittaṃ thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya upaṭṭhātī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:692_6: Kāmānaṃ amanasikārāti asubhabhāvanānubhāvena kāmasaññāya dūrasamussāritattā kāmaguṇe ārabbha manasikārasseva abhāvā.
anya-e0103n0:692_8: Yāya hi kāmasaññāya vasena sattā kāme manasi karonti,
anya-e0103n0:692_12: Paṭibhāganimittārammaṇāya hi asubhasaññāya saddhiṃ balappatto samādhi uppajjamānova kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambheti,
anya-e0103n0:692_13: anurodhamūlako āghāto mūlakāraṇe vikkhambhite vikkhambhitoyeva hotīti āha “anunaya…pe…
anya-e0103n0:692_15: Na hi kadāci pahīnānunayassa byāpādo sambhavati.
anya-e0103n0:692_16: Yathāvuttaasubhasaññāsahagatā hi pīti sātisayā pavattamānāva byāpādaṃ vikkhambhentī pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:692_19: Vīriyañhi paggaṇhantassa sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappaṃ viya savipphāratāya thinamiddhaṃ vikkhambhentameva uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:693_5: tesaṃ anuyuñjanena avūpasantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatīti āha “avippaṭisārakarasantadhammānuyogavasena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:693_6: Bhāvanāya hi pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā yaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhaṃ labbhati,
anya-e0103n0:693_9: Paccakkhatāyāti paṭipajjantassa yogino paccakkhabhāvato “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:693_10: yo evarūpiṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ desetī”ti paṭipattidesake satthari.
anya-e0103n0:693_14: Iti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahīyantīti evaṃ paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva heṭṭhā pavattabhāvanānubhāvanipphannehi
anya-e0103n0:693_15: samādhiādīhi kāmacchandādīni pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n0:693_16: Na hi paṭipakkhena vinā pahātabbassa pahānaṃ sambhavati,
anya-e0103n0:694_0: Teneva ca “imehi tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahāna”nti pahānaparidīpanamukhena jhānaṅgāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “tasmiññeva cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:694_1: Tattha tasmiññeva cāti yaṃ taṃ yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ uggahanimittaṃ bhinditvā viya upaṭṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:694_8: Ārammaṇe hi bhamarassa padumassūpari anuparibbhamanaṃ viya vicārassa anuvicāraṇākārena pavatti anumajjanakiccaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:694_10: paṭiladdho ca so visesādhigamo cāti paṭi…pe… gamo,
anya-e0103n0:694_15: Passaddhinimittaṃ passaddhihetukaṃ sukhaṃ “passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyatī”ti vacanato.
anya-e0103n0:694_18: Iti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavantīti evaṃ etāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni tasmiṃyeva nimitte uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:696_2: Lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti yaṃ taṃ nimittaggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:699_3: Nānādisāyaṃ patitampīti chinnaṃ hutvā sarīrassa khaṇḍadvayaṃ visuṃ disāsu patitampi.
anya-e0103n0:699_6: Vissāsaṃ āpajjatīti ajegucchitaṃ upagaccheyya seyyathāpi chavaḍāhako.
anya-e0103n0:699_7: Sahatthā aparāmasane jigucchā saṇṭhātiyevāti āha “kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā…pe…
anya-e0103n0:700_1: Aṅgulaṅgulantaranti vividhaṃ khittaṃ sarīrāvayavaṃ aṅgulantaraṃ aṅgulantaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:700_2: Katvā vāti kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā sayaṃ katvā vā.
anya-e0103n0:703_5: Aṭṭhike paṭhamavayādisaṃlakkhaṇaṃ na sakkāti “liṅganti idha hatthādīnaṃ nāma”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:703_8: ayaṃ avayavehi vuddhipattissā”ti evaṃ vayavasena vavatthapetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāva,
anya-e0103n0:703_11: aṭṭhike pana na labbhatīti tassa aniyatabhāvadīpanatthaṃ kamavilaṅghanaṃ katvā “tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:704_2: Yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabbanti yaṃ nimittaggahaṇaṃ yattha yujjati,
anya-e0103n0:704_9: Ekasmiṃ aṭṭhike yuttanti idaṃ yathā vinīlakādīsu ubhinnaṃ nimittānaṃ yathārahaṃ vaṇṇavisesato,
anya-e0103n0:705_1: Dvāraṃ datvā vāti “paṭikkūlabhāveyeva diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī”ti ettake eva aṭṭhatvā anantarameva “duvidhaṃ
anya-e0103n0:705_2: idha nimitta”ntiādinā uggahapaṭibhāganimittāni vibhajitvā vacanena yathāvuttassa nimittavibhāgassa dvāraṃ
anya-e0103n0:706_1: Nidassanānīti dantaṭṭhikamattadassanena sakalassāpi tassā itthiyā sarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni
anya-e0103n0:707_2: So hi ekāsaneneva sahassaatthānaṃ vicāraṇasamatthena paññācakkhunā samannāgatattā “sahassakkho”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:709_4: Sarīrañhi vinassamānaṃ aññarūpena ṭhitassa rakkhasassa viya sabhāvappattivaseneva vinassati.
anya-e0103n0:709_10: Tattha ca idhāgatesu dasasu asubhesu ekaccāneva gahitāni,
anya-e0103n0:710_0: Imesaṃ pana dassanampi asubhabhāvasāmaññena satipi avisesato rāgacaritānaṃ sappāyabhāve yaṃ vuttaṃ “rāgacaritabhedavasena cā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:710_2: Sūnabhāvena susaṇṭhitampi sarīraṃ dussaṇṭhitameva hotīti uddhumātakasarīre saṇṭhānavipattiṃ dīpetīti āha “sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:710_8: Sarīre ghanabhāvarāginoti sarīre aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ thirabhāvaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakarāgavato.
anya-e0103n0:710_9: Vikkhepappakāsanatoti soṇasiṅgālādīhi ito cito ca vikkhepassa pakāsanato aṅgapaccaṅgalīlārāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:710_10: Īdisānaṃ kira anavaṭṭhitarūpānaṃ avayavānaṃ ko līḷāvilāsoti virāgasambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:710_11: Saṅghātabhedavikārappakāsanatoti saṅghātassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṃhatabhāvassa susambandhatāya bhedo eva vikāro saṅghātabhedavikāro,
anya-e0103n0:711_1: na dutiyādīnīti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:711_2: Aparisaṇṭhitajalāyāti sotavasena pavattiyā samantato aṭṭhitajalāya asannisinnasalilāya.
anya-e0103n0:711_4: Dubbalattā ārammaṇassāti paṭikkūlabhāvena attani cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ asamatthabhāvo ārammaṇassa dubbalatā.
anya-e0103n0:711_5: Paṭikkūle hi ārammaṇe sarasato cittaṃ pavattituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:711_6: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana vitakkena abhiniropiyamānameva cittaṃ ekaggataṃ labhati.
anya-e0103n0:711_7: Na vinā vitakkenāti vitakkarahitāni dutiyādijjhānāni tattha patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti.
anya-e0103n0:712_0: Yadi paṭikkūlabhāvato uddhumātādiārammaṇe dutiyādijjhānāni na pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:712_1: evaṃ sante paṭhamajjhānenāpi tattha na uppajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:712_2: Na hi tattha pītisomanassānaṃ sambhavo yuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “paṭikkūlepi ca etasmi”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n0:713_1: Yathāvuttakāraṇena dasadhā vavatthitampi sabhāvato ekavidhamevāti dassetuṃ “dasavidhampi ceta”ntiādiṃ vatvā svāyaṃ sabhāvo yathā aviññāṇakesu,
anya-e0103n0:713_3: Tasmā tatthāpi yonisomanasikāravato bhāvanā ijjhatevāti dassento “tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:713_8: tehi pana vinā “timattāni aṭṭhisatānī”ti kāyagatāsatiyaṃ vakkhati.
anya-e0103n0:713_18: Yāthāvato rasīyati ñāyatīti hi raso, sabhāvo.
anya-e0103n0:714_7: mucchāpāpikāya vā taṇhāya vasena mucchaṃ pattā.
anya-e0103n0:716_3: Nimittaṃ gahetvāti asubhākārassa suṭṭhu sallakkhaṇavasena yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:716_6: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbanti yathāladdhe uggahanimitte kammaṃ karontena paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e0103n0:716_7: upacārajjhāne ṭhitena tameva bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpentena asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:716_8: Adhigatappano hi paṭhamajjhāne ṭhito tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto nacirasseva sabbāsave khepetīti.
anya-e0103n0:721_3: “Anu anu sati anussatī”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “punappunaṃ uppajjanato”ti vatvā na ettha anu-
anya-e0103n0:721_11: “Pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā”ti iminā ca anussatiyā anussaritabbānurūpatā vuttā hotīti pavattakasseva
anya-e0103n0:721_14: Anurūpatā nāma pavattitabbaṭṭhānassa anurūpatāya eva hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpatā vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:721_17: Buddhanti ye guṇe upādāya bhagavati “buddho”ti paññatti,
anya-e0103n0:721_22: Nanu ca nibbānaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena vakkhati?
anya-e0103n0:721_24: dhammabhāvasāmaññena pana maggaphalehi saddhiṃ idha pāḷiyā saṅgahitattā tassāpi dhammānussatikammaṭṭhāne gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:721_25: asaṅkhatāmatādibhāvena pana maggaphalehi visiṭṭhatāya tassa visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:721_26: Sīlānussatiādīnaṃ pana tissannaṃ anussatīnaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ yogāvacarassa attano eva
anya-e0103n0:721_28: Rūpakāyaṃ gatāti attano karajakāyaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattā.
anya-e0103n0:721_31: Ito purimāsu sattasu anussatīsu natthi nimittuppatti,
anya-e0103n0:722_1: Avecca buddhaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā uppanno pasādo aveccappasādo,
anya-e0103n0:722_3: taṃsadisopi vā yo diṭṭhigatavātehi acalo asampakampiyo,
anya-e0103n0:723_0: So bhagavāti ettha soti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
anya-e0103n0:723_1: abhisambuddho devānaṃ atidevo brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke
anya-e0103n0:723_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n0:723_7: saddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussaritabbāti dassento “itipi arahaṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n0:723_13: tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni bhāventena cittassa sammukhībhūtāni kātabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:724_1: Dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṃsagataṃ dūrabhāvaṃ dassento “suvidūravidūre”ti āha,
anya-e0103n0:724_3: Sā panassa kilesato dūratā tesaṃ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha “maggena kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:724_4: Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “savāsanāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:724_5: Na hi bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0103n0:724_6: etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:724_8: Pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:724_12: “ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā”tiādīni suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni.
anya-e0103n0:724_17: Vuttamevatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ “so tato ārakā nāmā”ti gāthābandhamāha.
anya-e0103n0:726_3: bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayaṃ dvayanti vuttaṃ “avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī”ti. Nābhiyā,
anya-e0103n0:726_4: nemiyā ca sambandhā arasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi sambandhā puññādisaṅkhārāti vuttaṃ “puññādiabhisaṅkhārāra”nti.
anya-e0103n0:726_5: Tattha tattha bhave pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṃ jarāmaraṇanti taṃ nemiṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā āha “jarāmaraṇanemī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:726_7: evaṃ saṃsāracakkapavattiyā āsavasamudayoti āha “āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:726_13: sabbaso vā ādito paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:729_2: Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne, kāle vā.
anya-e0103n0:729_3: Vīriyapādehīti saṃkilesavodānapakkhiyesu sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavattehi attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi.
anya-e0103n0:729_7: Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:730_1: Evaṃ “arānaṃ hatattā”ti ettha vuttaaraghāte saṃsāraṃ cakkaṃ viya cakkanti gahetvā atthayojanaṃ katvā
anya-e0103n0:730_2: idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:730_3: Tattha anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṃ aviññātakoṭikaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:730_4: Sesā dasa dhammā saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā arā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n0:730_6: nemiyā jarāmaraṇena antato sambandhattāti dassento āha “avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā cā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:730_11: Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ adhippetanti taṃ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikaṃ avijjaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:730_12: avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike ca paṭipāṭiyā dassento “kāmabhave ca avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:730_13: Tattha kāmabhave avijjāti kāmabhave ādīnavappaṭicchādikā avijjā.
anya-e0103n0:730_14: Rūpabhave arūpabhave avijjāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n0:730_18: Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n0:730_21: nānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena ca paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n0:730_24: Imasmiṃ panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti,
anya-e0103n0:730_25: sayameva ca parato āgamissatīti na naṃ vitthārayāma.
anya-e0103n0:731_3: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā tattha tattha kāmabhavādīsu uppajjanakā taṇhā.
anya-e0103n0:732_1: upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:732_4: Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena pavattamānā kāmupādānaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:733_1: “Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā”ti vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā “kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:733_4: so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:733_5: Aparo “asukasmiṃ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n0:733_6: so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:733_7: Aparo “rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī”ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti.
anya-e0103n0:733_9: Aparo “arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī”ti arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti.
anya-e0103n0:733_13: Aparo “sīlena suddhī”ti “asuddhimaggaṃ suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ
anya-e0103n0:734_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena “kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotī”tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:734_2: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento “evaṃ aya”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:734_4: evaṃ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha “ubhopete hetusamuppannā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:734_5: Paccayapariggaheti nāmarūpassa paccayānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ paricchijja gahaṇe,
anya-e0103n0:734_9: Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ yasmā addhāttaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:734_11: Eteneva nayenāti etena “avijjā hetū”tiādinā avijjāyaṃ vuttena nayena.
anya-e0103n0:735_9: āyatiṃ vipākoti evaṃ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā.
anya-e0103n0:735_11: saddo vā bhāgādhivacananti atīto hetubhāgo paṭhamo saṅkhepo.
anya-e0103n0:735_15: Kammaṃ taṇhā ca tassa sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hutvā vaṭṭanatthena kammavaṭṭaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:736_0: Viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāvatthā “jātijarāmaraṇa”nti vuttāti āha “jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:736_2: Āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṃ anāgatānaṃ gahitattā.
anya-e0103n0:736_4: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā,
anya-e0103n0:737_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto eko sandhi.
anya-e0103n0:737_2: Vedanātaṇhānamantarā pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi.
anya-e0103n0:737_3: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:739_2: Tattha te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme.
anya-e0103n0:739_4: Nibbindanto balavavipassanāya virajjanto vimuccanto ariyamaggehi are hanīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:739_7: Tato paraṃ pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “hani vihani viddhaṃsesī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:740_1: Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:740_3: kimaṅgaṃ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento “uppanne tathāgate”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:740_4: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṃ amahesakkhehi devamanussehi kariyamānānaṃ nātiuḷārānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:741_2: Raho pāpaṃ karonti “mā naṃ koci jaññā”ti esa bhagavā na kadāci karoti pāpahetūnaṃ bodhimaṇḍe eva suppahīnattā.
anya-e0103n0:741_8: tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā ca,
anya-e0103n0:742_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto,
anya-e0103n0:742_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
anya-e0103n0:743_0: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṃ pātaṃ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:745_0: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:746_4: tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā,
anya-e0103n0:747_3: so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo.
anya-e0103n0:748_0: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasahassantarikāpi honti,
anya-e0103n0:750_0: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṃ jino.
anya-e0103n0:751_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti,
anya-e0103n0:751_4: parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma,
anya-e0103n0:751_5: te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena sabbaso pahīnā samucchinnā. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:752_2: sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:753_0: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ a-
anya-e0103n0:755_0: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato.
anya-e0103n0:756_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto khīṇāsavā,
anya-e0103n0:756_1: ye ca sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti,
anya-e0103n0:756_2: ye ca parisuddhapayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā,
anya-e0103n0:756_5: Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitā eva honti.
anya-e0103n0:761_0: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
anya-e0103n0:765_0: Teneva ca te aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:766_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:767_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti.
anya-e0103n0:767_2: tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
anya-e0103n0:767_3: natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:769_0: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:770_1: bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāre gamanaṃ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva
anya-e0103n0:773_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
anya-e0103n0:774_0: Evaṃ natthi etassa rahogamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:775_0: Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0103n0:777_3: Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0103n0:777_4: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo
anya-e0103n0:777_5: appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi
anya-e0103n0:777_6: brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
anya-e0103n0:778_0: Guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake;
anya-e0103n0:783_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jino”ti.
anya-e0103n0:784_8: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:784_9: Evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:784_10: “Sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati,
anya-e0103n0:785_0: Idāni tassā visayaṃ “sabbadhamme”ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “abhiññeyye dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:785_12: Bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā kato,
anya-e0103n0:785_15: Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati.
anya-e0103n0:785_16: Uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāmattaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:785_17: na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṃ yathā “appaccayā dhammā,
anya-e0103n0:785_21: Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:786_3: Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni,
anya-e0103n0:787_1: Evaṃ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammehi,
anya-e0103n0:787_2: khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:787_3: Tattha mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena.
anya-e0103n0:787_14: upādānakkhandhantogadhattā ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:788_8: Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:788_9: Kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0103n0:789_6: sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṃ sayameva abhisambuddhattāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:789_7: Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0103n0:790_3: visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
anya-e0103n0:790_6: Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:790_12: Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi,
anya-e0103n0:790_13: anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:790_15: Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato,
anya-e0103n0:790_16: idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:790_19: sammāsambuddho”ti ca vuccati na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato.
anya-e0103n0:790_20: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa
anya-e0103n0:790_22: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
anya-e0103n0:791_1: kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:791_4: yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:791_6: asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
anya-e0103n0:791_7: tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
anya-e0103n0:791_8: Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:791_11: tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:791_13: ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n0:791_14: Tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
anya-e0103n0:792_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati?
anya-e0103n0:792_3: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati,
anya-e0103n0:792_5: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ‘sesepi eva’nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:792_9: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā “sesepi eva”nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:793_14: Ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
anya-e0103n0:793_15: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā
anya-e0103n0:794_0: Nanu ca etasmiṃ pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:794_1: tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na,
anya-e0103n0:794_4: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā.
anya-e0103n0:794_5: Tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:794_13: kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0103n0:795_5: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā.
anya-e0103n0:795_10: aṭṭhannaṃ ca vijjānaṃ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṃ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
