anya-e0103n0:795_11: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca.
anya-e0103n0:795_12: Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu saddho hotī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:795_13: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
anya-e0103n0:796_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imeyeva hī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:796_1: Tena tesaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṃsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
anya-e0103n0:797_5: so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha “caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṃ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:797_6: Yathā sattānaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṃ paññāya vinā na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:797_7: evaṃ nesaṃ atthānatthajānanaṃ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā.
anya-e0103n0:797_10: Tattha yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampannoti yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno,
anya-e0103n0:797_12: Sā panāyaṃ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “tenassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:798_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:798_22: Tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
anya-e0103n0:798_27: Tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto,
anya-e0103n0:798_28: paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto.
anya-e0103n0:798_30: evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:799_5: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṃ gamanaṃ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:799_6: So hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti katvā “gataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:799_8: Idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:799_10: Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṃ akaronto,
anya-e0103n0:799_12: Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato.
anya-e0103n0:799_16: Tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā sugato”ti sobhanattho su-
anya-e0103n0:800_0: Asundarānaṃ dukkhānaṃ saṅkhārappavattīnaṃ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṃ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti
anya-e0103n0:800_4: Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:800_7: sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṃ “sammā vā gato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:800_9: “Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto”ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:800_10: “Sassataṃ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato”ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:800_11: “Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato”ti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:801_22: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā “āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko”tiādikā.
anya-e0103n0:801_23: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṃ sugatiṃ āvahatī”ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
anya-e0103n0:801_26: Evaṃ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato da-
anya-e0103n0:801_29: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṃ piyaṃ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
anya-e0103n0:802_0: Apica sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:802_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:802_6: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:802_7: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:802_8: Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:802_9: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:802_10: Tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
anya-e0103n0:802_11: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
anya-e0103n0:803_2: Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo,
anya-e0103n0:803_12: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo,
anya-e0103n0:804_0: Iti “sabbathā lokaṃ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ suttaṃ dassento “yattha kho āvuso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:804_1: Tattha “na jāyatī”tiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n0:805_0: Kāmaṃ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ, daṭṭhuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:805_2: apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:805_5: Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:805_11: desatopi niddisīyati yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:806_5: Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṃ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:806_9: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
anya-e0103n0:807_1: Evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā,
anya-e0103n0:807_2: loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “apica tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:807_9: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā,
anya-e0103n0:807_18: saddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n0:807_19: Evaṃ hi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
anya-e0103n0:807_21: na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:808_4: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
anya-e0103n0:808_9: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:809_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n0:809_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n0:809_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṃ sahassappakāro okāsaloko,
anya-e0103n0:810_2: Eko lokoti “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:810_3: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:810_4: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāma-
anya-e0103n0:810_7: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0103n0:810_10: Atha vā “na lujjati na palujjatī”ti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:810_11: so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
anya-e0103n0:811_4: tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n0:811_8: tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
anya-e0103n0:811_11: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
anya-e0103n0:812_0: Āgamma cittaṃ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
anya-e0103n0:812_1: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo,
anya-e0103n0:812_2: evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n0:815_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
anya-e0103n0:816_0: Āsayaṃ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0103n0:817_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti,
anya-e0103n0:817_1: kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti”ādi.
anya-e0103n0:818_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā,
anya-e0103n0:818_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:818_7: Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
anya-e0103n0:818_8: Taṃ sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0103n0:819_6: Taṃ caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n0:820_10: Indriyānaṃ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṃ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:820_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodanīyaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:821_1: appaṃ vā rajaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā,
anya-e0103n0:822_10: imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:822_12: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti,
anya-e0103n0:822_13: tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0103n0:823_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi.
anya-e0103n0:823_1: Tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:824_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
anya-e0103n0:824_3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito,
anya-e0103n0:825_3: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā “cakkavāḷa”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:826_2: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho.
anya-e0103n0:828_4: dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato yugandharapabbato,
anya-e0103n0:828_5: ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:828_7: evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n0:828_13: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:829_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
anya-e0103n0:829_3: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:830_1: himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṃ satāni ucco ubbedho.
anya-e0103n0:833_2: Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṃ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:833_13: Tiṇṇaṃ hi pattānaṃ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n0:834_4: anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti tividhampi anantaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ paricchindati sayampi anantattā.
anya-e0103n0:834_12: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
anya-e0103n0:834_15: sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṃ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n0:835_5: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
anya-e0103n0:835_10: visesapaccayānaṃ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṃsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa
anya-e0103n0:835_12: Tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:836_6: Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:836_7: pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ savisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:836_9: bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṃ lahuṃ pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n0:837_0: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:837_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo.
anya-e0103n0:838_0: Na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbalokaṃ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe…
anya-e0103n0:838_1: pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ kañci puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi,
anya-e0103n0:839_2: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā,
anya-e0103n0:839_3: tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ye,
anya-e0103n0:839_7: Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti –
anya-e0103n0:841_1: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī,
anya-e0103n0:842_0: Evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. Ādikā gāthāyoti ettha –
anya-e0103n0:843_0: “Ahaṃ hi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0103n0:846_0: Mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo. ;
anya-e0103n0:852_3: Taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti āha “vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:852_10: Tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:852_22: Vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehīti etasmiṃ atthe vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.
anya-e0103n0:853_1: paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhāna”ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṃ ācikkhantoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:853_3: “Dantepi dametiyevā”ti idaṃ pubbe “sabbena sabbaṃ damathaṃ anupagatā purisadammā”ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:853_4: Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ nātivattā,
anya-e0103n0:854_4: Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti.
anya-e0103n0:854_7: Tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti disā,
anya-e0103n0:854_13: Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti.
anya-e0103n0:855_4: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko,
anya-e0103n0:855_10: Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati,
anya-e0103n0:855_15: Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa atthīti satthā,
anya-e0103n0:855_17: So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā viyāti satthā,
anya-e0103n0:856_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:856_4: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:856_10: Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ upanento tāreti.
anya-e0103n0:858_2: Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e0103n0:858_4: Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n0:858_5: Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi.
anya-e0103n0:858_8: tattha kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti āvajjanā.
anya-e0103n0:858_9: Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:859_1: buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo “ko me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi.
anya-e0103n0:859_12: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento,
anya-e0103n0:859_14: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:860_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi”nti gāthamāha.
anya-e0103n0:860_3: “Udake maṇḍūko”ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:860_8: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:860_9: Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
anya-e0103n0:860_11: Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:861_0: Sitaṃ katvāti “tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo labbhantī”ti
anya-e0103n0:861_1: pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavalavipphurantadassanakiraṇāvalīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento
anya-e0103n0:863_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n0:864_0: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
anya-e0103n0:865_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. ;
anya-e0103n0:867_1: Yaṃ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:867_4: Tasmā yaṃ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:867_15: tattha bhavaṃ tasmiṃ laddhe laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:868_21: Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti –
anya-e0103n0:869_1: Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi,
anya-e0103n0:869_2: tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vā-
anya-e0103n0:871_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_1: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_2: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_3: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_4: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:871_5: Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ buddhiatthatāya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_6: Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
anya-e0103n0:871_7: atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:871_8: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti anatthantaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:871_11: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:872_2: Guṇavisiṭṭhasabbasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi
anya-e0103n0:872_6: accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n0:873_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:874_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṃ “bhagavā”ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo
anya-e0103n0:874_1: nāmaṃyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento “catubbidhaṃ vā nāma”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:874_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:874_3: Tathā liṅgikaṃ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:874_17: “Vimokkhantika”nti iminā idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:874_19: atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:874_20: Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati.
anya-e0103n0:874_23: Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti.
anya-e0103n0:874_25: te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:877_11: bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_13: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_14: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_15: bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_16: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_17: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:877_18: pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:877_19: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n0:878_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n0:878_1: yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n0:878_11: suṇantassa ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso.
anya-e0103n0:878_18: Channaṃ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:879_1: Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva,
anya-e0103n0:879_2: tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pana aparo nayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:879_6: dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:879_15: itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n0:880_11: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhīlāni.
anya-e0103n0:880_15: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
anya-e0103n0:880_16: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti āgatā pañca vinibandhā.
anya-e0103n0:882_4: Sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:882_5: Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesāti.
anya-e0103n0:882_6: Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:882_11: āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n0:882_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ ‘vadhakaṃ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:882_15: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti devaputtamāro.
anya-e0103n0:882_17: jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti maccumāro.
anya-e0103n0:883_13: dhammakāyaṃ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṃ āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā,
anya-e0103n0:883_15: tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:884_2: adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato.
anya-e0103n0:884_4: saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
anya-e0103n0:884_13: aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā.
anya-e0103n0:885_3: Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ āruppe uppannānaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:885_8: “Tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṃ yaṃ etena lokanāthena icchitaṃ manovacīpaṇidhānavasena,
anya-e0103n0:886_2: saddena na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n0:886_7: Dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭho taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:886_13: Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:886_16: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā,
anya-e0103n0:886_27: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:886_30: Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n0:888_2: Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:890_0: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n0:891_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
anya-e0103n0:892_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:892_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:892_86: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā
anya-e0103n0:892_87: anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:892_88: Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-
anya-e0103n0:895_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi
anya-e0103n0:895_17: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā,
anya-e0103n0:895_21: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-
anya-e0103n0:895_24: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari,
anya-e0103n0:897_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n0:898_3: attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n0:898_6: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
anya-e0103n0:898_14: “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā,
anya-e0103n0:898_15: te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi.
anya-e0103n0:898_17: Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā,
anya-e0103n0:898_18: “kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
anya-e0103n0:900_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n0:901_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā,
anya-e0103n0:901_3: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi,
anya-e0103n0:901_4: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi.
anya-e0103n0:901_5: Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n0:901_7: jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiuttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n0:902_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n0:903_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n0:904_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
anya-e0103n0:904_11: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno”ti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
anya-e0103n0:904_13: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
anya-e0103n0:904_14: kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti.
anya-e0103n0:904_15: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
anya-e0103n0:907_6: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n0:908_0: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:910_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:911_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ,
anya-e0103n0:911_3: yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n0:911_4: Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle mūgapakkhapaṇḍitakāle cūḷasutasomakāleti
anya-e0103n0:911_5: evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ natthi.
anya-e0103n0:911_7: cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
anya-e0103n0:911_8: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n0:911_12: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
anya-e0103n0:914_8: sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami.
anya-e0103n0:914_9: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:914_10: cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:914_11: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
anya-e0103n0:914_27: dhammavicāra”ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n0:915_2: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:916_1: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
anya-e0103n0:920_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n0:922_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n0:923_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
anya-e0103n0:924_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n0:924_8: Tasmā tesaṃ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ “araha”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:925_0: Tattha “araha”nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n0:925_9: “Sugato”ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n0:925_11: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n0:925_14: Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:925_16: “Bhagavā”ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n0:926_2: Tattha “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū”ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n0:926_3: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0103n0:926_6: “Sugato bhagavā”ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:927_5: pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:927_10: Etasmiṃ pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:927_14: Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:928_1: “So bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:928_7: Pīti uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:928_9: Kāyacittadarathāti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā.
anya-e0103n0:928_11: Anukkamena ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:928_15: bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṃ paṭukiccāva honti,
anya-e0103n0:928_18: passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ thirataraṃ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:928_19: sukhena anubrūhitaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n0:928_20: Evaṃ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n0:928_21: indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n0:929_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti…pe…
anya-e0103n0:930_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṃ appanāpattaṃ na hotīti āha “buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:930_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0103n0:930_6: bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṃ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n0:930_7: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n0:930_11: Evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṃ pavattentassa ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:930_14: Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:930_16: na ayamekasmiṃyeva guṇe ṭhātuṃ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:931_11: Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato.
anya-e0103n0:931_13: Buddhabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ namati buddhaguṇānaṃ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n0:931_14: Buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṃ citte viparivattanato vuttaṃ “sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:931_15: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n0:932_3: Evaṃ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.
anya-e0103n0:934_2: sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṃ “dhammānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:934_3: Kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṃ viya “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:934_4: Nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṃ vasena desanaṃ āruḷhāti?
anya-e0103n0:934_6: evaṃ santepi “parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṃ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī”ti dassanatthaṃ “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti idha na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:934_8: Tathāpi pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:935_4: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṃ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:935_6: Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n0:935_10: “Sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī”ti ayaṃ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati,
anya-e0103n0:935_17: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
anya-e0103n0:935_19: saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
anya-e0103n0:935_26: pageva adhammā”ti ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:935_29: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:935_30: cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0103n0:935_33: Evaṃ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.
anya-e0103n0:936_3: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
anya-e0103n0:936_4: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu “gāthā”ti samaññā,
anya-e0103n0:936_5: taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ āropetvā dassento “paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:936_6: “Ekānusandhika”nti idaṃ nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:936_7: itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
anya-e0103n0:937_0: Ayaṃ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n0:937_1: idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṃ vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “sanidānasauppattikattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:937_5: dhammadesanāya ca taṃtaṃsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato.
anya-e0103n0:938_0: Evaṃ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni
anya-e0103n0:941_7: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:941_10: tato paraṃ kattabbaṃ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:942_11: So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho,
anya-e0103n0:942_17: tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya pariyosānakalyāṇatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:943_1: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanasambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:944_3: tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
anya-e0103n0:945_3: pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
anya-e0103n0:946_1: Samathavipassanāsukhāvahanatoti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato.
anya-e0103n0:947_0: “So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n0:951_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti ca. ;
anya-e0103n0:952_3: Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato.
anya-e0103n0:952_4: Esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṃ dhammaṃ desento yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:953_19: Saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0103n0:953_21: Satipi vā bhede “sabyañjana”nti ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto “saputto āgato”tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0103n0:953_25: atha vijjamānatāmattaṃ “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā.
anya-e0103n0:954_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti ettha nettinayenāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsana…pe…
anya-e0103n0:954_2: Tattha yadipi nettiyaṃ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti “akkharaṃ pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n0:954_3: idha pana pāḷiyaṃ “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsanapakāsanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:954_4: Tattha saṅkhepato kāsanaṃ dīpanaṃ saṅkāsanaṃ “maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa,
anya-e0103n0:954_9: Ādikammasmiṃ hi ayaṃ pasaddo “paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n0:954_11: Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0103n0:954_14: Yathā “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṃyeva ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā?
anya-e0103n0:954_15: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta”ntiādinā vitthārato vivaraṇavasena,
anya-e0103n0:954_19: vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni.
anya-e0103n0:954_20: Yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso?
anya-e0103n0:954_21: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā,
anya-e0103n0:955_0: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ pāṭhavikappo jātoti? Vuccate – nettipāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. Tattha hi –
anya-e0103n0:960_1: Pacchimo pana “paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti ‘passathā’ti cāhā”ti sutte āgatanayena byañjanamattakato.
anya-e0103n0:960_5: paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṃ paṭṭhapana”nti imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0103n0:960_6: Yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ “pakārato ñāpana”nti paññāpanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:960_7: taṃ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena “nibbisesaṃ pakārato kāsana”nti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:960_10: buddhiyā ca nisānaṃ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane jāyatīti.
anya-e0103n0:960_11: Evaṃ atthapadarūpattā pariyattiatthassa yathāvuttachaatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṃ sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:961_0: Akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyāti ettha uccāraṇavelāyaṃ apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:961_1: “Ekakkharaṃ padaṃ akkhara”nti eke “ā evaṃ kira ta”ntiādīsu ā-
anya-e0103n0:961_5: Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:961_10: Etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:962_8: tathā akkharehi ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:962_17: Evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhaveneyyavinayanoti.
anya-e0103n0:962_18: Evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṃ dhammo atthabyañjanapāripūriyā “sāttho sabyañjano”ti veditabbo “paripuṇṇo,
anya-e0103n0:963_5: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā,
anya-e0103n0:963_17: tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n0:963_18: Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā,
anya-e0103n0:963_21: Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā vuttaṃ “atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha”nti atthaguṇadīpanato.
anya-e0103n0:963_22: Tāsaṃ dhammadesanānaṃ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṃ “dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana”nti tāsaṃ byañjanasampattidīpanato.
anya-e0103n0:964_1: Atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā
anya-e0103n0:964_6: Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha “dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjananti,
anya-e0103n0:964_12: Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
anya-e0103n0:965_0: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha”nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ āha,
anya-e0103n0:965_4: Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:966_2: Adhigamabyattitoti saccapaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṃ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:966_4: Āgamabyattitoti durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṃ karontassa viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sabyañcanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:967_0: Evaṃ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṃ vibhāvetvā idāni
anya-e0103n0:967_1: pacchimavesārajjadvayavasenāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto”ti vatvā
anya-e0103n0:967_3: Tattha vipallāsamāpajjatīti tesaṃ dhamme “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ vipākādīnaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato ekaṃsena apāyūpapattihetutāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:967_5: saṃsārato ca niyyānikāti vuttadhammānaṃ ekaccayaññakiriyāpakatipurisantaraññāṇādīnaṃ tato niyyānikattābhāvato viparīto eva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:967_8: Tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti kammantarāyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ antarāyikabhāvassa ariyamaggadhammānaṃ niyyānikabhāvassa kadācipi anativattanato.
anya-e0103n0:968_0: Nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyāti adhigantabbassa sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭassa nibbānassa anurūpāya sabbasaṅkhāranissaraṇūpāyabhūtāya
anya-e0103n0:968_2: Paṭipadānurūpassāti sabbadukkhaniyyānikabhūtā ārammaṇakaraṇamattenāpi kilesehi anāmasanīyā yādisī paṭipadā,
anya-e0103n0:968_4: Supaññattāti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahitā sammādiṭṭhiādippabhedā micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahāyikabhāvena suṭṭhu sammadeva vihitā.
anya-e0103n0:968_6: Evaṃ magganibbānānaṃ paṭipadāpaṭipajjanīyabhāvehi aññamaññānurūpatāya svākkhātataṃ dassetvā idāni tividhassāpi
anya-e0103n0:968_7: lokuttaradhammassa paccekaṃ svākkhātataṃ dassetuṃ “ariyamaggo cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:968_18: dhammaṃ desessāmi amatañca tāṇañca leṇañcā”tiādinā tesu tesu suttesu sassatādibhāvakittanavasena.
anya-e0103n0:969_1: “Rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo”ti iminā “ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo pahīnā”ti
anya-e0103n0:970_0: Tena tena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya parassa saddahanena paraneyyena gantabbataṃ hitvā ñāpetabbataṃ pahāya paccavekkhaṇañāṇena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0103n0:970_2: Ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati,
anya-e0103n0:970_4: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:971_2: Phalampi heṭṭhimaṃ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṃ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato
anya-e0103n0:972_1: Nāssa kāloti nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthi.
anya-e0103n0:972_3: aparapariyāye”tiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi,
anya-e0103n0:972_7: Phaladānaṃ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti kāliko,
anya-e0103n0:973_5: Amanuññampi kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha “manuññabhāvappakāsanenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:974_2: upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā āha “upanetabboti opaneyyiko”ti.
anya-e0103n0:974_3: Citte upanayanaṃ uppādananti āha “idaṃ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:974_4: Citte upanayananti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya
anya-e0103n0:975_3: Te pana ekaṃsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha “ugghaṭitaññūādīhī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:975_4: “Paccatta”nti etassa “pati attanī”ti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha “attani attanī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:975_7: Tattha “me”ti iminā “paccatta”nti padena vuttamatthaṃ anvayato dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:975_9: “Viññūhī”ti idaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento “bālānaṃ pana avisayo cesā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:976_0: Evaṃ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṃ dassetvā idāni purimassa purimassa
anya-e0103n0:976_2: Tattha sandiṭṭhikattāti yasmā ayaṃ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n0:976_6: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:977_0: 153. Tassevantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:979_4: sadevakena ca lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca,
anya-e0103n0:980_2: Sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā,
anya-e0103n0:980_6: tassā ca paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dassetuṃ “suṭṭhu paṭipanno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:980_8: Punappunaṃ nivattane hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:981_0: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṃ savanaṃ sakkaccasavanaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ “sakkaccaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:981_1: tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu sāvakā nāmāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:981_4: Ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ninnānākaraṇaṃ maggenāgatattā.
anya-e0103n0:981_5: Tena te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṃhatāva.
anya-e0103n0:981_14: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo.
anya-e0103n0:981_16: Anurūpattā sāmīci opāyikātipi saṅkhaṃ samaññaṃ gatā sammāpaṭipatti,
anya-e0103n0:981_22: “suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā”ti ekasesanayena vā gahitānaṃ samūho “suppaṭipanno”ti vuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:982_0: Evaṃ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṃ avomissakaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:982_5: Ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:982_6: Purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0103n0:982_7: nanu ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṃ padaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyāti?
anya-e0103n0:982_9: Sā pana sāvakānaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṃ “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:983_0: Kilesajimhavasena antadvayagāhoti sabbaso taṃ pahāya sammāpaṭipadā kāyādivaṅkappahāyinī ujuppaṭipatti hotīti āha “majjhimāya paṭipadāya…pe…
anya-e0103n0:984_3: sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi paṭipajjitabbamevāti āha “ñāyo vuccati nibbāna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:984_5: maggañāṇādīhi vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyati cāti ñāyo nibbānanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:985_0: Guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kayiramānaṃ paccupaṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahantīti sāmīcikammārahā.
anya-e0103n0:986_1: Yadidanti antogadhaliṅgavacanabhedo nipātoti tassa vacanabhedena atthamāha “yā imānī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:986_4: Tena itarāni tīṇi yugaḷāni dassitāni hontīti āha “evaṃ cattāri purisayugaḷāni hontī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:986_6: Purisā ca te puggalā ca purisapuggalā.
anya-e0103n0:986_8: “puggalā”ti pana dutiyāyapi sattasāmaññenāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:986_11: Dātabbanti vā paccattavacanaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayāna”nti padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:986_12: aññathā yesaṃ kesañci catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ “āhuna”nti samaññā siyā.
anya-e0103n0:986_14: Sakkādīnampi vā āhavananti sakkādīhipi diyyamānaṃ dānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:986_15: Yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti yasmiṃ āvahanīyaggimhi hutaṃ dadhiādi āhuneyyaggigahapataggidakkhiṇeyyaggīsu hutato uḷāraphalanti tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi.
anya-e0103n0:987_0: Ṭhapetvā 165 teti te piyamanāpe ñātimitte apanetvā,
anya-e0103n0:987_2: Ekabuddhantare ca dissatīti ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte dissati. Ca-
anya-e0103n0:987_3: saddena kadāci asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe vītivatteti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:988_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā.
anya-e0103n0:990_1: Natthi ito uttaraṃ visiṭṭhanti hi anuttaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:990_3: Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyati rakkhati,
anya-e0103n0:990_4: khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṃ, kedārādi,
anya-e0103n0:992_2: aho vata acchiddānīti evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:992_6: Parassa sīlāni anussariyamānāni piyamanāpabhāvāvahanena kevalaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānaṃ honti,
anya-e0103n0:992_7: na visuṃ kammaṭṭhānanti āha “attano sīlāni anussaritabbānī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:993_2: ekajjhaṃ samādāne uddesakkamena sīlānaṃ ādiantaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:993_16: Tato eva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:993_18: “Imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṃ devaññataro vā,
anya-e0103n0:993_20: “sīlena suddhī”ti ca evamādinā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā ayaṃ te sīlesu dosoti catūsu vipattīsu yāya
anya-e0103n0:994_1: Sikkhāya sagāravoti sīladhanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṃ sikkhāya sagāravo sappatisso hoti.
anya-e0103n0:994_5: so tāya visabhāgavutti nāma hoti vilomanato.
anya-e0103n0:994_6: Yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:994_8: Sikkhāya sagāravattā eva tattha appamatto hoti.
anya-e0103n0:994_9: Attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayanti evamādīni bhayāni imassa dūrasamussāritānīti āha “attānuvādādibhayavirahito”ti.
anya-e0103n0:996_3: Niccaṃ sadā pavattā dānasaṃvibhāgā yassa so niccapavattadānasaṃvibhāgo, tena.
anya-e0103n0:996_9: Ito dāni pabhutīti ito paṭṭhāya dāni ajjatagge ajjadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:996_12: Tattha nimittaṃ gaṇhitvāti tasmiṃ dāne pariccāgacetanāya pavattiākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṃ gahetvā.
anya-e0103n0:996_13: Vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenāti vigatāni malamaccherāni etasmāti vigatamalamacchero, cāgo,
anya-e0103n0:997_0: Sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkamanti sādhūnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dhammaṃ paveṇiṃ anu anu kamanto okkamanto,
anya-e0103n0:998_2: tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:998_7: Sotāpannassa satoti gehaṃ āvasantassa sotāpannassa samānassa.
anya-e0103n0:998_10: Abhibhavitvāti agāraṃ āvasantānaṃ aññesaṃ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.
anya-e0103n0:999_5: evaṃ dānabahulo puggalo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti dassento “dātuṃ sadā dhotahatthoyevā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:999_12: Yājena yuttoti dānena yutto sadā pariccajanato.
anya-e0103n0:1000_1: Yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati,
anya-e0103n0:1000_2: evaṃ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva attano pariccāgaṃ anussarantassa bhāvanā
anya-e0103n0:1001_5: Paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti mettāya mettābhāvanāya anulomakārī anurūpapaṭipatti.
anya-e0103n0:1001_6: Visāradoti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto abhibhuyya vihārī.
anya-e0103n0:1003_3: Yādisā hi ariyānaṃ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo,
anya-e0103n0:1003_8: Tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṃsahacaritaṃ ṭhānaṃ tāvatiṃsaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1003_18: Devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya maggenāgatāya saddhāya samannāgatā,
anya-e0103n0:1003_19: sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā,
anya-e0103n0:1003_20: mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā ca saṃvijjatī”ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṃ
anya-e0103n0:1004_1: taṃ kathanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “sutte panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1004_3: tāsañca devatāna”nti ubhayaṃ samadhuraṃ viya sutte kiñcāpi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1004_5: Sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti “vutta”nti parato padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1004_6: Kimatthaṃ pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha “devatānaṃ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1004_7: Kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ attho gayhatīti āha “aṭṭhakathāyañhī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1005_1: Tasmāti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1005_2: sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ jhānuppattinimittaṃ yuttaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:1005_6: Yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1005_11: Pubbabhāge vā pavattaṃ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṃ upādāya “devatānussatī”ti imissā samaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1005_12: Tathā hi vakkhati “pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1007_5: Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1007_7: “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa hi yaṃ taṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu.
anya-e0103n0:1007_15: “yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā”tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti.
anya-e0103n0:1008_1: Ariyasāvakānaññeva ijjhantīti ariyasāvakānaṃ ijjhantiyevāti uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1008_7: kasmā mahānāmasuttādīsu bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0103n0:1011_1: Evaṃ santepīti evaṃ mahānāmasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi.
anya-e0103n0:1011_3: Pītiṃ paṭilabhitvāti anussavavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n0:1016_2: Sā hi chasu anussatīsu sabbapacchā niddiṭṭhattā āsannā,
anya-e0103n0:1016_5: Maraṇassa sati maraṇassatīti maraṇaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tattha maraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_6: Kāmañcettha khandhānaṃ bhedo “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti vacanato cutikhandhānaṃ vināso maraṇanti vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1016_7: visesato pana taṃ jīvitindriyassa vināsabhāvena kammaṭṭhānikānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhatīti “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_10: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti jīvitindriyappabandhassa vicchedo āyukkhayādivasena antaradhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_11: Samucchedamaraṇanti arahato santānassa sabbaso ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_12: Saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhātanti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ udayavayaparicchinnassa pavattikhaṇassa bhaṅgo nirodhoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_13: Khaṇikamaraṇanti yathāvuttakhaṇavantaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe labbhamānaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_15: tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ nissāya matavohāro sammutimaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1016_16: Na taṃ idha adhippetanti taṃ samucchedakhaṇikasammutimaraṇaṃ idha maraṇānussatiyaṃ nādhippetaṃ abāhullato,
anya-e0103n0:1018_4: uttarakurukādīnaṃ viya āhārasampattiyā ca abhāvena. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:1018_8: ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ vassasatamattaparimāṇassa viya āyuno khayavasenāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1018_9: Evaṃ hi anāgatepi paramāyuno saṅgaho kato hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1018_10: atīte pana gatisampattiyā viya kālāhārādisampattiyā bhāvena anekavassasahassa parimāṇopi āyu ahosi.
anya-e0103n0:1018_11: Ayañca vibhāgo vattamānassa antarakappassa vasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1018_15: tatthāpi puññakkhayamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ ubhayakkhayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇa”nti vuttappabhedaṃ maraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1019_5: Tattha ayoniso pavattayatoti anupāyena satiṃ, saṃvegaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1019_10: Yo hi “maraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ jātassa ekantika”nti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sarati,
anya-e0103n0:1019_13: Tasmāti yasmā ayoniso manasikāraṃ pavattayato ete dosā, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:1020_1: Vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānatoti ghātakassa viya pati pati upaṭṭhānato āsannabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1020_3: Upasaṃharaṇatoti paresaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetvā attano maraṇassa upanayanato.
anya-e0103n0:1021_1: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “vadhakassa viya paccupaṭṭhānato”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivaranto “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1021_4: Jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti “yathā hi ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ uggacchantaṃ paṃsuvirahitaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1021_5: evaṃ sattā nibbattantā jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontī”ti ettakena upamā.
anya-e0103n0:1021_7: sattā pana kathañcipi jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontīti khaṇikamaraṇaṃ tāva upamābhāvena dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1021_8: Atha vā yadime sattā jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1021_13: Hārahārinīti pavāhe patitassa tiṇapaṇṇādikassa ativiya haraṇasīlā.
anya-e0103n0:1021_15: Vattatevāti pavāhavasena vattati eva na tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n0:1022_6: Yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti rattiggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1022_11: Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatīti so evaṃ gacchanto khaṇamattampi na nivattati,
anya-e0103n0:1023_1: Pāto āporasānugatabandhanānanti purimadivase divā sūriyasantāpena anto anupavisitvā puna rattiyaṃ bandhanamūlaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1024_8: Papatatoti papatanato bhayaṃ sāmikānaṃ rukkhe ṭhatvā kamme viniyuñjitukāmānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1024_11: Mā maṃ amma nivāraya pabbajjāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1025_0: Koci mittamukhasatturandhagavesī saha vattamānopi na haneyya,
anya-e0103n0:1025_1: ayaṃ pana ekaṃsena hanatiyevāti dassetuṃ “sahajātiyā āgatato”ti vatvā “jīvitaharaṇato cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1028_3: Nabhaṃ āhaccāti vipulattā eva ākāsaṃ abhivihacca sabbadisāsu pharitvā.
anya-e0103n0:1028_7: Kulena vā rūpena vā sīlena vā sutena vā saddhādīhi vā seṭṭhoti sambhāvanāya khattiyādīsu na kañci parivajjeti.
anya-e0103n0:1028_8: Tehi eva nihīnoti avamaññamānāya suddādīsu na kañci parivajjeti.
anya-e0103n0:1028_10: Daṇḍādiupāyā ca tattha avisayā evāti dassetuṃ “na tattha hatthīnaṃ bhūmī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1029_1: Parehi saddhiṃ attano upasaṃharaṇatoti parehi matehi saddhiṃ “tepi nāma matā,
anya-e0103n0:1029_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisā”ti attano maraṇassa upanayanato.
anya-e0103n0:1029_8: Cānuro yo baladevena nibbuddhaṃ katvā mārito.
anya-e0103n0:1030_0: Saha iddhīhīti vejayantakampananandopanandadamanādīsu diṭṭhānubhāvāhi attano iddhīhi saddhiṃ maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0103n0:1031_0: Kalaṃ nagghanti soḷasinti soḷasannaṃ pūraṇabhāgaṃ na agghanti.
anya-e0103n0:1031_2: āyasmato therassa sāriputtassa paññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ soḷasadhā gahetvā laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1031_3: kalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ sattānaṃ paññā na agghantīti.
anya-e0103n0:1032_0: Sabbassāpi saṃkilesapakkhassa samugghāto ñāyena āraddhavīriyassa hotīti āha “ñāṇavīriyabalenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1032_1: Sammādiṭṭhisammāvāyāmesu hi siddhesu aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo siddhova hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1032_3: Paratoghosena vinā sayameva bhūtā paṭividdhākuppāti sayambhuno.
anya-e0103n0:1033_0: Hatthagatasuvaṇṇavalayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrassa katthaci asattatāti evamādikaṃ taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgamma.
anya-e0103n0:1033_6: khaggamigasiṅgaṃ vā samūpamā yesaṃ te khaggasiṅgasamūpamā.
anya-e0103n0:1034_1: vicitro acchariyabbhuto rūpakāyo etassāti asīti…pe… rūpakāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1034_2: Saha vāsanāya sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā sabbākāraparisuddhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaratanehi samiddho dhammakāyo etassāti sabbākāra…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1036_0: Maraṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ etassāti maraṇasāmañño, tassa bhāvo maraṇasāmaññatā, tāya.
anya-e0103n0:1037_0: 172. Kimikulānanti kimisamūhānaṃ, kimijātīnaṃ vā. Jīyantīti jaraṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n0:1038_2: So mamassa antarāyoti sā yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva,
anya-e0103n0:1038_3: atha kho mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa antarāyo assa bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n0:1038_5: Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakā maraṇakāle sandhibandhanacchedanakavātā satthakavātā.
anya-e0103n0:1039_8: paviṭṭhe vā anikkhamanteti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1039_12: Atisītena abhibhūtassa kāyassa vipajjanaṃ mahiṃsaraṭṭhādīsu himapātakālena dīpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1039_13: Tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n0:1039_14: Atiuṇhena abhibhūtassa vipajjanaṃ marukantāre uṇhābhitattāya pacchiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1039_18: Pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ pakopena sarīrassa vikārāpatti parato dhātukammaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ āgamissati.
anya-e0103n0:1041_0: Ito paranti ettha paranti paraṃ aññaṃ kālanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1041_3: Tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvanassa abhāvato “vavatthānābhāvato”ti vattuṃ na sakkāti.
anya-e0103n0:1041_15: Yantayuttagoṇo viyāti yathā yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati,
anya-e0103n0:1042_1: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato upari “dasa vā vassāni,
anya-e0103n0:1042_2: vīsati vā”tiādinā dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ apāpuṇanto appakaṃ vā jīvatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1045_1: tiṇagge ussāvabindu sūriye uggacchante khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1045_6: Balavā puriso jivhagge kheḷapiṇḍaṃ saṃyūhitvā akasireneva vameyya.
anya-e0103n0:1045_7: Divasaṃ santatte ayokaṭāhe maṃsapesi pakkhittā khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1045_9: Gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati,
anya-e0103n0:1045_13: govajjhūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bahupāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1047_2: Bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti bahuṃ vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n0:1047_4: Ekaṃ piṇḍapātanti ekaṃ divasaṃ yāpanappahonakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1048_8: Tasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā lahusaṃ ittaranti dassento “paramatthato”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1049_2: cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu,
anya-e0103n0:1049_4: katūpāsanānaṃ catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti. Yathā ca,
anya-e0103n0:1049_12: yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ purato dhāvanti,
anya-e0103n0:1050_1: Tatra hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
anya-e0103n0:1050_2: pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi parittako rūpajīvitindriyassa so khaṇo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1050_10: Ekacittappavattimattoyeva ekassa cittassa pavattimatteneva sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇassa paricchinnattā.
anya-e0103n0:1050_14: Tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatteti yena vattamānacittakkhaṇena “jīvatī”ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1050_15: tasmiṃ citte nirodhaṃ bhaṅgaṃ pattamatte taṃsamaṅgī satto niruddho matoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1050_17: Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanaṃ nāma cittakkhaṇavasenevāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1051_2: Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1051_7: Lahuso vattati khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
anya-e0103n0:1052_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ “niruddhā”ti vattabbā ye khandhā.
anya-e0103n0:1052_1: Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā.
anya-e0103n0:1052_2: Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n0:1052_3: Gatā appaṭisandhikā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā.
anya-e0103n0:1053_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti ajāto nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1053_1: Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1053_2: Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato
anya-e0103n0:1053_4: Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yā taṃ taṃ dharantaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati,
anya-e0103n0:1054_4: bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekattavasena maraṇārammaṇameva hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1054_6: Sabhāvadhammānaṃ bhedo sabhāvadhammagatiko evāti āha “sabhāvadhammattā pana ārammaṇassā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1054_10: Saṃvejanīyattāti saṃvegajananato mahābhūtesu mahāvikāratā viya gayhamānā maraṇaṃ anussariyamānaṃ uparūpari
anya-e0103n0:1054_11: ubbegameva āvahatīti tattha na bhāvanācittaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0103n0:1054_13: lokuttarajjhānaṃ ekaccāni arūpajjhānāni ca kathanti āha “lokuttarajjhānaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1054_16: evaṃbhūtassa visuddhibhāvanānukkamassa vasena lokuttarajjhānaṃ appanāppattameva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1054_17: Ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotīti aññesaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇakammaṭṭhānānaṃ viya cittassa samādhāne byāpāro natthi.
anya-e0103n0:1054_18: Yathāsamāhitena pana cittena ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattameva bhāvanāya kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1055_8: Abhayo asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti pageva maraṇasaññāya sūpaṭṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1057_9: Tathā hi sumedhatāpasena sarīraṃ jigucchantena vuttaṃ –
anya-e0103n0:1060_8: Satisampajaññāyāti sabbattha satiavippavāsāya ca sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññāya ca.
anya-e0103n0:1060_19: Anekehi ākārehi tesu tesu suttantesu pasaṃsitvā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1060_22: Tattha hi “kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave”tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āgatā.
anya-e0103n0:1060_26: kena ca pakārena punappunaṃ katā ānāpānajjhānādīnaṃ nipphattiyā mahapphalā,
anya-e0103n0:1061_1: sammasanavāro pana tattha sātisayoti dhātumanasikārapabbampi “vipassanāvasena vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1061_2: “Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti tattha tattha asubhāniccatādīhi saddhiṃ kāye ādīnavassa
anya-e0103n0:1061_8: taṃ idha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgaṇhitvā desanā āgatāti dassento “matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1061_11: kāye vā gatā sati kāyagatāsatīti satisīsena idaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1062_4: tassa vā avayavesu sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ pādatalanti vuttaṃ “uddhaṃ pādatalā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1062_8: tacaparicchinnabahulatāya pana kāyassa tacaparicchinnatā hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1062_9: Taco pariyanto assāti tacapariyantoti etena pana vacanena kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito eva,
anya-e0103n0:1062_10: tappaṭibaddhā ca kesādayo tadanupaviṭṭhamūlā tacapariyantāva hontīti dvattiṃsākārasamūho sabbopi kāyo tacapariyanto vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1063_5: saddaṃ vaṇṇantehipi asucisamudāyabhāveneva icchitabboti dassento “asucisañcayato”ti vatvā puna naṃ niruttinayena dassetuṃ “kucchitāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1063_9: Yehi nānappakāraṃ asuci vutta”nti te kesādike dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttanti imamatthaṃ dīpento āha “ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1063_11: Evaṃ sambandhoti “atthi imasmiṃ kāye nakhā”tiādinā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu “atthi imasmiṃ kāye”ti padattayena sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1064_1: samantato vā pādatalakesamūlesu ca tacassa labbhanato.
anya-e0103n0:1066_1: Tesaṃ kira cattāro māse sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyamaggeneva koṭṭhāse upadhārentānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā dvattiṃsākārā vibhūtatarā hutvā khāyiṃsu,
anya-e0103n0:1066_3: te tasmiṃ nimitte jhānaṃ appetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dassanamaggaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
anya-e0103n0:1067_4: vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ, aṭṭhi, nhāru, maṃsaṃ, taco, dantā, nakhā, lomā,
anya-e0103n0:1067_5: kesāti evaṃ vakkapañcakādīsu anulomasajjhāyaṃ vatvā paṭilomasajjhāyo purimehi sambandho vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1067_7: purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti chapañcāhaṃ sajjhāyo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1069_4: Cirataraṃ suṭṭhu pavattanena paguṇabhūtā kammaṭṭhānatanti samāvajjitvā manasi karontassa ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n0:1069_5: yāva pariyosānā katthaci asajjamānā nirantarameva upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1069_6: tadanusārena tadatthopi vibhūtataro hutvā khāyatīti āha “vacasā sajjhāyo hi…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1070_0: Paṭikkūlasabhāvasallakkhaṇassa kassaci vaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena koṭṭhāsā vavatthānaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n0:1070_4: kassaci sabbaso paricchijjaggahaṇamukhenāti vaṇṇādito sallakkhaṇaṃ uggahakosallāvahaṃ vuttanti taṃ dassento
anya-e0103n0:1071_8: Saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti “kesā”ti vutte “akesā na hontī”ti ayamattho viññāyati.
anya-e0103n0:1071_10: na ca ghaṭādīsu pasaṅgopakaraṇeneva tesaṃ nivattitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1072_1: Tattheva visuṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā ca dhātuvibhaṅgo pakkusātisuttaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dhātuvibhaṅgapāḷi ca.
anya-e0103n0:1072_3: taṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya jhānāni kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇāni vibhattāni.
anya-e0103n0:1072_7: Kāyagatāsatisutte hi paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbaṃ gahetvā idha kāyagatāsatibhāvanā niddisīyati.
anya-e0103n0:1073_1: Na ekantarikāyāti ekantarikāyapi na manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1073_4: lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ na pāpuṇāti ekantarikāya manasi karontoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1074_2: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇātīti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā manasikāramattaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1074_3: Avibhūtaṃ pana hoti paṭikkūlākārassa suṭṭhu asallakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n0:1075_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchatīti paṭipāṭiyā sabbakoṭṭhāse manasi karotoyeva vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0103n0:1075_1: Te sātisayaṃ pāṭikkūlato manasi karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0103n0:1075_2: imassa pana ativiya dandhaṃ manasi karoto vibhūtato upaṭṭhānameva natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1076_0: Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeti “asuci paṭikkūla”nti kesādīsu pavattetabbaṃ asubhānupassanaṃ hitvā subhādivasena
anya-e0103n0:1076_2: Rūpādayo hi nīlādivasena puthusabhāvatāya puthuttārammaṇaṃ nāma,
anya-e0103n0:1076_5: So satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontena paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1077_4: Tassā ugghāṭitattā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhahante “paṭikkūla”nti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1077_10: Tena manussānaṃ udapāne nhānapivanādi viya yogāvacarassa pubbabhāge kesā lomāti paṇṇattivasena manasikāro.
anya-e0103n0:1077_11: Abhiṇhasañcārena manussānaṃ saññāṇena vinā udapāne kiccakaraṇaṃ viya yogāvacarassa manasikārabalena paṇṇattiṃ
anya-e0103n0:1077_14: pākaṭo hotīti “kesā lomā”tiādinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kesādipaññattiyā saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvo pubbabhāge pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1077_16: Paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlākāreyeva bhāvanācittaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1078_3: Pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ tantianusārena ādito kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1078_4: Tathā hissa manasā sajjhāyo viya manasikāro te te koṭṭhāse āmaṭṭhamatte katvā gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1078_6: Yadā pana ne lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena suṭṭhu upadhārento manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n0:1078_13: tesampi dvinnaṃ eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati tāva.
anya-e0103n0:1079_0: Ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe viya ekatthakatāya ukkuṭṭhiyā kamena sabbatālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantatālaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1079_1: āditālañca āgantvā tato tato tattha tattheva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1081_1: Kiṃ paccekaṃ koṭṭhāsesu hoti udāhu aññathāti vicāraṇāyaṃ āha “appanākoṭṭhāsato”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1083_11: etassa saṃvattanassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1083_19: Na ca pabhaṅgūti kammaniyabhāvūpagamanena na ca pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ suddhantaṃ viya suvaṇṇaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1084_2: Tañcāti taṃ piḷandhanavikatisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ assa suvaṇṇakārassa anubhoti pahoti sādheti.
anya-e0103n0:1084_3: Assa vā suvaṇṇassa atthaṃ suvaṇṇakāro anubhoti pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n0:1085_0: Abhiññāya iddhividhādiñāṇena sacchikaraṇīyassa iddhividhapaccanubhavanādikassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa.
anya-e0103n0:1085_5: Sakkhi ca so bhabbo cāti vā sakkhibhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1085_10: Sati sati āyataneti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pubbahetuādike kāraṇe sati.
anya-e0103n0:1086_2: Niggaṇhātīti uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1086_3: Paggaṇhātīti līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1086_4: Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattaṃ cittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti,
anya-e0103n0:1086_6: Yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati,
anya-e0103n0:1086_7: tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti.
anya-e0103n0:1086_8: Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvīthiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1086_9: tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu kañci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakova hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1086_10: Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n0:1087_0: Suggahitaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ uggahakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ pariyāpuṇanādinā supariggahitaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1087_1: Suṭṭhu vavatthapetvāti manasikārakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ sammadeva sallakkhaṇavasena upadhāretvā.
anya-e0103n0:1087_3: Punappunaṃ parivattetvāti kammaṭṭhānatantiṃ paguṇabhāvaṃ pāpento bhiyyo bhiyyo vācāya,
anya-e0103n0:1087_5: Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedo araññassa vā gahanabhūto padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1087_6: evaṃ kammaṭṭhānatantiyā atthato dubbinibhedo gahanabhūto ca padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1088_2: Edisena payojanena luñcanampi anavajjanti dassetuṃ “luñcitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1088_8: itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1093_2: Nakhā tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1093_3: Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dve nakhā ekato natthī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1096_0: Anulomena paṭilomena cāti ettha aṃsapadesato paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhipadesena otaraṇaṃ anulomo,
anya-e0103n0:1096_1: maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya bāhuno purimabhāgena ārohanaṃ paṭilomo.
anya-e0103n0:1096_2: Teneva nayenāti dakkhiṇahatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena cāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1096_4: Antomukhacammādikoṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1096_6: Tañhi vuttanayena ñāṇena tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1096_7: Idha chavipi tacagatikā evāti “taco upari ākāsena paricchinno”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1097_3: Tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1097_5: Paṇhikamaṃsādithūlānaṃ sakalasarīrassa kisānaṃ yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchāditattā vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinna”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1098_0: 189. Jālākāro kañcuko jālakañcuko. Visuṃ vavatthitabhāveneva nhārū tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
anya-e0103n0:1099_1: Dantānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīnī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1099_5: Evaṃ timattānīti evaṃ mattasaddehi ānisadaṭṭhiādīni idha avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1099_6: Evañca katvā “atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussaya”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1100_0: Kīḷāgoḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni.
anya-e0103n0:1100_2: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1100_3: Tena ūruṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ yaṃ kaṭiṭṭhino,
anya-e0103n0:1101_3: tasmiṃ takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapitagoḷakā vaṭṭanā nāma,
anya-e0103n0:1104_3: Bhavati hi kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇavohāro yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1104_5: tampi lohitagatikameva hutvā tiṭṭhatīti “yaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1108_1: Papphāsamaṃsanti yathāṭhāne eva lambitvā thokaṃ parivattakamaṃsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1110_2: Tesaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ antaguṇaṃ nāmāti dassento āha “antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1110_3: Kuddālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ antabhoge agaḷante ekato ābandhitvā, kiṃ viya?
anya-e0103n0:1113_1: Heṭṭhānābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antareti purimabhāgavasena nābhiyā heṭṭhāpadesassa pacchimabhāgavasena heṭṭhimapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe.
anya-e0103n0:1115_0: 204. Pūtibhāvaṃ āpannaṃ kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ pūtikukkuṭaṇḍaṃ. Uddeko pittādīhi vinā kevalo uddhaṅgamavāto.
anya-e0103n0:1117_1: Vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇeneva temeti,
anya-e0103n0:1117_2: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1118_4: tiriyañca sedaṃ visamaṃ paggharatīti dassetuṃ visamacchinna-
anya-e0103n0:1119_3: Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “visabhāgāhāra”ntveva vuttaṃ tadā pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.
anya-e0103n0:1120_1: “Nhānakāle”ti idaṃ udakassa upari sinehassa sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1121_3: Hadayaṃ āgilāyatīti visabhāgāhārādiṃ paṭicca hadayappadeso vivattati.
anya-e0103n0:1122_3: Tālumatthakavivarena otaritvāti matthakavivarato āgantvā tālumatthakena otaritvā.
anya-e0103n0:1123_1: Telaṃ viya sakaṭassa nābhiakkhasīsānaṃ aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā.
anya-e0103n0:1124_1: Samūlakūlamāsaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ avassāvetvā gahitayūso māsakhāro.
anya-e0103n0:1124_4: Yassa pana āraggamattampi udakassa pavisanamukhaṃ natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1125_2: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ manasikārakosallapaṭipattimpi nigamanavasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “anupubbato”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1125_3: Tattha paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāneti kesādipaṇṇattisamatikkamavasena pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne.
anya-e0103n0:1125_9: Te dhammāti vaṇṇādivasena vavatthāpitā paṭikkūlākārato upaṭṭhitā koṭṭhāsadhammā.
anya-e0103n0:1126_5: Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesūti yathā attano kāye,
anya-e0103n0:1126_6: evaṃ paresampi kāye sabbesu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlavasena vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhitesūti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1126_7: Ayamettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhanasadiso yogino bhāvanāviseso dassito.
anya-e0103n0:1127_2: Punappunaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena attano kāye kesādike “paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā”ti abhiṇhaso manasikāraṃ
anya-e0103n0:1127_3: pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamathāni visadāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1127_4: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ balappattehi sattahi saddhammehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti.
anya-e0103n0:1127_5: Tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi.
anya-e0103n0:1127_7: so taṃyeva nimittaṃ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n0:1128_0: Yadi panetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ aviññāṇakāsubhakammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhānavasena sijjhati,
anya-e0103n0:1128_2: Nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccamettha sātisayanti āha “satibalena ijjhanato”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1129_2: kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ sahati abhibhavatīti aratiratisaho sarīrasabhāvacintanena anabhiratiyā pahīnattā.
anya-e0103n0:1129_3: Tathā koṭṭhāsabhāvanāya attasinehassa parikkhīṇattā bhayabheravaṃ sahati,
anya-e0103n0:1129_7: Imaṃ pana koṭṭhāsabhāvanamanuyuttassa na kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānamattameva,
anya-e0103n0:1131_1: Yaṃ taṃ evaṃ pasaṃsitvā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1131_2: Tattha yasmā “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādikāya pucchāpāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanāpāḷiyāpi attho vibhāvitoyeva hoti bhedābhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1131_3: tasmā taṃ laṅghitvā “kathaṃ bhāvito cā”tiādinā ārabhati.
anya-e0103n0:1131_4: Tattha hi ito pasaṃsābhāvo “ayampi kho”ti vacanañca viseso.
anya-e0103n0:1131_7: Tañhi sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati,
anya-e0103n0:1131_8: santo kirāyaṃ samādhi paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucayo
anya-e0103n0:1131_10: “Ayampi kho”ti padassa ye ime mayā nibbānamahāsarassa otaraṇatitthabhūtā kasiṇajjhānaasubhajjhānādayo desitā,
anya-e0103n0:1131_12: ayampi khoti bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1131_13: paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena evamāhāti sambandhamukhena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1132_0: Soḷasavatthukanti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1132_1: Sabbākāraparipūroti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā padattho piṇḍattho upamā codanā parihāro payojananti evamādīhi sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇo.
anya-e0103n0:1133_3: Sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1133_5: Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti etthāpi “ānāpānassatisamādhī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1133_7: Bahulīkato ānāpānassatisamādhīti tathāpuṭṭhadhammanidassananti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
anya-e0103n0:1133_8: Tathā santabhāvādayopi tassa yehi bhāvanābahulīkārehi siddhā,
anya-e0103n0:1134_2: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā vuccatīti
anya-e0103n0:1134_3: tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1134_4: Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti bhāvito,
anya-e0103n0:1134_12: Purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato,
anya-e0103n0:1134_14: Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa upanissayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1134_23: “vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-
anya-e0103n0:1135_5: Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1135_11: Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattaṃ ārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n0:1135_12: Sante hi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1135_15: Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1136_5: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1136_9: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantamappaṇītaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n0:1136_10: Upacārena vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1136_22: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1136_25: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “appitappitakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1136_32: taṃ pana jhānakattukassa idhādhippetattā pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha “vikkhambhetī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1136_34: Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1137_0: Nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti,
anya-e0103n0:1137_1: atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti?
