anya-e0103n0:1137_8: Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1137_9: Atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato ayameva samādhi “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1137_10: Yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa uṭṭhitassa dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ rajojallassa vūpasamo. Tenāha –
anya-e0103n0:1137_14: Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1137_16: Imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti.
anya-e0103n0:1137_17: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuddhippatto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1138_0: Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati.
anya-e0103n0:1138_1: Heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”ti āha,
anya-e0103n0:1139_1: Tamatthanti taṃ “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1139_10: imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1139_13: Bāhirakā hi jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti.
anya-e0103n0:1139_23: Parappavādāti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.
anya-e0103n0:1140_2: Yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati,
anya-e0103n0:1142_2: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1144_0: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekiko viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
anya-e0103n0:1145_3: Rukkhasamīpanti “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
anya-e0103n0:1145_5: ettāvatā rukkhamūlanti vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1145_6: Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1146_3: Tathā hi gimhakāle ca araññaṃ anukūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1146_27: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅghati,
anya-e0103n0:1146_28: tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0103n0:1146_32: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1146_35: Tasmā pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
anya-e0103n0:1147_1: Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva assasati nāssa kāci sativirahitā assāsappavatti hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1147_2: Sato passasatīti etthāpi satova passasatīti eva-
anya-e0103n0:1147_7: Yadi “satova assasati sato passasatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1147_12: Tasmā ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya sabbattha “satokāri”cceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1148_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghaassāsavasena vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso.
anya-e0103n0:1148_2: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmacittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato.
anya-e0103n0:1148_3: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1148_4: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenāti yathāvuttāya satiyā,
anya-e0103n0:1148_8: asammohato vā pajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitā eva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1148_11: tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī nāma hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1148_12: Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa vasena.
anya-e0103n0:1148_18: Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso,
anya-e0103n0:1149_0: “Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1149_1: “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti –
anya-e0103n0:1151_1: tasmā pavattikkamena assāso paṭhamaṃ vuttoti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1151_2: Tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyatīti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati.
anya-e0103n0:1151_3: Tena kira sampatijāto bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n0:1151_5: Keci “evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti adhippāyo”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1152_4: Tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1152_11: sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1152_15: Dīghaṃ assasantīti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1152_17: Sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti ca passasanti cāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1153_0: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā,
anya-e0103n0:1153_1: te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti,
anya-e0103n0:1153_3: ekacco tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0103n0:1153_4: Keci pana “assasatipi passasatipīti ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha”nti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1154_0: Kāmaṃ cettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1154_2: tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca “tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1154_3: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato,
anya-e0103n0:1154_5: Ekenākārenāti dīghaṃ assāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena,
anya-e0103n0:1155_0: “Dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso;
anya-e0103n0:1156_0: Cattāro vaṇṇā vattanti, nāsikagge va bhikkhuno”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1157_0: Ayaṃ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ “kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1158_2: Tattha kathaṃ pajānātīti pajānanavidhiṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchati.
anya-e0103n0:1158_10: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:1158_11: Chandavasenāti tathāpavattachandassa vasena savisesaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa.
anya-e0103n0:1158_13: Bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n0:1158_14: Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya,
anya-e0103n0:1158_15: kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā taruṇapīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n0:1158_16: Cittaṃ vivattatīti anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci.
anya-e0103n0:1158_17: Bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
anya-e0103n0:1158_18: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1159_0: Imehi navahi ākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā.
anya-e0103n0:1159_1: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyoti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1159_3: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0103n0:1159_7: cittaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1159_9: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0103n0:1159_10: Ettha ca “kāyo upaṭṭhāna”nti iminā itarakāyassāpi saṅgaho hoti yathāvuttasammasanacārassāpi idha icchitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1159_11: No satīti so kāyo sati nāma na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1159_17: Anupassatīti jhānasampayuttañāṇena ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati.
anya-e0103n0:1159_18: Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1160_2: tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve kāye niccādibhāvānupassanā,
anya-e0103n0:1160_4: Atha vā kāye “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci abhāvato tādisaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1160_6: tāya kāyānupassanāya sampayuttā satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1161_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ yathādassite “kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto”tiādinā āgate pāḷinaye.
anya-e0103n0:1163_3: Nāsikagge va bhikkhunoti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “nāsikagge vā”ti, vā-
anya-e0103n0:1164_1: Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo jānanasīlo,
anya-e0103n0:1164_2: tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
anya-e0103n0:1164_3: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedamānoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1164_5: ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ paṭi-
anya-e0103n0:1164_9: Tattha yathā samānepi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā,
anya-e0103n0:1164_10: evaṃ tamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya “sakalassā”tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1164_13: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanaṃ ñāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1164_14: Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse pavatteti,
anya-e0103n0:1164_16: tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1164_19: ñāṇassa ca vasena tathā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa pavattattā.
anya-e0103n0:1164_22: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1165_7: Tāya satiyāti yā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
anya-e0103n0:1165_8: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro,
anya-e0103n0:1166_2: Tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1166_3: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo kato.
anya-e0103n0:1166_4: Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1166_5: tasmā sātisayenettha pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1167_1: So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyappaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1167_2: Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā,
anya-e0103n0:1167_5: Passambhentotiādīsu pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1167_7: tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1167_11: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho,
anya-e0103n0:1167_16: sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1167_18: Santā hontīti cittaṃ tāvaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1167_21: kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n0:1168_4: Tasseva atthassa manasi karaṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro.
anya-e0103n0:1170_1: Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti
anya-e0103n0:1170_2: katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1170_4: Atha vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino kāyakilamathacittūpaghātādivasena,
anya-e0103n0:1170_5: vitakkādisaṅkhobhena ca sapariphandatāya cittappavattiyā dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1170_6: Atisukhumoti aññattha labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo.
anya-e0103n0:1171_1: ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya majjhimabhāṇakā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti.
anya-e0103n0:1171_2: Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā,
anya-e0103n0:1171_5: Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā.
anya-e0103n0:1171_7: Yasmā te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:1171_8: “Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatī”ti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1171_9: Na hi te eva oḷārikā assāsādayo sukhumā honti.
anya-e0103n0:1172_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1172_6: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā samathanaye vuttena nayena “apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro
anya-e0103n0:1172_7: mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1174_2: taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1174_3: yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukamyatāya pucchitvā kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato,
anya-e0103n0:1174_11: tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā.
anya-e0103n0:1175_10: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento.
anya-e0103n0:1175_11: Tasmiṃ hi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
anya-e0103n0:1176_0: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo na honti,
anya-e0103n0:1176_3: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati.
anya-e0103n0:1176_4: Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte
anya-e0103n0:1176_5: sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
anya-e0103n0:1176_6: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1177_6: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne.
anya-e0103n0:1177_9: assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā uppādanā pavattanā na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1177_11: Assāsapassāsānañca bhāvanāti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā ca na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1177_13: Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1177_15: Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1177_16: Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇadhammā sambhavanti.
anya-e0103n0:1177_17: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1177_18: Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1177_19: Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvūpanayanaṃ passambhananti adhippāyena codeti.
anya-e0103n0:1178_0: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā.
anya-e0103n0:1178_5: Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1178_6: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā ānāpānassatiyā,
anya-e0103n0:1179_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1179_18: saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenāpi cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:1179_19: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena
anya-e0103n0:1179_20: pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattateva.
anya-e0103n0:1179_21: Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte samādhānasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1180_1: Tattha yassa suttapadassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1180_2: taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1182_8: Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti,
anya-e0103n0:1182_9: tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1183_0: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato.
anya-e0103n0:1183_1: Tato eva ācariyampi na viheseti dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato.
anya-e0103n0:1184_1: Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā.
anya-e0103n0:1184_2: Phusanāti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa yathā appanā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1184_3: tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā.
anya-e0103n0:1184_4: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1184_5: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1184_7: Taṃ hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1184_8: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0103n0:1184_12: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vivaṭṭanā nāma maggo.
anya-e0103n0:1185_0: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1185_3: “Sikhāppattaṃ nu kho”ti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasi karontassa vasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1185_4: So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya.
anya-e0103n0:1185_6: taṃ gahetvā”ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1185_10: “Yo upaṭṭhātī”ti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1185_11: so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1185_12: Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1186_6: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1186_7: Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni.
anya-e0103n0:1187_0: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1187_1: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasi karonto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
anya-e0103n0:1187_3: Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragataṃ vātaṃ bahulaṃ manasi karontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya,
anya-e0103n0:1187_7: tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamannesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha “puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1189_1: Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1189_6: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva.
anya-e0103n0:1189_10: Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo majjhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1189_11: Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsasamaññāya tadavadhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1189_13: na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ sambhavo atthi.
anya-e0103n0:1191_0: Ādimajjhapariyosānavasenāti ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena na manasi kātabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1191_1: “Anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba”nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1191_4: anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena,
anya-e0103n0:1191_9: gaṇanā pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1191_12: Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1191_13: tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1191_14: Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1191_15: Tattha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento”ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1191_16: Tenāha “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1191_19: Satiyā anubandhantoti gaṇanāvīthiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto,
anya-e0103n0:1191_21: Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā appanā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1191_22: evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto.
anya-e0103n0:1191_23: Anubandhanāya cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1191_25: tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto”ti ca vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1191_27: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti,
anya-e0103n0:1191_28: sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1192_15: Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1193_0: 226. Teti nagarassa antobahigatā manussā, tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.
anya-e0103n0:1194_5: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. Ca-
anya-e0103n0:1194_8: Nupalabbhatīti na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho,
anya-e0103n0:1195_1: Ime tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso –
anya-e0103n0:1195_2: ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti,
anya-e0103n0:1195_3: tathāpi na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti,
anya-e0103n0:1195_5: Tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1195_6: padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0103n0:1195_7: nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0103n0:1196_1: Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā,
anya-e0103n0:1196_2: tathā ca sati kakacadantagati dubbiññeyyāti āha “same bhūmibhāge”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1196_6: Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1196_7: Tenāha “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1196_10: Na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1197_1: Upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā nāma,
anya-e0103n0:1197_5: Evamevāti yathāpi so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0103n0:1197_8: Nāsikagge mukhanimitteti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge itaro mukhaṃ dasanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
anya-e0103n0:1198_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1198_1: idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1198_2: Upakkilesā pahīyantīti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n0:1198_3: Vitakkā vūpasamantīti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n0:1198_4: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1198_5: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo payogo.
anya-e0103n0:1198_6: Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n0:1198_7: Anusayā byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti.
anya-e0103n0:1198_8: Ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1198_9: pahīnesu ca saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ “saṃyojanā pahīyanti anusayā byantī hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1198_10: Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1199_5: tatheva yena dīgharassapajānanādividhinā anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā,
anya-e0103n0:1199_6: tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā.
anya-e0103n0:1199_7: So bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti.
anya-e0103n0:1199_8: Yathā kiṃ abbhā muttova candimā abbhupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti.
anya-e0103n0:1201_3: vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1201_7: tasmā taṃ “appanā”ti dassento “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1201_8: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1201_9: laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hotī”ti ettako gantho parihīno.
anya-e0103n0:1202_3: Gattānisadakapparādīnaṃ sandhiṭṭhānesu valiṃ gaṇhāti tattha tattha valitaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:1202_4: Yasmā sāraddhakāyo garuko hotīti kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ sijjhamāno oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1202_6: Tattha kāyadarathe vūpasanteti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi lahuādibhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:1202_8: Svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena vinā natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1203_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1204_1: Uparūpari vibhūtānīti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0103n0:1205_1: “kassa natthī”ti puggalavasena vīmaṃsiyamānamatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ “antomātukucchiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1205_2: Tattha yathā udake nimuggassa puggalassa niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1205_11: rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1205_15: Nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti satiyā tattha tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thiratarasañjānanaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1205_17: Imamevāti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpananayena upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva.
anya-e0103n0:1205_24: bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse vīmaṃsitvā “ime te”ti upadhāretuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1205_25: sammadeva pajānituñca samatthāhi satipaññāhi virahitassāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1206_3: Sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti āha “garukabhāvana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1206_4: Uparūpari santasukhumabhāvappattito “balavatī suvisadā sūrā ca satipaññā ca icchitabbā”ti vatvā sukhumassa
anya-e0103n0:1206_5: nāma atthassa sādhanenāpi sukhumeneva bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1206_6: Idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento “tāhi ca panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1206_12: Satirasmiyā bandhitvāti vā vuttamevatthamāha “tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1206_13: Na hi upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:1208_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1208_6: Atthabyañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha “ekā vanarāji viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1208_9: Nānānusandhikaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ bahuvidhakammaṭṭhānamukhasuttantaṃ atthikehi sakkaccaṃ samupajīvitabbanti āha “sītacchāyo…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1209_2: Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:1209_3: Na ca upacāranti upacārampi na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n0:1210_0: Idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā “nimitta”ntiādikā gāthā paccānītā.
anya-e0103n0:1211_6: handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā visesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0103n0:1211_7: Visīdeyyāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa nimittampi na uppannaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1212_0: “Imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta”nti vutte kathaṃ saṅkocāpatti,
anya-e0103n0:1212_5: Pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1212_7: phusanañca vissajjetvā ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hotīti ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1213_7: Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā viya honti.
anya-e0103n0:1213_11: Sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati,
anya-e0103n0:1213_13: Ye pana “vibhāvayanti vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:1213_16: dhitisampannattā dhīro yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe karonto,
anya-e0103n0:1213_17: nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1213_18: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
anya-e0103n0:1214_4: Nimittassa rakkhaṇaṃ nāma tattha paṭiladdhassa upacārajhānassa rakkhaṇeneva hotīti āha “punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1215_6: Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1215_16: karajakāyaṃ pana vinā tesaṃ appavattanato “kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1216_1: Paccayaṃ pariyesatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā avijjādikaṃ paccayaṃ vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1216_2: Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti ādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati pajahati.
anya-e0103n0:1216_5: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikantīti ime obhāsādayo dasa.
anya-e0103n0:1216_6: Udayaṃ pahāyāti udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanato
anya-e0103n0:1216_7: bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ patvā ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya nibbidānupassanāya nibbindanto.
anya-e0103n0:1216_10: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyo virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1217_1: Visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1218_0: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanāsīlo,
anya-e0103n0:1218_1: tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
anya-e0103n0:1218_2: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno.
anya-e0103n0:1218_4: ggahaṇeneva pītiyā sakkaccaṃ viditabhāvo bodhito hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1218_5: yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1219_0: Tattha kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti pucchāvacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1219_1: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati.
anya-e0103n0:1219_3: “Paṭisaṃviditā”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1219_7: tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
anya-e0103n0:1219_9: Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito gahito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
anya-e0103n0:1219_10: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:1220_0: Kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1220_6: tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1221_7: dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1221_8: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
anya-e0103n0:1221_9: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1221_10: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti.
anya-e0103n0:1221_11: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1221_12: Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1221_13: Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1222_5: Tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1222_6: Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa.
anya-e0103n0:1222_8: Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa.
anya-e0103n0:1222_9: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
anya-e0103n0:1223_3: vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1223_15: Keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti,
anya-e0103n0:1223_16: taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n0:1224_0: Ettha ca “dīghaṃ assāsavasenā”tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1224_5: Kasmā panettha vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā,
anya-e0103n0:1224_7: Bhūmivibhāgādivasena vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1224_8: Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1225_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānīti “sukhapaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī”ti padāni pītipaṭisaṃvedipade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n0:1225_2: cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni,
anya-e0103n0:1225_3: cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā atthaṃ viññātuṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1225_11: “Imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle”tiādinā vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1226_0: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1226_3: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:1226_6: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu.
anya-e0103n0:1226_8: Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā,
anya-e0103n0:1226_10: idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ saññā vedanāva adhippetāti āha “saññāsampayuttā vedanā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1227_1: Cittapaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:1227_5: tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1227_6: Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
anya-e0103n0:1227_7: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā modayamāno.
anya-e0103n0:1228_0: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya odagyalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0103n0:1228_1: jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena ca paribrūhento haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ
anya-e0103n0:1228_3: Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
anya-e0103n0:1228_4: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1229_1: uddhaccapakkhañca anupagamma anonataṃ anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1229_2: samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1229_4: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenāti aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena.
anya-e0103n0:1229_6: Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti.
anya-e0103n0:1230_3: Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
anya-e0103n0:1230_4: tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccato passati,
anya-e0103n0:1230_7: dukkhassa ca anattakattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
anya-e0103n0:1230_11: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
anya-e0103n0:1230_15: Tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati,
anya-e0103n0:1230_19: So evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti,
anya-e0103n0:1230_22: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1230_30: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
anya-e0103n0:1230_31: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1230_32: Tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
anya-e0103n0:1230_34: Tena vuttaṃ “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento …pe…
anya-e0103n0:1230_35: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1231_2: Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1232_2: aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ panetaṃ aniccaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1232_5: kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1233_0: Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1233_3: atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha “aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:1233_6: Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahutvā sambhavo attalābho uppādo.
anya-e0103n0:1233_9: Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1233_14: Ekaṃsena ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo,
anya-e0103n0:1234_1: tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatāsamaññāti “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1235_4: Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1235_14: pade vuttanayānusārena “dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidisati,
anya-e0103n0:1235_15: tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1236_0: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n0:1236_1: Tathā sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1236_2: tanninnatāya vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n0:1237_0: Tadaṅgavasenāti ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati,
anya-e0103n0:1237_1: pariccajantī ca tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā,
anya-e0103n0:1237_6: Tenāha “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1238_4: Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatīti maggena kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā,
anya-e0103n0:1238_5: tammūlakā ca khandhā anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1238_8: Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā nibbānadassanato “anupassanā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1239_0: Soḷasavatthuvasena cāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasenāpi vuccamānasantabhāvādivasenāpīti samuccayattho ca- saddo.
anya-e0103n0:1240_4: Uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyeva ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1241_3: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti kāyānupassanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena tassā bhāvanāya pavattanato.
anya-e0103n0:1241_4: Satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya vinā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1242_5: Tasmāti tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāmabhave pavattanato.
anya-e0103n0:1242_10: Cuticittassa puratoti vā cuticittaṃ avadhibhāvena gahetvā tato oraṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvāti
anya-e0103n0:1242_11: evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatāva assāsapassāsānaṃ vuttā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1243_0: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā hontīti ānetvā sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1245_0: Candālokaṃ oloketvāti juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya gaganatalaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1245_3: kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1245_4: Lekhaṃ katvāti caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1248_2: Sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassāti dukkhadukkhādibhedaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ upasammati etthāti sabbadukkhūpasamoti saṅkhātabbassa.
anya-e0103n0:1249_0: “Paññattidhammā”tiādīsu asabhāvopi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyatīti dhammoti vuccatīti tato nivattento “dhammāti sabhāvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1249_4: Te hi attano sabhāvassa dhāraṇato dhammāti,
anya-e0103n0:1249_16: Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā mānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “tamāgamma…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1249_18: Tattha “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā maññanāvasena pavatto māno eva mānamado.
anya-e0103n0:1249_23: Madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano.
anya-e0103n0:1249_27: Kāmaguṇā eva āliyanti ettha sattāti kāmaguṇālayā.
anya-e0103n0:1250_0: Ye guṇe nimittaṃ katvā madanimmadanādināmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni,
anya-e0103n0:1250_1: te madanimmadanatādike yathāvutte nibbattitanibbānaguṇe eva gahetvā āha “madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasenā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1250_2: na pana madā nimmadīyanti etenāti evamādike.
anya-e0103n0:1250_8: Nibbānaṃ hi kenaci pariyāyena asantabhāvābhāvato ekaṃseneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1250_16: atisukhumasantasabhāvatāya ca anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya suṭṭhu duddasaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1250_18: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa jarābhāvoti ajaraṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1250_19: Tato eva jarādīhi apalokiyatāya thiraṭṭhena dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1251_4: ca bodhitā idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1251_5: tattha natthi etassa uppādanto vā vayanto vāti ananto,
anya-e0103n0:1251_21: Sacchikiriyaṃ muñcitvā na takkañāṇena avacaritabboti atakkāvacaro.
anya-e0103n0:1251_22: Buddhādīhi paṇḍiteheva veditabbato adhigantabbato paṇḍitavedanīyoti evamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1252_8: Sukhaṃ supatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ mettākathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n0:1258_1: aññaṃ adhigantukāmena aññattha ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā kimatthiyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1258_3: Tathā hi adosaniddese “metti mettāyanā mettāyitatta”nti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1258_5: Sā pana atthato adosappadhānā cattāro arūpakkhandhāti mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhākhanti siddhā eva hotīti āha “khanti adhigantabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1259_0: Khantī paramaṃ tapoti parāpakārasahanādikā titikkhalakkhaṇā khanti uttamaṃ tapo akattabbākaraṇakattabbakaraṇalakkhaṇāya sammāpaṭipattiyā mūlabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1259_1: Khantibalaṃ balānīkanti paramaṃ maṅgalabhūtā khanti eva balaṃ etassāti khantibalaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1259_3: Dosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya anīkabhūtena teneva ca khantibalena balānīkaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1259_4: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti attano paresañca anatthapaṭibāhano,
anya-e0103n0:1259_5: atthāvaho ca khantito uttari apassayo natthi.
anya-e0103n0:1260_7: Paṭhamanti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsantarupasaṃharaṇanayena vinā sabbapaṭhamaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1261_11: “appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acarī”tiādinā ca āghātavatthubhūto,
anya-e0103n0:1262_0: Idāni yathāvuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ dassento “appiyaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1262_1: Tattha appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti dosena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1262_3: na ca tassa piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā sijjhati.
anya-e0103n0:1262_4: Atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti rāgena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha atippiyasahāyassa gehassitapemaṭṭhānabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1262_6: Majjhattaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāhi majjhasabhāvaṃ neva piyaṃ nāppiyanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1262_7: Garuṭṭhāne piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati majjhatte sambhāvanīyapiyāyitabbatānaṃ abhāvā.
anya-e0103n0:1263_2: Bhittiyuddhamakāsīti sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāre gabbhe sayanapīṭhe nisīditvā mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena
anya-e0103n0:1263_3: uppannarāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya
anya-e0103n0:1264_0: Ādānanikkhepaparicchinne addhāpaccuppannabhūte dharamānatāya paccakkhato viya upalabbhamāne khandhappabandhe idha sattādiggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1264_2: Kasmā pana kālakate mettābhāvanā na ijjhatīti?
anya-e0103n0:1264_5: Yattha sati sambhave payogato hitūpasaṃhāro labbheyya,
anya-e0103n0:1264_7: Dukkhāpanayanamodappavattīsupi eseva nayoti karuṇābhāvanādīnampi kālakate anijjhanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1264_8: Aññattha paguṇamettājhāno ācariyassa kālakatabhāvaṃ ajānanto taṃ mettāya pharitukāmo “ācariyaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ ārabhatī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1264_12: so jīvati na jīvatī”ti jānāhīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1265_1: Attani bhāvanā nāma sakkhibhāvatthāti nānāvidhasukhānubandhaanavajjasukhaabyāsekasukhādi yaṃ attani upalabbhati,
anya-e0103n0:1265_2: taṃ nidassento tassa vattamānatāya āha “ahaṃ sukhito homī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1265_4: īdisassa puggalassa anokāsaṃ cittadukkhanti tadabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “niddukkhoti vā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1265_8: Sā panāyaṃ niddukkhatā verīnaṃ puggalānaṃ verasaññitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1265_10: anavajjakāyikasukhasamaṅgitāya ca hotīti dassento āha “avero abyāpajjo anīgho sukhī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1265_11: Attānaṃ pariharāmīti evaṃbhūto hutvā mama attabhāvaṃ pavattemi,
anya-e0103n0:1266_4: “Yaṃ vibhaṅge vutta”nti vatvā vibhaṅgadesanāya samānagatikaṃ suttapadaṃ āharanto “kathañca bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1267_3: Sakkhibhāvavasenāti ahaṃ viya sabbe sattā attano sukhakāmā,
anya-e0103n0:1267_4: tasmā tesu mayā attani viya sukhūpasaṃhāro kātabboti evaṃ tattha attānaṃ sakkhibhāve ṭhapanavasena.
anya-e0103n0:1267_6: Kasmā pana attani bhāvanā appanāvahā na hotīti?
anya-e0103n0:1267_8: Koṭṭhāsantare pana bhāvitabhāvanassa tatthāpi sīmasambhedo hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:1268_2: Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti sabbussāhena pariyesanto atisayena attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ katthaci disāya neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya.
anya-e0103n0:1268_3: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attato piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo.
anya-e0103n0:1269_1: attano ca piyatarabhāvaṃ nidassetvā tesu karuṇāyanaṃ vadatā bhagavatā sukhesitāya “attānaṃ sakkhibhāve
anya-e0103n0:1269_2: ṭhapetvā sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā”ti mettābhāvanāya nayadassanaṃ katamevāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1271_2: tādisaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa bhāvanaṃ ārabhanto yogī yuttappattakārī,
anya-e0103n0:1271_4: tena pana yoginā tāvatā santoso na kātabboti.
anya-e0103n0:1271_7: attā piyo majjhatto verīti vibhāgākaraṇanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1271_11: garuṭṭhānīye paṭiladdhaṃ mettāmanasikāraṃ atippiyasahāyake upasaṃharitabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1271_12: Sukhūpasaṃhārakatassa taṃ hoti pageva paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1271_13: Atippiyasahāyakato anantaraṃ majjhatte mettā bhāvetabbā majjhattaṃ piyagaruṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ sukarabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1271_15: Paguṇamanasikārādhigamato paṭṭhāya hissa sopi piyaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n0:1271_16: Majjhattato verīpuggaleti majjhattapuggale mettāyantena tattha paguṇamanasikārādhigamena piyabhāvaṃ upasaṃharitvā
anya-e0103n0:1271_17: tadanantaraṃ verīpuggalaṃ bhāvanāya majjhatte ṭhapetvā tato majjhattato piyabhāvūpasaṃhārena verīpuggale
anya-e0103n0:1271_20: Ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvāti piyagaruṭṭhānīyo, atippiyo,
anya-e0103n0:1271_22: verīti catūsu puggalakoṭṭhāsesu paṭhamaṃ tāva piyagaruṭṭhānīye mettābhāvanaṃ adhigantvā vasībhāvappattiyā
anya-e0103n0:1271_23: tathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ koṭṭhāsantarūpasaṃhāratthaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ atippiyasahāye atippiyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1271_24: vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvamatte cittaṃ ṭhapentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1271_25: tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ majjhatte udāsinabhāvaṃ vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1271_26: puna tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ verimhi verīsaññaṃ vikkhambhetvā majjhattabhāvūpaṭṭhapanamukhena
anya-e0103n0:1272_0: Verīpuggalo vā natthi kammabalena vā etarahi payogasampattiyā vā sabbaso anatthakarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1272_2: Tādiso hi sabbasaho parāparādhaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññati.
anya-e0103n0:1272_3: Tena vuttaṃ “anatthaṃ karontepi pare verīsaññāva nuppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1273_1: Purimapuggalesūti piyādīsu jhānassa ārammaṇabhūtesu purimesu puggalesu.
anya-e0103n0:1273_2: Mettaṃ samāpajjitvāti paṭighaṃ vikkhambhetvā uppāditaṃ mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā.
anya-e0103n0:1273_3: Mettāyantena paṭighaṃ paṭivinodetabbanti ettha keci pana “upacārajjhānaṃ sampādetvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:1273_4: tesaṃ upacārajjhānato vuṭṭhānampi icchitabbaṃ siyā “vuṭṭhahitvā”ti vuttattā.
anya-e0103n0:1273_5: Pubbe tasmiṃ puggale asatiyā amanasikārena paṭighaṃ anuppādentassa sādhāraṇato taṃ vikkhambhetvā jhānassa uppādanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1273_7: Idāni pana taṃ anussarantassapi manasi karontassapi yathā paṭighaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:1273_8: taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ “taṃ puggalaṃ mettāyantena paṭighaṃ vinodetabba”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1274_0: Anusāratoti anugamanato, paccavekkhaṇatoti attho. Ghaṭitabbanti vāyamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1275_0: Tañca kho ghaṭanaṃ vāyamanaṃ. Iminā idāni vakkhamānena ākārena.
anya-e0103n0:1276_0: Ubhato dvīsu ṭhānesu daṇḍo etassāti ubhatodaṇḍakaṃ, tena.
anya-e0103n0:1276_12: Sārambhādikassa kilesānubandhassa vatthubhāvato kodhassa sāvajjataṃ ñatvāpi kujjhanato sace kodhe anavajjasaññī
anya-e0103n0:1277_7: Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena virūpo eva hoti etarahi,
anya-e0103n0:1277_9: Kodhābhibhavassa ekantikamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ “dubbaṇṇo vā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna “kodhābhibhūto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1278_3: Majjhe gūthagatanti vemajjhaṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa vā uhadena gūthena makkhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1278_7: Imanti “so ca hoti abhijjhālū”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sandhāya satthā vadati,
anya-e0103n0:1279_0: So dāni tvantiādi yathāvuttehi suttapadehi attano ovadanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1280_1: Yo yo dhammoti kāyasamācārādīsu yo yo sucaritadhammo.
anya-e0103n0:1282_1: Paṭisanthārakusaloti yathā parehi chiddaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1282_7: Pubbabhāsīti yena kenaci samāgato paṭisanthāravasena paṭhamaṃyeva ābhāsanasīlo.
anya-e0103n0:1282_9: Sarabhāṇaṃ pana karonto parimaṇḍalehi paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi ca abyākulehi dhammakathaṃ katheti.
anya-e0103n0:1284_1: evarūpo puggalo nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjanto bahukālaṃ tattheva saṃsaratīti dassetuṃ “aṭṭhamahānirayasoḷasaussadanirayaparipūrako
anya-e0103n0:1284_4: Avīcimahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro cattāro katvā kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā.
anya-e0103n0:1284_7: tattha paṭigho anokāsovāti āha “kāruññampi paṭicca āghāto vūpasammatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1285_0: Imassa ca atthassāti “yo yo dhammo”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa.
anya-e0103n0:1286_2: so tassa vasena “attano visaye”ti vutto bhikkhuno kāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1286_11: Kodho hi uppajjamānova pāṇātipātādivasena hirottappādīni ucchindati.
anya-e0103n0:1287_5: Dukkhaṃ tassa ca nāmāti dukkhañca nāma tassa aparādhakassa.
anya-e0103n0:1288_1: sattu pana tassa vasavattitāya dāsasadisoti aṭṭhānaṃ paccāpakiriyāya.
anya-e0103n0:1288_3: Khaṇikattāti udayavayaparicchinno attano pavattikālasaṅkhāto khaṇo etesaṃ atthīti khaṇikā,
anya-e0103n0:1288_5: Kassa dānīdha kujjhasīti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādho kato,
anya-e0103n0:1288_7: Idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhantīti kassa tvaṃ idha kujjhasi.
anya-e0103n0:1288_8: Na hi yuttaṃ anaparādhesu kujjhananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1288_9: Taṃ vinā kassa so kareti yo puggalo yassa dukkhaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:1288_10: taṃ dukkhakiriyāya visayabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vinā kassa nāma so dukkhakārako dukkhaṃ kare kareyya.
anya-e0103n0:1288_11: Sayampi dukkhahetu tvamitīti evaṃ sayampi tvaṃ etassa dukkhassa hetu,
anya-e0103n0:1288_12: evaṃ samāne tassa tuyhañca tassa dukkhassa hetubhāve kiṃ kāraṇā tassa kujjhasi na tuyhanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1289_1: Paralokepi anugāmibhāvato kammaṃyeva sakaṃ santakaṃ etesanti kammassakā,
anya-e0103n0:1289_4: nisedhanañca bhāvino kammassāti āha “yaṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1289_8: so tassa kammassa phalanissandena “neva sammāsambodhi”ntiādinā byatirekato vuccamānamevatthaṃ joteti.
anya-e0103n0:1290_0: 247. Satthu pubbacariyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā, satthu gāravenāpi paṭighaṃ vūpasameyyāti.
anya-e0103n0:1291_0: Bodhisattopi samāno nanu te satthā cittaṃ nappadūsesi,
anya-e0103n0:1291_2: Deviyā paduṭṭhenāti deviyā saddhiṃ padubbhinā micchācāravasena aparaddhena.
anya-e0103n0:1291_6: Purisakāraṃ katvāti āvāṭato nikkhamanatthāya bāhubalena purisakāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1292_0: Āsīsethevāti yathādhippete atthe ñāyato anavajjato āsaṃ kareyya.
anya-e0103n0:1292_1: Na nibbindeyyāti “evaṃ kicchāpannassa me kuto sotthibhāvo”ti na nibbindeyya.
anya-e0103n0:1292_4: Yathā icchinti yena pakārena kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā rajje patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ icchiṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1293_0: Kāsiraññāti kalābunā kāsirājena. Sakaṇṭakāhīti ayakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭakāhi.
anya-e0103n0:1295_0: Cittapariggaṇhanakāloti visevanaṃ kātuṃ adatvā cittassa sammadeva damanakālo.
anya-e0103n0:1296_4: Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā mayi evaṃ karaṇaṃ nāma na tava vasena hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1296_6: rājamattassa vā ayaṃ payogo uyyojanāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1298_5: Taṃ pana yasmā upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1298_7: “Mittadubbhī vatāyaṃ andhabālo”ti kāruññena assupuṇṇehi nettehi taṃ purisaṃ udikkhamāno.
anya-e0103n0:1299_0: Mā ayyosi me bhadanteti ettha māti nipātamattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1299_2: tena upari tena kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ paṭisedheti.
anya-e0103n0:1299_3: Ayyo meti ayyirako tvaṃ mama atithibhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1299_5: Tvaṃ nāmetādisaṃ karīti tvampi evarūpaṃ akāsi nāma.
anya-e0103n0:1300_0: Tiracchānabhūtopi pana mahākapi hutvā khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1301_0: Peḷāya pakkhipantepīti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipantepi.
anya-e0103n0:1302_8: uttamattho na sijjhatīti tadā attanā tattha diṭṭhaṃ ādīnavaṃ dasseti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n0:1303_0: Aḷārāti yena sayaṃ tadā luddahatthato mocito,
anya-e0103n0:1304_0: Ativiya ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭighacittuppādanena kenaci appaṭisamakhantiguṇassa satthusāsanāvokkamanappasaṅgato.
anya-e0103n0:1306_1: Saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamanamaggo saṅkupatho.
anya-e0103n0:1306_5: Aññāni ca dukkarāni karitvā dhanāsāya pabbatavidugganadīviduggādipakkhandanavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1306_8: tatra nappatirūpaṃ manaṃ padūsetunti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1306_9: Evaṃ cittuppādanañca etarahi dissamānena puttādīnaṃ posanādinā atītassa anumānato gahaṇavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1308_2: Aparādho nāma aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpadhammamukhena gayhatīti katvā āha “kiṃ kesānaṃ kujjhasī”tiādi,
anya-e0103n0:1308_4: Idāni nibbattitaparamatthadhammavaseneva vinibbhogavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1308_8: Kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti yathā āragge sāsapassa,
anya-e0103n0:1308_10: evamassa “verī”ti parikappite puggale kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1309_4: Tassevaṃ karototi evaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karontassa tassa dāyakassa.
anya-e0103n0:1309_6: “Mama mātarā upāsikāya dinno”ti idaṃ “dhammiyalābho”ti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1310_0: Sabbatthasādhakanti “attattho parattho diṭṭhadhammiko attho samparāyiko attho”ti evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ, hitānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1311_4: gahaṇeneva cettha appiyapuggalassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmimpi mettāsiddhito,
anya-e0103n0:1311_5: piyato pana atippiyasahāyakassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ āsannapaccatthikassa dubbinimocayabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1312_5: Hitacittova pāṇinanti kevalaṃ sattesu hitacitto evāti pavuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1312_6: na pana “mettāya nikāmalābhī”ti vā “kusalī”ti vā pavuccati. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:1312_8: Kasmā panāyaṃ hitacitto kusalīti na vuccatīti?
anya-e0103n0:1312_10: Imassa ca puggalassa mettābhāvanā na visesavatī.
anya-e0103n0:1312_11: Atha vā na nikāmalābhī mettāya yato attādīsu passati nānattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1312_13: yasmā hitacittova pāṇinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1312_14: Gāmasīmādayo viya gāmantarādīhi sattasaṅkhāte mettāvisaye bhāvanāya pubbe aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇamariyādārūpena
anya-e0103n0:1312_15: ṭhitattā attādayo idha sīmā nāmāti āha “catasso sīmāyo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1312_16: Sambhinnā hontīti ettha vuttaṃ sambhedaṃ dassetuṃ “samaṃ pharati mettāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1313_1: Nimittanti yathā kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu taṃtaṃkasiṇamaṇḍalādipariggahamukhena bhāvanāvasena laddhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1313_3: na evamidha upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0103n0:1313_6: Tasmiṃ hi laddhe bhāvanāya sātisayattā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0103n0:1314_2: Pañcaṅgavippahīnantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
anya-e0103n0:1315_0: “Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aññataravasenā”ti idaṃ vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesaṃ sādhāraṇatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1315_3: anodhiso ca disāpharaṇādivasena jhānassa pavijambhanā vikubbanā vividhā kiriyāti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1316_1: Mettāsahagatenāti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttenāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1316_2: Yasmā pana taṃ vuttanayena mettāya sahagataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1316_5: saddo “adhicetaso”tiādīsu samādhipariyāyopi hotīti tato visesetuṃ “cetasāti cittenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1316_7: Disodhipariggaho sattodhipariggahamukheneva hotīti dassento āha “ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1316_10: Pharaṇañca sārammaṇassa dhammassa attano ārammaṇassa phassanā paccakkhato dassanaṃ gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamevāti
anya-e0103n0:1316_17: tena sambandhañca vinā natthīti tadubhayampi dassetuṃ “yathā puratthimādīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1316_18: Tattha tathā dutiyanti ettha pharitvā viharatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1316_26: evaṃ uddhaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1316_31: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassetuṃ “adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1316_38: yattha tattha vā attano heṭṭhimadisāya sattā gayhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1316_40: yattha tattha vā attano uparimadisāyaṃ sattā gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1317_2: Īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti appakampi kammaṭṭhānato bahi vikkhepaṃ anāpajjanto hitūpasaṃhārato aññathā thokampi avattamāno.
anya-e0103n0:1317_3: Sabbattatāyāti vā sabbena attabhāvena yathā sabbabhāvena attani attano attabhāve hitesitā,
anya-e0103n0:1317_4: evaṃ sabbadhi sabbasattesu mettāya pharitvā viharatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1317_7: tasmā sabbasattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti sabbāvantoti padatthato dassento “sabbāvantanti sabbasattavanta”nti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1317_16: Pariyāyadassane ca pubbe gahitapadānipi puna gayhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1317_17: yathā “saddhā saddahanā”ti ettha vuttampi saddhāpadaṃ puna indriyādipariyāyadassane “saddhā saddhindriya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1317_18: Tathāsaddo vā itisaddo vā na vuttoti “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti etassa anuvattako tathā-
anya-e0103n0:1317_20: saddo ca tesaṃ pharaṇānantarādiṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhānanti katvā te na vuttāti puna “mettāsahagatena cetasāti vutta”nti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1317_21: Vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti āha “nigamanavasena vā etaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1317_22: Nanu ca samāpanavasena vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti?
anya-e0103n0:1317_23: Nāyaṃ doso odhisoanodhisopharaṇānaṃ samāpane eva vuttattā.
anya-e0103n0:1317_25: mahattañcassa asubhakammaṭṭhānādīsu viya ārammaṇassa ekadesameva aggahetvā anavasesaggahaṇavasenāti āha “pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1318_1: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandacittavīriyapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1318_8: Taṃ hi pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1318_18: Taṃ panassa abyāpajjattaṃ pañcaviññāṇādīnaṃ viya na sabhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1318_21: tesu tesu ca suttapadesesu āgataṃ mettābrahmavihāravikubbanamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1319_3: dasahākārehī”ti ākāravibhāgena paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttāya ca vikubbanāya majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvamupasaṃharati
anya-e0103n0:1319_5: Kevalaṃ panettha paṭisambhidāmagge viya sattodhi na gahitoti ayameva viseso.
anya-e0103n0:1320_0: Idāni bhedābhāvadassanamukhena uddesato ānītaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ niddesato dassetvā tassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tattha cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1321_4: “sattā”ti pana padena paricchinnaṃ attano visayaṃ asesetvāva pariyādiyatīti āha “anavasesapariyādānameta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1322_1: Sattoti sajjanakiccena chandādipariyāyena lobhena āsatto laggo.
anya-e0103n0:1323_3: avītarāgesu vā pavattitvā indriyabaddhakhandhasantānatāya taṃsadisesu vītarāgesu ruḷhena saddena.
anya-e0103n0:1323_4: Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte katthaci visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāya
anya-e0103n0:1323_5: nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhī nāma yathā “gacchantīti gāvo”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1323_8: Satvayogatoti ettha satvaṃ nāma buddhi, vīriyaṃ, tejo vā,
anya-e0103n0:1324_6: Sattā hi nibbattantā taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ pūrentā viya honti,
anya-e0103n0:1324_13: Paññattimattasambhavatoti paramatthato asantepi sattasaññite paññattimattena sambhavato.
anya-e0103n0:1325_0: Yathā ca sattāti vacananti yathā satta-
anya-e0103n0:1325_1: saddo yathāvuttenaṭṭhena nippariyāyato padesavuttipi ruḷhīvasena anavasesapariyādāyako.
anya-e0103n0:1325_3: Tānipi hi rūpārūpabhavūpagacatutthajjhānādisamaṅgīnaṃ assāsapassāsābhāvato avinipātadhammānaṃ pugalanassa abhāvato padesavuttīni.
anya-e0103n0:1325_4: Ruḷhīvasena āropetvā yathāvuttāya ruḷhiyā vasena katthaci visaye avijjamānampi pāṇapuggalabhāvaṃ āropetvā.
anya-e0103n0:1325_5: Yadi sādhāraṇato sattavevacanānīti gahetvā anodhisopharaṇā mettā vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1325_6: atha kasmā pañcaheva ākārehi vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmañcā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1325_7: Keci panāhu “na kho panetāni “sattā”tiādīni padāni vevacanatāmattaṃ upādāya gahitāni,
anya-e0103n0:1325_13: Tesaṃ taṃ matimattanti dassento āha “anodhisopharaṇā virujjhatī”ti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n0:1325_17: Tathā atthaṃ aggahetvāti sattādisaddā sappadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā pubbe vuttanayena nippadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1325_19: Pañcasu ākāresūti “sabbe sattā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ āgatesu pañcasu bhāvanākāresu.
anya-e0103n0:1326_1: Idāni dvāvīsatiyā bhāvanākāresu appanā pariggahetvā dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1326_3: Tasmāti yasmā na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaākāravibhāgamattato appanāvibhāgo, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:1326_5: Yaṃ yaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yadipi pubbabhāge tattha tattha abhinivese anekakoṭṭhāsavaseneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0103n0:1326_6: bhāvanāya samijjhanakkhaṇe pana tattha yaṃ paguṇataratāya supākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1327_1: Tatiyā pana pakati yadipi paṭhamadukena na saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n0:1327_2: dutiyadukena pana tikena ca saṅgahitā eva.
anya-e0103n0:1329_1: Evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha ānisaṃse vibhāvetuṃ “itī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1329_2: Tattha sesā janāti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino.
anya-e0103n0:1329_3: Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇena passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā.
anya-e0103n0:1329_5: Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhāsupanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0103n0:1329_8: Yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
anya-e0103n0:1330_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1330_2: ito cito viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1330_3: Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādirahitova paṭibujjhati.
anya-e0103n0:1331_4: Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1332_0: Ure āmuttamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1332_2: anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1333_1: Sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā desassa khematāya,
anya-e0103n0:1335_1: Thero kira attanā paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhavihāre “ahamettha āgantuko”ti acintetvā tattha tattha yathārahaṃ attanā kātabbavattāni paripūrento eva vihāsi.
anya-e0103n0:1335_3: Ayaṃ hi thero arahattādhigamato pubbepi mettāvihārī ahosi.
anya-e0103n0:1336_0: Vanantare ṭhitoti thero kira tathā samappavattavāsavasena caramāno ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vanantaraṃ
anya-e0103n0:1336_1: disvā tattha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathāparicchedena tato uṭṭhito attano guṇāvajjanahetukena
anya-e0103n0:1337_3: Rukkhadevatānaṃ hi yebhuyyena nivāsarukkhavasena vohāro yathā phandanadevatāti.
anya-e0103n0:1339_0: Khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n0:1339_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti, yathāha –
anya-e0103n0:1342_1: tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1342_5: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.
anya-e0103n0:1344_3: “idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā aññataraññatarena vā sattānaṃ viheṭhanajātiko hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaviheṭhaneti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1344_5: Yathā tathā sattānaṃ viheṭhanāya pāpako vipāko idha ceva samparāye ca.
anya-e0103n0:1344_6: Tathā hi yo satte jīvitā voropanena vā aṅgapaccaṅgacchedanena vā dhanajāniyā vā alābhāya vā avāsāya vā
anya-e0103n0:1344_7: anatthāya vā ayasatthāya vā parisaṃsakkanena vā antamaso yathāvajjadassanenapi viheṭheti,
anya-e0103n0:1344_8: tassa so pamādavihāro diṭṭheva dhamme alābhāyapi hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1344_18: appāyukopi hoti parittajīvitoti evamādianekānatthānubandhitā vihesāya paccavekkhitabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1344_20: Tena vuttaṃ “nikkaruṇatāya ādīnavaṃ karuṇāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1344_22: Piyaṃ hi puggalaṃ karuṇāyitumārabhantassa na tāva piyabhāvo vigacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1345_3: So hi bhogapārijuññato sukhasādhanānaṃ abhāvena dukkhaṃ gato upagato duggatoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1345_4: Atha vā duggatanti dukkhena samaṅgibhāvaṃ gataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1345_7: Kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito durupetoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1346_0: Vadhetha nanti “ghātetha naṃ cora”nti evaṃ pahitāya rañño āṇāya khādanīyampi…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1347_0: Eteneva upāyenāti yena yena vidhinā etarahi yathāvutte paramakicchāpanne āyatiṃ vā dukkhabhāgimhi puggale karuṇāyituṃ karuṇā uppāditā,
anya-e0103n0:1347_3: Etarahi vā dissamānaṃ āyatiṃ vā bhāviniṃ dukkhappattiṃ gahetvā karuṇā pavattetabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1347_5: Yo hi so karuṇāya vatthubhūto duvidho puggalo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1347_7: iminā pana bhikkhunā tattha bhāvanaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā sīmāsambhedaṃ kātuṃ tadanantaraṃ piyapuggale,
anya-e0103n0:1347_10: Bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1347_12: mahāpurisajātikattā vā anatthaṃ karontepi verisaññāva nuppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:1347_13: tena majjhatte me cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1347_14: idāni verimhi upasaṃharāmīti byāpārova na kātabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1348_3: “kakacūpamaovādādīnaṃ anussarato”tiādinā ca mettābhāvanāya vuttena nayena taṃ paṭighaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1348_4: Evaṃ etarahi mahādukkhappatte sukhitepi akatakusalatāya āyatiṃ dukkhappattiyā vasena karuṇāyanavidhiṃ
anya-e0103n0:1348_5: dassetvā idāni katakalyāṇepi taṃ dassetuṃ “yopi cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1348_7: Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ anatikkantattāti sammāsambuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa anāgatassa āpāyikassa
anya-e0103n0:1348_10: sukhappattiyā akatakusalatāya vā katākusalatāya vāti sabbapakārenapi karuṇāya vatthubhāvassa sallakkhaṇena
anya-e0103n0:1348_11: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggale karuṇaṃ katvā karuṇābhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā.
anya-e0103n0:1348_12: Vuttanayenevāti “athānena punappunaṃ mettāyantenā”tiādinā mettābhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena.
anya-e0103n0:1348_14: Mettāya vuttanayenevāti yathā mettābhāvanāyaṃ “appakasirenevā”tiādinā tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā
anya-e0103n0:1348_15: “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā tassā vaḍḍhanā ca vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:1348_16: evamidha karuṇābhāvanāyaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā veditabbā ca vaḍḍhetabbā ca,
anya-e0103n0:1348_18: Vuttanayenevāti avadhāraṇena “paṭhamaṃ veripuggalo karuṇāyitabbo”ti idaṃ yathā pāḷiviruddhaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1348_20: Paṭhamaṃ hi veriṃ samanussarato kodho uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n0:1348_24: “Appanā vaḍḍhetabbā”ti iminā ca appanāppattacittasseva “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n0:1349_0: Karuṇāpadamattameva cassā pāḷiyā visesoti taṃ anāmasitvā paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttavikubbanā,
anya-e0103n0:1349_1: mettāya vuttaānisaṃsā ca idha labbhantīti dassetuṃ “tato paraṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1349_3: Tattha tato paranti “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā”ti vuttavikubbanato upari.
anya-e0103n0:1351_10: sammodakatāti evamādike muditāya padaṭṭhānabhūte visese ulliṅgeti,
anya-e0103n0:1351_11: īdisehi visesehi virahitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Eva-
anya-e0103n0:1351_14: Piyapuggalepi hi paramāya sampattiyā pamudite haṭṭhatuṭṭhe bhikkhuno muditokāsaṃ labheyya.
anya-e0103n0:1352_3: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena ādito muditābhāvanāya vatthuṃ dassetvā idāni pāḷinayena dassetuṃ “piyapuggalaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1352_7: Aho sādhūti tassa sattassa sampattiyaṃ sampajaññapubbapamodanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1352_8: Puna aho suṭṭhūti tassa pamodanassa bahulīkāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1353_6: “So evāyaṃ datto tisso”ti addhāpaccuppannatāya vijjamānabhāvena gahetabbato.
anya-e0103n0:1353_7: Kathaṃ panassa anāgate sampatti ārammaṇaṃ hotīti?
anya-e0103n0:1353_9: paccuppannāya vā payogasampattiyā anumānato laddhāya gahetabbato.
anya-e0103n0:1354_3: Anukkamenāti atippiyapuggalo piyapuggalo majjhatto verīti catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ, muduṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1354_5: Kiñcāpi catūsu janesu samacittatāva sīmāsambhedo sīmā sambhijjati etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1354_6: Bhāvanāya pana tathā bahuso pavattamānāya purimasiddhaṃ hetuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1354_7: itaraṃ phalañca katvā vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1354_8: Yathāvuttasīmābhāvo vā sīmāsambhedoti vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1356_6: Appaguṇaṃ hi uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1356_12: Mettādīnaṃ rāgagehassitadomanassasomanassānaṃ āsannavuttitāya yathārahaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1356_14: dukkhato muccantu modantū”ti hitesitabhāvappattiyā tissannampi anunayassa āsannacāritā.
anya-e0103n0:1356_15: Sati ca tabbipariyāye lohitappakope pubbo viya laddhokāsamevettha paṭighanti avisesena tāsaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1357_2: Mettādivasena pana oḷārikabhāve vuccamāne vitakkavicārapītiyogeneva oḷārikatā vattabbā siyā,
anya-e0103n0:1357_5: Na vā vattabbā tatiyajjhānikānaṃyeva mettādīnaṃ idhādhippetattā,
anya-e0103n0:1357_6: taṃtaṃjhānasamatikkameneva ca taṃtaṃjhānikā mettādayopi samatikkantā eva nāma honti,
anya-e0103n0:1357_11: Sukhumatā paṇītatā vidūrakilesatā vipulaphalatāti evamādayopi upekkhāya ānisaṃsā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1357_12: Pakatimajjhattoti kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā pakatiyā sabhāveneva imassa bhikkhuno udāsinapakkhe ṭhito.
anya-e0103n0:1357_13: Ajjhupekkhitvāti attanā katakammavaseneva ayamāyasmā āgato gacchati ca,
anya-e0103n0:1357_14: tvampi attanā katakammavaseneva āgato gacchasi ca,
anya-e0103n0:1357_15: na tassa tava payogena kiñci sukhaṃ vā upanetuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1357_20: yadidaṃ sabbasattesu majjhattatāti evaṃ paṭipakkhajigucchāmukhena majjhattatāya samupajātagāravabahumānādaro taṃ puggalaṃ punappunaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0103n0:1357_22: tassa tathā paṭipajjato pakatiyāpi udāsinattā sātisayaṃ tattha majjhattatā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1357_31: tasmā aññaṃ ekaṃ puggalanti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0103n0:1357_39: Iti “ekaṃ puggalaṃ neva manāpaṃ nāmanāpa”nti iminā attano,
anya-e0103n0:1358_1: Attasinehassa balavabhāvato veritopi attani majjhattatāya durūpasaṃhārattā “imesu ca attani cā”ti attā pacchā vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1358_2: Pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā”tiādinā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena.
anya-e0103n0:1358_7: catutthajjhāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā catutthādhigamāya yogaṃ karontassa catutthajjhānassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1358_8: Tasmā tattha vuttaṃ “pathavīsaddaṃ apanetvā tadeva nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1359_3: Kāmaṃ kasiṇānāpānesu uppannassāpi tatiyajjhānassa upekkhābrahmavihārena rūpāvacarajjhānāditāya attheva sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n0:1359_4: taṃ pana akāraṇaṃ ārammaṇassa visadisatāyāti āha “ārammaṇavisabhāgatāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1359_6: aññathā brahmavihārabhāvanāti bhāvanāvasenāpi yathāvuttajjhānānaṃ attheva visadisatāti?
anya-e0103n0:1359_8: bhāvanāvasena pana visadisatā anuppattiyā na ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1359_11: Tathāpi sattesu yathāpavattitaṃ hitesitādiākāraṃ byatirekamukhena āmasantī,
anya-e0103n0:1359_14: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1359_15: Ārammaṇasabhāgatāpi cettha atthīti mettādivasena paṭiladdhatatiyajjhānassa ijjhati upekkhābrahmavihāro.
anya-e0103n0:1361_0: 262. Brahmuttamenāti ettha sammutibrahmāno upapattibrahmāno visuddhibrahmānoti tividhā brahmāno.
anya-e0103n0:1363_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe. ;
anya-e0103n0:1365_0: Ca evamādīsu hi brahmasaddena sammutibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1370_0: “Atha kho brahmā sahampatī”ti ca evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1370_2: tato nibbattattā avisesena sabbepi ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya.
anya-e0103n0:1370_5: tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato sammāsambuddho uttamabrahmā nāma sadevake loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito.
anya-e0103n0:1370_7: brahmā ca so uttamo cāti vā brahmuttamo, bhagavā.
anya-e0103n0:1370_8: Tena kathite “so mettāsahagatena cetasā”tiādinā tattha tattha veneyyānaṃ desite.
anya-e0103n0:1370_9: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttena bhāvanākkamena ceva atthavaṇṇanākkamena ca viditvā jānitvā.
anya-e0103n0:1370_10: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ taṃtaṃbrahmavihārapaṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0103n0:1370_11: sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattitā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1371_0: Mejjatīti dhammato aññassa kattunivattanatthaṃ dhammameva kattāraṃ katvā niddisati.
anya-e0103n0:1371_1: Siniyhatīti ettha sattesu byāpajjanavasena lūkhabhāvassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ hitākārapavattivasena sinehanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1371_5: Nanu ca taṇhāsinehopi byāpādavirodhī tena sahānavaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n0:1371_6: Yadipi tena saha ekasmiṃ citte nappavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1371_11: mitte vā ārammaṇabhūte piye puggale bhavā,
anya-e0103n0:1371_12: mittassa esā pavatti mejjanavasena vāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1372_2: kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1372_3: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa apanetukāmassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1373_2: muditāvinimutto natthi tattha koci kattāti tameva kattubhāvena niddisati “sayaṃ vā modatī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1373_4: Dhammānaṃ avasavattanatoti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “modanamattameva vā tanti muditā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1374_0: Piyādīsu pakkhapātupacchedanamukhena udāsinabhāvasaṅkhātā upapattito ikkhā upekkhā.
anya-e0103n0:1374_2: Tattha upekkhatīti kattuniddese kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0103n0:1375_6: “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā pavattanakassa āghātassa vinayanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:1376_0: Karuṇādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1376_3: Apanayanaṃ pana hotu vā mā vā,
anya-e0103n0:1376_6: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1376_13: sattānaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavatto karuṇāya paṭipakkhabhūto paṭighacittuppādo.
anya-e0103n0:1377_4: adhikusaladhammesu ca asahanaṃ aramaṇaṃ aratiicceva saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1377_6: tassa vā vighātaṃ vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:1378_1: Sattesu samabhāvadassanarasāti piyādibhedesu sabbasattesu udāsinavuttiyā samabhāvasseva dassanakiccā,
anya-e0103n0:1378_2: upapattito ikkhaṇato samabhāveneva tesaṃ gahaṇakiccāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1378_3: Sattesu paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlākārānaṃ aggahaṇato tattha paṭighānunayānaṃ vūpasamanākārena vuttiyā tesaṃ vūpasamaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1378_6: paccāmasanto mettādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiākārapaṭisedhanamukhena pavattaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa
anya-e0103n0:1379_1: Vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti cāti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro cāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1379_4: Te pana heṭṭhā vuttā evāti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n0:1380_5: Evañca katvā rāganissaraṇatāvacanaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa suṭṭhu samatthitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1381_4: Rāgopi tattha yathā tathā guṇaggahaṇamukheneva pavattati manāpasaññāpalobhatoti āha “guṇadassanasabhāgatāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1381_5: Tasmā mittamukhasapatto viya tulyākārena dūsanato rāgo mettāya āsannapaccatthiko,
anya-e0103n0:1381_6: so lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati satisammosamattenāpi mettaṃ apanīya tassā vatthusmiṃ uppajjanārahattā.
anya-e0103n0:1381_11: Sattesu hi manāpākāragāhino mettāsabhāgassa tabbiparītasabhāvo byāpādo tena visabhāgo.
anya-e0103n0:1381_12: Tasmā so otāraṃ labhamāno cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya mettāya dūrapaccatthiko.
anya-e0103n0:1382_5: Appaṭilābhato samanupassatoti appaṭilābhena ahamime na labhāmīti paritassato.
anya-e0103n0:1382_12: Vipattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādivipattidassanamukhena karuṇā pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1382_13: tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati yathāvuttadomanassamukhena soko uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n0:1382_16: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti ettha sattesu dukkhāpanayanakāmatākārassa karuṇāsabhāgassa tesu dukkhūpanayanākāro
anya-e0103n0:1382_17: vihesāsabhāvo visabhāgoti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa
anya-e0103n0:1382_18: dūre ṭhitasapatto viya karuṇāya dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1383_0: Sampattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādisampattidassanamukhena muditā pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1383_1: tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpāna”ntiādinā vuttasomanassamukhena pahāso uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n0:1383_4: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti bhogādisampattīhi muditesu sattesu pamodanākārassa muditāsabhāgassa tattha anabhiramanākārā
anya-e0103n0:1383_5: arati visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto
anya-e0103n0:1383_7: Pamudito cātiādi muditāya siddhāya ayampi arati na hotīti laddhabbaguṇadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1383_9: Kāyacittavivekapaṭipakkhāya vā aratiyā vikkhambhitāya muditāya paṭipakkhā arati suvikkhambhaneyyā hotīti
anya-e0103n0:1384_4: odhijinā vā sekkhā odhisova kilesānaṃ jitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1384_9: Anekādīnave sabbesampi pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya anādīnavadassāvino.
anya-e0103n0:1384_11: Ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvadassanatthaṃ punapi “puthujjanassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1384_13: Rūpaṃ sā nātivattatīti rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1384_16: Dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgattāti yathā brahmavihārupekkhā mettādayo viya sattesu hitūpasaṃhārādivasena
anya-e0103n0:1384_18: evaṃ aññāṇupekkhā sattesu vijjamānampi guṇadosaṃ acintentī kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattatīti dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgā.
anya-e0103n0:1384_19: Tasmā sā lahuṃ otāraṃ labhatīti brahmavihārupekkhāya āsannapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1384_20: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu majjhattākārassa upekkhāsabhāgassa tattha anurodhavirodhapavattiākārā
anya-e0103n0:1384_21: rāgapaṭighā visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya te otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyunti purisassa
anya-e0103n0:1384_22: dūre ṭhitasapatto viya upekkhābrahmavihārassa dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1385_1: Kattukāmatā chando ādi “chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā”ti vacanato,
anya-e0103n0:1385_2: atha vā sattesu hitesitādukkhāpanayanakāmatādinā anavajjābhipatthanāvasena pavattanato “kattukāmatā chando ādī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1385_3: Upekkhābrahmavihāropi hi sattesu anirākatahitacchandoyeva “tattha abyāvaṭatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā”ti ajjhupekkhanākārena
