anya-e0103n0:1385_7: Katthaci sattaggahaṇampi saṅkhāraggahaṇameva hoti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya yathā “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1385_8: na evamidhāti āha “paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto aneke vā sattā ārammaṇa”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1385_11: Taṃ pana “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti vipassanāya aniccalakkhaṇagahaṇaṃ viya appadhānabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1385_13: Upacāre vā patte ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ tatthāpi sīmāsambhedasiddhitoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1386_0: Ekamāvāsaṃ paricchinditvāti ettha “satte mettāya pharissāmī”ti evaṃ ñāṇena paricchedaṃ katvā ekā racchā paricchinditabbāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1386_1: Racchāgahaṇena racchāvāsino sattā gahitā yathā ekaṃ disanti.
anya-e0103n0:1387_1: Kasiṇānaṃ nissandoti kasiṇajjhānānaṃ nissandaphalasadisā āruppā arūpajjhānāni,
anya-e0103n0:1387_5: heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānasamādhīnañca nissando paṭipāṭiyā te adhigantvāva paṭilabhitabbato.
anya-e0103n0:1387_10: “Purimabrahmavihārattayanissando”ti iminā mettādivasena tīṇi jhānāni adhigantvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāro,
anya-e0103n0:1387_12: Tamevatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1388_4: Imāni pana “sabbe sattā sukhitā hontū”tiādinā parahitapaṭipattibhūtāni.
anya-e0103n0:1388_5: Tasmā sattesu sammā paṭipattibhāvena seṭṭhā ete vihārā.
anya-e0103n0:1388_7: Te hi idha jhānabhāvanāya vinīvaraṇacittā hutvā brahmaloke uppannā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vinīvaraṇacittāva honti.
anya-e0103n0:1388_9: Brahmānoti vā sakalabuddhaguṇahetubhūtānaṃ dānapāramitādīnaṃ buddhakaradhammānaṃ paripūraṇavasena brūhitaguṇā mahāsattā bodhisattā.
anya-e0103n0:1389_2: Visuddhimaggādivasāti ettha byāpādasaṃkilesādito visujjhanupāyo visuddhimaggo. Ādi-
anya-e0103n0:1390_5: tameva upamāya dassetuṃ “yasmā ca yathā mātā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1390_6: Tattha vuttassāpi hitūpasaṃhārādiatthassa upameyyabhāvaṃ upanetvā dassetuṃ atthupanayanattho “yasmā cā”ti ca- saddo.
anya-e0103n0:1390_11: tathā sabbasattesu mettādivasena mettāyanādivasikena bhavitabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1390_12: Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā yathārahaṃ dosamoharāgapakkhiyā,
anya-e0103n0:1390_16: Catassopi etā bhāvetukāmena na ekekanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1390_19: Sambhāvetvā vāti “imāya paṭipattiyā ayaṃ nirayādīsu nibbatteyyā”ti parikappetvā vā.
anya-e0103n0:1390_23: Ayaṃ kamoti ayaṃ imāsaṃ appamaññānaṃ yebhuyyena pavattanakkamoti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1390_26: Mettādīnaṃ hi tissannaṃ bhāvanānaṃ kamaniyamo natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1390_27: yaṃ vā taṃ vā paṭhamaṃ bhāvetuṃ labbhā,
anya-e0103n0:1391_2: na ca sammutisaccavasena pavattaṃ sattaggahaṇaṃ paricchinnarūpādiggahaṇaṃ hotīti appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1391_4: Evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvāti yathā uddhumātakādīsu atirekuddhumātakādibhāvappatte padese nimittaṃ gayhati,
anya-e0103n0:1392_6: evaṃ domanassasahitānaṃ byāpādavihiṃsāratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtā mettākaruṇāmuditā na somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0103n0:1392_7: Nissaraṇaggahaṇeneva ca pubbabhāgiyānaṃ tāsaṃ upekkhāsampayogopi anuññātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ anissaraṇabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1392_8: Tathā hi aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittuppādesu karuṇāmuditānaṃ pavattiṃ ācariyā icchanti.
anya-e0103n0:1392_9: Na hi brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattati pārisuddhiupekkhā viya.
anya-e0103n0:1392_10: Na hi kadāci pārisuddhiupekkhā vedanupekkhaṃ vinā vattatīti.
anya-e0103n0:1393_2: Tasmāti yasmā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādikāya desanāya catunnampi appamaññānaṃ savitakkādibhāvo viya upekkhāsahagatabhāvopi viññāyati, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:1393_4: Evañhi satīti yadi mūlasamādhimhi vuttamatthaṃ anantaraṃ vuttatāya brahmavihāresu pakkhipati,
anya-e0103n0:1393_6: na pana honti vipassanāvasena desitattāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0103n0:1393_7: hontu kāyānupassanādayo ānāpānabhāvanāvasena catukkapañcakajjhānikāti vadeyyāti āsaṅkanto āha “vedanādīsū”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1393_8: Byañjanacchāyāmattaṃ gahetvāti “mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissatī”tiādīhi byañjanehi pakāsito eva
anya-e0103n0:1393_9: cittasamādhi “ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatī”tiādīhipi byañjanehi pakāsitoti byañjanato labbhamānasamādhicchāyāmattaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1393_10: gahetvā ubhayattha labbhamānaṃ adhippāyaṃ aggahetvāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1393_11: Suttatthaṃ hi aññathā vadanto ayathāvāditāya satthāraṃ apavadanto nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1394_1: “Tayimaṃ dosaṃ pariharitukāmena na sabbaṃ suttaṃ nītatthameva,
anya-e0103n0:1394_2: tasmā garukulato adhippāyo maggitabbo”ti dassento “gambhīraṃ hī”tiādiṃ vatvā tattha ādito paṭṭhāya adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1394_11: Cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti bahiddhā avikkhippamānaṃ ekaggabhāve ṭhitaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n0:1394_16: Akusalā dhammāti kāmacchandādayo akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā.
anya-e0103n0:1394_17: Cittaṃ pariyādāya pavattituṃ okāsādānena kusalacittaṃ khepetvā na ca ṭhassantīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1395_1: Taṃ pana upari vuccamānānaṃ samādhivisesānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhāvato “mūlasamādhī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1395_2: Svāyaṃ cittekaggatāmatto “ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmī”tiādīsu viya khaṇikasamādhi adhippeto.
anya-e0103n0:1395_3: Yatheva hi aññatthāpi “āraddhaṃ kho pana me,
anya-e0103n0:1395_6: samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga”nti vatvā “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādivacanato paṭhamaṃ vuttacittekaggatā “khaṇikasamādhī”ti viññāyati,
anya-e0103n0:1396_4: Evaṃ bhāvitoti yathā araṇisahitena uppādito aggi gomayacuṇṇādīhi vaḍḍhito gomayaggiādibhāvaṃ pattopi araṇisahitena uppāditamūlaggītveva vuccati,
anya-e0103n0:1396_5: evamidhāpi mūlasamādhi eva mettādivasena vaḍḍhitoti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1397_1: Tattha yathā mettābhāvanāpubbaṅgamena bhāvanānayena pathavīkasiṇādīsu savitakkādibhāvavasena catukkapañcakajjhānasampāpanavidhinā
anya-e0103n0:1397_3: evaṃ karuṇādibhāvanāpubbaṅgamaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsupi bhāvanāvidhiṃ dassetvā pacchā kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1397_6: Yadi evaṃ dhammānupassanāpariyosānāya desanāya arahattādhigamāya kammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā puna “tato tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
anya-e0103n0:1397_9: Sā hi saṅkhārupekkhābhāvena vattamānā yathāvuttajjhānadhamme sammasantī visesato matthakappattā nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1398_0: Puna yato kho tetiādi arahattappattito uddhaṃ laddhabbaphāsuvihāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1398_2: Tasmāti yasmā “savitakkampī”tiādikā desanā mettādīnaṃ ārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe samādhiṃ sandhāya vuttā,
anya-e0103n0:1399_2: saddo “subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti evaṃ vuttasubhavimokkhaṃ sandhāya vutto uttarapadalopena. Parama-
anya-e0103n0:1399_4: Subho subhavimokkho paramo ukkaṃso paramā koṭi etissāti subhaparamā,
anya-e0103n0:1399_6: tato paraṃ tāya sādhetabbaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1399_7: Asādhāraṇassa atthassa adhippetattā vipassanāsukhādayo idha anavasarā.
anya-e0103n0:1400_0: Tassa tassa upanissayattāti subhavimokkhādikassa tassa tassa vimokkhassa pakatūpanissayavasena upanissayapaccayabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1400_1: Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1400_3: Appaṭikkūlaparicayāti mettābhāvanāvasena sattasaññite yattha katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭikkūlākāreneva gahaṇassa paricitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1400_4: Tassa saṅkhārabhūtampi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ appaṭikkūlākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n0:1400_11: Yathāvutto ca attho anatthacaraṇādiadhippāyena sacetane ārammaṇe āghātaṃ uppādentassa paṭikkūlaparicayā
anya-e0103n0:1400_13: Na tato paranti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ kassaci vimokkhassa upanissayo na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1401_3: daṇḍābhighātādi rūpaṃ nimittaṃ yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1401_6: Rūpe ādīnavo suparividito hoti karuṇāvihārissa rūpanimittattā,
anya-e0103n0:1401_9: Cittaṃ pakkhandati sabbaso rūpānaṃ abhāvo vivaramapagamoti.
anya-e0103n0:1402_1: tena tena bhogasampattiādinā pāmojjakāraṇena pamuditānaṃ sattānaṃ uppannapāmojjaviññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa
anya-e0103n0:1402_2: yogino “sādhu vatāyaṃ satto pamodatī”ti muditāya pavattisambhavato pamuditaviññāṇassa dassanena viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1403_0: Anukkamādhigatanti ākāsakasiṇavajje yattha katthaci kasiṇe rūpāvacarajjhānādhigamānukkamena rūpavirāgabhāvanāya adhigataṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1404_1: Sattānaṃ sukhāsīsanādivasena pavattamānā mettādibhāvanāva paramatthaggahaṇamukhena satte ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:1404_2: upekkhābhāvanā pana tathā appavattitvā kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti āha “upekkhāvihārissa
anya-e0103n0:1404_5: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādinā paṭikkhepavasenapi paramatthaggahaṇamukheneva upekkhābrahmavihāropi satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti?
anya-e0103n0:1404_8: matthakappattiyaṃ pana kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti savisesaṃ paramatthato avijjamāne eva visaye tassa pavatti.
anya-e0103n0:1404_9: Avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhatā ca ajjhupekkhanavasena appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtatāya veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1405_7: Na hi lokiyadhammā buddhakaradhammehi ānubhāvato ukkaṭṭhā nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n0:1405_10: Adhiṭṭhānāni viya hi appamaññā sabbāsaṃ pāramitānaṃ pāripūrikarā.
anya-e0103n0:1405_12: catūhi appamaññāhi attano santānassa pageva abhisaṅkhatattā mahābodhisattā dānādipāramiyo pūretuṃ samatthā honti,
anya-e0103n0:1405_17: idaṃ na dātabbanti ca vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti vattabbato.
anya-e0103n0:1408_2: Tena deyyadhammena viya dānadhammenāpi mahāsattānaṃ lokassa bahūpakāratā vuttā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1408_8: vibhāgaṃ akatvā upaghātaṃ parivajjayantā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyantīti.
anya-e0103n0:1408_14: Idhāpi “vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidāna”nti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1408_15: Na hi bodhisattā kālavibhāgaṃ katvā pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1408_22: Paññaṃ pariyodapentīti yogavihitaṃ vijjāṭṭhānādiṃ assutaṃ suṇantā sutaṃ vodapentā ahaṃkāramamaṃkārādiṃ vidhunantā ñāṇaṃ visodhenti.
anya-e0103n0:1408_26: Vīriyamārabhantīti yathā sattānaṃ anuppannaṃ hitasukhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:1408_31: Nānappakārakaṃ aparādhaṃ khamantīti mammacchedanākārena attani pavattitaṃ nānāvidhaṃ aparādhaṃ sahanti.
anya-e0103n0:1409_0: Paṭiññaṃ na visaṃvādentīti avisaṃvādanasāmaññena sabbassapi anariyavohārassa akaraṇamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1409_2: apaṭiññāte ca diṭṭhādike micchāvikapparahitā hi saccapāramitā.
anya-e0103n0:1409_4: samādinnesu ca buddhakaradhammesu sammadeva avaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramitā.
anya-e0103n0:1409_10: Tathā hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ parānuggahāya pāramīnaṃ anuṭṭhānena saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1409_20: Etāva hontīti etā honti evāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1414_29: saddena adinnādānādikaṃ sabbaṃ rūpahetukaṃ anatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1414_35: Ālokoti vaṇṇaviseso evāti tattha pavattaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā siyā ākāsanimittaṃ uggahetuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1414_37: Tassa hi ugghāṭanā nāma rūpanimitteneva siyāti āha “ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasū”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1414_39: tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0103n0:1415_1: Nanu paṭhamajjhānādīnipi tassa anālambanavaseneva pavattanti paṭibhāganimittārammaṇattā?
anya-e0103n0:1415_3: oḷārikaṅgappahānato pana santasabhāvena āneñjappattena catutthajjhānena atikkantaṃ suṭṭhu atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti “catutthajjhānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1415_11: tasmā kiṃ tassa samatikkamanenāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n0:1416_3: Karajarūpasamaṅgikāloti attano attabhāvarūpena ceva ārammaṇarūpena ca samannāgatakālo.
anya-e0103n0:1416_8: Te hi tayo apekkhitvā bhayasantāsaadassanakāmatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1416_9: Eko kira sunakho vane sūkarena pahaṭamatto palāto,
anya-e0103n0:1416_10: so arūpadassanavelāya bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato disvā sūkarasaññāya bhīto uttasanto palāyi,
anya-e0103n0:1416_11: pisācabhīruko puriso rattibhāge aparicite dese matthakacchinnaṃ tālakkhandhaṃ disvā pisācasaññāya bhīto uttasanto mucchito papati,
anya-e0103n0:1417_6: Tāni hi “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā”tiādīsu santavimokkhāti āgatā.
anya-e0103n0:1417_9: kārena yena pakārena etaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1418_5: sukhumato ca manasikāro siddho hotīti āha “santato anantato manasi karitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1418_9: Ugghāṭeti kasiṇanti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikasiṇarūpaṃ apaneti.
anya-e0103n0:1418_19: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ manasi karoto,
anya-e0103n0:1418_20: tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasi karoto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1419_2: tato paṭṭhāya cassa na nesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1419_5: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “attheva sukhumāni arūpajjhānavikkhambhaneyyāni nīvaraṇāni,
anya-e0103n0:1419_8: Na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalesu viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0103n0:1419_10: so bhāvanāvisesena santatarapaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1419_12: Tathā hi aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1419_13: Ye pana “sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:1419_15: Sati santiṭṭhatīti ākāsanimittārammaṇā sati sammā sūpaṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n0:1419_16: Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1419_22: taṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayānusārena veditabbanti āha “pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayamevā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1420_1: taṃ atidisitvā idāni visiṭṭhaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1421_5: Rūpajjhānampi rūpanti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”tiādīsu yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1421_7: Ārammaṇampi kasiṇarūpaṃ rūpanti vuccati purimapadalopena yathā “devadatto datto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1421_8: Rūpāni passatīti kasiṇarūpāni jhānacakkhunā passatīti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1421_10: purimapadalopena ca yathākkamaṃ rūpajjhānakasiṇarūpesu rūpavohāro dissati, tasmā.
anya-e0103n0:1421_14: tena pāḷiyaṃ “rūpasaññāna”nti sarūpekasesena niddeso katoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1421_17: Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1421_18: Tassa sabbākārena virāgā anavasesānaṃ nirodhāti evaṃ vā ettha yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1422_0: “Ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hotī”ti idaṃ yasmā imāni jhānāni ārammaṇātikkamena pattabbāni,
anya-e0103n0:1422_2: Yasmā panettha saññāsamatikkamo ārammaṇasamatikkamena vinā na hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1422_3: tasmā “samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1422_9: Yadi saññāsamatikkamassa anunipphādiārammaṇasamatikkamo vibhaṅge ca avutto,
anya-e0103n0:1422_10: atha kasmā idha gahitoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1422_12: “tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacana”ntiādinā vibhaṅge viya saññāsamatikkamameva avatvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1423_2: Atthaṅgamātiādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa atthavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1423_3: tasmā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamo jhānasamaṅgikāle anuppattīti tassa idheva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ anuyogamukhena dassetuṃ “kāmañcetā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1424_1: paṭighasaññānaṃ pana atthaṅgamo idheva vattabbattā vuttoti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1424_2: Tattha sabhāvadhammassa abhāvo nāma paṭipakkhena pahīnatāya vā paccayābhāvena vā.
anya-e0103n0:1424_9: Na pahīnattā na santīti na tadā paṭighasaññā pahīnabhāvena na santi nāma.
anya-e0103n0:1424_10: Tattha kāraṇamāha “na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1424_11: Nanu ca paṭighasaññāpi arūpadhammā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ pavattī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1424_16: “Ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā”tiādinā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1425_1: Dosadassanapubbakapaṭipakkhabhāvanāvasena paṭighasaññānaṃ suppahīnattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1425_2: Tathā pana na suppahīnattā sabbarūpāvacarasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ siyā,
anya-e0103n0:1425_3: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pana appakampi saddaṃ na sahatīti taṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭakoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1425_4: Āruppabhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākappavatti,
anya-e0103n0:1425_7: Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitā,
anya-e0103n0:1425_12: javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1426_0: Tena ca nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpānaṃ samatikkamā samādhissa thirabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhepato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1426_1: Apica imehi tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā vaṇṇo kathito sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1426_3: Ye hi akusalā evaṃgāhino “sabbassādarahite ākāse pavattitasaññāya ko ānisaṃso”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1426_4: te tato micchāgāhato nivattetuṃ tīhi padehi jhānassa ānisaṃso kathito.
anya-e0103n0:1426_5: Taṃ hi sutvā tesaṃ evaṃ bhavissati “evaṃ santā kirāyaṃ samāpatti evaṃ paṇītā,
anya-e0103n0:1427_6: Ākāso pana asabhāvadhammattā tadubhayābhāvato ananto vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1427_7: Ajaṭākāsaparicchinnākāsānaṃ idha anadhippetattā “ākāsoti kasiṇugghāṭimākāso vuccatī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1427_10: Manasikāravasenāpīti rūpavivekamattaggahaṇena paricchedassa aggahaṇato anantapharaṇākārena pavattaparikammamanasikāravasenāpi.
anya-e0103n0:1427_11: Anantaṃ pharatīti aggahitaparicchedatāya anantaṃ katvā parikammasamphassapubbakena jhānasamphassena phusati.
anya-e0103n0:1429_1: Ciṇṇo carito paguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti ciṇṇavasībhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:1429_5: taṃsamatikkameneva tadaññesaṃ samatikkamitabbānaṃ samatikkamasiddhito ca vuttaṃ “āsannarūpāvacarajjhānapaccatthikā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1429_7: paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “no ca viññāṇañcāyatanamiva santā”ti vakkhati hi “suppaṇītatarā honti,
anya-e0103n0:1429_9: Anantaṃ anantanti kevalaṃ “anantaṃ ananta”nti na manasi kātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1430_2: Ākāsaphuṭe viññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte.
anya-e0103n0:1430_4: Sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanābhāvato idaṃ appanāppattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:1430_5: Appanānayo panettha vuttanayenevāti ettha dutiyāruppajjhāne purimabhāge tīṇi,
anya-e0103n0:1430_6: cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti.
anya-e0103n0:1430_7: “Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā arūpāvacara”ntiādinā paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttena nayena,
anya-e0103n0:1430_8: atha vā appanānayoti sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇe jhānassa appanānayo ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena āruppaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n0:1430_9: “appanāppattasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotī”ti maraṇānussatiniddese vuttanayena veditabboti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1431_5: Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena ñātuṃ sakkāti āha “sabbasoti idaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1431_6: Jhānassa ākāsānañcāyatanatā bāhiratthasamāsavasena heṭṭhā vuttāti āha “pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1431_8: Tattha “purimanayenevā”ti idaṃ “nāssa anto”tiādinā vuttapadasiddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1431_11: saddena idha attho yujjatīti dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1431_18: javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ amanasikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1431_19: ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena appavattanaṃ appavattikaraṇanti atthassa sambhavato ekajjhaṃ katvā sāmaññaniddesena,
anya-e0103n0:1432_0: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ attano pharaṇākāreneva “ananta”nti
anya-e0103n0:1432_1: manasi kātabbattā “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti vuttanti puna “manasikāravasena vā ananta”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1432_4: Jhānavibhaṅgepi ayamevattho vuttoti dassento “yaṃ pana vibhaṅge vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1432_5: Tassā pāḷiyā evaṃ vā attho veditabbo –
anya-e0103n0:1432_6: taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1432_8: taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi karoti.
anya-e0103n0:1432_10: Yaṃ hi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena anantaṃ pharati,
anya-e0103n0:1432_11: taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasi karonto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī anantaṃ pharatīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1433_1: na ākāsassa viya uppādantādiabhāvenāti “nāssa antoti ananta”nti ettakamevāha.
anya-e0103n0:1433_4: yathāvuttaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ dutiyāruppajjhānena añcīyati vuttākārena ālambīyatīti viññāṇañcanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1435_4: Tattha tassevāti yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ, tasseva.
anya-e0103n0:1435_6: Etena tato aññaṃ tatiyāruppajjhānassa ārammaṇaṃ natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1435_12: “Manasi kātabbo”ti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ viññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1435_13: Tattha amanasikaritvāti sabbena sabbaṃ manasi akatvā acintetvā. Vā-
anya-e0103n0:1435_15: tena tīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1436_0: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattinimitte.
anya-e0103n0:1437_0: Tasmiṃ hi appanācitteti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānasampayutte appanāvasena pavatte citte,
anya-e0103n0:1437_1: tasmiṃ vā paṭhamāruppassa apagamasaṅkhāte natthibhāve yathāvutte appanācitte uppanne.
anya-e0103n0:1437_2: So bhikkhu abhāvameva passanto viharatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1437_3: Puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā suññameva passati,
anya-e0103n0:1437_6: “Parikammamanasikārena antarahite”ti iminā ārammaṇakaraṇābhāvena tassa antaradhānaṃ na naṭṭhattāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1437_8: yathā so puriso tattha sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato,
anya-e0103n0:1437_9: tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu kenacideva karaṇīyena apagatesu āgantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūhi suññameva passati,
anya-e0103n0:1437_11: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā pacchā natthīti parikammamanasikārena
anya-e0103n0:1437_12: tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppajjhānacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva passanto viharati,
anya-e0103n0:1437_13: na tassa apagamanakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
anya-e0103n0:1437_14: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1438_1: Natthitā pariyāyāsuññavivittabhāvāti “natthī”ti padassa atthaṃ vadantena suññavivittapadānipi gahitāni.
anya-e0103n0:1438_3: Vibhaṅgepi imassa padassa ayamevattho vuttoti dassetuṃ “yampi vibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1438_4: Tattha taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetīti yaṃ pubbe “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kataṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1438_6: Taṃyeva hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭhamena viya rūpanimittaṃ tatiyenāruppenābhāvetīti.
anya-e0103n0:1438_8: Sā hi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ bhaṅgābhāvameva passantī “viññāṇampi abhāvetī”tiādinā vattabbataṃ labhatīti adhippāyenāha “khayato sammasanaṃ viya vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1439_2: Sabhāvadhammassa appāvasesatā nāma bhaṅgo eva siyāti āha “bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1439_3: Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā siyā.
anya-e0103n0:1439_4: Akiñcananti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāraṃ aggahetvā sabbena sabbaṃ vibhāvanamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1441_1: No ca santāti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā savisesā santā,
anya-e0103n0:1441_2: evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti no ca santā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1441_11: Sā cettha paṭukiccā pañcavokārabhavato oḷārikasaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1442_3: Taṃ hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1442_4: Jhānasampayuttadhammānampi jhānānuguṇatāya samāpattipariyāyo labbhatīti āha “ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattisaṅkhātesu catūsu khandhesū”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1443_1: Yathāvuttaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti jhānaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1443_2: ākiñcaññameva ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ jhānassa kāraṇanti ārammaṇaṃ ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1444_0: Yāya saññāya bhāvatoti yādisāya saññāya atthibhāvena.
anya-e0103n0:1444_1: Yā hi sā paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato saññātipi na vattabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1444_5: Taṃ tāva dassetunti ettha tanti taṃ sasāpaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1444_8: Nevasaññīnāsaññīti hi puggalādhiṭṭhānena dhammaṃ uddharantena saññāvantamukhena saññā uddhaṭā,
anya-e0103n0:1445_2: Asati ca ādīnavadassane samatikkamo eva na siyā”ti dassento “santato ce manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n0:1446_0: Samatikkamitvāva gacchatīti tesaṃ sippīnaṃ jīvikaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te vītivattatiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:1446_3: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “santā vatāyaṃ samāpattī”tiādinā vuttena nayena santato manasi karonto.
anya-e0103n0:1446_14: Paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchantiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitā,
anya-e0103n0:1447_3: Visesato adhipaññāsikkhāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1447_4: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvatoti yadipi catutthāruppavipākasaññāya catutthāruppakusalasaññā oḷārikā,
anya-e0103n0:1447_6: tathāpi oḷārikasukhumatā nāma upādāyupādāya gahetabbāti pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannāya viya catuvokārepi
anya-e0103n0:1447_7: heṭṭhā tīsu bhūmīsu saññāya viya oḷārikāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1447_8: Sukhumāyāti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā sukhumāya saññāya bhāvato vijjamānattā.
anya-e0103n0:1447_19: Tathā nāsaññāti ettha na- kāro, a-
anya-e0103n0:1447_20: kāro ca aññattho evāti tena dvayena saññābhāvo eva dassitoti dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya āyatanabhāvo
anya-e0103n0:1448_1: yenettha saññāva edisī jātāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevala”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1448_2: Saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā katā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”tiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1448_3: Evaṃ esa atthoti kañci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa kañci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0103n0:1449_0: Atithokampi yaṃ telamatthi bhanteti āha akappiyabhāvaṃ upādāya,
anya-e0103n0:1450_1: taṃ saññā samānā kathamayaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti āha “dahanakiccamivā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1450_2: Saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā eva hesā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:1450_3: tato eva ca ñāṇassa sugayhāpi na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1450_7: Khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārālambanehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassako sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaudayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1450_10: Kalāpasammasanavasenevāti catutthāruppacittuppādapariyāpanne phassādidhamme avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā
anya-e0103n0:1450_12: Phassādidhamme vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasanaṃ anupadadhammavipassanā.
anya-e0103n0:1450_13: Evaṃ sukhumattaṃ gatā yathā dhammasenāpatināpi nāma anupadaṃ na vipassaneyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1451_2: eko kira brāhmaṇo aññataraṃ purisaṃ manuññaṃ mattikabhājanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā yāci “dehi me imaṃ bhājana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1451_5: Brāhmaṇo attano samīpe ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ uddissa āha “tena hi imassa pātuṃ dehī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1451_7: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ayogyabhāvaṃ upādāya “atthī”tipi vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1452_2: natthi kiñcī”ti tattha tattha bhāvanākāro gahito,
anya-e0103n0:1452_5: “bhāvanākāro nāma sopacārassa jhānassa yathāsakaṃ ārammaṇe pavattiākāro,
anya-e0103n0:1452_7: Te pana gayhamānā ekassa vā pubbaṅgamadhammassa vasena gahetabbā siyuṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1452_9: Tattha paṭhamapakkhe viññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ āpannanti ‘viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa’nti manasikāre catutthāruppassa viññāṇañcāyatanabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0103n0:1452_10: Dutiyapakkhe pana sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanadhammārammaṇatāya jhānassa ‘ākiñcaññaṃ ākiñcañña’nti manasikāre ākiñcaññāyatanatā vā siyā,
anya-e0103n0:1452_14: Na hi catutthāruppabhāvanā viññāṇamākiñcaññaṃ vā āmasantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1453_6: Atha kasmā vibhaṅge viya sutte bhāvanākāro na gahitoti?
anya-e0103n0:1453_9: Ye hi veneyyā yathā heṭṭhā tīsu āruppesu “ananto ākāso,
anya-e0103n0:1453_12: evaṃ aggahite eva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1453_13: tesaṃ vasena sutte tathā desanā katā,
anya-e0103n0:1453_15: Ye pana veneyyā vibhajitvā vutteyeva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1453_17: Dhammissaro pana bhagavā sammāsambuddho dhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ jānanto katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1453_19: Sā ca desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayatthāti ayamettha desanāvilāso.
anya-e0103n0:1453_20: Suttantadesanā vā pariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro na gahito,
anya-e0103n0:1453_21: abhidhammadesanā pana nippariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro gahitoti evampettha bhāvanākārassa gahaṇe,
anya-e0103n0:1454_3: Sā ca anupubbabhāvanā pahānakkamopajanitā pahātabbasamatikkamena jhānānaṃ adhigantabbato.
anya-e0103n0:1454_8: sabbāpi paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva sampādetabbato pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desanā āruḷhā.
anya-e0103n0:1454_9: Tathā hi “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādinā sīlasaṃvaro,
anya-e0103n0:1454_10: “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī”tiādinā indriyasaṃvaro,
anya-e0103n0:1454_12: “idha bhikkhu micchājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī”tiādinā ājīvapārisuddhi,
anya-e0103n0:1454_18: āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
anya-e0103n0:1454_20: Tasmā jhānāni desento bhagavā “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desesi.
anya-e0103n0:1454_23: Tattha yathā rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvanāvisesādhigatehi vitakkādīhi viya saddhādīhipi tikkhavisadasūrasabhāvehi
anya-e0103n0:1454_25: tadekaṭṭhānañca pāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanato uttarimanussadhammabhāvappattaṃ kāmāvacaradhammehi saṇhasukhumaṃ, santaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1454_27: dutiyajjhānādīni pana bhāvanāvisesena oḷārikaṅgappahānato tato sātisayaṃ saṇhasukhumasaṇhasukhumatarādibhāvappattāni honti.
anya-e0103n0:1454_28: Tathā arūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ ārammaṇasantatāyapi aṅgasantatāyapi
anya-e0103n0:1455_1: mahaggatabhāvenāpi ca abhede rūpāvacaracatutthato āruppaṃ aṅgatopi santameva,
anya-e0103n0:1455_5: svāyaṃ bhāvanāviseso paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya taṃtaṃpahātabbasamatikkamanavasena tassa tassa jhānassa
anya-e0103n0:1455_7: Yato catutthāruppaṃ yathā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakativipassakassāpi
anya-e0103n0:1455_9: tathā sayaṃ tatiyāruppadhammesu pavattamānaṃ te yāthāvato vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n0:1455_11: Kevalaṃ pana ārabbha pavattimattamevassa tattha hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1455_12: tayidaṃ ārammaṇabhāvenāpi nāma vibhūtākāratāya ṭhātuṃ appahontaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇe kiṃ pahoti.
anya-e0103n0:1455_13: Tasmā tadassa avibhūtakiccataṃ disvā satthā heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu bhāvanākāraṃ vatvā tādiso idha na labbhatīti
anya-e0103n0:1455_14: dīpetuṃ catutthāruppadesanāyaṃ sutte bhāvanākāraṃ pariyāyadesanattā na kathesi.
anya-e0103n0:1456_0: Yasmā pana sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇe pavattiākāro atthevāti atisukhumabhāvappattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n0:1456_1: “taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotī”ti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ yathādhammasāsanabhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1456_2: pubbabhāgavasena vā vibhaṅge “santato manasi karotī”ti vuttaṃ tadā yogino tassa vibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1456_3: Appanāvasena pana sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito avibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1456_4: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ hi kiñci ādito avibhūtaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1456_13: Catutthāruppakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana pariyosāne avibhūtaṃ bhāvanāya matthakappattiyaṃ ārammaṇassa avibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1456_14: Tasmā catutthāruppe imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ satthārā sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito,
anya-e0103n0:1456_15: na sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1458_5: tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi asadisatā dassitā hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1458_8: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tattha tattha jhāne patiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0103n0:1458_9: sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattheva pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1459_8: na ca ārammaṇe dosaṃ disvā anārammaṇassa vibhāvanātikkamo yujjati.
anya-e0103n0:1459_10: sato vuṭṭhahitvā taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1459_13: “Anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajjā”ti ettha pana dvayaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇañca viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1459_18: saddassa sambandhe āpanne “ayañca ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanā”ti viññāṇañcāyatanassa nivattanatthaṃ viññāṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1460_6: pamāṇato ca samabhāve uparūpari pana kāmaguṇānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1460_7: sukhasamphassādīnañca visesena paṇītatarādibhāvo viya etāsaṃ catunnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ āruppabhāvato,
anya-e0103n0:1460_8: aṅgato ca satipi samabhāve bhāvanāvisesasiddho pana sātisayo uparūpari paṇītatarādibhāvoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yathā hī”tiādinā.
anya-e0103n0:1461_6: Tannissitanti vā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ purisanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1461_7: Maṇḍapalaggañhi anissāya tena vinābhūte vivitte bahi okāse ṭhānaṃ viya ākāsalaggaviññāṇassa viveke tadapagame tatiyāruppassa ṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n0:1462_3: no ca santa”nti ca diṭṭhādīnavampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ aññassa tādisassa
anya-e0103n0:1462_4: ārammaṇabhāvayogyassa abhāvena alābhena ārammaṇaṃ karoti eva.
anya-e0103n0:1463_2: yathā koci puriso anekaporisaṃ dīghanisseṇiṃ āruḷho tassa uparimapade ṭhito tassā nisseṇiyā bāhumeva olubbhati aññassa alābhato,
anya-e0103n0:1463_4: missakapabbatassa vā aggakoṭiṃ āruḷho tassa matthakameva olubbhati,
anya-e0103n0:1463_5: yathā ca giriṃ silāpabbataṃ āruḷho paripphandamāno aññābhāvato attano jaṇṇukameva olubbhati,
anya-e0103n0:1463_6: tathā etaṃ catutthāruppajjhānaṃ taṃ tatiyāruppaṃ olubbhitvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n0:1468_2: āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti āha “ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1468_6: “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopākarūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekatthā udāhu nānatthā”tiādīsu samathe āgato.
anya-e0103n0:1468_9: tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ idha “āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā”ti adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1468_11: tattha nibbedavirāguppādanāya tappasaṅgena sabbampi āhāraṃ kiccappabhedādīnavopammehi vibhāvetuṃ “āharatīti āhāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1469_1: ṭhitiyā vā paccayabhāvena attano phalaṃ āneti nibbatteti pavatteti cāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1469_5: kabaḷīkāro ca so yathāvuttenatthena āhāro cāti kabaḷīkārāhāro.
anya-e0103n0:1469_8: Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:1469_11: attano sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho,
anya-e0103n0:1469_17: aññe dhammā kiṃ attano phalassa paccayā na hontīti?
anya-e0103n0:1469_19: ime pana tathā ca honti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayabhāve atirekapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n0:1470_1: Etesu hi paṭhamo sayaṃ yasmiṃ kalāpe tappariyāpannānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo hontova ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharati,
anya-e0103n0:1470_6: Ettha ca kammajādibhedabhinnā ojā sati paccayalābhe dve tisso paveṇiyo ghaṭentī ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ āharati,
anya-e0103n0:1470_7: sukhavedanīyādibhedabhinno phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati,
anya-e0103n0:1470_8: puññābhisaṅkhārādibhedabhinno manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavādīsu tīsu bhavesu yathārahaṃ saviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1470_12: Atha vā upatthambhakaṭṭhena ime eva dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1470_13: Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro rūpakāyassa upatthambhakaṭṭhena paccayo,
anya-e0103n0:1470_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0103n0:1470_16: arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1470_19: phassādayo ca tayo dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1470_20: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro,
anya-e0103n0:1471_8: Kabaḷīkārāhārahetu imesaṃ sattānaṃ chandarāgo bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa hetubhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1471_15: Upagamanaṃ appahīnavipallāsassa ārammaṇena samodhānaṃ saṅgati sukhavedanīyādiphassuppatti bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi aparimuccanato.
anya-e0103n0:1471_21: Tattha tattha bhave upapajjati etenāti upapatti,
anya-e0103n0:1471_23: khipanaṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ upapattimūlakehi byasanehi aparimuttato.
anya-e0103n0:1471_31: taṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ paṭisandhinimittehi dukkhehi avimuccanato.
anya-e0103n0:1472_1: Evaṃ hi tattha nikantibhayaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1472_2: Niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1472_5: vedanā ca dukkhasallādito daṭṭhabbāti phasse ādīnavaṃ passantassa upagamanabhayaṃ na hotīti āha “phassāhāro niccammagāvūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1472_6: Ekādasahi aggīhi sabbaso ādittā bhavā aṅgārakāsusadisāti passato upapattibhayaṃ na hotīti āha “manosañcetanāhāro aṅgārakāsūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1472_8: pahārasadisī vedanā duradhivāsatoti sammadeva passato paṭisandhibhayaṃ na hotīti āha “viññāṇāhāro sattisatūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1473_0: Evaṃ kiccādimukhena āhāresu ādīnavaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha yathādhippetaṃ āhāraṃ niddhāretvā paṭikkūlato
anya-e0103n0:1473_2: Upādāyarūpaniddesepi “kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti āgatattā tato visesento “asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedo”ti āha,
anya-e0103n0:1473_4: Tattha asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedoti asitabbapātabbakhāyitabbasāyitabbavibhāgo kālabhedavacanicchāya abhāvato yathā “duddha”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1473_5: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro vāti avadhāraṇaṃ yathā phassāhārādinivattanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1473_7: Savatthuko eva hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhūto,
anya-e0103n0:1473_8: tena āharīyatīti āhāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1473_9: Āharatīti āhāroti ayaṃ panattho nibbattitaojāvasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1474_1: atthato ca suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1474_11: kimikulasaṃvaddhanatoti evamādīhipi ākārehi āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā?
anya-e0103n0:1474_19: laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhosanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1474_20: “bhutto ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ āvahati,
anya-e0103n0:1474_22: takkoṭakādayo ca dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa kulappabhedā kimayo ca naṃ upanissāya jīvantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1475_1: antimajīvikābhāvo tāva cittasaṃkilesavisodhanatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhinivesato pageva manasi kātabbo “māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1475_2: Tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesupi paritassanagedhādisamuppattinivāraṇaṃ pageva anuṭṭhātabbaṃ suparisuddhasīlassa paṭisaṅkhānavato tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1475_7: Iminā vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n0:1476_6: ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
anya-e0103n0:1476_10: Nidadhāti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo,
anya-e0103n0:1476_19: sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikkūlanti sabbapacchā ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1477_1: Evaṃ mahānubhāveti idāni vattabbapaṭipattiyā mahānubhāveti vadanti,
anya-e0103n0:1477_2: sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānapariharaṇādisiddhaṃ vā dhammasudhammataṃ purakkhatvā yogāvacarena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti
anya-e0103n0:1477_7: Ayañca gamanādito paccavekkhaṇā yogino na attuddesikāva,
anya-e0103n0:1477_8: atha kho anuddesikāpīti dassento “sakalaratti”ntiādinā dhuradvayaṃ pariggahesi.
anya-e0103n0:1477_12: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañhi appattā bhāvanā pharaṇapītiyā abhāvato nisajjāvasena kāyakilamathaṃ na vinodatiyevāti iriyāpathacalanaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:1477_14: Atha vā gamanato yāva sammakkhanamanasikāro eko vāro,
anya-e0103n0:1477_25: tasmā ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgānīti purimāni dve pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇavacanāni.
anya-e0103n0:1478_0: Kiñcāpi yogāvacarānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sujaggitaṃ susammaṭṭhameva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1478_1: kadāci pana jagganato pacchā evampi siyāti paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇāya sambhavadassanatthaṃ “pādarajagharagolikavaccādisamparikiṇṇa”ntiādi
anya-e0103n0:1478_3: Tattha paccattharaṇanti bhūmiyā chavirakkhaṇatthaṃ attharitabbaṃ cimilikādiattharaṇamāha.
anya-e0103n0:1478_7: Appekadā ulūkapārāvatādīhīti idhāpi “appekadā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1479_0: Vitakkamāḷaketi “kattha nu kho ajja bhikkhāya caritabba”ntiādinā vitakkanamāḷake.
anya-e0103n0:1480_0: Gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādentenātiādi evamajjhāsayena nivāsanādi kātabbanti vattadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1480_2: Atha vā gaṇḍaṃ viya gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānenāti ekaṃ gaṇḍa-
anya-e0103n0:1480_6: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato gaṇḍoti attabhāvassa pariyāyo,
anya-e0103n0:1480_18: Gāmaracchā vinivijjhitvā ṭhitā oloketabbā honti yugamattadassināpi satāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1481_1: Anekakuṇapapariyosānanti ettha dunnivatthaduppārutamanussasamākulānaṃ gāmaracchānaṃ olokanampi ānetvā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1481_5: Yāvañcidaṃ paṭikkūlo āhāro yadatthaṃ gamanampi nāma evaṃ jegucchaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1482_5: ito parampi mahantaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sakalaṃ adhivāsetabbamevā”ti vakkhamānaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0103n0:1482_11: Macchā dhovīyanti etenāti macchadhovanaṃ, udakaṃ. Sammissa-
anya-e0103n0:1483_0: Dadamānāpītiādi satipi kesañci saddhānaṃ vasena sakkaccakāre paṭikkūlapaccavekkhaṇāyogyaṃ pana asaddhānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1483_7: Piṇḍolyassa antimajīvikābhāvenāha “kapaṇamanussena viya gāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhamitabba”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1484_2: Lajjitabbaṃ hoti “ucchiṭṭhaṃ nu kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ dātukāmo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti,
anya-e0103n0:1485_4: Vicuṇṇitamakkhitoti ubhayehi dantehi vicuṇṇito kheḷādīhi samupalitto.
anya-e0103n0:1485_9: raso pana nasseyya vā na vāti āha “antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1485_12: Cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n0:1486_2: Esa āhāro anto pavisamāno bahalamadhukatelamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1486_4: Nidhānamanupagato āmāsayaṃ appattoyeva āhāro pittādīhi vimissito hotīti āha “pavisamāno”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1486_8: Evaṃ āsayatoti jeguccho hutvā anto paviṭṭho jegucchatarehi pittādīhi vimissito ativiya jeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1488_4: Yathāvuttappakāreti sace pana “dasavassikenā”tiādinā yathāvutto pakāro etassāti yathāvuttappakāro, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1488_6: Atiduggandhajegucche padese paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1488_8: Kālameghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahuso vassanena ekaccaṃ asucijātaṃ uppilavitvā vigaccheyyāti akālamegha- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1488_10: ggahaṇaṃ na asubhassāpi asubhena sammissatāya asubhabhāvappattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1489_1: Suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viyāti yathā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo vidhinā tāpiyamānā suvaṇṇarajatādike muñcantiyo
anya-e0103n0:1489_4: Ayaṃ pana āhāro kāyagginā paripakko pheṇapubbuḷake muñcanto saṇhaṃ karonti etthāti “saṇhakaraṇī”ti laddhanāmake
anya-e0103n0:1489_5: nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddakaveḷunāḷikāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānamattena pakkhippamānapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1489_8: Gahaṇiyā indhanabhāgo viya kimibhakkhabhāgo ca apākaṭova.
anya-e0103n0:1489_10: aparipakkasabhāgā ca teti te anāmasitvā karīsamuttabhāgā evettha dassitā.
anya-e0103n0:1490_1: Paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūleneva bhavitabbanti dassento “sammā paripaccamāno”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1490_3: saddena na kevalaṃ tacādīni eva dvattiṃsākārapāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
anya-e0103n0:1490_4: atha kho akkhigūthakaṇṇagūthadantamalajallikāsambhavādīni dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsavinimuttāni asubhāni saṅgaṇhanto “nānākuṇapānī”ti āhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1491_10: sakalakāye lomakūpehi sedajallikāti evaṃpakāraṃ asuciṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1491_16: Rattoti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmākārena chandarāgena ratto.
anya-e0103n0:1491_17: Giddhoti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddho gedhaṃ āpanno.
anya-e0103n0:1491_18: Gadhitoti dummocanīyabhāvena ganthito viya tattha paṭibaddho.
anya-e0103n0:1492_4: Evanti ekena dvārena pavesanaṃ anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1493_2: saddena paviṭṭhamattopi nāma pavesadvāraṃ jegucchaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n0:1493_16: Cokkhajātikā pana mukhādīnipi dhovitvā hatthaṃ puna dhovantiyeva.
anya-e0103n0:1493_20: Ettha ca āhāratthāya gamanapariyesanānaṃ paṭikkūlatā āhāre paṭikkūlatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n0:1494_1: Taṃ nimittanti yathāvuttehi ākārehi punappunaṃ manasi karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārasaññitaṃ bhāvanāya nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1494_5: Tathā ca sati appanāppattena jhānena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1494_10: Ettha hi yadipi paṭikkūlākāravasena bhāvanā pavattati.
anya-e0103n0:1494_13: na paññattīti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇamukhenapi sabhāvadhammeyeva ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanato,
anya-e0103n0:1494_14: sabhāvadhammānañca sabhāveneva gambhīrabhāvato na tattha jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0103n0:1494_17: kathaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ “saññā” icceva voharīyatīti āha “paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1495_0: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “imañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1495_2: Patilīyatīti saṅkucati anekākāraṃ tattha paṭikkūlatāya saṇṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1495_7: madābhāvaggahaṇeneva cassa davamaṇḍanavibhūsanādīnampi abhāvo gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1495_8: Kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhenāti vuttanayena paṭikkūlākārato kabaḷīkārāhārassa paricchijja jānanadvārena.
anya-e0103n0:1495_9: Pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgoti anativattanaṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu niyutto,
anya-e0103n0:1495_12: Rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatā eva honti bhojane mattaññutāya ukkaṃsagamanato.
anya-e0103n0:1495_13: Sati ca visayisamatikkame visayo samatikkanto eva hotīti āha “so pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1495_15: taggāhakā pasādā ca sukheneva pariññaṃ gacchantīti.
anya-e0103n0:1495_21: phalaggahaṇena kesādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pariggaho siddho hotīti āha “kāyagatāsatibhāvanāpi pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1495_24: Anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇena kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n0:1495_25: Imaṃ pana paṭipattinti imaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1495_26: Amatapariyosānatanti nibbānaniṭṭhitaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbānādhigamanti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1498_1: “Ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti uddeso nāma niddesattho mudumajjhapaññābāhullato,
anya-e0103n0:1498_2: āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1498_3: Tattha satipi visayabhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthānabhāvasāmaññena pana taṃ abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti,
anya-e0103n0:1498_4: pubbabhāge vā satipi visayabhede atthasiddhiyaṃ tassa ekavisayatāvāti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1498_5: Yathā hi dvattiṃsākāre kammaṃ karontassa yogino yadipi pubbabhāge visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1498_6: aparabhāge pana ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse atthasiddhi hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1498_10: yathā paṭikkūlabhāvasāmaññena dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhāne abhedato manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1498_11: evaṃ idha dhātubhāvasāmaññena abhedato manasikāro pavattatīti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti?
anya-e0103n0:1498_13: Tattha hi paṇṇattisamatikkamato paṭṭhāya paṭikkūlavaseneva sabbattha manasikāro pavattetabbo,
anya-e0103n0:1498_14: idha pana sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato dhātuyo manasi kātabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1498_18: aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ nāma ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1498_24: Kathaṃ pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassā vacīgocarātikkantabhāvatoti?
anya-e0103n0:1499_1: Idaṃ hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na paṇṇattimattasallakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0103n0:1499_22: tatthāpi ajjhattikānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pabhedato anavasesapariyādānassa katattā,
anya-e0103n0:1499_24: Atha vā dvidhā āgatanti ettha dvidhāva āgatanti na evaṃ niyamo gahetabbo,
anya-e0103n0:1499_26: tena tatiyassāpi pakārassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1499_27: So ca nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayo “saṅkhepato ca vitthārato cā”ti ettha āvuttivasena, ca-
anya-e0103n0:1499_29: Atha vā yo nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena atisaṅkhepapaṭikkhepamukhena labbhamāno vitthārabhāgo,
anya-e0103n0:1499_31: Evañca katvā “nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgata”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1500_0: Kāmaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā desanā āgatā,
anya-e0103n0:1500_1: upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyatthavibhāvanatthāti upamaṃ tāva dassetvā upameyyatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādinā pāḷi ānītā.
anya-e0103n0:1500_7: ekaccaveneyyajanacaritānukulatāya ca mahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1501_0: Evaṃ tikkhapaññassātiādīsu evanti yathādassitaṃ pāḷiṃ paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n0:1502_1: yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā,
anya-e0103n0:1502_5: Antevāsīti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī tassa tannissāya jīvanato.
anya-e0103n0:1502_7: Mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāteti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte.
anya-e0103n0:1502_8: Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā samohitā viya honti,
anya-e0103n0:1502_11: Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhajjantīti bīlā, bhāgā, va-
anya-e0103n0:1502_15: Tameva hi bhāgatthaṃ dassetuṃ “koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1502_19: saddassa aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako,
anya-e0103n0:1502_20: idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1502_22: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāsaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya “iriyāpathā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n0:1502_27: Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1502_28: Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1502_29: Dhātusoti dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1502_30: Paccavekkhatīti pati pati avekkhati ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujitvā passati.
anya-e0103n0:1503_0: Yathā chekotiādinā pāḷiyā saddatthavivaraṇavasena vuttamevatthaṃ idāni bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1503_5: Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā,
anya-e0103n0:1503_9: tato vā vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1503_13: Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti yathāvuttaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso paccavekkhantassa.
anya-e0103n0:1503_15: vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato.
anya-e0103n0:1503_16: Evaṃ hi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena opameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti.
anya-e0103n0:1504_1: Evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “mahāhatthipadūpame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1504_4: na sabbaṃ desanānayaṃ aññathāpi tattha desanānayassa āgatattā.
anya-e0103n0:1505_2: Ajjhattaṃ paccattanti padadvayenāpi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammo vuccatīti āha “ubhayampi niyakassa adhivacana”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1505_3: Sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attani gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena attānaṃ adhikicca pavattaṃ ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1505_8: Yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1505_12: Yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1505_16: Taṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya upādinnampi atthi anupādinnampi,
anya-e0103n0:1505_17: taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “upādinnanti daḷhaṃ ādinna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1505_19: Seyyathidanti kathetukamyatāpucchāvācīti āha “taṃ katamanti ceti attho”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1505_23: Kiñcāpi matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgahetvā idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1505_24: paṭisambhidāmagge pana vīsatiyā ākārehi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ visuṃ gahitanti tampi saṅgaṇhanto thaddhabhāvādhikatāya
anya-e0103n0:1505_25: pathavīdhātukoṭṭhāsesuyeva “matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n0:1505_26: “Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti vā iminā pāḷiyaṃ matthaluṅgassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1505_27: Tasmā idha “yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ “matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1505_29: Puna yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesūti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1506_4: So hi vissandanabhāvena sasambhārapathavīsaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ visarati,
anya-e0103n0:1506_7: Sopi hi sahajātaaññamaññanissayādipaccayatāya sesabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ dravabhāvasiddhena vissandanabhāvena ābandhattaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1507_5: Tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena veditabbāti dassetuṃ “indriyavekallata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1507_7: sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho paridāhoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n0:1507_8: Yena jīrīyatīti ca ekāhikādijararogena jarīyatītipi attho yujjati.
anya-e0103n0:1507_9: Satakkhattuṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā sītudake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭā sappi “satadhotasappī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1507_13: Sammā paripākaṃ gacchatīti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1507_14: asammāparipākopi pana visamavepākiniyā tassā eva vasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1507_17: Asitādibhedassa hi āhārassa pariṇāme raso hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1508_8: saddena pana antantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarappadeso idha kucchi-
anya-e0103n0:1508_9: saddena vuccatīti āha “kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1508_12: “Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāvā”ti etena assāsapassāsānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā pavatti natthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0103n0:1508_13: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānassa sambhavo atthīti.
anya-e0103n0:1508_18: santāne pavattautusamuṭṭhānassa ca vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1508_19: Sabbatthāti āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ niddesaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n0:1508_20: Tattha āpodhātuniddese “yaṃ vā panañña”nti iminā sambhavassa,
anya-e0103n0:1508_22: vāyodhātuniddese dhamanijālānusaṭassa tattha tattha cammakhīlapīḷakādinibbattakavāyuno saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1508_26: Na hi samiñjanādinibbattakā eva aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā,
anya-e0103n0:1509_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ vitthārato āgate dhātukammaṭṭhāneti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1509_3: Tena ayaṃ vaṇṇanā na kevalaṃ mahāhatthipadūpamasseva,
anya-e0103n0:1510_5: Yasmā yesaṃ “tikkhapañño nātitikkhapañño”ti imesaṃ duvidhānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ dvidhā desitaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1510_6: tasmā kammaṭṭhānābhinivesopi tesaṃ dvidhāva icchitabboti taṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1510_10: lomā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā evaṃ dvācattālīsāya ākārehi vitthārato dhātukammaṭṭhānapariggaho.
anya-e0103n0:1510_12: Yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇanti kesādīsu yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvo.
anya-e0103n0:1510_14: Evaṃ manasi karototi vatthuṃ anāmasitvā evaṃ lakkhaṇamattato manasikāraṃ pavattentassa.
anya-e0103n0:1510_16: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1510_17: tassa vā lakkhaṇassa suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānato taṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ manasikārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ visadaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1510_19: Sabbaso mandapaññassa bhāvanāva na ijjhatīti āha “nātitikkhapaññassā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1510_20: Evaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena saṅkhepato manasi karoto.
anya-e0103n0:1510_21: Andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hotīti anupaṭṭhānato andhaṃ viya karontaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1510_23: Vatthuāmasanena vitthārato manasi karontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1511_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1511_1: Tattha peyyālamukhanti peyyālapāḷiyā mukhabhūtaṃ dvārabhūtaṃ ādito vāraṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1511_6: Yathā ganthaparivattane tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepo ruccati,
anya-e0103n0:1512_3: taṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti idha na āmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1512_10: Paṭisallīnenāti pati pati puthuttārammaṇato cittaṃ nisedhetvā kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena,
anya-e0103n0:1512_12: Sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ āvajjetvāti uddhaṃ pādatalā,
anya-e0103n0:1512_14: tiriyaṃ tacapariyantaṃ sabbampi attano karajakāyaṃ dhātuvasena manasi karonto yasmā cātumahābhūtiko ayaṃ kāyo,
anya-e0103n0:1512_15: tasmā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti catumahābhūtavasena samannāharitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1512_17: upaṭṭhānākārato ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “yo imasmiṃ kāye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1513_10: upaṭṭhānākāro ca nāma dhātūnaṃ sakiccakaraṇavasena ñāṇassa vibhūtākāro.
anya-e0103n0:1513_13: Ekaccassa hi dhātuyo manasi karontassa tā sabhāvato gahetabbataṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n0:1513_16: Tatrāyaṃ yogī dhātuyo manasi karonto ādito paccekaṃ salakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:1513_18: Tenāha “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1513_20: Tattha pariggahetvāti pariggāhakabhūtena ñāṇena dhātuyo lakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n0:1514_0: Evaṃ pana dhātuyo pariggahetvā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0103n0:1514_3: vāyodhātu vitthambhanabhāvo vā samudīraṇabhāvo vā”ti evaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva dhātuyo manasi karontena
anya-e0103n0:1514_4: kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1514_6: Tassevaṃ manasi karoto yaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu supākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1514_7: tadeva gahetvā itaraṃ vissajjetvā tena saddhiṃ “pathavīdhātu āpodhātū”tiādinā manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1514_15: tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi manasikārakosallaṃ anuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1515_0: Tattha anupubbatoti anupaṭipāṭito ācariyassa santike uggahitapaṭipāṭito,
anya-e0103n0:1515_2: Evaṃ anupubbato manasi karontenāpi nātisīghato manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1515_3: Atisīghato manasi karoto hi aparāparaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro nirantaraṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1515_9: Atisaṇikato manasi karoto hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1515_11: Atisīghaṃ atisaṇikañca maggaṃ gacchantā purisā ettha nidassetabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1515_12: Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1515_13: Bahiddhā vikkhepe hi sati kammaṭṭhānā parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
anya-e0103n0:1515_16: taṃ atikkamitvā lakkhaṇesu eva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1516_0: Evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ vijahitvā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇādīsu eva manasikāraṃ pavattentassa lakkhaṇāni supākaṭāni suvibhūtāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0103n0:1516_1: Tassevaṃ punappunaṃ manasikāravasena cittaṃ āsevanaṃ labhati.
anya-e0103n0:1516_2: Sabbo rūpakāyo dhātumattato upaṭṭhāti suñño nissatto nijjīvo yantaṃ viya yantasuttena aparāparaṃ parivattamāno.
anya-e0103n0:1516_4: athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā dhātusamūhavaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0103n0:1516_5: tehi kariyamānā kiriyā dhātumayena yantena pavattiyamānā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n0:1516_6: tehi ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi dhātusaṅghāte pakkhippamāno dhātusaṅghāto viya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1516_7: Athassa tathā laddhāsevanampi cittaṃ yadi accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccavasena vā atilīnavīriyatāya kosajjavasena vā bhāvanāvidhiṃ na otareyya,
anya-e0103n0:1516_10: bojjhaṅgasuttanti imesu tīsu suttesu āgatanayena vīriyasamādhiyojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1516_12: Evaṃ pana vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā tasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamatāni suvisadāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1516_13: tadā asaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0103n0:1516_14: tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāniyeva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi.
anya-e0103n0:1516_15: Ettāvatā cānena upacārajjhānaṃ samadhigataṃ hoti dhātulakkhaṇārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1517_2: lokiyamahājano ca “satto jīvo”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve avijjamānaṃ vikappanāmatteneva samāropenti,
anya-e0103n0:1517_6: Manasi kātabbanti punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena dhātumattato dhātulakkhaṇaṃ manasi ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1517_7: Paccavekkhitabbanti tadeva dhātulakkhaṇaṃ pati pati avekkhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1518_0: Tassevaṃ vāyamamānassāti tassa yogino evaṃ vuttappakārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa,
anya-e0103n0:1518_7: antarā saṅkocaṃ anāpajjantena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ussoḷhiyaṃ avaṭṭhānena sammadeva vāyāmaṃ payogaṃ parakkamaṃ pavattentassa.
anya-e0103n0:1518_9: bhāvanāpaññāya ādimajjhapariyosānesu avijahanena sabbato gahito mahaggatabhāvaṃ appattatāya upacāramatto
anya-e0103n0:1518_12: Appanaṃ hi upecca cārī samādhi upacārasamādhi,
anya-e0103n0:1518_14: Tādisassa pana samādhissa samānalakkhaṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1518_17: Sabhāvadhamme hi tassa gambhīrabhāvato asati bhāvanāvisese appanājhānaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n0:1518_19: āruppaṃ ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena appanāppattaṃ hotīti maraṇānussatiniddese vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0103n0:1519_0: Evaṃ rūpakāye avisesena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha
anya-e0103n0:1519_1: aṭṭhiādīnaṃ vinibbhujanavasena saṅkhepato sutte āgataṃ dhātumanasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1519_2: Tattha ye ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1519_3: Yathāpaccayaṃ ṭhitā sannivesavisiṭṭhā kaṭṭhavallitiṇamattikāyo upādāya yathā agārasamaññā,
anya-e0103n0:1519_4: na tattha koci agāro nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n0:1519_5: evaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ sannivesavisiṭṭhāni pavattamānāni aṭṭhinhārumaṃsacammāni paṭicca sarīrasamaññā,
anya-e0103n0:1519_9: Tattha aṭṭhiñca paṭiccāti paṇhikaṭṭhikādibhedaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ussitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ atirekatisatabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ upādāya.
anya-e0103n0:1519_10: Nhāruñcāti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitaṃ navasatappabhedaṃ nhāruṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1519_11: Maṃsanti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1519_12: Cammanti macchikapattakacchāyāya chaviyā sañchāditaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ bahalacammaṃ paṭicca upādāya.
anya-e0103n0:1519_15: Ākāso parivāritoti yathā bhittipādādivasena ṭhapitaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1519_19: bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1519_22: bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso tāneva aṭṭhiādīni upādāya rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n0:1519_24: Yathā ca kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ loke “khattiyagehaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1519_27: natthettha koci satto vā jīvo vāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1520_0: Teti te cattāro koṭṭhāse vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1520_1: Taṃtaṃantarānusārināti aṭṭhinhārūnaṃ nhārumaṃsānaṃ maṃsacammānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ vivarānupātinā ñāṇasaṅkhātena hatthena.
anya-e0103n0:1520_3: Atha vā vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti paccekaṃ aṭṭhiādīnaṃ antarānusārinā ñāṇahatthena vinibbhogaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n0:1520_4: Etesūti sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ catudhā katvā vibhattesu yathāvuttesu aṭṭhiādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu.
anya-e0103n0:1520_5: Purimanayenevāti “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva.
anya-e0103n0:1521_4: nanu ādito dvattiṃsākārā dhātuyo na hontīti?
anya-e0103n0:1521_6: Vuttappakāreti “gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgate”tiādinā vuttappakāre.
anya-e0103n0:1521_7: Katasabbakiccenāti palibodhupacchedādikaṃ kataṃ sabbakiccaṃ etenāti katasabbakicco,
anya-e0103n0:1521_8: tenassa sīlavisodhanādi pana kammaṭṭhānuggahaṇato pageva siddhaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1521_13: Kesādīsu hi vīsatiyā ākāresu “pathavī”ti buddhivohārā pathavīnimittakā thaddhataṃ upādāya pavattanato.
anya-e0103n0:1521_14: Tasmā tattha pathavīsambhāro nāma savisesāya tassā atthitāya kesādayo saha sambhārehīti sasambhārā.
anya-e0103n0:1521_20: chasu ca koṭṭhāsesu yathākkamaṃ pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo pariggahetvā dhātuvavatthānaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n0:1522_0: Sasambhāravibhattitoti sasambhārānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse pubbe viya ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1522_10: kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tattha thaddhatādikaṃ catubbidhampi lakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā bhāvanā salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n0:1522_12: Salakkhaṇavibhattitoti thaddhalakkhaṇādinā salakkhaṇānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādīsu dvācattālīsāya
anya-e0103n0:1522_13: ākāresu paccekaṃ thaddhatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vavatthāpanavasena bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n0:1523_0: Evaṃ catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭhaṃ bhāvanānayaṃ niddisituṃ “kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvetī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1523_1: Ettha ca yathā tikkhapañño puggalo tikkhatāya paropariyattasabbhāvato tikkhindriyamudindriyatāvasena duvidhoti.
anya-e0103n0:1523_2: Tattha tikkhindriyassa vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamanayo vutto,
anya-e0103n0:1523_11: Tassa evaṃ vavatthāpayato eva dhātuyo pākaṭā honti savisesaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā.
anya-e0103n0:1524_7: Dvattiṃsākāreti dhātumanasikāravasena pariggahite kesādike dvattiṃsavidhe koṭṭhāse.
anya-e0103n0:1524_8: “Dvattiṃsākāre”ti ca idaṃ tejavāyukoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇādivasena vavatthānassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1524_9: Sabbaṃ tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbanti “vacasā manasā”tiādinā vuttauggahakosalluddesato paṭṭhāya yāva “anupubbamuñcanādivasenā”ti padaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1524_10: tāva āgataṃ sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1524_12: Ayañca vaṇṇādivasena manasikāro dhātupaṭikkūlavaṇṇamanasikārānaṃ sādhāraṇo pubbabhāgoti nibbattitadhātumanasikārameva
anya-e0103n0:1525_1: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti ete “sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ kesā”ti evaṃ vohariyamānā bhūtupādāyadhammā “mayi kesā jātā,
anya-e0103n0:1525_3: Iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca abyāpāratāya dhātumattataṃ sandasseti,
anya-e0103n0:1525_4: tena ca ābhogapaccavekkhaṇānampi evameva abyāpāratā dīpitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1525_6: tesaṃ kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā,
anya-e0103n0:1525_16: Tato eva pathavīdhātūti evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1526_0: 312. Suññagāmaṭṭhāneti ettha suññagāmaggahaṇaṃ paramatthato vedakavirahadassanatthaṃ kāyassa.
anya-e0103n0:1532_1: Paṇhikaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādhārabhāvo viya gopphakaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādheyyabhāvopi asamannāhārasiddhoti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1532_2: “paṇhikaṭṭhigopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna “sīsaṭṭhigīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1536_2: Evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānātīti ettha na vakkahadayāni jānanti “mayaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchannānī”ti,
anya-e0103n0:1536_3: na sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchanna”nti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1540_1: Āmāsaye ṭhito paribhuttāhāro udariyanti adhippetanti āha “udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyita”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1541_2: kāyusmā viya ca kammajarūpapaṭibaddhavuttikanti āha “ābaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1541_3: Paṭibaddhatāvacanena cassa jīvitindriye sati sabbhāvameva dīpeti,
anya-e0103n0:1543_1: Pubbāsayo mandapaññānaṃ kesañcideva hotīti katvā asabbasādhāraṇanti adhippāyenāha “pubbo anibaddhokāso”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1544_4: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇena ca temetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1544_5: Heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāneti temakatemitabbānaṃ abyāpāratāsāmaññanidassanatthaṃ eva upamā daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0103n0:1544_9: Yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānāti,
anya-e0103n0:1544_10: vakkādīni “amhe temayamānaṃ lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānantīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1545_4: Medassa satipi patthinnatāya ghanabhāve maṃsassa viya na baddhatāti vuttaṃ “patthinnayūso”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1546_1: Udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesūti nātipariṇatānaṃ sajalakānaṃ aggato chinnānaṃ tālasalāṭukānaṃ vivarāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1547_1: Vasāya attano ādhāre abhibyāpanamukhena abyāpāratāsāmaññaṃ vibhāvetabbanti ācāmagatatelaṃ nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1549_1: Kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā tejokoṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbo manasikāroti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1550_3: Dhātuyo pākaṭā hontīti vitthārato pariggahitattā dhātuyo vibhūtā honti.
anya-e0103n0:1552_0: Puna tatthevāti tesuyeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesūti attho.
anya-e0103n0:1552_1: Ettha ca kesādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ saṃviggahatāya tattha vijjamānā āpodhātuādayo nhāniyacuṇṇādīsu udakādayo viya
anya-e0103n0:1553_0: Santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsesu pana vāyodhātuādayo na tathā suviññeyyāti katvā “tena avinibhutta”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1553_4: Vāyukoṭṭhāsāpi hi uddhaṅgamavātādayo piṇḍākāreneva pariggahetabbataṃ upagacchanti,
anya-e0103n0:1553_9: Evaṃ vavatthāpayatoti vuttākārena salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo vavatthāpentassa.
anya-e0103n0:1554_1: Evampi bhāvayatoti salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo pariggahetvā bhāventassāpi.
anya-e0103n0:1554_2: Pubbe vuttanayenāti sasambhāravibhattito bhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena.
anya-e0103n0:1554_4: Sabbakoṭṭhāsesūti ekacattālīsabhedesu sesasabbakoṭṭhāsesu evamettha aṭṭhasaṭṭhidhātusatassa pariggaho vutto hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1555_0: Idāni vacanatthādimukhenapi dhātūsu manasikāravidhānaṃ dassetuṃ “vacanatthato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1555_1: Tattha vacanatthatoti yasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānassa uggahaṇaṃ vacanavasena hoti vacanadvārena tadatthassa ādito gahetabbato,
anya-e0103n0:1555_4: sāmaññato ca dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa yasmā tā piṇḍaso pavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1555_7: Te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti tappariyāpannānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ ekasmiṃ sarīre parimeyyaparicchedaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1555_9: So panāyaṃ tāsaṃ cuṇṇato manasikāro saṅghāṭavasena hotīti nibbaṭṭitasarūpameva pariggahetabbaṃ dassetuṃ lakkhaṇādito manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1555_10: Lakkhaṇādito dhātuyo pariggaṇhantena salakkhaṇavibhattito kammaṭṭhānābhinivese yasmā dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1555_12: ettakā cittādisamuṭṭhānā”ti ayaṃ vibhāgo ñātabbo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1556_0: Evaṃ pariññātasamuṭṭhānānampi tāsaṃ saddānusārena vinā visesasāmaññapariggaho kātabboti dassetuṃ nānattekattato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_1: Lakkhaṇavisesato vinibhuttarūpāpi etā aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya padesena avinibhuttāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti
anya-e0103n0:1556_4: kāci visabhāgāti ayampi viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_6: bāhirā tabbiparītāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ ajjhattikabāhiravisesato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_7: Sajātisaṅgahādiko dhātusaṅgahavisesopi pariggahitabboti dassetuṃ saṅgahato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_8: Sandhāraṇādīhi yathāsakakiccehi aññamaññūpatthambhabhāvatopi dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ paccayato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_9: Abyāpāranayato dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ asamannāhārato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1556_11: paccayabhāvavisesato ca dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ paccayavibhāgato manasikāro vuttoti evametesaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1557_11: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n0:1558_0: Evaṃ tāva visesato vacanatthaṃ vatvā idāni sāmaññato vattuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1558_1: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇatoti yathā titthiyaparikappito “pakati attā”ti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi,
anya-e0103n0:1558_3: Etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0103n0:1558_5: Etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā ayalohādidhātuyo viya ayalohādiṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti.
anya-e0103n0:1558_7: taṃ vā dukkhaṃ etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi anuvidhīyati,
anya-e0103n0:1558_8: tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti evaṃ dukkhādhānato, dhātuyo.
anya-e0103n0:1558_10: Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturoyaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0103n0:1558_12: sādhāraṇato ca dhātūnaṃ sarasalakkhaṇameva vibhāvīyatīti āha “evaṃ visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasi kātabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1558_13: Manasikāro pana vacanatthamukhena dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1559_2: Atha vā ākarīyanti dissanti ettha dhātuyoti ākārā, koṭṭhāsā.
anya-e0103n0:1559_3: Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānāti yathāvuttānaṃ paccayavisesena visiṭṭharūpānaṃ vaṇṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samavadhānato
anya-e0103n0:1559_7: Yathā hi vaṇṇādayo aṭṭha dhammā paññāya vinibbhujjamānā aññamaññabyatirekena paramatthato upalabbhanti,
anya-e0103n0:1559_8: na evaṃ vaṇṇādibyatirekena paramatthato kesā upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n0:1559_9: Tasmā ye ca dhamme samudite upādāya “kesā”ti sammuti,
anya-e0103n0:1559_10: tesu visuṃ visuṃ katesu natthi “kesā”ti sammuti,
anya-e0103n0:1560_0: “Aṭṭhadhammakalāpamattamevā”ti idaṃ kesapaññattiyā upādāyabhūte vaṇṇādike ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1560_4: Dasadhammakalāpopīti ettha asitādiparipācako tejokoṭṭhāso navadhammakalāpopīti vattabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1560_6: atha kasmā pathavīādidhātumattato manasi karīyantīti āha “ussadavasena panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1560_10: Ettha hi udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttañca utusamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n0:1560_13: sedoassu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti cattāro utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n0:1561_0: Tesu asitādiparipācake tejokoṭṭhāse eko kalāpo jīvitanavako,
anya-e0103n0:1561_8: cakkhādisaññitesu maṃsakoṭṭhāsesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāvatthudasakasahitā cāti paripuṇṇāyatanake rūpakāye
anya-e0103n0:1561_9: bhedaṃ anāmasitvā ekattavasena gayhamānā sattacattālīsādhikasatarūpakalāpā rūpavibhāgato sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍharūpasahassaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1561_10: koṭṭhāsānaṃ pana avayavavibhāgena tadavayavakalāpānaṃ bhede gayhamāne rūpadhammānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhedatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1561_11: Evaṃ dhammavibhāgato anekabhedabhinnāpi ime dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsā ussadaggahaṇena catudhātuvaseneva vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0103n0:1562_1: Majjhimena pamāṇenāti ārohapariṇāhehi majjhimasarīre labbhamānena majjhimena parimāṇena.
anya-e0103n0:1562_3: Paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇāti ettha yathā “aṅgulassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo yavo,
anya-e0103n0:1562_9: evaṃ aṇuno aṭṭhamo bhāgo paramāṇu nāmā”ti keci.
anya-e0103n0:1562_17: Tasmā aṇuno chattiṃsatimabhāgamatto paramāṇu nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa agocaro dibbacakkhusseva gocarabhūto.
anya-e0103n0:1563_5: taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n0:1563_8: Anupālitāti yathā paggharaṇasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1563_12: Na vikirati na viddhaṃsatīti sukhumarajabhūtāpi pathavīdhātu ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi
anya-e0103n0:1563_13: laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā tejasā paripakkā vāyunā vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā piṭṭhacuṇṇā viya na ito cito
anya-e0103n0:1563_15: atha kho piṇḍitā ghanabhūtā hutvā nānappakārena gahetabbataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0103n0:1563_20: na tādiso tejovāyodhātūsu labbhatīti meyyabhāvābhāvato tattha cuṇṇabhedo na uddhaṭo.
anya-e0103n0:1563_21: Tathā hi sasambhāratejovāyūsupi meyyabhāvo na labbhateva.
anya-e0103n0:1565_0: Usumākārabhūtāti etena kāye pākatikausmāpi gahaṇīsaṅkhātāya tassāyeva tejodhātuyā vasena hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n0:1565_2: Sā hi yathābhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti santejetīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1565_5: cittappasādahetukāya ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo,
anya-e0103n0:1565_6: pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyā yathāvuttatejodhātūti āha “vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahatī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1566_13: Tattha dhātuyantanti suttena viya yantarūpakaṃ asatipi kattubhūte attani cittavasena dhātumayaṃ yantaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1567_1: Yadipi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇādayo heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttā eva,
anya-e0103n0:1567_2: tathāpi te anavasesato dassetvā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “lakkhaṇādito”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1567_7: tathāpi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena abhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato.
anya-e0103n0:1567_10: kakkhaḷattaṃ hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1567_13: Tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:1567_16: Yathā vā dhammuddesavāravaṇṇanādīsu rasādinā aññesaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā paccayavantatādassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1567_18: Idha pana dhātūnaṃ anaññasādhāraṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya codanāya aññadhammabhūtaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1567_20: Tathā hi sā nesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n0:1567_21: Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraudakaṃ viya nhānīyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ saṅgahaṇapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:1567_22: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:1568_7: Sabbepīti te sabbepi kammādivasena uppajjanato catusamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n0:1568_8: Kesādīnampi hi maṃsato avimuttabhāgo kammāhāracittasamuṭṭhānova hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1569_7: saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānānaṃ viya mudusaṇhapharusabhāvādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1569_9: nanu kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekattaṃ hoti sādhāraṇattāti? Na,
anya-e0103n0:1569_11: aññā utuādisamuṭṭhānā”tiādikaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāya tathā vacanato.
anya-e0103n0:1569_16: tasmiṃ vā sati yo vijjamānasseva visadisuppattiyā hetubhāvo,
anya-e0103n0:1571_4: mahantāni vā abhūtāni etthāti mahābhūto, māyākāro.
anya-e0103n0:1571_6: niruḷho vā ayaṃ tesu mahābhūtasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1571_10: Tattha vañcakatā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāni hutvā nīlādisabhāvassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1571_13: bahi ca aṭṭhitānaṃyeva aññamaññaṃ nissāya avaṭṭhānato aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatā.
anya-e0103n0:1571_14: Yadi hi imā dhātuyo aññamaññassa anto ṭhitā,
anya-e0103n0:1571_19: Evaṃ santepi patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakaṃ kiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārikā honti,
anya-e0103n0:1571_21: Tenāha “na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1572_0: Mahāparihāratoti ettha vacanatthaṃ vadanto āha “mahantehi…pe… bhūtāni,
anya-e0103n0:1573_0: Tathā hīti tato eva vikārassa mahantattā evāti taṃ vikāraṃ dassetuṃ “bhūmito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1573_2: Koṭisatasahassaṃ ekaṃ koṭisatasahassekaṃ cakkavāḷanti taṃ sabbaṃ āṇākhettabhāvena ekaṃ katvā vadati.
anya-e0103n0:1573_3: Vilīyatīti vipattikarameghābhivuṭṭhena khārudakena lavaṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchati viddhaṃsati.
anya-e0103n0:1574_3: Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena ḍaṭṭho patthaddho hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1574_4: evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1574_10: kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1574_11: tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hotīti. Vā-
anya-e0103n0:1574_14: kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti vā,
anya-e0103n0:1574_16: pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti.
anya-e0103n0:1575_2: Sañchinnoti samantato chinno paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇo āyasmato upasenattherassa sarīraṃ viya.
anya-e0103n0:1575_3: Mahāvikārāni bhūtānīti mahāvikāravantāni bhūtāni mahābhūtānīti purimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1575_4: “Pathavī”tiādinā sabbalokassa pākaṭānipi vipallāsaṃ muñcitvā yathāsabhāvato pariggaṇhane mahantena vāyāmena
anya-e0103n0:1575_7: “Amahantānī”ti mantvā ṭhitā tesaṃ duppariggahataṃ disvā “aho mahantāni etānī”ti jānātīti mahābhūtekadesatādīhi vā kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0103n0:1576_8: Pathavīādayo pana catasso dhātuyo tassa mahābhūtassa ekadesabhūtā “mahābhūtā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n0:1576_9: Samudāyesu hi pavattavohārā avayavesupi dissanti yathā “samuddo diṭṭho,
anya-e0103n0:1576_11: Mahābhūtasamaññatoti tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavanti ettha upādārūpānīti bhūtāni,
anya-e0103n0:1576_13: Sā panāyametāsu bhūtasamaññā anaññatthavuttitāya upādārūpānaṃ aviparītaṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n0:1576_15: cakkhusamuddādīnaṃ nissayabhūtā cāti mahantāni bhūtānīti samaññāyiṃsu.
anya-e0103n0:1576_22: sāvakānaṃ upādāyupādāya vā sabbesampi bhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ nissayabhūtatāya mahantā bhūtā etesūti mahābhūtā.
anya-e0103n0:1576_27: Pathavīādayo ca dhātuyo ekasmimpi attabhāve aparimeyyappabhedā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n0:1576_28: Tasmā mahantā bahū anekasatasahassappabhedā bhūtāti mahābhūtā.
anya-e0103n0:1578_0: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti. –
anya-e0103n0:1579_1: So hi ucchinnabhavanettikatāya āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikattā ekantato “bhūto”ti vuccati, na itare,
anya-e0103n0:1579_3: Bhūto eva idha pūjāvasena “mahābhūto”ti vutto yathā “mahākhīṇāsavo,
