anya-e0103n0:1579_5: Imāsañca dhātūnaṃ anādimati saṃsāre pabandhavasena pavattamānānaṃ yathāvuttassa mahābhūtasseva santāne pariyosānappatti, nāññatra.
anya-e0103n0:1579_6: Tasmā mahābhūte bhūtā pariyosānaṃ pattāti mahābhūtā purimapade bhūta-
anya-e0103n0:1582_1: teneva “dhammā”tipi vuccanti ubhayathāpi nissattanijjīvatāya eva vibhāvanato.
anya-e0103n0:1582_5: Arūpānaṃ khaṇato rūpānaṃ khaṇassa nātiittaratāyāha “attano khaṇānurūpa”nti.
anya-e0103n0:1583_1: Sahuppannāva etāti etā catasso dhātuyo saha uppannāva saha pavattamānāva samānakāle labbhamānāpi avakaṃsato
anya-e0103n0:1583_3: kammajesu jīvitanavaketi ekekasmiṃ suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā visuṃ visuṃ aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya.
anya-e0103n0:1583_4: Yattha hi tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena pathavī,
anya-e0103n0:1584_1: Purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā aññamaññanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n0:1584_2: Ettha ca nanu pathaviyāpi lahubhāvo atthi.
anya-e0103n0:1584_3: Tathā hi sā “kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka”nti niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n0:1584_6: Garubhāvo eva hi pathavīdhātuyā garutaraṃ upādāya lahubhāvoti pariyāyena vutto sītabhāvo viya tejodhātuyā.
anya-e0103n0:1584_8: Ayampi vuttanayā eva lahutākāraṃ upādāya labbhanato.
anya-e0103n0:1584_9: Na hi paricchedavikāralakkhaṇāni paramatthato labbhanti nipphannarūpānaṃ avatthāvisesasabhāvato.
anya-e0103n0:1584_10: Tasmā paramatthasiddhaṃ garubhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1585_9: “Vuttaviparītappakārā”ti idaṃ bāhirānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathā sabbaso viññāṇavatthuviññattiindriyānaṃ anissayatā ca iriyāpathaviraho ca vuttavipariyāyo,
anya-e0103n0:1585_11: na lakkhaṇarūpassa viya kutocipi samuṭṭhānassa abhāvato utusamuṭṭhānatāya tāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1587_1: Tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotīti yehi mahābhūtehi sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n0:1587_4: tesaṃ attanā sahajātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā tato eva sandhāraṇavasena avassayo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1587_5: vuttanayena vā patiṭṭhā hutvā sahajātādivasena paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n0:1588_1: Yadipi aññamaññaābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti heṭṭhā dhātūnaṃ asamannāhāratā dassitā eva,
anya-e0103n0:1588_2: athāpi imināva nayena visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggaho kātabboti dassento “pathavīdhātu cetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n0:1588_7: Ahaṃ “pathavīdhātū”ti vā “paccayo homī”ti vā na jānātīti attani viya attano kicce ca ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n0:1588_8: upakārakassa viya upakattabbānampi ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “itarānipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1589_2: “Paccayato”ti hi iminā pathavīādīnaṃ aññāsādhāraṇo patiṭṭhābhāvādinā sesabhūtattayassa paccayabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1589_3: Idha pana yehi dhammehi pathavīādīnaṃ uppatti,
anya-e0103n0:1589_4: tesaṃ pathavīādīnañca anavasesato paccayabhāvavibhāgo vuccatīti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n0:1589_11: tena akammajānampi kesañci kammassa pariyāyapaccayabhāvo dīpito hoti.
anya-e0103n0:1589_13: Nanu ca kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ kammato aññenapi paccayena bhavitabbanti?
anya-e0103n0:1589_15: so pana kammagatikovāti paṭiyogīnivattanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1589_21: Vuttaṃ hi “kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1590_1: Pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hotīti paṭṭhāne arūpānaṃyeva upanissayapaccayassa āgatattā nippariyāyena rūpadhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayo natthi.
anya-e0103n0:1590_2: Sutte pana “puggalaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍaṃ upanissāyā”ti vacanato suttantikapariyāyena vinā abhāvo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1590_3: Cittaṃ janakapaccayo hotīti sahajātanissayāhārādivasena paccayo hontaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhāpakataṃ upādāya “janakapaccayo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1591_0: Evaṃ kammādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vasena dhātūsu paccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ dhātūnampi
anya-e0103n0:1591_1: vasena paccayavibhāgaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādinā uddisitvā puna “tattha
anya-e0103n0:1591_3: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātūti “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”nti ettha sāmaññato vuttā kammajapathavīdhātu.
anya-e0103n0:1591_4: Kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsanti kammajānaṃ āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sahuppattiyā attano upakārakānaṃ tāsaṃ upakārakato,
anya-e0103n0:1591_7: vigamābhāvato ca sahajātaaññamaññanissayaatthiavigatavasena ceva patiṭṭhāvasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0103n0:1591_9: tāsañca na janakavasena paccayo hoti asamuṭṭhāpakattā tāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1591_12: pathavīdhātuyā pana anaññasādhāraṇakiccaṃ sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvoti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “patiṭṭhāvasena cā”ti visuṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1591_16: Pathavīdhātuyā patiṭṭhābhāvo nāma sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃyevāti āha “na patiṭṭhāvasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1591_19: “Cittasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsa”ntiādīsu sukaro tantinayo netunti “cittaāhāra…pe…
anya-e0103n0:1592_3: tadubhayena ca yathāvuttasahajātādipaccayehi pavattamānā dhātuyo iminā visesena pavattantīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0103n0:1593_1: Tattha ekaṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tisso dhātuyo catudhā sampavattanti,
anya-e0103n0:1593_2: tisso dhātuyo paṭicca ekāva dhātu catudhā sampavattati,
anya-e0103n0:1593_3: dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve dhātuyo chadhā sampavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n0:1593_4: Attho pana pathavīādīsu ekekissā paccayabhāve itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko catukko,
anya-e0103n0:1593_5: tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayabhāve itarāya ekekissā paccayuppannatāti ayamaparo catukko,
anya-e0103n0:1593_11: dutiyatatiyāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayabhāve tattha tattha itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko chakko.
anya-e0103n0:1593_13: chadhā ca pavattamānānaṃ ekakadvikatikavasena tikadukaekakavasena ca yathākkamaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n0:1593_16: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṭiccavāre “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā,
anya-e0103n0:1593_18: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1594_2: Uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuvasena sijjhanato.
anya-e0103n0:1594_5: pathavīdhātuyā ca padhānabhāvanti patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi sātisayakiccattā tassā patiṭṭhāpanassa pādaṭṭhapanassa paccayo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n0:1594_7: Tattha ca garutarasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā sātisayo byāpāroti āha “pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātū”ti.
anya-e0103n0:1594_8: Tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0103n0:1594_9: Tiriyaṃ gatikāya vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo gahito.
anya-e0103n0:1594_10: Tattha ṭhitaṭṭhānato abhimukhaṃ pādassa haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1595_0: Ekekena mukhenāti “patthaṭattā pathavī”tiādinā vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanamukhena.
anya-e0103n0:1596_1: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “idañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1596_2: Suññataṃ avagāhatīti dhātumattatādassanena rūpakāyassa anattakataṃ vavatthāpayato tadanusārena nāmakāyassāpi
anya-e0103n0:1596_3: anattakatā supākaṭā hotīti sabbaso attasuññataṃ pariyogāhati tattha patiṭṭhahati.
anya-e0103n0:1596_4: Sattasaññaṃ samugghātetīti tato eva “satto poso itthī puriso”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ ayāthāvasaññaṃ ugghāteti samūhanati.
anya-e0103n0:1596_5: Vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamānoti sasantāne viya parasantānepi dhātumattatāya sudiṭṭhattā khīṇāsavo viya “ime sīhabyagghādayo vāḷamigā,
anya-e0103n0:1596_6: ime yakkharakkhasā”ti evamādivikappaṃ akaronto bhayabheravaṃ sahati abhibhavati.
anya-e0103n0:1596_10: Mahāpañño ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa karaṇato.
anya-e0103n0:1596_11: Tathā hidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ buddhicaritassa anukūlanti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n0:1599_2: Sarūpādito hi ñātassa pabhedo vuccamāno suviññeyyo hoti saṅkhepapubbakattā vitthārassa,
anya-e0103n0:1599_3: vitthāravidhinā ca saṅkhepavidhi saṅgayhatīti “samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1599_4: Atha vā “ko samādhī”tiādināpi samādhisseva pakārabhedo dassīyati,
anya-e0103n0:1599_5: bhāvanānisaṃsopi bhāvanānayanissito evāti adhippāyena “vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1599_6: Sabbappakāratoti palibodhupacchedādikassa sabbassa bhāvanāya pubbakiccassa karaṇappakārato ceva sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāvibhāvanato ca.
anya-e0103n0:1600_0: “Samattā hotī”ti vatvā tameva samattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “duvidhoyevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1600_2: Dasasu kammaṭṭhānesūti yāni heṭṭhā “upacārāvahānī”ti vuttāni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni, tesu.
anya-e0103n0:1600_3: Appanāpubbabhāgacittesūti appanāya pubbabhāgacittesu aṭṭhannaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgacittuppādesu.
anya-e0103n0:1602_4: “ekaggacittā”ti pana padena upacārasamādhinopi gahaṇaṃ hotīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “appanāsamādhibhāvanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n0:1602_5: Na kho paneteti ete bāhirakabhāvitā jhānadhammā cittekaggatāmattakarā.
anya-e0103n0:1602_6: Ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane “sallekhā”ti na vuccanti kilesānaṃ sallekhanapaṭipadā na hotīti katvā,
anya-e0103n0:1603_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā saṃkiliṭṭhatāya paramasambādhe ativiya saṅkaṭaṭṭhānabhūte saṃsārappavatte.
anya-e0103n0:1603_2: Tassa hi dullabhatāya appanādhigamampi anadhigamayamāno saṃvegabahulo puggalo upacārasamādhimhiyeva ṭhatvā
anya-e0103n0:1604_3: tena “iminā pakārena vuttanayā”ti sesābhiññānampi vuttappakāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n0:1604_4: Sati sati āyataneti purimabhavasiddhe abhiññādhigamassa kāraṇe vijjamāne.
anya-e0103n0:1604_10: Dhammassāti bhāvetabbassa ceva vibhāvetabbassa ca dhammassa.
anya-e0103n0:1605_0: Taṃ taṃ bhavagamikammaṃ ārabbha bhavapatthanāya anuppannāyapi kammassa katūpacitabhāveneva bhavapatthanākiccaṃ
anya-e0103n0:1606_1: udāhu itarāpīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “upacārasamādhibhāvanāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n0:1607_1: Rūpadhamme pariyāpannā vijjamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā cittassa abhāvena asantasamāva.
anya-e0103n0:1607_9: ubhayesaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ ekaṃ katvā evaṃ navā”ti vadanti.
